column4:
>

The following video shows real reactions of users experiencing Woojer Edge for the first time. All were filmed at E3, along Venice Beach, and Hollywood Boulevard in June 2019.
column12: >
column19:
>

Forget just hearing sound. We’re enabling you to feel sound. Woojer is a progressive sensation that boasts an amplified level of immersion. Imagine standing right next to a huge bass cabinet. You know that oomph you feel in your body? That energy pulsing into your bones? That’s what Woojer feels like.  It gives you everything that your headphones simply can’t.

column5:
>

 

Sound is air movement that typically spreads as an audible wave of pressure. Headphones gather that audible part, but you’re missing out on the movement. That’s where Woojer steps in. We enable you to enjoy both aspects of sound. 

Simply put on the strap or vest, connect the audio and start feeling the sound.

column1:
After all the feedback we received from 70K+ users, we decided to create a new series that everyone can dig. We’re bringing you the Woojer Edge series that’s flexible enough to cater to the music professional, casual gameplayer, film enthusiast, dedicated gamer, music lover and to anyone who’s simply curious enough to know what it means to feel sound. 

We’ve rigged this series with CSR APTX low-latency Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity and Texas Instruments built in analog headphone amplifier. We played around a bit with the arrangement of the transducers, improved the Osci, and kept the incredible sensation to ensure that the Woojer Edge Series is for everybody.

column3:
>

A powerful, high-fidelity haptic experience in transportable form. The Strap Edge is built to go with you, so you can have the Woojer Experience no matter where you are. Wear it around your hips, on your chest or cross-body, and then fold it up and place it in your backpack when you’re done. Amp up your workouts, vibe up your walk to work, and stimulate your gameplay. Don’t just move through the day, immerse yourself in the day.

column1: Submerge yourself in a powerful, high-fidelity haptic experience. The Vest Edge gives you 360 degrees of immersion, delivering accurate and detailed sensations that’ll raise your pulse. It’s got out-of-the-box stereo haptics, and is the perfect companion for at-home gaming and VR. If you’re a music pro- this’ll pump the low-frequencies through your body as it engages you in a unique and mesmerizing audio experience.
• Stereo haptic transducers array (2x sides, 2x back, 2x front)
•  TR52 – Woojer’s 52mm transducer  - 3X more powerful than the TR32

Download Woojer’s Haptic metronome app to work on your rhythm and tempo. Connect your strap or vest via bluetooth, play the metronome, and feel the device pulse on beat. It’s perfect for tempo training and practicing rhythm.
• Up to 8 hours playtime, depending on usage and volume/sensation level.

column2:
>

The evolution of the Woojer Edge series Strap and Vest goes back to the beginning of the year. We’re happy to share with you the long process of making these product a reality.

As with creating any hardware product,  we started off with sketches and basic 3D renders. Then we worked on perfecting the transducers and the technical components. We tested the products over and over, and created several prototypes- testing different fabrics and stitches to ensure were 100% happy.
column3:
>

Woojer Edge Demo Video

column1: Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company
Thank you all for an amazing journey!
Get your Woojer now on woojer.com
For support, reach out via www.woojer.com/s

The following video shows real reactions of users experiencing Woojer Edge for the first time. All were filmed at E3, along Venice Beach, and Hollywood Boulevard in June 2019.  Forget just hearing sound. We’re enabling you to feel sound. Woojer is a progressive sensation that boasts an amplified level of immersion. Imagine standing right next to a huge bass cabinet. You know that oomph you feel in your body? That energy pulsing into your bones? That’s what Woojer feels like.  It gives you everything that your headphones simply can’t.

Sound is air movement that typically spreads as an audible wave of pressure. Headphones gather that audible part, but you’re missing out on the movement. That’s where Woojer steps in. We enable you to enjoy both aspects of sound. Simply put on the strap or vest, connect the audio and start feeling the sound.

After all the feedback we received from 70K+ users, we decided to create a new series that everyone can dig. We’re bringing you the Woojer Edge series that’s flexible enough to cater to the music professional, casual gameplayer, film enthusiast, dedicated gamer, music lover and to anyone who’s simply curious enough to know what it means to feel sound. We’ve rigged this series with CSR APTX low-latency Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity and Texas Instruments built in analog headphone amplifier. We played around a bit with the arrangement of the transducers, improved the Osci, and kept the incredible sensation to ensure that the Woojer Edge Series is for everybody.

A powerful, high-fidelity haptic experience in transportable form. The Strap Edge is built to go with you, so you can have the Woojer Experience no matter where you are. Wear it around your hips, on your chest or cross-body, and then fold it up and place it in your backpack when you’re done. Amp up your workouts, vibe up your walk to work, and stimulate your gameplay. Don’t just move through the day, immerse yourself in the day.
1x patented, powerful, polyphonic & silent Osci TRX52 haptic transducer

Submerge yourself in a powerful, high-fidelity haptic experience. The Vest Edge gives you 360 degrees of immersion, delivering accurate and detailed sensations that’ll raise your pulse. It’s got out-of-the-box stereo haptics, and is the perfect companion for at-home gaming and VR. If you’re a music pro- this’ll pump the low-frequencies through your body as it engages you in a unique and mesmerizing audio experience.
6x patented, powerful, polyphonic & silent Osci TRX52 haptic transducer
Stereo haptic transducers array (2x sides, 2x back, 2x front)
TR52 – Woojer’s 52mm transducer  - 3X more powerful than the TR32
TRX52 – R52 with improved mechanicals & energy efficiency

Download Woojer’s Haptic metronome app to work on your rhythm and tempo. Connect your strap or vest via bluetooth, play the metronome, and feel the device pulse on beat. It’s perfect for tempo training and practicing rhythm.
Texas Instruments built-in analog headphones amplifier
Up to 8 hours playtime, depending on usage and volume/sensation level.
Built-in independent headphones & sensation volume control

The evolution of the Woojer Edge series Strap and Vest goes back to the beginning of the year. We’re happy to share with you the long process of making these product a reality.As with creating any hardware product,  we started off with sketches and basic 3D renders. Then we worked on perfecting the transducers and the technical components. We tested the products over and over, and created several prototypes- testing different fabrics and stitches to ensure were 100% happy. Woojer Edge Demo Video

EarFun Free on Amazon
column12:
linkId=9f3c02fa772456ecc28e17a2f1b26ef8"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">DE, UK, JP.

Buy on EarFun official store:https://www.myearfun.com/headphones/earfun-free...

Learn more: https://www.myearfun.com
column13: >EarFun Free is a pair of True Wireless EarBuds that integrates all of the latest mobile audio technologies to deliver incredible sound and an unforgettable ""EarFun"" experience.
column16:
>

 

EarFun Free will remain secure when you’re on-the-run, working out, or even playing paraglider! It has an ergonomic design that can perfectly fit in every unique ear shape.

We dedicated 240 days to researches with 3D printing and modeling tests, analyzed against thousands of human ear shapes. So in terms of comfort level, EarFun Free Earbuds are second to none.

Never worry about losses of earbuds no matter the case they’re in is closed or opened. EarFun Free’s magnetic tech creates a rock steady fit and attracts the earbuds to the case when they are near to it.
column17: >
column19:
>

 

The most frustrating part of wireless devices is that constant stopping to reset and reconnect is a pain when connection issues occur. To eliminate this hassle, we concentrated R &
column20:
D on creating a super stable, worry-free connection.

EarFun Free is powered by the most advanced Bluetooth 5.0 protocol which dramatically enhances the stability and connection of the earbuds. After a one-time setup, the earbuds will automatically turn on and pair with your smart device. Just open the case and wear them,  EarFun Free works flawlessly within a range of 15 Meters (49 Feet).

 

 

Take EarFun Free with you even when kayaking or surfing! EarFun Free is protected by the Innovative SweatShield Technology. We developed this unique technology that hermetically seals the internal circuitry so EarFun Free will keep every single bead of sweat on the outside where it belongs.     

Most of the “waterproof earbuds” on the market use the nano-coating method to resist water. However, the coating is easily corroded after only 1-3 months usage. On the contrary, EarFun Free’s SweatShield Technology is immune to corrosive sweat as well as water.

 

 

Graphene is an incredibly strong and lightweight latticed carbon super-material that has incredible electrical conductivity. These unique properties make it the perfect material for compact audio drivers. They use less power than traditional drivers to produce better sound in smaller packages efficiently. Compared to non-graphene drivers, they are more accurately reproducing sound with more clarity, separation, and details. The graphene driver in EarFun Free delivers sound on par with larger more expensive speakers without the bulk or expense.

 

 

No wires, no worries. Power up your EarFun Free by simply placing the charging case on the wireless charging pad. If you already have a Qi charging pad, you can use it to juice up EarFun Free as well.

To provide over 4000-hours standby time, EarFun Free particularly designed the circuit with exceptionally low-power consumption and equipped with the high-quality lithium battery from VDL. More than 4000 hours which is about 6 months of standby time and with the current lower than 50 μA, EarFun Free is now 10 times the standby time of competitors. It undoubtedly renders EarFun Free the longest standby true wireless earbuds!

Voice command makes it more convenient control of EarFun Free. You can easily access your voice assistant to make a phone call, choose your music and more. Using this process, you don’t even need to take your phone out of your pocket or touch it.
column22:
/>

Built-in MEMS microphone with noise cancellation assures your crystal-clear hands-free call in noisy circumstances.

Many earbuds suffer from imprecise touch control that can result in false signals that interrupt your listening experience or accidentally hang up a call. It can also be difficult to exert control when working out. EarFun solves this problem with a special control button that triggers command with only 80g of force, about half of the pressure needed by typical earbuds. The result is smooth and accurate control changes only when you want them.
column24: >Say Goodbye to annoying fingerprints
column25:
>

 

Every customer of the EarFun will receive this Thank You Card once the contribution delivered. After getting your EarFun Free, you can share your story with EarFun on any channels. For your sharing, we will donate 1 dollar to UNICEF. Even 1 dollar could make a difference! We appreciate it a lot for your kindness!
column26:
>We've started mass production of black color in early May, so all of the black color EarFun Frees will be shipped within May. For the white color, we will start the mass production in June, and these will be shipped at the end of June.

EarFun was established in 2018 by an experienced group of industrial designers, acoustic engineers and music enthusiasts who shared the goal of creating next-generation wireless audio devices. The EarFun team is driven by a passion for music and a commitment to delivering solutions that use the latest technology to improve sound for audio products.

To bring our vision for creating the ultimate true wireless earbuds to reality, our team has dedicated the past year to every aspect of the product from design to delivery to ensure a great end-to-end experience for their loyal customers.

EarFun believes that technology can enhance modern lifestyles and seamlessly fit within the fabric of our lives.

column1:
0,"

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

column7: >We’re LSTN Sound Co. For the last three years, we’ve been making beautiful headphones with incredible sound quality. Using proceeds from our sales, we’ve been able to give thousands of people hearing worldwide through our partner, Starkey Hearing Foundation.
column13: >We believe that what's good for business should also be good for the world.

column1: Working to restore hearing around the globe isn't just an afterthought for LSTN, it's the reason LSTN was started. Every purchase from LSTN Sound Co. helps someone hear for the first time, or the first time in a long time. Our team has already traveled to Peru, Sri Lanka, Indonesia, China, Uganda, and Kenya where we helped give the gift of hearing to over 20,000 people. Next month, we will be in Tlaxcala and Toluca, Mexico helping thousands more. This is the heart and soul behind LSTN Sound Co.
By pledging today, portions of future speaker purchases that YOU helped bring to life on Indiegogo will help thousands of people hear for the first time.
WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

One year ago, we set out to create the most amazing Bluetooth speakers possible. After several prototypes and countless hours of acoustic refinement, we have our final prototypes and they are stunning. Now we need $20,000 to finish developing necessary tooling and cover our initial production costs to bring both models to life.
By funding this campaign, you'll be one of the first people in the world to experience the premium sound of LSTN speakers.

While we don't anticipate delays in delivery, we will be sure to keep our backers up to date on all activity in the event that we experience any setbacks. LSTN has produced headphones and various accessories with our factory for three years.
We've consistently provided high-quality products to our customers with efficiency
column2: we’ve got thousands of satisfied customers to prove it! Our team is confident that we have the manufacturing and fulfillment capabilities to successfully complete this project once it's been funded.

column1: The Satellite speaker will ship before Christmas. The Apollo speaker will ship by the end of January. We’ll keep you updated with our production progress as we have updates.
Absolutely! If your speakers have malfunctioned for some reason, you can exchange them for brand new ones within one year. Please email hello@lstnsound.co with any issues.

How is my purchase helping others?

Every purchase helps someone hear for the first time through the Starkey Hearing Foundation. Learn more about LSTN's contribution.

column2: >Thank you for landing on our page!
column3: >Have you ever faced a situation where you need to buy many items and devices separately?
column4: >A soundbar for TV, wireless speaker, stereos, charger, home decoration, ice bucket....
column5: >...and that you'll have to pay a lot of money to acquire all those things?
column6: >The problem has been solved!
column7: >ZONE combines all those and even a lot more in a simple, compact and decorative item.
column9: >ZONE is a high-end luxury product. It is the first wireless and versatile Bluetooth speaker in the world made from durable and certified eco-friendly materials.
column10: >ZONE combines many items and functions in one simple and compact device. The design of ZONE has already gained worldwide recognition.
column11: >With the help of all the orders in our first Indiegogo Campaign we were able to go on with designing ZONE. At the moment ZONE is ready for production, but we are needing your support to fulfil the factory minimum order quantity. The funding type was marked accidentally ""flexible"" but it really is fixed. After a couple of more backers we are having everything ready for the production.
column12: > It is easy to take Zone with you. Just fill it with your belongings and put it in your backpack.
column13: >What makes ZONE so special? It is a totally new kind of luxury wireless speaker and it combines many functions which no other speaker has ever done.
column20: >You can do a huge amount of things with the ZONE. Find your own way!
column21: >ZONE has been given a worldwide recognition, because it creates sound in a totally different way from any other speaker. ZONE has three balanced sound allocation methods:
column24: >3. The structure makes the sound extremely deep
column26: >The structure of ZONE is modular. That is one of the reasons why ZONE is a high-end quality and a durable HiFi speaker. Every part of ZONE is an independent high-quality system and easy to replace if necessary.

column1: ZONE generates a true 360-degree Super Powerful High-Fidelity sound, which can be understood only when you experience it. ZONE also contains RGB sound reactive lights with different light modes.
""It's strange how this speaker can create such a realistic sound""

column2: >ZONE has also a equalizer - you can choose pop, rock, vocal or super bass mode.
column4: >ZONE provides you not only with HiFi sound but it can even be used as a saunapail, ZONE is Designed From Finland - Find your own way to use ZONE!
column9: >ZONE is a perfect companion for Hot Yoga.
column11: >​ZONE has even a rather exceptional design - and a wide range of connection possibilities. You can easily carry it everywhere. The battery will last at least 10 hours, so you can listen to the music all night long.
column13: >ZONE is much more than a HiFi speaker, it offers you and your friend relaxing moment.
column15: >You can create your preferred mood for any occasion with the RGB sound reactive lights.
column18: >There are RGB sound reactive lights with various modes! You can control lights as you desire.
column19: >ZONE is also a flashlight with a motion sensor:
column21: >When lifting ZONE, a bright LED light starts to glow the area beneath it. You can find your way even in the dark with the help of the ZONE by just lifting it.
column22: >ZONE has also an USB power bank -function!
column23: >You'll never run out of battery on your mobile device when ZONE is around. It charges any device with the USB plug.

column1: ZONE has a limited one-year warranty, but we promise that if you’re using ZONE as it's been designed, it will last long time.
column2: >The structure of ZONE is modular. If some parts need maintenance it would be easy to replace them.
column3: >We are proud to tell that ZONE is not a disposable product. It's been made of durable and eco-friendly parts, which creates it a high-end quality product with reasonable cost.
column5: >ZONE is ready for production, but we are needing your help to fulfil the factory minimum order quantity.
column6: >The upcoming process we will include:
column9: >3. Shipping

","Thank you for landing on our page!Have you ever faced a situation where you need to buy many items and devices separately?A soundbar for TV, wireless speaker, stereos, charger, home decoration, ice bucket.... ...and that you'll have to pay a lot of money to acquire all those things?The problem has been solved!ZONE combines all those and even a lot more in a simple, compact and decorative item. ZONE is a high-end luxury product. It is the first wireless and versatile Bluetooth speaker in the world made from durable and certified eco-friendly materials.ZONE combines many items and functions in one simple and compact device. The design of ZONE has already gained worldwide recognition.With the help of all the orders in our first Indiegogo Campaign we were able to go on with designing ZONE. At the moment ZONE is ready for production, but we are needing your support to fulfil the factory minimum order quantity. The funding type was marked accidentally ""flexible"" but it really is fixed. After a couple of more backers we are having everything ready for the production. It is easy to take Zone with you. Just fill it with your belongings and put it in your backpack.What makes ZONE so special? It is a totally new kind of luxury wireless speaker and it combines many functions which no other speaker has ever done.You can do a huge amount of things with the ZONE. Find your own way!ZONE has been given a worldwide recognition, because it creates sound in a totally different way from any other speaker. ZONE has three balanced sound allocation methods:1. Omnidirectional sound2. Direct sound3. The structure makes the sound extremely deepThe structure of ZONE is modular. That is one of the reasons why ZONE is a high-end quality and a durable HiFi speaker. Every part of ZONE is an independent high-quality system and easy to replace if necessary.

column1: ZONE generates a true 360-degree Super Powerful High-Fidelity sound, which can be understood only when you experience it. ZONE also contains RGB sound reactive lights with different light modes.
""It's strange how this speaker can create such a realistic sound""

ZONE has also a equalizer - you can choose pop, rock, vocal or super bass mode. ZONE provides you not only with HiFi sound but it can even be used as a saunapail, ZONE is Designed From Finland - Find your own way to use ZONE!ZONE is a perfect companion for Hot Yoga. ​ZONE has even a rather exceptional design - and a wide range of connection possibilities. You can easily carry it everywhere. The battery will last at least 10 hours, so you can listen to the music all night long.ZONE is much more than a HiFi speaker, it offers you and your friend relaxing moment. You can create your preferred mood for any occasion with the RGB sound reactive lights.There are RGB sound reactive lights with various modes! You can control lights as you desire.ZONE is also a flashlight with a motion sensor:When lifting ZONE, a bright LED light starts to glow the area beneath it. You can find your way even in the dark with the help of the ZONE by just lifting it.ZONE has also an USB power bank -function!You'll never run out of battery on your mobile device when ZONE is around. It charges any device with the USB plug.Just use your imagination.

ZONE has a limited one-year warranty, but we promise that if you’re using ZONE as it's been designed, it will last long time.The structure of ZONE is modular. If some parts need maintenance it would be easy to replace them.We are proud to tell that ZONE is not a disposable product. It's been made of durable and eco-friendly parts, which creates it a high-end quality product with reasonable cost.ZONE is ready for production, but we are needing your help to fulfil the factory minimum order quantity.The upcoming process we will include:1. What is a Smart Acoustic Guitar?

column2: >''It just sounds amazing. This is really just an incredible innovation. This would be a solid buy.” - Guitar World Magazine
>One of “The Best New Guitars of NAMM 2018.” -Music Radar

column1: The HyVibe Guitar is a connected guitar that can be controlled by our Android &
column2: iOS mobile applications in real time! The app allows you to perform more complex functions such as creating your own effects, sharing recordings, effect presets, changing acoustic settings with our equalizer, managing your backing tracks, and programming banks/presets on your guitar.

column1: HyVibe Guitar Effects Sampler: an overview of what the HyVibe Guitar can do
HyVibe Speaker (jam along with your favorite tracks)
HyVibe Reverb Effect, performed by Ben Rungsrithong
The HyVibe Guitar in a live performance, with Ash Orphan
Many more friends have played and been blown away by the HyVibe Guitar

column2:
/>


 

What's Under the Hood?

Our patent-pending technology is based on vibration control. Our system combines sensors, multiple actuators, embedded algorithms, and a PCB designed to be the fastest sound card in the world.

Our low latency system allows us to control feedback and transform the natural vibrations of the guitar from the top plate, by the bridge where the instrument performs best.

This sets us apart from anything else on the market today.

Simplified description of vibration control technology on resonance transformation:

column1:
Guitar Specifications

*This is a prototype picture. The actual HyVibe Guitar is a cutaway dreadnought style.

**Left-handed models available

 

The HyVibe 'Inside' Story

 

Our Story

 

Our story begins in 2010. Adrien was in his apartment in Camden Town, London. He put an actuator connected to his smart phone on top of his acoustic guitar. He realized a huge potential for exciting acoustic guitars, but also felt disappointed by the sound quality that he heard. 

This inspired him to create a research project at Ircam. This evolved into the Ircam SmartInstrument Project. During this project Adrien led a growing team of 10 researchers, engineers, musicians and technicians dedicated to knowledge an music creation with vibration control technology.  It was here that Adrien met Francois Beaulier who is also a Co-Founder of HyVibe 

After 7 years of research and some incredible breakthroughs, Adrien wanted to develop musical instruments that he could share with the entire world. Together with Matthew Volsky who Adrien met through a childhood friend, the three started in HyVibe in early 2017 and have been working on the HyVibe Guitar ever since.   

 

Production has started. Here are pictures of our plastic tooling:

 

Any questions? 

Please contact us on Messenger or send us an email at contact@hyvibe.audio, and we will be glad to speak with you directly.

","What is a Smart Acoustic Guitar?
''It just sounds amazing. This is really just an incredible innovation. This would be a solid buy.” - Guitar World Magazine
One of “The Best New Guitars of NAMM 2018.” -Music Radar

The HyVibe Guitar is a connected guitar that can be controlled by our Android & iOS mobile applications in real time! The app allows you to perform more complex functions such as creating your own effects, sharing recordings, effect presets, changing acoustic settings with our equalizer, managing your backing tracks, and programming banks/presets on your guitar.

Eneste måten å få tak i plata på vil være gjennom forhåndsbestilling på denne siden. Trykk på ""Get this perk"" i menyen til høyre og velg hvor mange plater du ønsker! The only way to get your hands on this record is through pre-order on this page. Choose ""Get this perk"" on the menu to the right and choose the number you want to order.

English below!

For 10 år siden slapp Taliban Airways ut Blues For The Almighty. Vi ønsker å feire dette med å trykke opp en remikset og remastret versjon av plata på nytt med tidligere uutgitte spor. Denne gangen i et format den aldri tidligere har vært utgitt på, nemlig vinyl. 

BFTA vil bli trykket i et begrensa opplag, og den eneste måten du kan sikre deg ditt eksemplar på er gjennom å bidra i crowdfundinga. Det er mulig å bestille flere eksemplarer med en liten rabatt  gjennom å velge «perks» på siden. Utover forhåndsbestilling vil det bli vanskelig å få tak i plata da vi kun kommer til å trykke et knippe ekstra som medlemmene i bandet vil disponere.

 


Godt nytt år!


Our debut full-length album ""Blues For The Almighty"" celebrates its 10-year anniversary this year, and to commemorate this we have decided to repress a remixed and remastered edition, with bonus tracks not featured on the original, in a limited number on vinyl. In fact, the only way to get hold of this release would be to contribute to the crowdfunding campaign. However, it is possible to order additional copies by selecting ""perks"" on the campaign website. A few extra copies will be printed for band members and close friends, but besides that the album will not be for sale anywhere else.

with bonus tracks not featured on the original

Happy New Year!

Aircom believes sound should be experienced and not just heard. It is the difference between hearing your favorite song in the car or physically being at the festival soaking in the sounds and energy of the performer. Using the Aircom A3b will create that sound experience. 

Aircom's Airflow audio technology delivers sound through an airtube so it can breathe more and pick up dimension and details that many traditional wired headphones miss or tune out. The result is a feeling that you are at a live performance. 

 

The figure below shows the components of the Airflow audio technology. #1 represents the earbuds, which are empty inside because the speakers are not there. The speakers are about 6 inch away inside the speaker chamber. These empty earbuds add to the total air space of the headphone and more air means better sound development. #2 shows the airtubes connecting the earbuds to the speaker chamber and this is where the bulk of additional air space is achieved. No other in-ear headphones can match this amount of air space. #3 are the speaker chambers and this is where the speakers are housed, the Bluetooth chipset, and the battery.
column2:
showinfo=0"" width=""560""> 

There is an audio ""sweet spot"" that resides in every recording studio. This sonic sweet spot is the proper distance/space between the speakers and your eardrums, within the acoustic environment. The distance must be enough to allow the sound waves to fully develop before hitting your eardrums. It is for this same reason that we do not place our ears within close proximity to our sound system speakers, even at a low volume. 

 

 

Besides having the Airflow audio technology for the sound experience, the Aircom A3b is designed to fit your lifestyle whether that is a peaceful isolation on the subway commute to work, a few hours a week in the gym, or just talking to family and friends. The airtubes above the speaker chamber and the cable below it acts like a suspension and creates a weightless feel for the earbuds and it also helps that the earbuds are empty inside, reducing any weight on the ear. Beyond the weightlessness on the ears and the suspension to handle the bumps in life, the A3b has multiple size earrings that provide a secure and comfortable fit for any size ear. With earring design, the earbud stays securely in the ear and then the eartips are used for making that perfect seal for optimal sound. 

 

Whether you are on the way to work, working out, or just relaxing, the A3b was not only designed to keep up with and fit your lifestyle but it also enhances it through Airflow audio technology, which delivers a sound experience to everything you hear. 

 

 

Every share counts. Help us out by sharing with family and friends. Not only are you being super awesome for sharing this great Early Bird discounts with friends, but you're also helping us bring Airflow Wireless to life! Hit one of the buttons below and tag your friends who could use this. Thank you for your support! 

 

 

On a sunny Southern California day, founder - Ryan Tsui, marketing - Lucas George, and Art Director - Amy Sun were spit balling ideas about what the next Aircom headphone should be. Since the Airflow audio technology was already changing the game in the wired headphones market, it was not much of a stretch to think we could do the same in the wireless headphones market. So, the Aircom A3b, the world's first Airflow audio wireless headphone was born.

Where is the charging port?
The micro-USB charging port is at the bottom of the left speaker chamber. Lift cap to access it.

Is the headphone waterproof?
No, but the headphone is coated and is water resistant. However, the earbuds can be submerged in water to be washed and then hang upside down to air dry.

How do I customize the fit of the earbuds?
Using the provided accessories, change out the eartips and earrings to the size that fits most comfortably and securely.

Is there a warranty?
One year limited warranty.

How long will the battery last for one full charge?
The battery will last 4.5 hours at 75% output and 8 hours at 40% output. 

How long does it take to get a full charge?
It takes only 2.5 hours to get a full charge. 

Which devices are compatible with Aircom A3b?
Aircom A3b is compatible with any Bluetooth enabled device.

What are the color options?
Currently, Aircom A3b is only available in black.

column2: >an amazing portable bluetooth speaker which provides a massive sound and deep bass.
>Watch this video and learn more about mc.brick.
>How mc.brick can produce such rich sound and deep bass?

>Thanks to its two 40mm drivers, which represents a total power of 10 watts, but also thanks to its really large passive subwoofer of 100x25mm - - 4*1 inches, which almost stretches to the full width of the speaker, mc.brick is able to deliver an amazing high quality and lound sound with outstanding and deep bass.

Key features:

column1: • Large speaker cavity inside for excellent sound effects
• Buddy-jack audio output function to connect 2 or more mc.brick together

column2: >Connect or plug mc.brick to any device!

>Such as all the Mova Systems portable speakers, mc.brick can easily connect to any device, such as phones, smartphones, tablets, laptop, desktops and much more, using one of the three following methods:

column1: <li>Tap-to-pair using NFC technology to get a quick connection to a
device knowing this is available on most of smartphones. Just activate
the NFC functionality on your device if it is not done yet and approach
it to the right upper part of mc.brick. The connection is made automatically and you can enjoy mc.brick immediately.
• Your device is not NFC friendly ? This is not a problem as you can pair mc.brick using the classic Bluetooth method.
• Anyway, mc.brick can also be connected to a device using the 3.5MM audio jack supplied. You can also connect a mc.brick speaker to another speaker using the audio jack output

column2: >Do not lose contact and remain connected with others!
>mc.brick has a built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls. It does not

column1: ","mc.speakers by Mova SystemsYou won't believe your ears
meet our Mova Systems portable wireless speakers

mc.brick and mc.mini are small portable wireless speakers designed and made to provide a high quality sound.Thanks to their size, mc.brick and mc.mini fits in hand and can slip into a bag or in the pocket.mc.brick video presentationmc.mini video presentationWith up to 10 hours of battery life, these amazing speakers can be taken everywhere. Whether at the beach, doing camping, at the pool, doing sports, in the bathroom or simply at home, mc.speakers face all the situations ensuring a massive and rich sound. 1. Speakers2. Support and downloadsmc.brick has been designed to provide a massive sound with deep bass while mc.mini has been made to be as small as possible without overlooking the sound quality. Which one will be yours ?
an amazing portable bluetooth speaker which provides a massive sound and deep bass.
Watch this video and learn more about mc.brick.
How mc.brick can produce such rich sound and deep bass?

Thanks to its two 40mm drivers, which represents a total power of 10 watts, but also thanks to its really large passive subwoofer of 100x25mm - - 4*1 inches, which almost stretches to the full width of the speaker, mc.brick is able to deliver an amazing high quality and lound sound with outstanding and deep bass.Key features:
Large speaker cavity inside for excellent sound effects
Buddy-jack audio output function to connect 2 or more mc.brick together
Connect or plug mc.brick to any device!

Such as all the Mova Systems portable speakers, mc.brick can easily connect to any device, such as phones, smartphones, tablets, laptop, desktops and much more, using one of the three following methods:
Tap-to-pair using NFC technology to get a quick connection to a
device knowing this is available on most of smartphones. Just activate
the NFC functionality on your device if it is not done yet and approach
it to the right upper part of mc.brick. The connection is made automatically and you can enjoy mc.brick immediately.
Your device is not NFC friendly ? This is not a problem as you can pair mc.brick using the classic Bluetooth method.
Anyway, mc.brick can also be connected to a device using the 3.5MM audio jack supplied. You can also connect a mc.brick speaker to another speaker using the audio jack output
Do not lose contact and remain connected with others!
mc.brick has a built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls. It does not
matter what you are doing or where you are, you will remain connected
with others while using mc.brick and your device. Just press a button or use Siri to pick a call and to talk.
Choose among 5 colors and get the mc.brick that suits you!
Customize mc.brick and make it yours!

Change the cover and mix the colors… We are sure you will be able to create the mc.brick you are looking for by choosing among our 5 cover colors (same colors as main ones). The additional top covers can be purchased separately.
What’s inside? Just have a look!

We are three young entrepreneurs who had and still have the desire to develop and commercialize connected objects that could improve people’s lives. We started working on our wireless portable speakers more than one year ago and we set up the company in last August, once we were sure about the products and about where we want to go.

Our main goal is to provide devices and accessories of high quality with excellent value for money. We have the will to invest heavily in research and development to improve our products but also to develop new products.

column2:
>

CUSTOMIZABLE HEADPHONES 
THAT ADJUST TO YOUR HEARING
 

B&
column3: B PURE adapts to your hearing and has more features that are not on the market so far — a new headphone experience <b>designed &amp

>

LORENZ KELLER
Switzerland's best-known gadget tester has taken a close look at the B&
column5: >
column6:
>

 

Music adjusted to You!
column7:
>


 

PURE is the worlds first customizable headphone that adapts to your unique hearing. By pairing advanced algorithms with exact hearing results we can create an incredibly accurate sound wave that is adjusted to your ears. Experience music like never before and hear the full spectrum of your sound.

column4: >
column6:
>
 

SOUND AND DESIGN 
TUNED FOR YOUR EARS

PURE adapts to the listener's personal hearing, increasing sound quality for your ears with the most accurate hearing technology that has been built into a headphone so far. Apart from this key feature B&
column7: B PURE offers many other features that you can adjust to fit your lifestyle.

column1: • Exchangeable Ear Cups to adjust your comfort or adapt to different situations.
• Active Noise Canceling for a perfect isolation
• Integrated charging cable to charge on the go (Fast Fueling)

column4:
>
 

Hear every bit of your music! It is now possible to do an intelligent and individual hearing test to make your headphone unique and adjusted to you. Our technology measures your personal hearing signature which is then saved to your headphone. PURE can store multiple profiles, so feel free to add your friends profiles too.
column6:
>
 

With our flexible switch system you can easily change between on-ear and over-ear Ear Cups to find your comfort and get the best of both worlds. We measured many different heads and ears to make sure you have the most comfortable fit for yourself. Feel free to switch and adapt to different situations: both sizes are included, on-ear &
column11: B PURE has an integrated cable so you can charge on the go. And thanks to Fast Fueling your headphone is fully charged within minutes. Nowadays you can find USB ports almost everywhere you go. So when traveling with your B&
column12: B PURE you will always have everything you need to listen to your music.
column15:
>
 

Our intelligent play/pause system understands when it needs to pause. So when you take off your headphone it pauses automatically. When you put your headphone back on it continues playing. This function can also be turned off using the B&
column19:
>
 

Of course you can use the normal size change mechanism. But how often has it happened that you had to reset your perfect fit because the size changed by itself? It is now possible to lock your perfect fit using the Size Lock. Simply turn the wheel clockwise to lock it and counter-clockwise to unlock it.
column22:
>
 

Turn on Noise Canceling to filter out annoying frequencies in loud surroundings. You can turn it off whenever you want using the B&
column26:
>
 

We installed a dual microphone with CVC (Clear Voice Canceling) for clear phone calls without disturbing background noises. Dual = one microphone to filter out disturbing frequencies (similar to Noise Canceling) and one microphone for a clear voice.
column31:
showinfo=0"">
 


Music unites and this brought us together with the Formula 1 Team Scuderia Toro Rosso. They are always confronted with music as it motivates them before their races. We are looking forward to supplying them with our headphones to help push them for maximum power.
Check out their statements in the video above.
column33:
>

Amplifon — Market Leader in Audiology
column35:
showinfo=0"">
 

Everybody has a different perception of sound as the ear is a very sensitive part of the body. Therefore we came together with experts in audiology to find out what it needs to create a perfect sound profile. We developed an APP that measures your personal hearing, which is then saved to your headphone.
This makes your headphone unique and 100% adjusted to you.

column3:
>
 

Everybody hears differently as every single person has a different hearing ability. Some do not hear as good as others as they may have a hearing loss in a specific frequency range. So when we started the project we were looking for a solution to get the best sound quality for everybody. A headphone that simply adjusts to your personal hearing ability. We asked ourselves how can we get the perfect sound setting for your ears? So we teamed up with the market leader in audiology and Swiss engineers &
column4: designers to create a completely new sound concept adjusted to your ears. We developed an APP on which you can do a hearing test so you can find out your unique sound profile to take your music to the next level.
column7:
>


Measure your personal hearing 

Create your personal profile using the B&
column8: B PURE App. You can create multiple profiles for you and your friends. Your hearing will be tested using 5 different frequency levels: 500Hz, 1KHz, 2KHz, 4KHz, and 6KHz. In the video below you will be able to see the measurement procedure for one of the frequency levels (1KHz).
column10:
showinfo=0"">


Test for each frequency level:
1. Play the tone
2. Listen carefully and press the button once the tone can be heard silently.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 three times to validate your result.

Validation for true results! 
Each frequency level requires 3 trials to make sure the result is correct. This is in case you may have pressed too early or too late.
Exact hearing results = PURE sound quality!

column1: At the Muba fair (Switzerland) we received the chance to show people our newest prototypes. They were able to hold it and test all the features. What we really appreciated was that people already wanted to buy a headphone at this early point in time. The fair was a great success and we got a lot of great and honest feedbacks. After the fair was over we knew that we were soon ready for our launch on Kickstarter.
column6: B PURE's headband is made with high qualitative, strong but also flexible material. See for yourself:

>
 

 Charging Options
column7:
>
 

Frequency Response of Generic Sound
column8:
>
 

Our sound concept is extremely balanced. The right amount of bass to give you enough power without having any loss in the higher frequency areas. Thanks to our balanced mid and treble ranges your music will be very clear and you can enjoy an overall wide spectrum of frequencies. This is the frequency response curve when you are listening in generic mode. Feel free to define your own hearing profile to take your music to the next level.

column1:
Controls

There is a touch panel on the right side of the headphone. 

These are all the controls:
Play/pause or enter/exit phone calls: Press mechanical Button in the middle (Press and hold the center button to turn your headphone ON or OFF)
Previous song: Swipe backwards (from right to left)
Volume: Tap the top or the bottom of the circle

column6:
>
 

We wanted to find a way to reflect our gratitude to everyone who supports B&
column7:
B Pure, while also showing you what further possibilities our headphone concept has — Sport Ear Cups. 

You will be the first and only to to have these special Kickstarter Edition Ear Cups. The backer-exclusive Ear Cups make you stand out from the crowd and show you're listening through an exclusive part of the future of headphone design.

Note: Upon reaching the $500'000 stretch goal, you will be able to choose between the normal cushion fabric or the sweat resistant cushion fabric. We will contact backers to confirm their preference before we ship.

column6:
>
 

Why Crowdfunding?

We have made great experiences with Crowdfunding. Crowdfunding offers a great opportunity to give an insight behind the scenes of a product. It is really important to us that we can show our supporters what is actually possible with headphones. We have gone a long way developing the best quality and creating a headphone that covers all your needs. Now we need your support to start the production. We have done a lot of tests and prototyping — now we are ready!

 

Timeline

MAY 2015 — SEPTEMBER 2016...

...we released our first headphone generation. It was a success and a door opener for more possibilities. During this time we gathered a lot of experience and learned what is required to launch a successful product. The first generation was successfully integrated into the market.

B&
column7:
B PURE — Start of a new era

","CUSTOMIZABLE HEADPHONES THAT ADJUST TO YOUR HEARING B&B PURE adapts to your hearing and has more features that are not on the market so far — a new headphone experience designed & engineered in Switzerland!

column1: Cooperation PartnersLORENZ KELLERSwitzerland's best-known gadget tester has taken a close look at the B&B PURE.  Music adjusted to You!  PURE is the worlds first customizable headphone that adapts to your unique hearing. By pairing advanced algorithms with exact hearing results we can create an incredibly accurate sound wave that is adjusted to your ears. Experience music like never before and hear the full spectrum of your sound.

Additional Features      SOUND AND DESIGN TUNED FOR YOUR EARSPURE adapts to the listener's personal hearing, increasing sound quality for your ears with the most accurate hearing technology that has been built into a headphone so far. Apart from this key feature B&B PURE offers many other features that you can adjust to fit your lifestyle.
Exchangeable Ear Cups to adjust your comfort or adapt to different situations.
Active Noise Canceling for a perfect isolation
Integrated charging cable to charge on the go (Fast Fueling)
Integrated microphone with Clear Voice Canceling (CVC)

Hear every bit of your music! It is now possible to do an intelligent and individual hearing test to make your headphone unique and adjusted to you. Our technology measures your personal hearing signature which is then saved to your headphone. PURE can store multiple profiles, so feel free to add your friends profiles too.   With our flexible switch system you can easily change between on-ear and over-ear Ear Cups to find your comfort and get the best of both worlds. We measured many different heads and ears to make sure you have the most comfortable fit for yourself. Feel free to switch and adapt to different situations: both sizes are included, on-ear & over-ear.   B&B PURE has an integrated cable so you can charge on the go. And thanks to Fast Fueling your headphone is fully charged within minutes. Nowadays you can find USB ports almost everywhere you go. So when traveling with your B&B PURE you will always have everything you need to listen to your music.   Our intelligent play/pause system understands when it needs to pause. So when you take off your headphone it pauses automatically. When you put your headphone back on it continues playing. This function can also be turned off using the B&B PURE APP.  Of course you can use the normal size change mechanism. But how often has it happened that you had to reset your perfect fit because the size changed by itself? It is now possible to lock your perfect fit using the Size Lock. Simply turn the wheel clockwise to lock it and counter-clockwise to unlock it.   Turn on Noise Canceling to filter out annoying frequencies in loud surroundings. You can turn it off whenever you want using the B&B PURE APP.  We installed a dual microphone with CVC (Clear Voice Canceling) for clear phone calls without disturbing background noises. Dual = one microphone to filter out disturbing frequencies (similar to Noise Canceling) and one microphone for a clear voice.   Scuderia Toro Rosso — Racing Team  Music unites and this brought us together with the Formula 1 Team Scuderia Toro Rosso. They are always confronted with music as it motivates them before their races. We are looking forward to supplying them with our headphones to help push them for maximum power.Check out their statements in the video above. Amplifon — Market Leader in Audiology Everybody has a different perception of sound as the ear is a very sensitive part of the body. Therefore we came together with experts in audiology to find out what it needs to create a perfect sound profile. We developed an APP that measures your personal hearing, which is then saved to your headphone.This makes your headphone unique and 100% adjusted to you.

Everybody hears differently as every single person has a different hearing ability. Some do not hear as good as others as they may have a hearing loss in a specific frequency range. So when we started the project we were looking for a solution to get the best sound quality for everybody. A headphone that simply adjusts to your personal hearing ability. We asked ourselves how can we get the perfect sound setting for your ears? So we teamed up with the market leader in audiology and Swiss engineers & designers to create a completely new sound concept adjusted to your ears. We developed an APP on which you can do a hearing test so you can find out your unique sound profile to take your music to the next level.  Measure your personal hearing Create your personal profile using the B&B PURE App. You can create multiple profiles for you and your friends. Your hearing will be tested using 5 different frequency levels: 500Hz, 1KHz, 2KHz, 4KHz, and 6KHz. In the video below you will be able to see the measurement procedure for one of the frequency levels (1KHz). Test for each frequency level: 1. Play the tone2. Listen carefully and press the button once the tone can be heard silently.3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 three times to validate your result.Validation for true results! Each frequency level requires 3 trials to make sure the result is correct. This is in case you may have pressed too early or too late.Exact hearing results = PURE sound quality!

At the Muba fair (Switzerland) we received the chance to show people our newest prototypes. They were able to hold it and test all the features. What we really appreciated was that people already wanted to buy a headphone at this early point in time. The fair was a great success and we got a lot of great and honest feedbacks. After the fair was over we knew that we were soon ready for our launch on Kickstarter.    The B&B PURE's headband is made with high qualitative, strong but also flexible material. See for yourself:

Specifications   Connectivity — Bluetooth & Cable  Charging Options Frequency Response of Generic Sound Our sound concept is extremely balanced. The right amount of bass to give you enough power without having any loss in the higher frequency areas. Thanks to our balanced mid and treble ranges your music will be very clear and you can enjoy an overall wide spectrum of frequencies. This is the frequency response curve when you are listening in generic mode. Feel free to define your own hearing profile to take your music to the next level.
ControlsThere is a touch panel on the right side of the headphone. These are all the controls:
Play/pause or enter/exit phone calls: Press mechanical Button in the middle (Press and hold the center button to turn your headphone ON or OFF)
Next song: Swipe forward (from left to right)
Previous song: Swipe backwards (from right to left)
Volume: Tap the top or the bottom of the circle

We wanted to find a way to reflect our gratitude to everyone who supports B&B Pure, while also showing you what further possibilities our headphone concept has — Sport Ear Cups. You will be the first and only to to have these special Kickstarter Edition Ear Cups. The backer-exclusive Ear Cups make you stand out from the crowd and show you're listening through an exclusive part of the future of headphone design.Note: Upon reaching the $500'000 stretch goal, you will be able to choose between the normal cushion fabric or the sweat resistant cushion fabric. We will contact backers to confirm their preference before we ship.  You can now have the B&B PURE in one of the two color options: orange/black and gray/black.Note: Upon reaching the $750'000 stretch goal, you will be able to choose between color options. We will contact backers to confirm their preference before we ship.

SmartMike+, a groundbreaking wireless microphone with realtime transmission and synchronization of full band stereo for vlogging, recording, remixing, voice-over, dubbing and more with smartphones.  

We have created it professional and easy for global content creators, filmmakers, videographers and journalists.

 

 

SmartMike+ is also the world’s first mic that transmits wireless, multi-channel audio at ultra low-latency within a range of 15 meters, synchronize audio and video in real time. And the powerful SmartMike+ App support one-touch simultaneous output.

How does it sound? 

  • No post editing. Auto-sync with video in real time from SmartMike+ App.
column8:
showinfo=0"">

 

SmartMike+ records full band audio at 48kHz -- more than six times the frequency of conventional mono microphones (e.g. Apple AirPods). 

 

 

 

You can record audio from two SmartMike+s simultaneously (TWS Mode), which is ideal for group interviews, concerts, wedding receptions or other large venues and events. 

How does it sound?

Simply pair two SmartMike+s with the SmartMike+ App via Bluetooth, the App will automatically switch to TWS mode. 

 

 

SmartMike+ allows you to mix audio from different audio sources in real time. Using your smartphone to create and remix lip sync, music, and dance videos (with your favorite music, shows, and movies) has never been easier!

How does it sound?

Note: iOS - pair with 2-4 SmartMike+s simultaneously. Android 9.0 and above - pair with two simultaneously. 

 

 

 

With an embedded intelligent algorithm SmartMike+ is always prepared to record optimum acoustics by reducing sounds like wind or background noise such as people chatting.

 

How does it sound?

  • Recording comparison in outdoor noisy environment
• Multi-level noise reduction embedded algorithm control by the SmartMike+ app.
• Windshield for outdoor usage in case of strengthening or actual strong winds/gusts.
• An unidirectional microphone is preferable when louder background noise and interference is present.
Comparison of the noise reduction performances between SmartMike+ and Rode Wireless Go

In powerful M/S (Master/Slave) mode, SmartMike+s can be used with any video recording devices to capture studio quality audio that matches the equally professional video
column6:
or with any speakers to amplify the captured audio. Simply hook up one SmartMike+ to your digital camera/ GoPro/ PC/ speaker via a 3.5mm 3-pole male-to-male AUX cable to act as a receiver. Long pressing the button for 10s to pair this SmartMike+ with another (to act as a microphone) via Bluetooth.

 

Note: For optimal performance from a loudspeaker, please make sure to use an external unidirectional mic along with the SmartMike+ (the microphone) to suppress howling. 

 

SmartMike+s can also be used in the same way with any third-party App on a smartphone, such as Filmic-Pro, Tiktok, Facebook Live, YouTube Live, etc. Please use a 3.5mm 4-pole male-to-male AUX cable instead to hook up the receiver SmartMike+ to your smartphone.

 

 

 

 

This test video is personally made by Sabinetek founder/CEO, Dr. Zhang, in an A/C room using SmartMike+ to record video &
column7: audio and Sony ECM-AW4 to capture audio at the same time without any post processing. By comparing the audio track from two microphones, a conclusion can be drawn that Sony ECM-AW4 records much more noises than SmartMike+. SmartMike+ records much clearer audio devoid of the running noise of the A/C.

Stay tuned for more coming new comparison videos with other microphones posted by us. 

 

 

SmartMike+ recognizes, auto transcripts, and auto generates subtitle files for over 100 languages.

 

 

SmartMike+ works with 3.5mm earphones for real time monitoring. Listen to the background music and your own voice, it is best for recording dancing tutorial, or even creating your personal music video.

 

 

 

Press the button on SmartMike+ to start/end recording. During recording, you can easily switch between front and rear camera or pause/resume BGM by a simple double-click of the button on SmartMike+. 

 

 

 

SmartMike+ comes with free iPhone and Android apps that gives you total control over your audio and video creation and content. The latest apps and updates for your SmartMike+ can be effortlessly downloaded via OTA.

Headphones today may be masterfully designed, but none of them care about your ears' unique sensitivities.
So, just as you wouldn't wear glasses that were made for your friend, why should you use headphones that weren't made for you?
Heari is a wireless headphone that integrates our clinically proven and customer acclaimed Aumeo technology and tailors all sound to help you reach your full hearing potential.

Our award-winning technology maps your unique hearing sensitivity to different sounds and then adjusts your music based on your audio profile. The result is a tailored audio experience custom-fit for your ears only.
What's more, you can use Heari's app to adjust sounds to your liking.
Want to enjoy more bass as you're exercising to the beat or boost the voice section of favorite singer's tunes?
Want to have a face-to-face conversation with your friends or family in a noisy environment?
Want to listen to all the details at a seminar or lecture, even though you are sitting at the back of the lecture room?
You can now do that with a few easy clicks.
Every ear processes sound differently thanks to the combination of slight variances in ear bone shape, the hair cells that are responsible for hearing, and, in some cases, hearing loss.
Heari's app allows you to take Aumeo's 2 - 3 minute test to accurately determine your unique sensitivities and to build your optimal custom EQ.
In addition of Aumeo Technology, Heari also offers a unique feature called Tailored Audio Transparency.
Thanks to 3 included microphones and advanced circuitry, Heari works by recording the sounds around you and then in real time, processing them through your unique hearing profile.
This means you can listen to the entire world around you with the same clarity as your music.
You'll be picking up little details of sounds from TV Shows, live concerts, Seminars or Lectures, face to face conversations and other situations that you never realized were there before!
- Single driver with rich and full sound

column2: balance Armature driver that delivers exceptional sweetness and clarity.

column1: With selected models of Heari, it will support MMCX, a connector standard that allows the user to swap the earbuds, so you can switch between all our earbuds, presents or future.
That provides you a flexible option of future updates on new earbuds, or exchange earbuds when needed.
Heari comes with the famous COMPLY Premium Earphone Tips (Isolation T-Series Cutaway) to further enhance user’s comfort levels and the superior audio experience.
COMPLY TM Foam Tip comes with unique viscoelastic memory foam technology. It conforms to the shape of the ear canal at body temperature for a dynamic custom fit.
Your ear canal shape and size change with movement and temperature. And now your earplugs change with you.
This true fit seals in low-frequency energy. It won’t leak bass, for a richer sound. Materials are also engineered to provide optimal friction coefficient, so tips stay put.
As suggested by lots of media, Heari is the next generation of smart headphone that delivers data-driven customized audio to the consumer in real time.
• Premium CSR8675 Bluetooth DSP chip by Qualcomm
• Only 3g of weight felt by your ears
• COMPLY Premium Earphone Tips (Isolation T-Series Cutaway) tailored to different ear shapes
<li>Your choice of high quality single or dual dynamic &amp

In July 2015, our team launched the Aumeo Tailored Audio Device on Indiegogo. The campaign ended with 2,541 backers and 641% funding. We sent out 3,000+ devices, allowing our backers to enjoy music in a new way!
After hearing tailored audio for the first time, many of our backers urged us to create a product that could both apply tailored audio to more than just music, and be more convenient to use.

The MF Jebsen team enjoyed Aumeo and partnered with the Aumeo team to create Heari. Heari is a more convenient way to enjoy Aumeo’s audio tailoring while also being able to enhance the quality of your phone calls, TV Shows, live concerts, the sounds of nature, or even the hustle and bustle of your favorite coffee shop.

Have you ever rocked out or kicked back to live music in Asheville? We've recently lost some treasured live venues and the ones hanging on could use your help! We are organizing this venue benefit record with the help of artists from our passionate music community to help venues who have been adversely affected by the coronavirus pandemic, and subsequent venue shutdowns. The compilation record is titled ""They Gave Us A Stage: Asheville Artists For Venues"" as homage to our venues that have continually supported the local arts and have given a platform to all creators to showcase their works.

All proceeds from this record will be given directly to The Grey Eagle Music Hall and Slygrog Lounge to help them keep their stages open until safer times. Your purchase counts, save Asheville live music! If we can sell over 500 we can continue to help other Asheville venues, let's do this!

We would love to sell 500 of these limited run records before presale ends which would help us raise a good chunk of change to give our venues immediately! If we sell even more records, we can continue to give.
Don't take our word for how kick ass this record is going to be, check out the line up of talent!

Contributing artists: Papadosio, Alexa Rose, Empire Strikes Brass, Tall Tall Trees, Steep Canyon Rangers, Vaden Landers, Battery Powered Hooker Boots, Travers Brothership, Christy Lynn Band, and Secret Shame.

With your contribution you will receive a 180g limited press 10 song LP. Choose the ""Name in the liner notes"" option at check out to get your name in the records liner notes! It will be dressed up with Asheville music inspired art from Jenny Greer Fares of Soundmind Creative. Vinyl masters will be cut by yours truly at American Vinyl Co on our recently restored Neumann mastering lathe for a big and warm listening experience. Pop this record up on your turntable for a range of genres that all flow together to show how diverse and special our music community is. Be proud that you supported your venues when they needed it!

Right now music venues all over are struggling in order to keep their communities safe and help curb the spread of the virus. Venue owners, music lovers, and industry workers are frightened that it could have a permanent impact on live music and the livelihood of their staff. Venues have been able to have limited capacity outdoor shows but still unable to return to normal indoor events. Raising this money will help The Grey Eagle and Slygrog Lounge (more venues if enough records are sold!) pay bills, keep their staff paid, and bridge the pandemic until it is safe enough to return to enjoying music indoors once again. The more records we sell the more we can help!
Challenges would be to raise enough money to create the first 500 records. American Vinyl Co is no stranger to record production and will deliver a high quality vinyl record.

If you can't afford the vinyl record, help spread the word on your social accounts or around town! Unfortunately, we can't offer these works digitally but if you don't have a record player just display the vinyl record proudly on your wall! Also, there is an option to give what you can and it is truly appreciated!

Have you ever rocked out or kicked back to live music in Asheville? We've recently lost some treasured live venues and the ones hanging on could use your help! We are organizing this venue benefit record with the help of artists from our passionate music community to help venues who have been adversely affected by the coronavirus pandemic, and subsequent venue shutdowns. The compilation record is titled ""They Gave Us A Stage: Asheville Artists For Venues"" as homage to our venues that have continually supported the local arts and have given a platform to all creators to showcase their works.

All proceeds from this record will be given directly to The Grey Eagle Music Hall and Slygrog Lounge to help them keep their stages open until safer times. Your purchase counts, save Asheville live music! If we can sell over 500 we can continue to help other Asheville venues, let's do this!
What We Need & What You Get

We would love to sell 500 of these limited run records before presale ends which would help us raise a good chunk of change to give our venues immediately! If we sell even more records, we can continue to give.
Don't take our word for how kick ass this record is going to be, check out the line up of talent!

Contributing artists: Papadosio, Alexa Rose, Empire Strikes Brass, Tall Tall Trees, Steep Canyon Rangers, Vaden Landers, Battery Powered Hooker Boots, Travers Brothership, Christy Lynn Band, and Secret Shame.

With your contribution you will receive a 180g limited press 10 song LP. Choose the ""Name in the liner notes"" option at check out to get your name in the records liner notes! It will be dressed up with Asheville music inspired art from Jenny Greer Fares of Soundmind Creative. Vinyl masters will be cut by yours truly at American Vinyl Co on our recently restored Neumann mastering lathe for a big and warm listening experience. Pop this record up on your turntable for a range of genres that all flow together to show how diverse and special our music community is. Be proud that you supported your venues when they needed it!

Right now music venues all over are struggling in order to keep their communities safe and help curb the spread of the virus. Venue owners, music lovers, and industry workers are frightened that it could have a permanent impact on live music and the livelihood of their staff. Venues have been able to have limited capacity outdoor shows but still unable to return to normal indoor events. Raising this money will help The Grey Eagle and Slygrog Lounge (more venues if enough records are sold!) pay bills, keep their staff paid, and bridge the pandemic until it is safe enough to return to enjoying music indoors once again. The more records we sell the more we can help!
Challenges would be to raise enough money to create the first 500 records. American Vinyl Co is no stranger to record production and will deliver a high quality vinyl record.

If you can't afford the vinyl record, help spread the word on your social accounts or around town! Unfortunately, we can't offer these works digitally but if you don't have a record player just display the vinyl record proudly on your wall! Also, there is an option to give what you can and it is truly appreciated!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column12: >AuricSound A7 Magazine Review in E-ZONE
column13:
>

AuricSound A7 Tube AMP X M6 Speaker : Eugene Ruffolo - Poor Lonesome Me (DSD 256)
column15:
showinfo=0"">

 

AuricSound A7 Tube AMP X M6 Speaker : 靈魂伴侶 黄龄 (PCM 192kHz)
column18: >THE ALL-NEW  [New HQ Music] Audiophile Music
column19: >AuricSound A7 Vacuum Tube Amp ""EX""
column20:
>VACUUM TUBE  +  SOLID-STATE

This tube power amplifier has all the features to meet the needs of today’s music enthusiast while preserving the qualities that have made the A7 ""EX"" the most revered AuricSound tube amplifier.

This second-generation A7 ""EX"" has many subtle enhancements from the previous release that greatly improve performance. Combined with the widest bandwidth AuricSound output transformer design, the A7 ""EX"" features tauter bass control and thermally quiet circuit design. The result is pure music.
column21: >Stereo Integrated Tube Amplifier A-7 EX
column22:
>Employs innovative fully-digitized processing 
that delivers a pure and accurate signal to the speakers.

Every finely crafted AuricSound is refined to bring music to life with stunning vividness and realism and to convey music with the very breath of life present in the recording studio or concert hall. AuricSound products are masterpieces because they allow each recorded performance to be heard with the musical authenticity the musicians intended.

To bring this sonic purity and dimension of sound to the discerning ears of our customer, AuricSound uses vacuum tube technology almost exclusively. A passion for superb sound quality and expert attention to detail is also required to refine each piece to its peak of performance. Great care is evident in every note sounded by an AuricSound. This is an appreciation that can only grow over a lifetime of listening for the music lover. Listen and let the sound be your guide!
column25:
>A vacuum tube power amplifier with ambition

The A7 ""EX"" has an elegant dark BLACK and METALLIC BLUE finish, realizing a modern classical appearance reminiscent of our finest legacy products. This model’s improved clarity and warm, accurate audio reproduction, unique to vacuum tube products, and the quality of the components and engineering shine through. We strongly feel that the introduction of new technology and added customization will prove integral to this model’s appeal as a modern day vacuum tube amplifier.

VACUUM TUBE  +  SOLID-STATE output

The output vacuum tubes are known for their power and rich sound quality. The triode configuration employed achieves longer vacuum tube life and a highly transparent timbre that vacuum tube amps are known for. The paralleled first stage feeds a driver stage featuring performance proven hybrid circuitry. For the final stage, we have adopted a hybrid compatible push-pull configuration to achieve an output power of 150 Watts per channel at 4 and 8 Ohms with very low distortion.

JENO Engine (Jitter Elimination and Noise-shaping Optimization)

Just like the A-7 EX is a fully-digital amplifier and delivers high-resolution digital signals without any distortion being introduced between the input stage and output to the speakers. AuricSound has developed an original jitter-reduction circuit, avoiding the sound quality degradation due to jitter common to conventional digital amps. It uses a clock generator for the noise-shaping system to reduce jitter in the low-frequency range and a high-precision sample rate converter to suppress jitter in the high-frequency range.
column29:
showinfo=0"">

LAPC (Load Adaptive Phase Calibration)

AuricSound has developed a speaker impedance optimization algorithm, using digital signal processing to flatten both the amplitude and phase-frequency response to make the most of your speakers. The result is a sound with better focus, spaciousness and definition.

High Res Re-master

AuricSound has developed signal processing to increase both sampling frequency and

bit-depth: the High Res Re-master system converts audio signals to high-resolution

at up to 192 kHz/32 bits, to bring the listener closer to the original music.
column30:
>ACCESSORIES

MOBILE HI-RES CONVERTER IN EASY WAY

The Mobile CableDAC to A7 Amplifier is perfectly tailored to provide them with a digital interface. So you are no longer dependent on the jack plug of your portable device. In fact, the cable DAC facilitates lossless digital transmission so you can enjoy first‑class playback quality of your music – for a sound experience that meets the highest standards.

THE CORE

The technology inside would do credit even to exclusive hi-fi systems. The AuricSound Mobile CableDAC decrypts high-resolution audio signals up to a resolution of 32 bits and 384 kilohertz. This device class typically achieves maximum values of 32 bit/384 kHz.

HIGH-RESOLUTION AUDIO

Mobile CableDAC can handle Hi-Res audio files in their uncompressed and full resolution format. Immerse yourself in the multidimensional world of high-resolution music with a hi-res player app of your choice. For example, you could use USB Audio Player PRO for Android devices, foobar2000 for Windows, and Audirvana Plus 3 for MacBook. This way, you can discover music recordings the way they were intended to be heard originally.

 

 - COMPATIBLE WITH DIGITAL DEVICES -

AuricSound Mobile CableDAC - iOS (Lightning to RCA Version) 

AuricSound Mobile CableDAC - USB-C (Type-C to RCA Version)

No matter where you store your music: Mobile CableDAC is an all-rounder that offers versatile connection options. Thanks to four different connecting cables, Mobile CableDAC can be used with Apple iOS, iPhone, iPad (with Lightning) and iPad Pro and Android devices (with USB-C) as well as with PC and notebook (with USB-C). Mobile CableDAC is suitable for use with Android smartphones and tablets (with USB-C) as well as with PC and notebook.

COMPATIBILITY
