column1: • For those of you who don’t know my my name is Davog Rynne and I come from Miltown Malbay Co Clare Ireland
• I want to raise money for the people on the streets this winter with my album of poetry.
• Funds will go directly to a homeless group in Ennis Co Clare and to a refugee group in Lyon France,where I live.
Break it down for folks in more detail:
• This funding campaign will cover the costs of the studio and the whole production line process
• I will be producing a physical CD but also doing an online version of the album
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:
• The poetry I am using for this project are from volunteers who work either in the camps of France and Greece or with the homeless in England or Ireland
• Many of you know me for these fundraising  projects and will remember my fundraising actions in the past.*
The biggest challenge with a project like this is trying to keep the initial costs down as much as possible.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Please share my project on all the social media

And that's all there is to it.

","Short Summary
For those of you who don’t know my my name is Davog Rynne and I come from Miltown Malbay Co Clare Ireland
I want to raise money for the people on the streets this winter with my album of poetry.
Funds will go directly to a homeless group in Ennis Co Clare and to a refugee group in Lyon France,where I live.
What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:
This funding campaign will cover the costs of the studio and the whole production line process
I will be producing a physical CD but also doing an online version of the album
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:
The poetry I am using for this project are from volunteers who work either in the camps of France and Greece or with the homeless in England or Ireland
Many of you know me for these fundraising  projects and will remember my fundraising actions in the past.*
The biggest challenge with a project like this is trying to keep the initial costs down as much as possible.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please share my project on all the social media
And use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that's all there is to it.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
0,"
column2:
>The Encore RockMaster Live

Now for Sale at: www.sonicunity.com

Sonic Unity presents the Encore RockMaster Live headphone, the fifth in a series of new audio components. At Sonic Unity, we are passionate about music and want you to experience the very best sound quality at prices you can easily afford. Compared to headphones costing several times as much, the RockMaster Live is an affordable, audiophile grade, full-range, portable headphone with detachable audio cable. Perfect for your smartphone or high-resolution audio player.

The soft padded headband and deep ear cushions improve wearing comfort, while a detachable audio cable allows for individual cable selection. The RockMaster Live offers balanced sound with excellent detail, impressive deep bass, great midrange, and accurate high frequencies. It comes with a high-quality, braided audiophile cable and you can add an optional smartphone cable with microphone if needed. The included textile carrying case protects your portable headphones which fold into a compact package for easy carrying. A set of velvet ear pads are included as an alternative to the standard leatherette ear pads.
column5: >The RockMaster Live is designed with a focus on comfort and sound quality.
column7:
>HEADFONICS Review

Our First review has been published on HEADFONICS and here are a few excerpts:

""For a $35 headphone, I am positively shocked by the quality offered here.  Not even a hint of serious mud or thickness.  In fact, it is very pure feeling…""

""The low’s on this headphone extend very well and you will be hard pressed to find any other $35 or so headphone that can handle that bass without sounding  awful.  Encore has said that some special inner cup dampening and Jason’s hand picked tuning seems to confirm what I was told about this headphone originally before receiving it.  This is a great sign for the market.""

""Encore’s RockMaster Live is probably one of the best very cheap headphones on the market...""

""This is a great deal and I feel more than confident enough in saying nobody will contest that statement.  For $35, this is a bargain and a half.""

http://headfonics.com/2017/07/the-rockmaster-live-by-encore/

Our first crowdfunding project, the Encore RockMaster over-ear and in-ear headphones, sold several thousand sets worldwide and is now sold out. As reviewer posed on reddit after hearing the original RockMaster headphones, 'this will be the headphone value product of the summer.' Order the RockMaster Live today to ensure you don't miss out on this excellent sounding, portable headphone.

The design and development phase are now complete and we have already begun production. This means we will be shipping the RockMaster Live by early September!
column8: >
column9: >The RockMaster Live is an affordable, audiophile grade, full-range, portable headphone with detachable audio cable.
column10:
>

Our factory direct pricing allows you to purchase audio products that perform well above their price point. We rely on crowdfunding for a single production run and there is no guarantee that there will be subsequent retail sales of the same product.
column15: >The RockMaster Live is perfect for your smartphone or portable audio player.
column17:
>Features

Dynamic Driver Size: 38 mm

Frequency response: 20-20,000 Hz

Impedance: 32 Ohms at 1 KHz

Sensivity:  98dB ± 3dB at 1mW

Maximum input power: 100mW

Weight: 125g (without detachable audio cable)
column19:
>Converting the RockMaster Live Into a Bluetooth Headphone

There are several portable Bluetooth receivers available on Amazon.com that can be attached to the headphone's cable connector if you wish to use it as a Bluetooth headphone. Please note that the Bluetooth receiver is not included in this project.
column22: >
column25: >The custom designed dynamic driver produces impressive deep bass and a rich mid-range sound, accurate midrange and a great top end.
column27:
>Meet Our Development Partner

Sonic Unity has once again partnered with Jason Lim to design and produce the Encore RockMaster Live headphones. Jason is an established audio industry leader who co-founded NuForce and served as CEO from 2004 to 2013. NuForce is a well known audio brand that reinvented high-end audio for the digital age. Featuring easy to use, well designed audio products, Jason and NuForce have been featured in Forbes magazine as well as Wired, Stereophile, c|net, The New York Times, The Absolute Sound, Hi-Fi+ and Sound and Vision.
column28: >
column29: >Jason Lim, past CEO and co-founder of NuForce and current CEO of NuPrime Audio and Celsus Sound.
column30:
>

After leaving NuForce in 2014, Jason Lim launched NuPrime Audio and Celsus Sound. Each company offers the very best sound quality regardless of price and in 2015 received accolades from several professional audio magazines. With a proven track record developing high-fidelity audio products, Jason Lim has the industry experience to deliver the products as promised.
column31: >
column32: >Under the direction of CEO Jason Lim, NuForce, NuPrime and Celsus Sound have received numerous awards for their audiophile products.
column33:
>

With Jason leading production, we have someone with a proven track record who has delivered consistently high quality audio products, regardless of price. Jason knows the industry well and can get the job done.
column34: >
column35: >The soft pad ear cups rotate and fold away making the RockMaster Live easy to carry.
column36:
>

The ENCORE RockMaster Live has been personally customized by Jason using OEM housing and speaker drivers after auditioning many different models. By modifying existing OEM housing and drivers, we can keep the cost at the minimum while maximising performance. The RockMaster Live delivers portable and desktop audio quality that far exceeds their price.
column37: >
column38: >Full range, audiophile sound in a portable headphone at a great price.
column40:
>Factory Direct

Our manufacturing partners have been creating headphones for some of the worlds leading brands and they can make products to our exact specifications.
column41: >
column42: >These are just a few images of the production facility used to create the RockMaster Live
column43:
>

The cost of most retail headphones are quite high. Advertising, retail store displays, events sponsorship, online promotion, and product exposure and placement are all very costly. These marketing expenses often double, triple or even quadruple the price of the product and get passed on to the customer. You pay a premium for a major brand's familiar style and quality but there is another way - factory direct products with great factory direct pricing and no expensive markup.
column44: >
column45: >The RockMaster Live headphone is superior to the award-winning NuForce NE-600X (Wired magazine's ""Top earphones under $50"" award) in sound quality.
column47:
>Ways You Can Help

We don't have an enormous marketing budget. If we did, the cost of these audio products would be much higher! We need your help. Tell your friends about us. Share us on Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter and other social media. Please post about us on reddit and other audio forums like Head-Fi and Headfonics. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out! 

Please visit the Sonic Unity on-line store and sign up for our newsletter. We will keep you informed every step of the way throughout the manufacturing process and as new products are developed, you will be among the first to hear about what we have planned next.
column48: >
column49: >The RockMaster Live Premium, Portable Headphone
column51:
>Product Reviews From Our Previous Indiegogo Campaigns

""...Unlike other USB DAC sticks though the Encore mDSD decodes at fantastically high rates including 32-bit/384kHz PCM and native DSD 256 decoding which puts it out there almost in a league of its own in terms of future proofing and reproduction capability compared to the other mere mortal sticks in the market... ""

""...Power and control is also equally impressive. Noise is absent on highly sensitive IEMs and there is enough power for most mid-tier and modern planars to sound excellent and in the case of planars pretty good for the price. The Ether C hates thin signatures and this isn’t one of them...""

“…Upon first listen, I’d boosted up a bass heavy track…The bass and stage formation feel very much like how I recall the Vmoda M100 to sound”.  Fast forward a few weeks and after I snagged a brief listen to a loaner M100…and what do you know? It really does sound very similar in those two areas, but only in those two areas of listening.  I can safely say for this price, nothing I am aware exists that offers bass quality on par with the Rockmaster OE for $59, I’ve also not heard a sub $100 headphone outside of the JVC HARX700 that sounds this large and vast in stereo imaging…certainly, this headphone is “the headphone” to get if you are on a small budget and enjoy bass and a nice, aired out sense of appeal.  The low end is very tight and fast, considering the price this is an excellent deal and you can close up shop and go home right now, no need to read on…”, Headfoncis.com 

""One of my very first big reviews on this site was a big comparison of DJ style headphones all in the ~$150-200 range, so I like to think I have a pretty good grasp on that market segment. I put on the Rockmaster for the first time and I immediately thought “ yup, fits right in with those guys... what, this is at a fifth of the price?"" - ""Armaegis"", Headphoneus Supremus, head-fi.org

""Cohesive. That is the one word that I would use to describe the RockMaster IE. It is far far more than the sum of its parts. Each section on its own I could maybe find things to nag on, but taken as a whole all of that just disappears. The sound just comes at me and fills the space in my head without me finding things to fault. It's a rare occurrence for me with iems... maybe a first. Nothing feels glaring, nothing feels indistinct. Just simple sound and I'm not distracted by any others foibles."" - ""Armaegis"", Headphoneus Supremus, head-fi.org

Encore’s OE headphone came in with a sound that was bassy, and if you’re one that loves that sound signature, $60 dollars isn’t much to pay for it. The over-ear model looks and feels great while comfort is of no issue. It isn’t the most perfect headphone out there, but it still holds a good value.  Overall Score ★★★★½, ifans.com

I have to say that Encore did a great job with the tuning of the IE in-ear monitors. Though driver flex does plague these IEMs, pretty much everything else is great with the IE. They offer a nice design with exceptional sound for their price. Overall Score ★★★★½, ifans.com
column52:
>

The RockMaster Live offers balanced sound with excellent detail, impressive deep bass, great midrange, and accurate high frequencies. It comes with a high-quality, braided audiophile cable and you can add an optional smartphone cable with microphone if needed. The included textile carrying case protects your portable headphones which fold into a compact package for easy carrying. A set of velvet ear pads are included as an alternative to the standard leatherette ear pads.The RockMaster Live is designed with a focus on comfort and sound quality.HEADFONICS ReviewOur First review has been published on HEADFONICS and here are a few excerpts:""For a $35 headphone, I am positively shocked by the quality offered here.  Not even a hint of serious mud or thickness.  In fact, it is very pure feeling…""""The low’s on this headphone extend very well and you will be hard pressed to find any other $35 or so headphone that can handle that bass without sounding  awful.  Encore has said that some special inner cup dampening and Jason’s hand picked tuning seems to confirm what I was told about this headphone originally before receiving it.  This is a great sign for the market.""""Encore’s RockMaster Live is probably one of the best very cheap headphones on the market...""""This is a great deal and I feel more than confident enough in saying nobody will contest that statement.  For $35, this is a bargain and a half.""http://headfonics.com/2017/07/the-rockmaster-live-by-encore/Our first crowdfunding project, the Encore RockMaster over-ear and in-ear headphones, sold several thousand sets worldwide and is now sold out. As reviewer posed on reddit after hearing the original RockMaster headphones, 'this will be the headphone value product of the summer.' Order the RockMaster Live today to ensure you don't miss out on this excellent sounding, portable headphone.The design and development phase are now complete and we have already begun production. This means we will be shipping the RockMaster Live by early September! The RockMaster Live is an affordable, audiophile grade, full-range, portable headphone with detachable audio cable.Our factory direct pricing allows you to purchase audio products that perform well above their price point. We rely on crowdfunding for a single production run and there is no guarantee that there will be subsequent retail sales of the same product. The RockMaster Live is perfect for your smartphone or portable audio player.FeaturesDynamic Driver Size: 38 mmFrequency response: 20-20,000 HzImpedance: 32 Ohms at 1 KHzSensivity:  98dB ± 3dB at 1mWMaximum input power: 100mWWeight: 125g (without detachable audio cable)Converting the RockMaster Live Into a Bluetooth HeadphoneThere are several portable Bluetooth receivers available on Amazon.com that can be attached to the headphone's cable connector if you wish to use it as a Bluetooth headphone. Please note that the Bluetooth receiver is not included in this project.The custom designed dynamic driver produces impressive deep bass and a rich mid-range sound, accurate midrange and a great top end.Meet Our Development PartnerSonic Unity has once again partnered with Jason Lim to design and produce the Encore RockMaster Live headphones. Jason is an established audio industry leader who co-founded NuForce and served as CEO from 2004 to 2013. NuForce is a well known audio brand that reinvented high-end audio for the digital age. Featuring easy to use, well designed audio products, Jason and NuForce have been featured in Forbes magazine as well as Wired, Stereophile, c|net, The New York Times, The Absolute Sound, Hi-Fi+ and Sound and Vision.Jason Lim, past CEO and co-founder of NuForce and current CEO of NuPrime Audio and Celsus Sound.After leaving NuForce in 2014, Jason Lim launched NuPrime Audio and Celsus Sound. Each company offers the very best sound quality regardless of price and in 2015 received accolades from several professional audio magazines. With a proven track record developing high-fidelity audio products, Jason Lim has the industry experience to deliver the products as promised.Under the direction of CEO Jason Lim, NuForce, NuPrime and Celsus Sound have received numerous awards for their audiophile products.With Jason leading production, we have someone with a proven track record who has delivered consistently high quality audio products, regardless of price. Jason knows the industry well and can get the job done.The soft pad ear cups rotate and fold away making the RockMaster Live easy to carry.The ENCORE RockMaster Live has been personally customized by Jason using OEM housing and speaker drivers after auditioning many different models. By modifying existing OEM housing and drivers, we can keep the cost at the minimum while maximising performance. The RockMaster Live delivers portable and desktop audio quality that far exceeds their price.Full range, audiophile sound in a portable headphone at a great price.Factory DirectOur manufacturing partners have been creating headphones for some of the worlds leading brands and they can make products to our exact specifications. These are just a few images of the production facility used to create the RockMaster LiveThe cost of most retail headphones are quite high. Advertising, retail store displays, events sponsorship, online promotion, and product exposure and placement are all very costly. These marketing expenses often double, triple or even quadruple the price of the product and get passed on to the customer. You pay a premium for a major brand's familiar style and quality but there is another way - factory direct products with great factory direct pricing and no expensive markup.The RockMaster Live headphone is superior to the award-winning NuForce NE-600X (Wired magazine's ""Top earphones under $50"" award) in sound quality.Ways You Can HelpWe don't have an enormous marketing budget. If we did, the cost of these audio products would be much higher! We need your help. Tell your friends about us. Share us on Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter and other social media. Please post about us on reddit and other audio forums like Head-Fi and Headfonics. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out! Please visit the Sonic Unity on-line store and sign up for our newsletter. We will keep you informed every step of the way throughout the manufacturing process and as new products are developed, you will be among the first to hear about what we have planned next.The RockMaster Live Premium, Portable HeadphoneProduct Reviews From Our Previous Indiegogo Campaigns""...Unlike other USB DAC sticks though the Encore mDSD decodes at fantastically high rates including 32-bit/384kHz PCM and native DSD 256 decoding which puts it out there almost in a league of its own in terms of future proofing and reproduction capability compared to the other mere mortal sticks in the market... """"...Power and control is also equally impressive. Noise is absent on highly sensitive IEMs and there is enough power for most mid-tier and modern planars to sound excellent and in the case of planars pretty good for the price. The Ether C hates thin signatures and this isn’t one of them...""“…Upon first listen, I’d boosted up a bass heavy track…The bass and stage formation feel very much like how I recall the Vmoda M100 to sound”.  Fast forward a few weeks and after I snagged a brief listen to a loaner M100…and what do you know? It really does sound very similar in those two areas, but only in those two areas of listening.  I can safely say for this price, nothing I am aware exists that offers bass quality on par with the Rockmaster OE for $59, I’ve also not heard a sub $100 headphone outside of the JVC HARX700 that sounds this large and vast in stereo imaging…certainly, this headphone is “the headphone” to get if you are on a small budget and enjoy bass and a nice, aired out sense of appeal.  The low end is very tight and fast, considering the price this is an excellent deal and you can close up shop and go home right now, no need to read on…”, Headfoncis.com ""One of my very first big reviews on this site was a big comparison of DJ style headphones all in the ~$150-200 range, so I like to think I have a pretty good grasp on that market segment. I put on the Rockmaster for the first time and I immediately thought “ yup, fits right in with those guys... what, this is at a fifth of the price?"" - ""Armaegis"", Headphoneus Supremus, head-fi.org""Cohesive. That is the one word that I would use to describe the RockMaster IE. It is far far more than the sum of its parts. Each section on its own I could maybe find things to nag on, but taken as a whole all of that just disappears. The sound just comes at me and fills the space in my head without me finding things to fault. It's a rare occurrence for me with iems... maybe a first. Nothing feels glaring, nothing feels indistinct. Just simple sound and I'm not distracted by any others foibles."" - ""Armaegis"", Headphoneus Supremus, head-fi.orgEncore’s OE headphone came in with a sound that was bassy, and if you’re one that loves that sound signature, $60 dollars isn’t much to pay for it. The over-ear model looks and feels great while comfort is of no issue. It isn’t the most perfect headphone out there, but it still holds a good value.  Overall Score ★★★★½, ifans.comI have to say that Encore did a great job with the tuning of the IE in-ear monitors. Though driver flex does plague these IEMs, pretty much everything else is great with the IE. They offer a nice design with exceptional sound for their price. Overall Score ★★★★½, ifans.com",37.0,0,"5 Campaigns

EarOn – the smartest Bluetooth earpiece in the world, equipped with microphone system in an ear. With the innovative EarOn a user may exclude any foreign noises and clearly hear only the sound of their earpieces. With EarOn your voice will be distinct even in noisy environment. The users may also use EarOn to listen to music! Listen to your favourite melodies in between calls and business meetings without the problem of broken wires.

EarOn represents our vision, to which we have come in 2008, after viewing of intro-movie “Definitely, Maybe”, where the actor Ryan Reynolds walks along the crowded New-York street with only pair of small earpieces without wires, listening to “beautiful day soundtrack”. Upon this movie viewing, our young team was inspired to “create ideal wireless earpieces”. That is how our product has been generated.

Our earpieces are the most compact in the world, it’s true, and this wireless system also includes the built-in omnidirectional microphone. While traditional earpieces may be large, compact, absolutely of any size and with any sound quality, all of them have one significant deficiency – wires. Cumbersome WIRES, irritate!!!

EarOn catches human voice in any, even the noisiest environment, giving you the possibility to communicate with your relatives and friends. The EarOn noise suppression technology reduces surrounding noises up to 30dB.

Notwithstanding the reason of your choice of EarOn – to listen to music or to do anything else – you will do this without any problems. From the very beginning our mission has been to create the product that is focused on simplicity, size and sound quality.
EarOn is for lovers of really qualitative sound and music.

Here, at EarOn Audio, we make all the efforts to share with your authentic, real wireless experience. Our mission is to provide the most compact, really wireless stereo-earpieces that may be bought with money, as well as to eliminate any deficiencies that usually irritate in most wire and wireless earpieces in general.

Now you may finally enjoy balances sound without constant bustle of the winding wires and without missing your favourite music. You will heard the deepest minimums, the clearest maximum and full stereo-sound without any wire within your line of sight. Our team works hard to create the most advances, Bluetooth 4.1, really wireless earpieces with complete support of audio for APTX, AAC, and SBC codecs.
EarOn is an innovative breakaway from traditional headset. Tiny but powerful, EarOn ensures maximum comfort with minimum efforts.
Balanced EarOn speaker – new case with extended bass response and considerably improved high frequencies response.

The balanced speaker represents the design to high accuracy, consisting of spring and magnetic force, eliminating a lot of odd moving mass. This gives you the possibility to leave only the clearest high qualitative sound that allows you to heat all the music details. At the same time, EarOn has rather powerful battery, so you will not suffer from frequent recharging.
EarOn is equipped with new micro-driver to satisfy the most demanding audio critics. Three distinct advantages include:
• Proprietary membrane composite driver, specially designed to ensure the best sound at various frequencies.
<li>Located in its heart powerful neodymium magnet to achieve high efficiency at maximum volume
column2: the music may be loud and bass still strong
column3: and the battery life is surprisingly durable

column1: • EarOn has smooth frequency response and maintains low levels of distortion from 20 Hz and far beyond 20 kHz.
In order to be able to fit all the components in such a small space, we chose a chip with built-in functionality, as shown below in a simplified flow diagram of EarOn.

APTX for EarOn digital audio can provide transmission of sound, which is optimized for instant real-time audio streaming. APTX has already earned a reputation for the highest quality sound, it has an extremely low lag time and strong resilience to bit errors, it has been proven in wireless, broadcast and professional versions of live sound.
Audio compatibility with traditional Bluetooth devices (A2DP profile, CSR aptX® audio codec)
Compatible with any smartphone, computer and/or tablet PC with Bluetooth and communication functions
Talk time: 9 hours – Recharging for less than 2 hours
Charger: Micro USB Recharging Capsule: 310mAh – ensures 6 complete recharges for monoblock and 3 compete recharges for stereo (as there are two units for recharging)

After all the foregoing, EarOn is finally ready for you, folks. We have paid for our initial technological equipment and have produced small lot, however we need your help to find out what colors you prefer to complete them. With advanced payment you will help us to choose colours and to complete our products!

We planned 30-days campaign. The first lot of the orders will be delivered in the middle-end of December 2016 after confirmation of colour and your address. And for additionally collected money we will start the production of the second sample of our product.

​
column3: >SPACO, meaning “space,” is a omnidirectional audio speaker that combines high end audio with smart technology in one compact design.
column5: >The speakers can be controlled by voice even in noisy situations. The speakers have been crafted using high quality materials and the special levitation feature offers true uninterrupted surround sound.
column6: >
column12: >SPACO is a smart device that lets you speak to it even in noisy situations, you can turn the volume up or change the track. The device learns the more you use it.
column13:
>

Basic speaker commands :
power on/ off, volume up /down, next, previous, play, pause, mute, TV or Music

Music commands :
Streaming platforms – fire up your favorite streaming music platforms. 
Radio – boot up your preferred radio station. 
DJ – Let Spaco play the tunes you like, based on your selection history. The more you listen, the smarter it gets

Social community commands :
Just call out a name and chat live to a group or individuals so you can talk to people on the other side of the world as if they were next to you. Teleconferencing your office, conducting a global classroom, or sending out an SOS to all your contacts in an emergency.
column15:
>
The levitating tweeter speaker, unimpeded by surface friction, faces upward,
providing crystal-clear, high-pitched audio. It charges while levitating meaning 365-Days Always-On Audio. The tweeter doesn’t need to fall down to charge.
column17:
>

The SPACO system is specially designed to emit a circle of light and sound over
a full 360-degree range, infusing your room with glow and acoustics. Adjust your light settings for each speaker through the app,using a whole-color spectrum, and then control by voice.
column18:
>

SPACO gives you music in concert across the whole home, or different music in each room. Set up individual speakers and their names and speak to family in different rooms across your home with the two-way speaker and microphone.
column20: >
column21: >You will never lose Wi-Fi again anywhere around your house. Enjoy whole home Wi-FI coverage with SPACO as each speaker acts as a Wi-Fi extender. By creating a meshed network of extenders, SPACO can help you exterminate dead spots in your home and share the Wi-Fi signal with multiple devices in different rooms.

Multi-language support

Software &
column37:
APP
Automatic updates with new features and music services for free.
column39:
>

1. WHY COMBINE ELECTROSTATIC DIAPHRAGM AND DYNAMIC DRIVERS?
A 720-degree acoustics field is created by the combination of 28 dynamic and electrostatic diaphragm drivers, which provide multidimensional, movie-theater grade audio, all within a compact home audio system. Most high street audio systems use less than half the number of drivers. They rarely use electrostatic drivers, which are normally found in tiny form in only the most expensive headphones.

2. PURCHASING &
column40:
SHIPPING
How do I order SPACO? 
Simply click on the “purchasing” button and complete the form.

Why should I order now? 
We have super early bird prices up to the value of US$1,450.  

When can I receive my SPACO?
We will do our utmost to ship the SPACO to you as soon as possible. Continuous updates about the production schedule will be provided during and after the campaign. Our projected timelines will be fulfilled by October 2017.

Where do you deliver to?
We use major couriers and we will ship to anywhere these companies deliver.

Is shipping free? 
Shipping is: 
$15 for SPACO mini
$20 for SPACO mini x 2
$25 for SPACO 2.1 
$40 for SPACO 5.1
$60 for SPACO family
 (Customers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by your own countries)

Do you provide a warranty?  
Yes, SPACO comes with a one-year replacement warranty
 
3. IN THE BOX
SPACO will arrive in deluxe packaging with a:
• AC Power cord
• Power adapter
• World Wide membership card 
• Quick-Start Guide and User Manual
 
4. COMPATIBILITY
What devices can I use to stream music wirelessly?
Any device that has Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, including your Android™ device, iPhone®, iPod touch®, iPad™, PC, or Mac. SPACO supports your home Wi-Fi network with any 802.11b/g, 2.4GHz broadcast capable router. 

What kind of digital music sources can I play?
Any music that you can currently access from your device, SPACO will play.  That means any online streaming sites or Internet radio (Pandora, the radio, Youtube, Spotify, ITunes Radio, TuneIn, etc). Any format of music stored on your device, on your home network, NAS Server, or in the cloud can also be played.
 
5. STREAMING MUSIC TO SPACO
How easy is it to connect my device and start playing music?  
Piece of cake.  Just power up your SPACO and pair your device by turning Bluetooth on and selecting SPACO in the menu or download our APP to connect via Wi-Fi to enjoy more functions. Pair the device once and it will remain stored in SPACO’s memory for future use.  

How close to the SPACO do I need to be?  
75 feet (23m) indoors and 150 feet (46m) outdoors 

Can I pair multiple devices to SPACO?  
Yes, you can pair multiple devices to SPACO and the information will stay stored in your device in the future.  However, SPACO can only be connected to and play from one source at a time. 
 
6. MULTIROOM
How many SPACOs do I need to create a multiroom environment?
We suggest you get the SPACO 5.1 system and then you can wirelessly connect anywhere in your house.  Or you can connect with as many SPACO minis as you like.

Do I need to be connected to Wi-Fi or a router for multiroom?
No router, Wi-Fi or special application is needed. SPACO creates its own 5 GHz adaptive wireless network that you can connect to.

How far apart can the SPACO speakers be from each other?
75 feet (23 m) indoors and 150 feet (46 m) outdoors from any SPACO devices.

What if I want SPACO speakers in different rooms to play different music?
Push the source button on the APP or use voice control to tell SPACO you would like to play locally.  
 
7. PORTABILITY
Does SPACO have an internal battery?
Only the SPACO mini has an internal battery that recharges when plugged in. It lasts 12 hours, and takes less than 1 hour to charge.

At ASWY, we believe in the power of technology and design to improve people’s lives. Our goal in establishing ASWY in 2012 was to give our customers innovative, high-quality products with strong designs that are also affordable and easy-to- use. Every day, we set out to stretch the Internet’s potential and make it a reality for people. We are continually trialing new products that push technology’s boundaries and design standards.

Enjoy whole home Wi-FI coverage with SPACO as each speaker acts as a Wi-Fi extender. By creating a meshed network of extenders, SPACO can help you exterminate dead spots in your home and share the Wi-Fi signal with multiple devices in different rooms.  Power onTurn your SPACO system WHY COMBINE ELECTROSTATIC DIAPHRAGM AND DYNAMIC DRIVERS?A 720-degree acoustics field is created by the combination of 28 dynamic and electrostatic diaphragm drivers, which provide multidimensional, movie-theater grade audio, all within a compact home audio system. Most high street audio systems use less than half the number of drivers. They rarely use electrostatic drivers, which are normally found in tiny form in only the most expensive headphones.2. PURCHASING & SHIPPINGHow do I order SPACO? Simply click on the “purchasing” button and complete the form.Why should I order now? We have super early bird prices up to the value of US$1,450.  When can I receive my SPACO?We will do our utmost to ship the SPACO to you as soon as possible. Continuous updates about the production schedule will be provided during and after the campaign. Our projected timelines will be fulfilled by October 2017.Where do you deliver to?We use major couriers and we will ship to anywhere these companies deliver.Is shipping free? Shipping is: $15 for SPACO mini$20 for SPACO mini x 2$25 for SPACO 2.1 $40 for SPACO 5.1$60 for SPACO family (Customers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by your own countries)Do you provide a warranty?  Yes, SPACO comes with a one-year replacement warranty 3. IN THE BOXSPACO will arrive in deluxe packaging with a:• AC Power cord• Power adapter• World Wide membership card • Quick-Start Guide and User Manual 4. COMPATIBILITYWhat devices can I use to stream music wirelessly?Any device that has Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, including your Android™ device, iPhone®, iPod touch®, iPad™, PC, or Mac. SPACO supports your home Wi-Fi network with any 802.11b/g, 2.4GHz broadcast capable router. What kind of digital music sources can I play?Any music that you can currently access from your device, SPACO will play.  That means any online streaming sites or Internet radio (Pandora, the radio, Youtube, Spotify, ITunes Radio, TuneIn, etc). Any format of music stored on your device, on your home network, NAS Server, or in the cloud can also be played. 5. STREAMING MUSIC TO SPACOHow easy is it to connect my device and start playing music?  Piece of cake.  Just power up your SPACO and pair your device by turning Bluetooth on and selecting SPACO in the menu or download our APP to connect via Wi-Fi to enjoy more functions. Pair the device once and it will remain stored in SPACO’s memory for future use.  How close to the SPACO do I need to be?  75 feet (23m) indoors and 150 feet (46m) outdoors Can I pair multiple devices to SPACO?  Yes, you can pair multiple devices to SPACO and the information will stay stored in your device in the future.  However, SPACO can only be connected to and play from one source at a time.  6. MULTIROOMHow many SPACOs do I need to create a multiroom environment?We suggest you get the SPACO 5.1 system and then you can wirelessly connect anywhere in your house.  Or you can connect with as many SPACO minis as you like.Do I need to be connected to Wi-Fi or a router for multiroom?No router, Wi-Fi or special application is needed. SPACO creates its own 5 GHz adaptive wireless network that you can connect to.How far apart can the SPACO speakers be from each other?75 feet (23 m) indoors and 150 feet (46 m) outdoors from any SPACO devices.What if I want SPACO speakers in different rooms to play different music?Push the source button on the APP or use voice control to tell SPACO you would like to play locally.   7. PORTABILITYDoes SPACO have an internal battery?Only the SPACO mini has an internal battery that recharges when plugged in. It lasts 12 hours, and takes less than 1 hour to charge.​ ​At ASWY, we believe in the power of technology and design to improve people’s lives. Our goal in establishing ASWY in 2012 was to give our customers innovative, high-quality products with strong designs that are also affordable and easy-to- use. Every day, we set out to stretch the Internet’s potential and make it a reality for people. We are continually trialing new products that push technology’s boundaries and design standards. We are excited to be featured in BackerClub.co ! They are the top community for people who are very serious about crowdfunding and we are really looking forward to the feedback and support from their community of super-backers! ​",48.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

Hi Indiegogo

Music is the most powerful form of sound, because it taps into our emotional state. If you are passionate about music, you will definitely love our earbuds!

Here at ALTO, our aim is to give you the world’s best listening experience, with a simple and elegant look that provides the user with improved utility.

At ALTO, we believe that with the right earbuds, we can create a new sense of freedom and convenience for users. Our “cordless” design will expand your listening capabilities and allow you to enjoy your music, regardless of where you are. Whether you are having an intense match of tennis, or trying to enjoy music while lying down on your side, ALTO feels natural. ALTO earbuds are incredibly small, elegant and comfortable. 

We combine technology and lifestyle, to provide everyone, from fitness gurus, music lovers, to audiobook listeners, a new level of convenience in their daily lives. 

We're very excited about the product and we are confident that you will be too. Please help us bring ALTO into reality. With your help, we can revolutionize the listening experience forever, together.

Our Speakers: 

We used Balanced Armature Single - Full Range Driver to design our first prototype

One of the advantages of balanced armature is that it removes a lot of the moving parts. Unlike dynamic and regular speakers, balanced armature speakers do not require air to operate, and thus can be tuned very precisely since external air is not a factor, allowing you to hear all the details in the music.

With the single balanced armature driver the bass is warm but by combining several balanced armatures together you get a deep heartbeat bass sound quality that makes you want to dance. We will be upgrading our driver from single to 2-way balanced armature driver.

2-way balanced armature speaker: With multiple speakers you get a more precise sound reproduction,giving you a similar concert hall sound experience. Each driver is tuned for a specific range of music
column2:
one driver will handle the high frequency sound and the other will take the mid/low range sound.

Our Team

We are a diverse, young and energetic team with various backgrounds, ranging from engineering, business to design. Of course, we are also proudly Canadian

>LET YOUR SKIN DO THE LISTENING
column7: >HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ adds the sensation of touch to audio-visual listening experience — be in music, games, television, streaming, or movies.
column10:
>Movies and shows have never felt so real.
Feel the rumbles and rolls of battle, or the serene fall of rain drops.

column1: The high-quality, binaural, 3D-stereo sound out-performs big-brand headphones. It also clearly reproduces frequencies below 60 Hz, which is something you won't experience with headphones.

column3: >
column5: >Cinemas across the globe are looking to enhance your experience and have turned to our technology to do so. The HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ gives you that experience anywhere you go.
column9: >Choose from gray or graphite vegan suede cover.
column20: >The Augmented Audio technology inside HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ combines high-quality sound reproduction and physical distributed vibration, that allows users to hear and feel sound simultaneously. Unlike loudspeakers that vibrate sound into air, HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ contains a single, proprietary Flexound Augmented Audio module with patented Elastic Vibrating Elements to vibrate sound into an intelligent foam interior. It produces a soft, near-field listening experience which minimizes disturbance to others in the vicinity of the device, even when listening to bass-heavy frequencies. HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ covers the whole frequency range from 20 Hz to 20 kHz with a single element, while the vibrating sensations are felt most at lower frequencies up to 500 Hz. Middle and high frequencies create a spatially augmented HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ sound sphere, a personal binaural stereo soundscape. In addition to these benefits, the unique combination of sound and vibration at middle frequencies also adds clarity to spoken dialogue as both skin and ears act as sensory channels in synchrony.
column27: >HUMU Augmented Audio Cushion™ ​is designed and engineered in Finland. Flexound team started the work in 2015 to help autistic and disabled children by adding the sensation of touch to music. The versatile, globally unique technology can be embedded into cushions, cinema and car seats, gaming chairs, furniture and more. The patented FLEXOUND Augmented Audio™ has won many hearts and awards internationally.
column33: >

column3:
>Introducing PowerMuffs™!

 

 

 

Stay Warm with PowerMuffs...The Warmest Sound in the World!

column1: We live in a world where your personal sound is both more important and more accessible than ever before. Where once music lovers were content to wear low-fidelity, tinny headphones or, worse, stick annoying earbuds in their ears, those who prefer to have their lives continually scored may now choose from a plethora of high-quality, high-fidelity headphones that bring truly remarkable sound reproduction straight to their eardrums. There’s just one problem, however, with the current crop of great headphones out there.

No matter what product or product line you love, no matter what music company has your loyalty, no matter what style is your personal expression and choice, if you live somewhere that the weather is not picture perfect all year ‘round... you will eventually find that you can’t wear your beloved headphones and listen to the music you so dearly want to hear. That’s because when the weather turns cold, the average headphones simply can’t keep your ears warm while also delivering high quality sound. Heck, some of us just wear earmuffs as fashion statement!



The solution is PowerMuffs, the warmest sound in the world. In anything but pleasant, sunny weather, standard headphones, even high-quality headphones that command premium prices, aren’t up to the task of keeping you wired for sound. PowerMuffs can deliver high-quality sound in even unpleasant weather. Whether it’s just a little chilly or it’s freezing outside, whether it’s raining lightly or snowing like mad, PowerMuffs protect your ears and keep them (and you) warm and comfortable... while also giving you the high-quality sound reproduction that lets you enjoy your music in premium fidelity. PowerMuffs are attractive, stylish, and wonderfully warm earmuffs with Bluetooth compatible speakers and a built-in microphone.
PowerMuffs are lightweight and flexible. They can be sized to any person and, at just 140 grams, they offer anyone a comfortable and stylish choice for premium stereo audio.

Each set of PowerMuffs will overwhelm you with their premium stereo Bluetooth audio. You don’t just want to listen to your music. You want to feel your music, live your music, revel in your music. With PowerMuffs, you can.

Now, with PowerMuffs, you can get the experience you desire, each and every time, for up to six hours on a full charge of the PowerMuffs’ battery. And if you are listening to music on your phone, don’t worry if you have to take a call. PowerMuffs transition seamlessly from your music to your messages and calls.

column2: >Noise canceling technology means your PowerMuffs help cut down on extraneous environmental noise while you are talking to the other party on the line. You (and they) will be amazed at just how great your phone calls sound.

column1: Replacing dead batteries is not fun, so PowerMuffs come with premium built-in rechargeable lithium-ion batteries.

column2: >Rest assured knowing your PowerMuffs come with a 1-year limited warranty which means the best quality is backed by something even better.

column1: We are so confident in our PowerMuffs that are offering a full ONE YEAR limited warranty!

column2: perk_id=3223126"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""blank"">

column1:
What's in the box?

☑ 1 Set of PowerMuffs
☑ Built-in Rechargeable Batteries
☑ 1 Micro-USB Charging Cable
☑ Owner's Manual

You can wear them to listen to your music through your favorite Bluetooth capable device, including your phone or tablet. You can wear them even in inclement weather while your device is kept safe, dry, and warm near your body. PowerMuffs are designed for use in the outdoors when it’s cold and even snowing, so they’ll shield your ears while surrounding you with the tunes of your choice. And you won’t have to dig your phone or tablet out from under your coat or from within your pocket or bag, either, because your PowerMuffs have built-in sound controls and an integrated microphone. That’s right: You can listen to up to six hours of music or phone calls with your fully charged PowerMuffs.

Delivering before Christmas 2015 in your choice of universal colors. Conduct your phone calls or record your voice memos with PowerMuffs’ noise-canceling integral microphone -- and buy in confidence knowing PowerMuffs ship complete with built in rechargeable batteries and a one-year warranty. PowerMuffs would normally retail at $99 so we are passing on huge savings to all of our Indiegogo backers, but you need to act fast to take advantage of our huge and exclusive discounts!

 

PowerMuffs Are Bluetooth Compatible

Since the first Walkman was introduced in 1979, people have enjoyed being able to bring their music wherever they go with ease. But the one big disadvantage of the Walkman was shared by almost every other portable music player until only recently, and that is that they all had cords. No one wants their music on a leash. Dealing with the cord keeps you from enjoying your music as freely as you deserve to enjoy it. Say no more to cord hassle with wireless Bluetooth compatibility. PowerMuffs can be used with virtually any Bluetooth capable device, making them the perfect way to listen to your music -- not to mention switching easily to phone calls and back again. Cords are no longer holding you back when you have Bluetooth-capable PowerMuffs!

There was a time when people had to learn to conform to technology. Remember those iconic Walkman headphones? They weren’t very attractive and they weren’t very ergonomic... but in the early 1980s, anyone who was anyone was wearing a pair of those flat, spongy, tinny headphones around their necks. It was as much as fashion statement as it was a bold declaration of one’s devotion to enjoying one’s music on the go. But now, technology has advanced to the point where we no longer have to conform to function over style. Now, we can have style and function in a seamless package, and we can declare our style as easily as we do our allegiance to the music we love. PowerMuffs look and feel great. They’re not just comfortable and warm
column2: they are also great looking, and can be the perfect accent to any fall or winter outfit. But don’t think you can’t wear your PowerMuffs when the temperature rises, either. These are the perfect fashion statement for all temperatures and moods, provided you’re bold enough to strut your stuff with your PowerMuffs on your head or neck.

column1: PowerMuffs Come in Brown, Black, or White

Did we say fashion? One of the problems with the current field of “art” headphones is that, while they look very attractive by themselves, they often don’t look very good when paired to your actual clothes. You don’t want to draw unnecessary attention to just one part of your clothing or accessories, after all. You want your headphones to look like they belong with your outfit overall. That’s where PowerMuffs’ stylish color choices come into play. We offer comfortable, well-made PowerMuffs in one of three universal colors to keep it simple: brown black, and white. Black will go with almost anything, but for those outfits where brown is a better fit, you can have that, too. White is as neutral as you get and pretty much matches with everything. Buy one of each and always be prepared for whatever your mood and whatever the weather. It’s the perfect system for both your music and your messages.
PowerMuffs Feature Lightweight Adjustability to Fit Any Size Head

If you’re worried about cramping your style or weighing yourself down when you try to step out in style with your music, don’t be. Every pair of PowerMuffs weighs in at just 140 grams. They’re not just lightweight
column2: they’re also adjustable to fit any size head. That means you can get the perfect fit with ease when you wear your PowerMuffs, no matter what the outfit, weather, or occasion. Just slip them on, adjust them to suit yourself, and head on out. And if something changes (like your hairstyle or your accessories), you can readjust the PowerMuffs to perfectly fit the new you.

column1: None of this would matter if PowerMuffs did not also offer great, high-fidelity sound. You can immerse yourself in premium quality audio every time you wear your PowerMuffs... and you can look great while doing it. Don’t settle for lower-quality audio, and don’t try to get by with a Bluetooth headset that doesn’t faithfully recreate the type of sound quality you demand from your audio gear. You’re a music lover and it matters to you what your music sounds like.

When you’re listening to music, especially if the weather is less than perfect and you’re bundled up to listen in comfort, you don’t want to have to dig out your phone or take off your headset to take a call. With PowerMuffs, you don’t have to. With PowerMuffs, you can just use the headset’s built in noise-canceling microphone and volume controls to listen to your call, hold your conversation, and adjust the levels accordingly. No more tinny sound, and no more distorted Bluetooth conversations half-shouted to your family, friends, or business contacts. Now you can be as stylish and comfortable as you’ve always wanted to be while you enjoy great sound quality for both phone calls and music.

PowerMuffs Come Complete with a Battery and One-Year Warranty and Don’t Forget to Enjoy Six Hours of Music and Calls

Every set of PowerMuffs comes complete with a battery, unlike most other products out there. Buy with confidence knowing that our one-year warranty has your back. If you’re not happy, we’re not happy. PowerMuffs are a great product and we’ve spent a great deal of time, effort, and money developing them so that you’ll be satisfied. We wouldn’t bring PowerMuffs to market one minute before they were ready... and now, with your input and participation, we can finally bring PowerMuffs to market. You will enjoy them, we guarantee it... and if you have any problem at all, our one-year warranty ensures you have nothing to worry about. Do you have a question, concern, or feedback to share with us? Reach out to us today and let PowerMuffs be the solution to your audio needs. And the best part is, you can listen to up to six hours of music and phone calls on a full charge with your PowerMuffs.

column1: Affordably Priced for Everyone. Delivered Direct to Your Doorstep.

Get Yours In Time For the Holidays
The Holiday season is upon us. Don’t wonder what to get your family and friends this year. Everyone loves high-quality audio, and everyone will love PowerMuffs. These headphones have the style and versatility to please almost anyone. They’re classy, fun, and look great on anyone. They’re lightweight and adjustable, too, which means they’ll fit anyone. Don’t delay
column2:
get your PowerMuffs now and have them in time for the holiday season this year! We plan to ship shipments via air shipping in early-December, which means you should receive your PowerMuffs before Christmas!

Due to international regulations, the PowerMuffs are currently only available for shipping to the USA and we will update you if this changes in the future.

Do you know someone else who might enjoy a pair of PowerMuffs? Refer them for great sales incentives! PowerMuffs are just too great a product to keep to yourself. We guarantee that you know someone who would enjoy one or more pairs of PowerMuffs. Tell your friends and family about PowerMuffs today! Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total $200, you'll be rewarded with a free set of PowerMuffs!

column7:
>FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


Q. What colors are available for PowerMuffs?
A. PowerMuffs are available in universal colors of brown, black, and white to match any outfit.

Q. Are PowerMuffs Bluetooth compatible?
A. Yes, PowerMuffs are a Bluetooth compatible device, which frees you from cords and lets you enjoy your music on the go through the Bluetooth phone or tablet of your choice.

Q. When will my PowerMuffs be available?
A. PowerMuffs will be available by Christmas of 2015. Get yours today before they sell out!

Q. Can I take phone calls with my PowerMuffs?
A. Yes, you can. PowerMuffs have an integral noise-canceling microphone and built-in volume controls, so you can switch seamlessly from your music to a phone call and back again.

Q. What is the battery life in a pair of PowerMuffs?
A. On a single charge, your PowerMuffs should offer you up to six hours of music and phone calls!

Q. What sort of sound quality can I expect from PowerMuffs?
A. PowerMuffs offer high-quality, premium stereo sound. You will love the sound quality you get from your PowerMuffs, which are designed to satisfy even the most demanding audio buffs.

Q. How do I know PowerMuffs will fit me?
A. Every flexible pair of PowerMuffs weighs just 140 grams. PowerMuffs are flexible and can be adjusted to fit almost any size head. You can relax when you purchase a pair of PowerMuffs, knowing that it can be adjusted to fit you.

Q. Is there anything like this out there?
A. Nothing like PowerMuffs exist especially at our incredibly low and exclusive Indiegogo price point. PowerMuffs would normally retail at $99, so we are passing on huge savings to all of our Indiegogo backers!

Q. How fast is the shipping?
A. We will do everything in our power to make sure you receive your PowerMuffs before December 25, 2015.

Q. Can I pick-up my PowerMuffs locally?
A. Even though we are based in Los Angeles, CA, our manufacturing is done overseas, which is why the price for the PowerMuffs is so low. However, shipping costs to get the product from overseas are very costly and unfortunately we are not offering a local pickup option. The good news is that your new PowerMuffs will be delivered direct to your front door!

Q. How do you handle refunds?
A. Indiegogo stipulates in their Terms that all contributions are non-refundable, but things happen and we understand, so we will do everything we can to be fair and just.
column13:
>THE TEAM


It's the hard work that makes us succeed. With over 8 years of business, design, and manufacturing experience, the PowerMuffs team promises to deliver only an exceptional product backed by years of success.

column1: Ashley grew up in the cold suburbs of Chicago, but quickly realized a love for warm sunny southern California. Traveling back to the cold to visit family meant having to deal with the same issues as everyone else living in the cold understands and that's enjoying music and talking on the phone while trying to stay warm. After a countless number of cold days and tangled headphone cords, she decided to amalgamate two great products into one. That's when she turned to her design and manufacturing skills to build a set of wireless earmuff headphones that kept her warm and entertained.
column7:
>CONTACT US


Have a question or comment about PowerMuffs? Awesome! We'd love to hear from you. Just send us an email to: contact at PowerMuffs.com and we'll get back to you right away!

","Introducing PowerMuffs™!   Stay Warm with PowerMuffs...The Warmest Sound in the World!

column1: We live in a world where your personal sound is both more important and more accessible than ever before. Where once music lovers were content to wear low-fidelity, tinny headphones or, worse, stick annoying earbuds in their ears, those who prefer to have their lives continually scored may now choose from a plethora of high-quality, high-fidelity headphones that bring truly remarkable sound reproduction straight to their eardrums. There’s just one problem, however, with the current crop of great headphones out there.

No matter what product or product line you love, no matter what music company has your loyalty, no matter what style is your personal expression and choice, if you live somewhere that the weather is not picture perfect all year ‘round... you will eventually find that you can’t wear your beloved headphones and listen to the music you so dearly want to hear. That’s because when the weather turns cold, the average headphones simply can’t keep your ears warm while also delivering high quality sound. Heck, some of us just wear earmuffs as fashion statement!The solution is PowerMuffs, the warmest sound in the world. In anything but pleasant, sunny weather, standard headphones, even high-quality headphones that command premium prices, aren’t up to the task of keeping you wired for sound. PowerMuffs can deliver high-quality sound in even unpleasant weather. Whether it’s just a little chilly or it’s freezing outside, whether it’s raining lightly or snowing like mad, PowerMuffs protect your ears and keep them (and you) warm and comfortable... while also giving you the high-quality sound reproduction that lets you enjoy your music in premium fidelity. PowerMuffs are attractive, stylish, and wonderfully warm earmuffs with Bluetooth compatible speakers and a built-in microphone. AWESOME FEATURES
PowerMuffs are lightweight and flexible. They can be sized to any person and, at just 140 grams, they offer anyone a comfortable and stylish choice for premium stereo audio.

Each set of PowerMuffs will overwhelm you with their premium stereo Bluetooth audio. You don’t just want to listen to your music. You want to feel your music, live your music, revel in your music. With PowerMuffs, you can.

Now, with PowerMuffs, you can get the experience you desire, each and every time, for up to six hours on a full charge of the PowerMuffs’ battery. And if you are listening to music on your phone, don’t worry if you have to take a call. PowerMuffs transition seamlessly from your music to your messages and calls.

Noise canceling technology means your PowerMuffs help cut down on extraneous environmental noise while you are talking to the other party on the line. You (and they) will be amazed at just how great your phone calls sound.
Replacing dead batteries is not fun, so PowerMuffs come with premium built-in rechargeable lithium-ion batteries.
Rest assured knowing your PowerMuffs come with a 1-year limited warranty which means the best quality is backed by something even better.
We are so confident in our PowerMuffs that are offering a full ONE YEAR limited warranty!

What's in the box? ☑ 1 Set of PowerMuffs☑ Built-in Rechargeable Batteries☑ 1 Micro-USB Charging Cable☑ Owner's Manual You can wear them to listen to your music through your favorite Bluetooth capable device, including your phone or tablet. You can wear them even in inclement weather while your device is kept safe, dry, and warm near your body. PowerMuffs are designed for use in the outdoors when it’s cold and even snowing, so they’ll shield your ears while surrounding you with the tunes of your choice. And you won’t have to dig your phone or tablet out from under your coat or from within your pocket or bag, either, because your PowerMuffs have built-in sound controls and an integrated microphone. That’s right: You can listen to up to six hours of music or phone calls with your fully charged PowerMuffs.

Delivering before Christmas 2015 in your choice of universal colors. Conduct your phone calls or record your voice memos with PowerMuffs’ noise-canceling integral microphone -- and buy in confidence knowing PowerMuffs ship complete with built in rechargeable batteries and a one-year warranty. PowerMuffs would normally retail at $99 so we are passing on huge savings to all of our Indiegogo backers, but you need to act fast to take advantage of our huge and exclusive discounts! PowerMuffs Are Bluetooth Compatible

Since the first Walkman was introduced in 1979, people have enjoyed being able to bring their music wherever they go with ease. But the one big disadvantage of the Walkman was shared by almost every other portable music player until only recently, and that is that they all had cords. No one wants their music on a leash. Dealing with the cord keeps you from enjoying your music as freely as you deserve to enjoy it. Say no more to cord hassle with wireless Bluetooth compatibility. PowerMuffs can be used with virtually any Bluetooth capable device, making them the perfect way to listen to your music -- not to mention switching easily to phone calls and back again. Cords are no longer holding you back when you have Bluetooth-capable PowerMuffs!

There was a time when people had to learn to conform to technology. Remember those iconic Walkman headphones? They weren’t very attractive and they weren’t very ergonomic... but in the early 1980s, anyone who was anyone was wearing a pair of those flat, spongy, tinny headphones around their necks. It was as much as fashion statement as it was a bold declaration of one’s devotion to enjoying one’s music on the go. But now, technology has advanced to the point where we no longer have to conform to function over style. Now, we can have style and function in a seamless package, and we can declare our style as easily as we do our allegiance to the music we love. PowerMuffs look and feel great. They’re not just comfortable and warm
column2: they are also great looking, and can be the perfect accent to any fall or winter outfit. But don’t think you can’t wear your PowerMuffs when the temperature rises, either. These are the perfect fashion statement for all temperatures and moods, provided you’re bold enough to strut your stuff with your PowerMuffs on your head or neck.

column1: PowerMuffs Come in Brown, Black, or White

Did we say fashion? One of the problems with the current field of “art” headphones is that, while they look very attractive by themselves, they often don’t look very good when paired to your actual clothes. You don’t want to draw unnecessary attention to just one part of your clothing or accessories, after all. You want your headphones to look like they belong with your outfit overall. That’s where PowerMuffs’ stylish color choices come into play. We offer comfortable, well-made PowerMuffs in one of three universal colors to keep it simple: brown black, and white. Black will go with almost anything, but for those outfits where brown is a better fit, you can have that, too. White is as neutral as you get and pretty much matches with everything. Buy one of each and always be prepared for whatever your mood and whatever the weather. It’s the perfect system for both your music and your messages.
PowerMuffs Feature Lightweight Adjustability to Fit Any Size Head

If you’re worried about cramping your style or weighing yourself down when you try to step out in style with your music, don’t be. Every pair of PowerMuffs weighs in at just 140 grams. They’re not just lightweight
column2: they’re also adjustable to fit any size head. That means you can get the perfect fit with ease when you wear your PowerMuffs, no matter what the outfit, weather, or occasion. Just slip them on, adjust them to suit yourself, and head on out. And if something changes (like your hairstyle or your accessories), you can readjust the PowerMuffs to perfectly fit the new you.

column1: None of this would matter if PowerMuffs did not also offer great, high-fidelity sound. You can immerse yourself in premium quality audio every time you wear your PowerMuffs... and you can look great while doing it. Don’t settle for lower-quality audio, and don’t try to get by with a Bluetooth headset that doesn’t faithfully recreate the type of sound quality you demand from your audio gear. You’re a music lover and it matters to you what your music sounds like.
PowerMuffs Have a Built-in, Noise-Canceling Microphone

When you’re listening to music, especially if the weather is less than perfect and you’re bundled up to listen in comfort, you don’t want to have to dig out your phone or take off your headset to take a call. With PowerMuffs, you don’t have to. With PowerMuffs, you can just use the headset’s built in noise-canceling microphone and volume controls to listen to your call, hold your conversation, and adjust the levels accordingly. No more tinny sound, and no more distorted Bluetooth conversations half-shouted to your family, friends, or business contacts. Now you can be as stylish and comfortable as you’ve always wanted to be while you enjoy great sound quality for both phone calls and music.

PowerMuffs Come Complete with a Battery and One-Year Warranty and Don’t Forget to Enjoy Six Hours of Music and CallsEvery set of PowerMuffs comes complete with a battery, unlike most other products out there. Buy with confidence knowing that our one-year warranty has your back. If you’re not happy, we’re not happy. PowerMuffs are a great product and we’ve spent a great deal of time, effort, and money developing them so that you’ll be satisfied. We wouldn’t bring PowerMuffs to market one minute before they were ready... and now, with your input and participation, we can finally bring PowerMuffs to market. You will enjoy them, we guarantee it... and if you have any problem at all, our one-year warranty ensures you have nothing to worry about. Do you have a question, concern, or feedback to share with us? Reach out to us today and let PowerMuffs be the solution to your audio needs. And the best part is, you can listen to up to six hours of music and phone calls on a full charge with your PowerMuffs. COLOR OPTIONS    BROWNIVORYBLACK  PRODUCTION & SHIPPING
Affordably Priced for Everyone. Delivered Direct to Your Doorstep.

Get Yours In Time For the HolidaysThe Holiday season is upon us. Don’t wonder what to get your family and friends this year. Everyone loves high-quality audio, and everyone will love PowerMuffs. These headphones have the style and versatility to please almost anyone. They’re classy, fun, and look great on anyone. They’re lightweight and adjustable, too, which means they’ll fit anyone. Don’t delay
column2: get your PowerMuffs now and have them in time for the holiday season this year! We plan to ship shipments via air shipping in early-December, which means you should receive your PowerMuffs before Christmas!Due to international regulations, the PowerMuffs are currently only available for shipping to the USA and we will update you if this changes in the future.

column1: REFERRAL PROGRAMDo you know someone else who might enjoy a pair of PowerMuffs? Refer them for great sales incentives! PowerMuffs are just too great a product to keep to yourself. We guarantee that you know someone who would enjoy one or more pairs of PowerMuffs. Tell your friends and family about PowerMuffs today! Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total $200, you'll be rewarded with a free set of PowerMuffs!How Does it Work?1. Log into your Indiegogo account or click here to signup for an Indiegogo account if you have not yet already created an account.2. Navigate to the PowerMuffs campaign page and click the ""link"" icon  on the left side of the campaign and then paste this link into an email to send to all your friends. Or click the Facebook, Twitter, or Google Plus icons to share your unique link on your social media accounts.3. View your total referral contribution amount by logging into your profile in the upper right and then click ""Referrals"".  DEVELOPMENT TIMELINE

Originally
made to power class D amplifiers, such as the TPA3116, it works very well with my DIY7297 amplifier and any other single pole projects, as a winning

combination for noise and cost vs performance with capacitors.

-CFC (capacitor field cancellation)
filter with dampened common mode choke, optional arrangement for naked EPCOS
MKT capacitors with CFC following the CMC on AC side
Diode (MSR860 specifically preferred) or bridge package HEXFRED, for low noise, and lay
down next to ground plane proximity
options to fit variety of Nichicon KG capacitors and many Panasonics, all on a
ground plane to lower inductance as cost saver vs. 3/4 pole capacitors
22A, and voltages with capacitors up to 100v (35mm diameter, 1,500-10,000uf caps)

Reviews/Sightings:

From ChrisMmm on DIYaudio. Here and Here.

Also used in my demo amplifier, seen here.

column2: >The most secure wireless earphones ever. Easily and quickly molded by you to the exact shape of your ears creating a perfect fitting earphone that will never fall out or become uncomfortable.

column1: The Black Diamond earphones are the most secure true wireless earphones ever made. We want people to do whatever they choose without having to worry about their earphones falling out or becoming uncomfortable.

column11:
s=4272bd002bc0ea6357d04e5e74ef5ef2"" src=""""/>

 

Easily create perfect fitting custom molded earphones in minutes with our all-new Decibullz Press-Fit System. Simply heat the earpieces in hot water, snap in the earphones and press them into your ear. The earpieces will hold their shape until they are re-heated. The earpieces can be re-molded to make sure you get a perfect fit.

column1: Decibullz makes the only re-moldable custom earphones and earplugs in the world. If you don't get the perfect fit the first time simply re-heat and re-shape! This can be done as many times as needed to get a perfect fit.
column17:
s=f01298a2158df1436b7c3ce810ea9419"" src=""""/>

 

Decibullz has a track record of creating some of the best sounding earphones available. Our earphones have been recognized by some of the industry's toughest critics earning two CES Innovation Awards as well as Reviewed.com's Best Earphone of 2015. We are known for our well-balanced sound signature that is clean, powerful, and distortion free.

column9:
s=63fffe02a63d419316c0edadf8c253c0"" src=""""/>

 

The Black Diamond earphones feature a digital audio passthrough allowing you to hear external sounds when you want it and shut it out when you don't. Decibullz makes some of the best hearing protection so it's no surprise that our earphones do an amazing job of blocking out external noise.

s=c4faa032c6e157b740aab86203a248ee"" src=""""/>

 

BLUETOOTH 5.0

The Black Diamond earphones use the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology designed specifically for true wireless audio and data. The means a stronger connection, 2X range, better audio quality, and 2X faster data transfer speeds

s=a6e424610144a3e0cc94d6cfcd07587c"" src=""""/>

 

Simply remove the earphones from the charging case and pair to your phone. Seriously, that's it! The earphones will then automatically sync to your phone everytime they are removed from the charging case.

s=8d88a91294eb48f3ee701f03fcc6c292"" src=""""/>

 

It's all about freedom. No more reaching to your device to adjust volume, control your music, make calls, or use voice assistants like Alexa, Siri, or Google.

s=408c15b5d83db9eca3304bf39f9d55c4"" src=""""/>

We include everything you need to make the best fitting true wireless earphones with ease.

What's In The Box

column1: • Custom Silicone Canal Tips S, M, L

column17:
s=80004c9ef452608fc212fdd2d185f3d9"" src=""""/>

 

The absolute best way to keep earphones secure and comfortable is to fit them to the exact shape of your ears. Ears are too diverse for the traditional one-size-fits-all approach.

column1:
OUR STORY

Decibullz started out as a weekend project to make an affordable set of custom molded earphones that would not fall out while being active. Decibullz has quickly become the leader in affordable custom earpieces making the best custom-fit earphones, earplugs, and acoustic filters on the market. Put simply, if it goes in your ear we make it better. 

Decibullz is located in Fort Collins Colorado. Our team is dedicated to the pursuit of bringing custom molded earpieces to the masses. 

TRUE WIRELESS DEVELOPMENT

We have been working on a custom molded true wireless earphone for years and Black Diamond has turned into a true passion project for the Decibullz team. We were tired of seeing me-too companies make the same true wireless products without adding any real value. We know that combining our custom molded earpieces with the latest Bluetooth technology would create truly amazing earphones.
column9:
s=cb946a4b1fb31e5b7e6f43f4c4e902ff"" src=""""/>

 

We have created and tested hundreds of prototypes in our pursuit to create the perfect earphones.
column17:
s=5130038e6333afa92c5f45d5d2219f2c"" src=""""/>

 

We scrutinized every aspect of the design, refusing to compromise or rest until everything was perfect.

column1: The most secure wireless earphones ever. Easily and quickly molded by you to the exact shape of your ears creating a perfect fitting earphone that will never fall out or become uncomfortable.

The Black Diamond earphones are the most secure true wireless earphones ever made. We want people to do whatever they choose without having to worry about their earphones falling out or becoming uncomfortable.

Easily create perfect fitting custom molded earphones in minutes with our all-new Decibullz Press-Fit System. Simply heat the earpieces in hot water, snap in the earphones and press them into your ear. The earpieces will hold their shape until they are re-heated. The earpieces can be re-molded to make sure you get a perfect fit.

Decibullz makes the only re-moldable custom earphones and earplugs in the world. If you don't get the perfect fit the first time simply re-heat and re-shape! This can be done as many times as needed to get a perfect fit.   Decibullz has a track record of creating some of the best sounding earphones available. Our earphones have been recognized by some of the industry's toughest critics earning two CES Innovation Awards as well as Reviewed.com's Best Earphone of 2015. We are known for our well-balanced sound signature that is clean, powerful, and distortion free.

The Black Diamond earphones feature a digital audio passthrough allowing you to hear external sounds when you want it and shut it out when you don't. Decibullz makes some of the best hearing protection so it's no surprise that our earphones do an amazing job of blocking out external noise.

BLUETOOTH 5.0The Black Diamond earphones use the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology designed specifically for true wireless audio and data. The means a stronger connection, 2X range, better audio quality, and 2X faster data transfer speeds
