0,"

Press the button, put your earphones on and you’re ready to drum. No complicated directions or any hidden fees, HyperDrum is a pure, powerful drumming experience so you can improvise freely anytime and anywhere. Listen to your inner rhythms or follow your favorite songs and jam your dream beats with ease!

No matter if you're a novice, beginner or a pro player, you can get started with HyperDrum and play right away. Inspired by Roland e-kits, HyperDrum has the same drum component layout and position as the physical e-kit.

Unlike conventional bulky and expensive drum kits, HyperDrum is ultra-lightweight and portable at a fraction of the price. You can easily take HyperDrum with you in your hands, pockets or in your backpack. Fast draw your sticks and dive into the ultimately immersive drumming environment right away when the inspiration hits you.

With the proprietary Sensing Algorithm, HyperDrum perfectly follows your position and movements to ensure high accuracy with every strike you hit in the air. No special adjustments are needed and you don’t have to keep the power button held up. Drum and perform freely in your own way!
column2:
>P.S. Other virtual drumsticks require drummers to hold drumsticks with extra attention to make sure the power button is always placed up otherwise you won’t be able to drum. HyperDrum eliminates this hassle and lets you drum and perform freely in your own style without extra adjustments.

HyperDrum is crafted for your ultimate music performance. Ultra-Low latency largely reduces delay and produces incredibly life-like, ultra-high quality, synchronized sound so you never miss a beat.

HyperDrum elevates your drumming experience to the next level.  HyperDrum supports the standard MIDI protocol. You can use it to connect music production software such as GarageBand, Logic ProX and more for creativity. 

Set your left-foot console to bass drum through the function key and enjoy double bass drumming, HyperDrum will take your playing to the next stage and allows you to create new dimensions of drum beats.
column4:
showinfo=0"">

Whether you are sitting on the couch and getting some practice in or leading the beat at a party. HyperDrum sets the mood and stands out in any space. From home to office, studio to street, play alone or together and always have a blast!

See how he enjoys grooving to the beat, and you can immerse yourself into drumming like him.
column6:
showinfo=0"">

Connect your Drum Console via Bluetooth, and play your favorite music through your phone, you will enjoy the perfect mix of music and drum sound right off the bat.

君が好きだと叫びたい - BAAD  (Drum Cover)
column8:
showinfo=0"">

With unrivaled beast power and pure minimalist elegance, HyperDrum breaks through all obstacles and takes your drumming experience to the next level. Move more fluently and feel the real beats like never before. Classy look, premium touch, game-changing functions - it's a musical masterpiece on-the-go.

 

Although HyperDrum is our first crowdfunding project, we have enough confidence to deliver the products on time with quality thanks to the strong support from our factory and logistic partners. Theodots team will provide the best solution to all of our backers. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us and we'd love to hear your voice.

Other virtual drumsticks require drummers to hold drumsticks with extra attention to make sure the power button is always placed up otherwise you won’t be able to drum. HyperDrum eliminates this hassle and lets you drum and perform freely in your own style without extra adjustments.HyperDrum is crafted for your ultimate music performance. Ultra-Low latency largely reduces delay and produces incredibly life-like, ultra-high quality, synchronized sound so you never miss a beat.HyperDrum elevates your drumming experience to the next level.  HyperDrum supports the standard MIDI protocol. You can use it to connect music production software such as GarageBand, Logic ProX and more for creativity. Set your left-foot console to bass drum through the function key and enjoy double bass drumming, HyperDrum will take your playing to the next stage and allows you to create new dimensions of drum beats.Whether you are sitting on the couch and getting some practice in or leading the beat at a party. HyperDrum sets the mood and stands out in any space. From home to office, studio to street, play alone or together and always have a blast!See how he enjoys grooving to the beat, and you can immerse yourself into drumming like him.Connect your Drum Console via Bluetooth, and play your favorite music through your phone, you will enjoy the perfect mix of music and drum sound right off the bat.君が好きだと叫びたい - BAAD  (Drum Cover)With unrivaled beast power and pure minimalist elegance, HyperDrum breaks through all obstacles and takes your drumming experience to the next level. Move more fluently and feel the real beats like never before. Classy look, premium touch, game-changing functions - it's a musical masterpiece on-the-go. Although HyperDrum is our first crowdfunding project, we have enough confidence to deliver the products on time with quality thanks to the strong support from our factory and logistic partners. Theodots team will provide the best solution to all of our backers. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us and we'd love to hear your voice.",38.0,3,"1 Campaign

column1:
0,"

We wanted outdoor portable speakers that could actually be heard outdoors. And we couldn’t find one that could fill an outdoor space with big, powerful sound. So we created the loudest Bluetooth speaker we could possibly fit in an 11.5” x 6.5” x 8.75” box of pure rugged tenacity.

 

Turtlebox is LOUD and incredibly CLEAR.

With a 50-watt internal amplifier, and an extremely efficient speaker and driver, Turtlebox will roar over anything without losing the subtle nuances in your music. You’ve never heard anything like this.

Our optimized frequency curve makes sure you can hear every detail loud and clear as the sound cuts through wind and distance.

Turn it up and unleash earth-shaking, glass-shattering distortion-free sound at up to 120dB! That’s louder than the cockpit of a fighter jet - all without losing sound quality!

 

Every Turtlebox speaker can wirelessly pair up with another Turtlebox to give you legendary L/R true stereo sound.

The first time we managed to pair two of our prototypes in stereo was an inspirational moment in our lives. We were instantly brought back to that common childhood memory of a first big rock concert.

Most portables that pair together only do so in mono. Some brag that you can daisy-chain multiple units (more than 2 together) and that would somehow be awesome. What a waste.

Turtlebox is different. It distinctly separates your left and right channels. This not only means you get double the sound power, but you get an incredibly realistic sound experience. You don’t want a daisy chain. You want real stereo sound. You want 2 boxes in stereo, well separated, and you want them loud.

Turtlebox uses an advanced sound frequency curve that’s specifically designed to cut through wind and travel distance. This means your crystal-clear music will blast through raging storms and over hundreds of yards without a problem.

One thing we’ve observed along the way is most other portables boast of “omnidirectional” sound (speaker placement on all sides of unit) and have touted its superiority. We’ve found that to be false in an outdoor environment. Half the sound generated by omnidirectional speakers is lost in the wind - all that audio power is wasted.

You rarely put your sound source in the middle of the action - the reality is you put it to the side and fire it at the action. You want all of that power directed toward the listener.

Not only is Turtlebox loud, it’s powerfully durable. Waterproof, dust-proof, and shockproof, Turtlebox can stand whatever abuse you throw at it.

Toss it from your truck, wash it with a jet hose, or drop 100 brass bullet casings on it. Turtlebox can take a beating and keep playing.

IP67 Water Ingress Protection Rating means Turtlebox is completely sealed from water and dust. You can throw Turtlebox in a pool, drop it in a lake, wash it off with a jet hose, and it’ll still play loud and clear.

From the beginning, we took the road and the attitude that the housing is every bit as important in the outdoor experience as the electronics. All the housing we encountered were either too heavy or too light and used bad material choices.

Yes, the box needs to be extremely tough. But the box should also be well-shaped, and not easily snagged. It shouldn’t hold water, anywhere. Mud and sand should hose right off.

It needs to be well weighted - not too light, where it tips over with any movement, but not too heavy either. It needs a central center of gravity, where you can put it on its back the same as its feet.

The box should be UV resistant and not fade in the sun. It needs to be slip resistant and have a grippy handle.

And it should be built with very few pieces.

Turtlebox hardware is made of stainless steel - making it not just strong but incredibly corrosion resistant. It’s able to handle saltwater, sand and whatever else nature has to offer.

We use a 2 piece shell loaded with UV inhibitor that features non-slip rubber feet, a rubber handle, and a strong ABS skeleton.

We took painstaking detail to perfect the look and strength of every piece in and out of Turtlebox. It can take a beating and still be ready for your next adventure.

Turtlebox is approximately the size and shape of a classic lunchbox. We wanted the biggest speaker we could get with the lowest center of gravity, period.

The size and weight ratio was strategically engineered to deliver excellent portability, without sacrificing substance.

Too many portable speakers lack the size and weight required to deliver the full sound. When you pick up Turtlebox, you will immediately know you are holding something substantial.

You are getting a big-magnet speaker - able to give you big sound - and you are getting a lightweight portable, able to bring on all your trips. Our 8 lb weigh-in is truly ideal.

Need to strap Turtlebox down? No problem. We understand the need to have booming speakers strapped to the hood of your 4Wheeler - so we included built-in tie-down anchors on Turtlebox so you can strap it to virtually anything.

Tie it to your canoe, ranger, airboat, bull, or whatever else you can think of. We designed it to fit any standard tie-down strap that you can buy from your local hardware store.

Turtlebox boasts a 20+ hour long continuous playtime at 50% volume (still louder than many portables at max volume) with its rechargeable battery. We call this volume level “tailgate”. Everyone in a 50 person tailgate can hear it perfectly.

We have had many max-volume longevity tests done, and honestly, it really depends on the music you test, but rock n’ roll routinely plays 6+ hours on our battery at an insanely loud max volume.

Though the length varies depending on what you play, the 15,600 mAh/57.7 watt-hour built-in lithium ion 6-cell battery pack is a great capacity/weight choice and plays all day long when you need it to.

Have you noticed how many portables need an instruction book? It’s crazy. Buttons all over the thing and even hidden buttons. We created the functionality of Turtlebox to be as simple as possible.

The box is simple and straightforward. You will always be able to understand what the box is doing, and what state it is in. The buttons are all in one place. The panel is intuitive. And the Bluetooth pairing sequence is as easy as pushing a button.

No fancy tricks, confusing buttons, or complicated screens. Our Bluetooth 4.0 connects automatically to your Bluetooth linked device up to 100 ft away.

If you prefer the higher fidelity of an auxiliary input, you can bypass the Bluetooth connectivity by simply plugging in an aux cord to our classic 3.5mm input.

LOUD, TOUGH, PORTABLE and EASY TO USE, what more can you ask for?

We specifically designed and engineered Turtlebox to be the best outdoor speaker in the world. We did it.

 

 

We’re 4 best friends doing life together - canoeing the bayou, sailing in the bay, camping on the weekends.  We love music and high-quality gear. But when it came to a speaker that could keep up with our lifestyle - nothing got the job done.

Portable Bluetooth speakers broke easily and weren’t nearly loud enough, while “outdoor” speakers were uber durable, but sounded terrible. We needed a clear sounding, loud as a foghorn Bluetooth speaker that was also waterproof and strong. So we created Turtlebox.

We built the first Turtlebox in our garage - it was a waterproof case with a marine-grade 6x9 speaker mounted to the front and a car amplifier and motorcycle battery inside.  

It was something no-one had ever seen or heard. Everywhere we went, people wanted to know about it. We knew we had something special.

So we began ruthlessly testing speakers, batteries, amplifiers, switches, and Bluetooth modules. We spent over 10,000 grinding hours making sure every detail performed powerfully. We bought, sold, strained, pushed, stretched, dinked, and destroyed every portable speaker out there to make sure we could beat and exceed every single one outdoors.

If we were going to make a portable speaker, we wanted it to be the best outdoor speaker modern-day technology could offer.  After years of working with engineers from all over the world, we finally crafted a speaker we’re proud of.

LOUD, portable, waterproof and impact resistant, Turtlebox is the perfect speaker for all your life’s adventures. You’ll want it at your tailgate, your backyard bbq, your fishing boat, and anywhere else you want to listen to rich, powerful music.  

 

Turtlebox was designed and created by four friends with a desire to LIVE FREE. We love life, adventure, and the outdoors - we also love music and believe that all aspects of our lives are better when blended with great music.   

Our music needs to be loud, clear, and full. It needs to play a LONG time, and we need it to be weatherproof. Turtlebox is our answer. We take it EVERYWHERE.
 

The Turtlebox team is based out of Houston, TX, where we enjoy canoeing, sailing, biking, hunting, fishing, and eating good BBQ with friends. For us, Turtlebox simply makes all of these things better.

Our hope is that we get to share our love for life, music, and adventure with all who come in contact with Turtlebox.  

Love,

The Turtlebox Team

column2: >Otto's DIY is now available from our webshop!

column1: The eurorack format is a mechanical and electrical standard for modular synthesizers. These synthesizers consists of eurorack modules, which are interconnected by patch cables. The modular concept allows you to build the functional blocks one by one, creating a synthesizer from ground zero.

Otto's DIY makes learning and experimenting easier and more accessible. Building eurorack modules is a great way to learn electronics, get creative and have fun. Whether you are expert or just starting off with synthesizers, Otto's DIY is here to take your eurorack experience to the next new level.
Otto's DIY Ecosystem consists of eurorack compatible prototyping printed circuit boards (PCBs), carefully chosen electrical components and mechanical parts.
The design allows you to build sandwich style skiff friendly modules, while the included set of hardware makes your build just as durable as any other factory made module.
The PowerBrick extension is responsible for powering your circuit while protecting the rest of your modular system.
There are currently two DIY panels available: the Protoboard-1120 and Stripboard-480.
The PowerBrick comes pre-assembled, it connects your Otto's DIY build to the power distribution board of your modular rack.

The hardware package includes 10 mm standoffs, M2 bolts, nuts and a 16pin IDC busboard cable to power your module. The hardware pack is included free of charge in every perk.  (The amount of components vary with the number of PowerBricks in the perk.)

The Otto's DIY ecosystem was created for safe experimentation, easy and fast module prototyping. The printed circuit-boards are designed to fit common parts of synthesizers. The coordinates of the holes in the prototyping area are numbered along the edges of the panels to help the layout process. The pre-drilled holes make it easy to mount potentiometers and jack sockets even for relatively inexperienced craftsman. Just extend the size of the hole with a larger drill-bit and install any panel mount component.

We put together a number of different kits to get you started on your Otto's DIY journey. Choose the ""Early bird"" Core Kit to be one of the first backers to receive the package! (Early bird perks ship in March while the rest of the packages ship in April and May of 2018.)

Intech Studio is a fresh brand in the world of electronic instruments. Our main focus in the past was on modular MIDI controllers. Otto’s DIY is a project we are personally passionate about, the eurorack format has given many of our existing projects a new face. We believe that the DIY community is ready for a powerful new way of prototyping, building fully functional eurorack modules has never been easier.
This campaign is the presentation of our dedication towards the modular concept. Otto's DIY is here to help you experience DIY nature and flexibility provided by modular systems.

We have contacted various suppliers across the globe to find the best components which are both superior in quality and fit the Otto’s DIY ecosystem. The more contribution we receive, the better prices we can negotiate, additional perks will be available as we surpass our goal.

Otto's DIY is more than a hardware project, our goal is to build a synthesizer do-it-yourself community. Sharing knowledge and experience about DIY builds and techniques is an important part of Otto's DIY.
Come, join our facebook group, check out projects made using Otto's DIY panels and interact with like minded people.

In case we do not reach our goal, we will be forced to downgrade our perks and supply only the core components of Otto's DIY. The perks that include third party components (Potentiometers, TS jacks etc.) will contain more Otto's DIY panels instead to compensate the backers!

We have to deal with several manufacturers and suppliers across the world. There may be delays in production, but we try to overcome these issues with good communication. We are working only with reliable partners, with whom we already done business in the past.
Our experience in hardware development and supply chain management for prototyping will help us to fulfill our responsibilities and deliver a great product to our backers.

You can always show your support by sharing the campaign on your social media. If you wish to stay up-to-date with the latest developments, you can join the Otto's DIY facebook group or check the Intech Studio facebook and instagram pages!
Otto's DIY is not your cup of tea? No problem! Share our project with your friends. Tip us a coffee if you want to support us.

The world’s smallest DAC + high-powered amplifier earphone designed to provide full digital audio without the need for an external device or bulky stereo headphone.

column1: The latest retail gift box version with bonus PC USB adapter included.
music continues to becoming more mobile and much more personal, we ask
ourselves how we can improve on earphone design for better enjoyment. HiFi
grade products utilize external USB DACs and headphone amplifiers to eliminate
the deficiency in the audio design of the mobile phone. We take this challenge
one step further by shrinking the implementation into a regular earphone. Z:ero
is the first digital earphone that includes a USB DAC and headphone amplifier
that you won’t even notice. It gets pure digital audio data from your mobile
USB port and creates High Fidelity music that everyone can afford and it’s
easily carried around. This isn’t just some marketing gimmick. Z:ero earphones
actually carry around bulky external USB DACs and amplifiers to improve the
audio quality and we were able to compact it and put it inside standard
earphones? Yes, we believed that High Fidelity earphone could be designed to be
more affordable and compact by carefully picking the right architecture and
components. We managed to put all components onto a tiny Printed Circuit Board
(PCB) that fits into Z:ero’s control box. Don’t be fooled by its size, it comes
matter how good (or expensive) your existing earphone are, it is limited by the
DAC and amplifier design inside your mobile phone. Mobile phone designs are
highly dense and audio quality is always compromised for cost and size. By
getting the original audio data from the USB port directly, we free up the
bottleneck of processing the audio inside the phone. It’s like going from RCA
cables to HDMI in the TV evolution.
know how important the driver is in order to create really good music. Z:ero
digital earphones use neodymium magnets that can deliver high sensitivity SPL
(sound pressure level) in the 110-120dB range. This translate into quicker
response time and more vibrant audio .
to cost and size considerations, most mobile phones have very small audio
output power in the 12mW range. With the headphone amplifier built into
Z:ero, we increase the output power to 27mW. The bass quality sounds
revived and you’ll be surprised how much you have been missing out with your
earbud driver is housed in an aluminum casing with a gloss coating. We designed
Z:ero to come in red or gold so you can match it with your individual style.
The cables have been shielded preventing outside interference from rubbing or
scratching and coated in a red/silver stripe pattern. The control box is
covered with a matching color plate to unify the design pattern.

column2: >To keep your earphones safe and clean, we also provide a free carrying case. The Z:ero red version comes with a purple carrying case and the Z:ero gold version comes with a black carrying case.

Tech Reviews 24/7
Think About
You can find more Z:ero digital earphone comments from our backers at the comment section and also at our Zorloo Facebook and Twitter page.

using “USB Audio Player Pro” or “Hiby Music Player” from Google PlayStore, you

column4: >We are so excited to reach our 1st stretch goal. We are now in full gear for Z:ero production. The next iPhone Lightning digital earphone campaign will be launched at Q4 this year. Please follow us at
column22: > to get the latest updates. Because of you, the digital earphone evolution has just begun.

column4: >Z:ero comes with convenient and easy to use button to control your music. You can change the volume using the top and lower buttons while using the middle button to play, stop, skip forward and backward.

column1: Z:ero featured at NewsWatch TV on Discovery Channel

column5: >Q. Is Z:ero compatible with all Android smartphones?

column1: A.  It's currently compatible with the following smartphone below.
* Samsung Galaxy S3, S4, S5, S6, S6 Edge
* Samsung Note2, Note3, Note4, Note Edge
* Sony Xperia Z1, Z2, Z3, M Dual
* HTC One M7, M8, Droid DNA
Please check www.zorloo.com FAQ on the latest compatibility list.
Q. Any plans to extend to other smartphones?
A.  Sure. We will continue testing additional smartphones that are commonly used         in the market.
Q. Why do we expect compatibility issues with Z:ero?
A.  First of all, smartphones should be ready for USB On-The-Go(OTG) functions             but most older versions of Android smartphone do not support OTG functions.

Second, in the case of Android OS, there is not a standard that can be applied to        all devices like Apple's iOS since every brand has their own modifications that            are applied on top of the standard OS released from Google. This means testing        for every single Android smartphone must be tested to confirm compatibility.
Q. How do I pick earphone color or T-shirt size?

A.  We will be sending out messages to our backers per perk that was selected                 requesting color and/or t-shirt size. We will also request address verification               before shipping out our products.

Q. Does it work with other PC platforms like Windows, OS X and                Linux?

A.  Yes, Z:ero is also tested to work at Windows 7, Windows 8.0/8.1, OS X Yosemite,       Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. You need an USB Type A to micro-USB female adapter in
column2: >order to connect Z:ero to the PC USB port.

column1: ","The world’s smallest DAC + high-powered amplifier earphone designed to provide full digital audio without the need for an external device or bulky stereo headphone.
The latest retail gift box version with bonus PC USB adapter included.
music continues to becoming more mobile and much more personal, we ask
ourselves how we can improve on earphone design for better enjoyment. HiFi
grade products utilize external USB DACs and headphone amplifiers to eliminate
the deficiency in the audio design of the mobile phone. We take this challenge
one step further by shrinking the implementation into a regular earphone. Z:ero
is the first digital earphone that includes a USB DAC and headphone amplifier
that you won’t even notice. It gets pure digital audio data from your mobile
USB port and creates High Fidelity music that everyone can afford and it’s
easily carried around. This isn’t just some marketing gimmick. Z:ero earphones
actually carry around bulky external USB DACs and amplifiers to improve the
audio quality and we were able to compact it and put it inside standard
earphones? Yes, we believed that High Fidelity earphone could be designed to be
more affordable and compact by carefully picking the right architecture and
components. We managed to put all components onto a tiny Printed Circuit Board
(PCB) that fits into Z:ero’s control box. Don’t be fooled by its size, it comes
matter how good (or expensive) your existing earphone are, it is limited by the
DAC and amplifier design inside your mobile phone. Mobile phone designs are
highly dense and audio quality is always compromised for cost and size. By
getting the original audio data from the USB port directly, we free up the
bottleneck of processing the audio inside the phone. It’s like going from RCA
cables to HDMI in the TV evolution.
know how important the driver is in order to create really good music. Z:ero
digital earphones use neodymium magnets that can deliver high sensitivity SPL
(sound pressure level) in the 110-120dB range. This translate into quicker
response time and more vibrant audio .
to cost and size considerations, most mobile phones have very small audio
output power in the 12mW range. With the headphone amplifier built into
Z:ero, we increase the output power to 27mW. The bass quality sounds
revived and you’ll be surprised how much you have been missing out with your
earbud driver is housed in an aluminum casing with a gloss coating. We designed
Z:ero to come in red or gold so you can match it with your individual style.
The cables have been shielded preventing outside interference from rubbing or
scratching and coated in a red/silver stripe pattern. The control box is
covered with a matching color plate to unify the design pattern.
To keep your earphones safe and clean, we also provide a free carrying case. The Z:ero red version comes with a purple carrying case and the Z:ero gold version comes with a black carrying case.
Please see our users and reviewers comments about Z:ero digital earphone:
You can find more Z:ero digital earphone comments from our backers at the comment section and also at our Zorloo Facebook and Twitter page.
is compatible with the following Android smartphones:

using “USB Audio Player Pro” or “Hiby Music Player” from Google PlayStore, you
can extend the compatibility with other devices.

We are so excited to reach our 1st stretch goal. We are now in full gear for Z:ero production. The next iPhone Lightning digital earphone campaign will be launched at Q4 this year. Please follow us at zorloo, facebook and twitter to get the latest updates. Because of you, the digital earphone evolution has just begun.

Z:ero comes with convenient and easy to use button to control your music. You can change the volume using the top and lower buttons while using the middle button to play, stop, skip forward and backward.

'>A lot of you asked for stretch goals. We have been thinking a lot about this and asked many people in order to do this right. Here is what we decided:

Stretch goal #1 - Hacking Guide 130.000 EUR
The second most requested thing was a hacking guide. We already created a draft for a visual guide which will explain you the foundations of how to use the automat toolkit. As part of the stretch goal we will create a series of tutorials for our backers, too. 

Stretch goal #2 - Community - 160.000 EUR
Besides just having a piece of paper or video to explain things, we believe there has to be a central platform for the future of music making with machines / dadamachines. So I want to open and run a community platform based on discourse - like the guys from axoloti, monome and elektron run it for their communities It’ll be a platform where you can share new designs for adapters and elements, code or circuit designs and much more.

Stretch goal #3 - Configuration Tool / Velocity - 177.777 EUR [adjusted]
So far the most-requested feature has been velocity. What exactly does that mean? For people not as familiar with MIDI, the velocity value essentially maps to how strong the solenoid movement is when it hits something. This means that if you have variable velocity then you have more variety in the sound you output. This variety can offer more expressive and less mechanical noise making - and as music makers that’s pretty cool.

Currently, the toolkit allows changing the dynamic by changing the length of the note you are sending via MIDI which aleady offers a lot of possibilites. In order to give you guys even more control, we will create a configuration tool if we reach 190K EUR. This tool will allow you to customize the MIDI velocity values - meaning you can change the latency thereby ‘tuning’ the instruments you build. We are excited because we expect people can find cool ways to use velocity if they hooks up LED lights or DC motors as well. We will also make sure the tool includes the option to save favorite settings as presets.

Our friend Tobias who runs tubbutec made a similar tool for his product called unipulse, from which we will draw inspiration for the dadamachines configuration tool:
column4:
>

We have discussed this with several experts and are confident that we can build this solution given the constraints of the campaign funding. There are of course many different solutions to this problem, but we believe this is the best solution for the automat toolkit and is viable with the extra funding if we reach the stretch goal.

To successfully build this configuration solution we will need extra help from a software engineer to consult on software and firmware. We have set the goal out far enough to be sure there is budget to include this extra testing and development.

column1:
Together with your support, we want to make the first series production batch of the automat toolkit. In return, you will get an awesome reward and become a part of our community of music machine lovers!

Get one of the ready-to-go toolkit packages including everything you need to get started.

music maker friendly 
The automat is hackable in almost every dimension and 100% Arduino compatible. Thanks to the toolkit's modular design you can extend the kit as needed. If you find one automat controller is not enough - chain them! The board can be programmed just like an Arduino so if you want to hack it, no problem. With the automat controller, its easy to open the casing and extend its functions with Arduino shields and your own additions. To make it even easier - every controller comes with an extra port for extension modules.

open source 
We want make music machines accessible to everyone. Just like the great people behind Axoloti, Bare Conductive, MeeBlip, monome, MusicThingModular, MutableInstruments we think the best projects are open. Therefore, upon successful funding and after all backers received their rewards, the automat toolkit will be open sourced. You can find the repository which currently contains the Board Support Package for the Arduino IDE here: https://github.com/dadamachines/automat

made in germany 
We care about quality and a good relationship with our manufacturing partners. This is why the automat is made by Watterott electronic GmbH, a premier hobby electronics distributors in Germany and an official manufacturing partners for arduino.cc in Europe. All other components are made or sourced by partners in Germany.

dadamachines is the project of Berlin-based Creative Technologist and DJ – Johannes Lohbihler. Johannes grew up in Bavaria, hailing from a line of seven generations of carpenters. Growing up among the Weilheim music scene that included producers and bands such like the Notwist, Lali Puna and Acid Pauli - Johannes was interested in music from early on. He started DJing and found inspiration to bring together the world of electronic music and analog tools - combining his background as a craftsman and love of music.

During his masters studies in product and interaction design, he began building tangible musical instruments which eventually led to dadamachines. Given the complicated nature of most automata and music machines, Johannes began developing the automat toolkit, a simple plug-and-play kit that made music machines available to everyone.

More on dadamachines 
Press Kit | Web | Facebook | Instagram | Twitter

dadamachines isn't the first music machine. There are tons of other music makers exploring the possibilities of how to create sound all around the world. A few of our favorite contraptions are built by trimpin, godfried willem raes, felix machines, nick yulman, sonicrobots - check them out for inspiration.

The automat is plug & play – offering unlimited possibilities. Simply connect your favorite MIDI hardware device, music App or DAW and trigger the actuators of your choice to create a composition.  Never played an instrument? Not a problem! Today’s music apps make it easy to get started. Back in November 2014, Johannes held a workshop with friends in Lund, Sweden. This very special evening provided the motivation to build the dadamachines project after seeing non-musician friends get excited and experimenting with sound.  Ready to get hands-on and explore your ideas? Digital tools enable you to be precise and fast about trying new things. Combine anything with the automat toolkit and start creating your own sound.Taison is an old friend of Johannes and composes for theatre productions such as ""20.000 Meilen unter den Meeren"". This production became the original testing ground for the toolkit development.

In early 2016, Johannes was approached by BLACKSPACE to develop an installation with them for AUDI called the MUSIC BOX that has since played 50+ live sets.   ""automat is an innovative, hackable controller that turns MIDI signals into mechanical impulses and can be used to make musical instruments out of just about anything. Bring on the music robots!"" – Rounik Sethi I ask.audio

Sounds85 (patent pending) is a simple device that can be used with any set of earbuds or headphones. It keeps the volume at a safe level that will not result in permanent hearing loss.

column3:
>

 

It is simple to use and unobtrusive. The Sounds85 attaches to all earbuds, headphones or music/video players, and limits the volume to approximately 85 decibels - no matter how loud the volume on the device.  The proprietary design ensures that it does not denigrate the quality of the sound - keeping your music or video sound effects as they were meant to be heard. It can be used

column1: with all audio devices, such as iPhones, Androids, iPads, MP3 players, and tablets, keeping<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
volume at a safe level. Sounds85 is not a permanent installation. It can be attached and removed from headphones, earbuds and music/video players.
The National Institute of Occupation Safety and Health
(NIOSH) states that a person can listen to any noise at 85 decibels for up to 8
hours without suffering a permanent hearing loss. As soon as the noise is increased only 3 decibels, the amount of
time a person can listen without permanent hearing loss is cut in half…only 4 hours!

column5:
>

Will your kids have Hearing Loss by age 20?

column1: concluded loud music delivered through headphones or earbuds promotes potential hearing
loss. This survey carried out by a 3rd party for Siemens asked 500 teens if
they had experienced ringing, roaring, buzzing, or pain in their ears – nearly HALF
- 46% - said “Yes”!  This is a significant increase over a similar study done
about 4 yrs ago showing only 20% of teens indicated possible hearing loss.
our children’s skin from the sun, our children’s heads and knees when on bikes,
and we limit what our children watch on TV. Let’s get a Sounds85 on all children’s
listening devices and protect the only set of ears they will ever have!
• Permanent Hearing Loss cannot be fixed or reversed!
• 46% of teens in a recent study admitted to having roaring, buzzing, or pain in their ears...signs of permanent hearing loss!
• There are almost as many 30-somethings with loud music induced hearing loss as there are 70 year olds with age-related hearing loss.
• Music induced hearing loss is often accompanied by tinnitus (ringing in the ears).
• The output from headphones and earbuds can be greater than 110 decibels (this is like the sound of a chainsaw with no protection).
• Listening to 100 decibels will start to cause permanent hearing loss and often times tinnitus after only 15 minutes of listening time (National Institute of Safety and Health – NIOSH)

column4: >Great article written about Sounds85 in the

column1: is a Simple Low Tech Solution to a High Tech Problem: Music Induced Hearing Loss! Most  music, movie, or game players do not have an app to control the maximum output.
Some of the new devices have a way to lower the max output . . .  BUT, YOU MUST GUESS
AT WHERE YOU ARE SETTING IT. Too low you get justified complaints. Too high and
you are still at risk of permanent hearing loss. <i>Guessing at the setting is like putting your car's cruise control on
There is NO APP that controls the max volume for all music, movies and games. With the Sounds85 there is no guessing. It automatically sets the max output to approximately 85dB.
<li>Anyone who does not want to experience hearing loss from loud headphones and earbuds<u>.</u>
computers where students use headphones and earbuds.
them young. They will think this is part of how we listen to anything with
headphones and earbuds . . . just like kids think ""you should always put a seat belt on when
remind them it’s not cool to struggle to hear, especially when they caused the loss themselves.
Baron, AuD, has been an audiologist for over 22 years. He designed and tested
the Sounds85, and is the CEO of Sounds85, LLC, a Boulder, Colorado based
company. His primary focus is now the prevention of hearing loss for people of
all ages, especially those that use headphones and earbuds.  He spent years researching,
designing, and developing the Sounds85  Personal Volume Protector. He worked with an audio engineer, a
doctor of education, and incorporated research by doctors of audiology and
high-tech manufacturing experts.  Since billions of earbuds and headphones were already in use, he
wanted to develop a product that could be used with any existing headphone or

column38:
/>

                   

Where are we in the manufacturing, distribution, and information dissemination process?

1. We completed our first small manufacturing run, tweaked a few minor issues pointed out by our beta-testers and incorporated those changes into our design. You will be receiving our finished product – not a prototype.

2. We currently have 100 units in use and ordered a second, larger manufacturing run so that our backers will receive their orders soon after the Indiegogo campaign is completed.

3. Two articles were written in local newspapers about music -induced hearing loss and Sounds85. We are diligently working with a very talented marketing expert (who is currently donating her time because she believes in our product) to spread the word through blogs, newspapers, and social media.

column44:
>One of our early beta-testers described the problem of music induced hearing loss as a “latent pain”. He said ""By the time you realize that you need to do something about it, the damage is already done.”



","Sounds85 (patent pending) is a simple device that can be used with any set of earbuds or headphones. It keeps the volume at a safe level that will not result in permanent hearing loss.

column1: How does Sounds85 work? It is simple to use and unobtrusive. The Sounds85 attaches to all earbuds, headphones or music/video players, and limits the volume to approximately 85 decibels - no matter how loud the volume on the device.  The proprietary design ensures that it does not denigrate the quality of the sound - keeping your music or video sound effects as they were meant to be heard. It can be used
with all audio devices, such as iPhones, Androids, iPads, MP3 players, and tablets, keeping the
volume at a safe level. Sounds85 is not a permanent installation. It can be attached and removed from headphones, earbuds and music/video players.
The National Institute of Occupation Safety and Health
(NIOSH) states that a person can listen to any noise at 85 decibels for up to 8
hours without suffering a permanent hearing loss. As soon as the noise is increased only 3 decibels, the amount of
time a person can listen without permanent hearing loss is cut in half…only 4 hours!
Will your kids have Hearing Loss by age 20?
concluded loud music delivered through headphones or earbuds promotes potential hearing
loss. This survey carried out by a 3rd party for Siemens asked 500 teens if
they had experienced ringing, roaring, buzzing, or pain in their ears – nearly HALF
- 46% - said “Yes”!  This is a significant increase over a similar study done
about 4 yrs ago showing only 20% of teens indicated possible hearing loss.
our children’s skin from the sun, our children’s heads and knees when on bikes,
and we limit what our children watch on TV. Let’s get a Sounds85 on all children’s
listening devices and protect the only set of ears they will ever have!
Look at these Hearing Loss Facts:
Permanent Hearing Loss cannot be fixed or reversed!
46% of teens in a recent study admitted to having roaring, buzzing, or pain in their ears...signs of permanent hearing loss!
There are almost as many 30-somethings with loud music induced hearing loss as there are 70 year olds with age-related hearing loss.
Music induced hearing loss is often accompanied by tinnitus (ringing in the ears).
The output from headphones and earbuds can be greater than 110 decibels (this is like the sound of a chainsaw with no protection).
Listening to 100 decibels will start to cause permanent hearing loss and often times tinnitus after only 15 minutes of listening time (National Institute of Safety and Health – NIOSH)
Great article written about Sounds85 in the
is a Simple Low Tech Solution to a High Tech Problem: Music Induced Hearing Loss! Most  music, movie, or game players do not have an app to control the maximum output.
Some of the new devices have a way to lower the max output . . .  BUT, YOU MUST GUESS
AT WHERE YOU ARE SETTING IT. Too low you get justified complaints. Too high and
you are still at risk of permanent hearing loss. Guessing at the setting is like putting your car's cruise control on
There is NO APP that controls the max volume for all music, movies and games. With the Sounds85 there is no guessing. It automatically sets the max output to approximately 85dB.
Anyone who does not want to experience hearing loss from loud headphones and earbuds.
Schools should place them on all
computers where students use headphones and earbuds.

headphones and earbuds . . . just like kids think ""you should always put a seat belt on when
remind them it’s not cool to struggle to hear, especially when they caused the loss themselves.
Baron, AuD, has been an audiologist for over 22 years. He designed and tested
the Sounds85, and is the CEO of Sounds85, LLC, a Boulder, Colorado based
company. His primary focus is now the prevention of hearing loss for people of
all ages, especially those that use headphones and earbuds.  He spent years researching,
designing, and developing the Sounds85  Personal Volume Protector. He worked with an audio engineer, a

Overview

IKKO ITM05 Music Patch combines Double CS43198 DAC chips with the most portable but delicate size, producing an accurate immersive Hi-Fi sound with a distortion rating of only 0.0008%. Experience music like you're there. Bring sound to the next level.

 

Engineered in every detail, they feature:

 

✅ Weighs Only 23g

✅ Real Hi-Fi Sound with Double CS43198 DAC Chips

✅ THD: 0.0008% / SNR: 122dB

✅ 2.5mm Balanced Output
column4:
Ultra-low Power Consumption Design

✅ Quite a Simple Plug and Play

✅ Supports All Android, iOS and PC devices (even if the device with the case)

✅ Supports For Using While Charging

 

 

 

 

When buying a smartphone nowadays, most people expect it to do everything correctly. One of the biggest complaints of users is the fact that most smartphones have limited performance DAC chips, and audiophiles have to resort to other, more expensive solutions to get the sound they want.

 

That's when we decided to set a new standard in the portable AMP market, developing the most thoroughly designed product, premium in every detail, at an affordable price.

 

Borrowing from our successful experience in creating OH1, OH10, and similar USB-type AMP - Zerda, we integrated more professional technology and MasterHIFI series chips into our Music Patch. Yes, it came
column5:
it came with incredible super functions.

 

 

 

 

 

Initially, we analyzed the market to isolate the features that users cared about the most. We identified the nine main factors and their solutions.

column1:
Once we made sure we could fit every feature in such a small budget, we set out to find the best suppliers for each component.

 

We then focused on creating a team of developers composed of the most experienced engineers in the fields of core technology, audio quality, and portable exterior.

 

We have designed the new standard of portable DAC, the following table speaks for itself:

 

 

 

Here are some of the DAC chips on the market:

 

 

 

 

What immediately sets cheap AMP apart from premium ones is the quality of the audio.

 

Thanks to the Cirrus MasterHIFI CS43198 chips support, ITM05 Music Patch delivers precision-tuned sound. It is a next-generation, low power audio DAC that provides a superior system-level audio performance without draining battery life. Our high-quality chips provide for a full-range listening experience, satisfying even at lower volumes.

 

ITM05 Music Patch’s distortion rate of under 0.0008% will give you the listening needed for an immerse and seamless audio delivery.
column2:
> 

What the Music Patch does is connect to your phone’s or computer’s USB or lightning port and convert the digital signal to analog. Also, it has two audio out ports, one 3.5mm, and one 2.5mm so that you can connect your headphones or other equipment.

 

It's worth mentioning that, ITM05’s maximum audio sample rate is PCM 32bit/384Khz
column3: DSD256 (Supports the highest specifications for iPhone devices). The quality of the sound effect is similar to the monitor
column4: the sample rate is like the resolution
column5: the higher the value, the clearer the effect. So the music presented by an excellent audio player like our ITM05 is also more colorful.
column7:
> 

Even better than other AMP products, ITM05 Music Patch directly supports Lightning and Type-C input, meaning that even if you're playing games or listening to music while you're interfacing ITM05, it doesn't interfere with your normal use.

 

 

 

This isn’t an easy market to compete in as portable DACs and AMPs market has been growing in recent years, but the ITM05 looks to be the smallest one yet. It weighs only 23 grams (comparable to a AAA battery) and features both USB-C and Lightning support. Besides, battery-free and low power consumption design help eliminate unwanted burdens and allow you to quite a simple plug and play.

 

 

The plug of ITM05 has a retractable strap, so even if your phone has a case, it fits perfectly.

 

 

Our ITM05 equipped with five pieces of adhesive strips(three are nano-silica strips, two are nanosponge strips), which can be easily glued to the surface of your phone without loosening, regardless of whether made of plastic or glass. It also is very convenient to remove. Just plug it into your phone, you can use it at once. It applies to plastic, glass, silica gel, leather, PU, metal, glass, and other smooth surfaces, etc.

 

 

 

Stop fretting about the unsatisfactory sound quality of your electronics, and don't need to buy extra expensive audio products to go with it. Just plug it in, and ITM05 Music Patch instantly upgrades your smartphones or computer to a perfect HiFi audio system.

 

Also, the Music Patch can support the Android version of quick charge, do not support Apple's quick charge temporarily.

 

Even though this is our first crowdfunding campaign, but before that, we had designed and produced IKKO OH1, IKKO OH10, and IKKO Zerda, all of which were well received by HiFi enthusiasts around the world. We are confident we will be able to deliver a great product and without delays. Here are some feedbacks from our previous customers:

 

 

 

Because of our professional attitude and rich product experience, we are trusted by many partners in the industry, so this time, IKKO still strives to make the best products and services.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We get a lot of inquiries from customers about how high the ITM05 can bring sound quality up to. Using the iPhone X as an example, we measured the output effect before and after using ITM05.  Using ITM05 increases the output of the phone to nearly 100%!

 

 

 

Want more incredible sound quality? Pair our OH1(worth $139) or OH10(worth $189) with ITM05 Music Patch. From this, there is no end to sound quality upgrading!

The team has developed a breakthrough wireless in-­ear headphone that fits comfortably in your ears and lasts 6 hours on a single charge, which is currently the longest battery life in the market. Use the portable charging case and get another full charge in only 45 minutes.

TBH ergonomic design is so comfortable you can wear it anywhere, and small enough to be nearly invisible. 

TBH Bluetooth technology allows lightning fast and crystal clear communication between your mobile device and your TBH earbuds, in a package so small, comfortable, and easy to use, that you’ll never want to take them out. Listen to the music you like, or maybe your favorite audio book, anywhere and any time.

column1: If fitness is an important part of your lifestyle, the waterproof and sweat resistant TBH is your perfect workout partner.

No more sweaty fitness bands to deal with. TBH Fitness Mode will track your steps, distance, speed, and time, along with calories and heart rate, all while listening to your favorite tunes.  Who could ask for more?

If biking or jogging is your thing, not to worry, Workout Mode still allows you to hear the cars and traffic noise that other earphone may block out. And with its comfortable ergonomic fit, TBH will stay put during the most rigorous of activities.
Who doesn’t need a good night sleep. Are noisy neighbors, or their dogs keeping you up? Hoping to sleep through a long plane trip? How about a snoring partner in your own bed?
TBH noise cancellation function will block outside noises and give you a peaceful sleep.
We know how busy you are so each set of wireless TBH earbuds comes complete with its own stylish mobile charging case so you can re-charge your TBH anywhere and any time.
And each case is small enough to fit into a pocket or key chain for your convenience.
Compatibility : Android, iOS and Windows devices with Bluetooth 4.1

column3:
showinfo=0"">
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

We have been music lovers for quite some time now, and we know very well how sometimes listening to a song - or an artist, or an entire album - can make us feel better, or can change completely the mood of the day.

Today we need music more than ever.

 

 

 

Thanks to technology and streaming services, we can access our favorite music every time and everywhere we like. However, in the last few years, many of us realized that music had lost most of its value: we live in a world full of unlimited possibilities, and music is always there, in your car, in your smartphone, while jogging, inside your office, in the public spaces of your city.

This made us wonder: are we really giving music all the attention it deserves?

 

 

This reality has transformed the act of listening to music into a very basic and passive gesture. The great comeback of musical physical formats, first and foremost the vinyl disc, with its superior audio quality and vintage charm, has been the most likely answer to all these problems.

This is why we created Logigram.  

We have been vinyl-addicted for many years, and we felt in need of creating an object able to give the right value to our music, holding together quality and aesthetics.

 

 

In the design process, we combined traditional elements with innovative technologies.

 

 

The plinth is characterized by a unique shape that incorporates a reinforcing layer of composite material: this design allowed us to create an anti-resonant barrier between the tonearm/cartridge axis and the motor, considerably improving the audio quality:

 

 

Logigram is made of very few components, and its design looks simple and minimal. The diagonal shape of the plinth is our trademark: it gives a fresh look to our turntable and makes it a unique product on the market.

 

 

Thanks to its original design, the continuous search for a superior audio quality, and the choice of high-quality materials and components, Logigram sounds incredibly great, like a hi-end premium turntable. You will be amazed.

 

 

 

The plinth

In order to achieve a premium audio quality, we managed to increase the audio standards by using a 30 mm antiresonant composite plinth, hold up by three non-decoupling supports.

 

 

The motor

Logigram is a traditional belt-drive turntable with 33 ⅓ and 45 RPM manual speeds. Its synchronous motor is put in suspension inside the plinth's body through an O-ring. Pivot to Spindle stiffening plate, separated from the motor by composite anti-vibration system.

 

 

The tonearm

Thanks to 3D printing, we managed to manufacture a single piece and jointless tonearm, which is optimally shaped to provide a totally even mechanical response.

column1: • Machined MDF (Logigram One) / Wood plinth (Logigram One Premium) / Composite plinth (logigram One Ultimate)
• Low resonance MDF (Logigram One) and acrilic platter (Logigram One Premium / Logigram One Ultimate)
• Cork slipmat (Logigram One Premium / Logigram One Ultimate)
• Dimensions Logigram One / Logigram One Premium - 454x362x145 mm (WxDxH)
• Weight Logigram One / Logigram One Premium - 6,2 kg
• Universal AC to DC power supply compatible with US or European standard

Logigram’s first production line will be limited to only some hundreds of units. This is why, to celebrate the product launch, only this time we will include a special “Indiegogo Limited Edition” identification plate, attached to the bottom of the turntable, containing its unique serial number. Therefore by purchasing through Indiegogo you will have the chance to own a very unique and personal piece of design!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The study and pre-production of our turntables has taken place in a co-working environment, allowing us to experiment different working methods, and to identify the most efficient technlogies for this type of product. Before getting to the final prototype, we had the possiblity to work with CNC machines and to test different types of materials and models. During these months we solved most of the problems concerning the turntable and its components, also thanks to 3D printing.
All of this allowed us to know better the machines we’ll be working with, and made us ready for a large-scale production.
We managed as well to simplify the design in a way that makes the production and assembling of our turntable the fastest and most precise possible.

As a company, we are planning to grow by adding more products to our design firm, even though we are aware of all the problems of a large-scale production. On the other hand, we have carefully considered and analyzed all the risks and challenges, and we are ready to face them. A customer care service will be set up during the campaign
column2:
this will help to get in touch directly with our customers.
As for logistics, we already made arrangements with company to ensure that the shipment will be right on schedule.

We are looking forward to start creating Logigram for you, with all the care, precision and quality required for this type of audio device.

The Defoss Team

","We have been music lovers for quite some time now, and we know very well how sometimes listening to a song - or an artist, or an entire album - can make us feel better, or can change completely the mood of the day.Today we need music more than ever.   Thanks to technology and streaming services, we can access our favorite music every time and everywhere we like. However, in the last few years, many of us realized that music had lost most of its value: we live in a world full of unlimited possibilities, and music is always there, in your car, in your smartphone, while jogging, inside your office, in the public spaces of your city.This made us wonder: are we really giving music all the attention it deserves?  This reality has transformed the act of listening to music into a very basic and passive gesture. The great comeback of musical physical formats, first and foremost the vinyl disc, with its superior audio quality and vintage charm, has been the most likely answer to all these problems.This is why we created Logigram.  We have been vinyl-addicted for many years, and we felt in need of creating an object able to give the right value to our music, holding together quality and aesthetics.  In the design process, we combined traditional elements with innovative technologies.  The plinth is characterized by a unique shape that incorporates a reinforcing layer of composite material: this design allowed us to create an anti-resonant barrier between the tonearm/cartridge axis and the motor, considerably improving the audio quality:  Logigram is made of very few components, and its design looks simple and minimal. The diagonal shape of the plinth is our trademark: it gives a fresh look to our turntable and makes it a unique product on the market.  Thanks to its original design, the continuous search for a superior audio quality, and the choice of high-quality materials and components, Logigram sounds incredibly great, like a hi-end premium turntable. You will be amazed.   The plinthIn order to achieve a premium audio quality, we managed to increase the audio standards by using a 30 mm antiresonant composite plinth, hold up by three non-decoupling supports.  The motorLogigram is a traditional belt-drive turntable with 33 ⅓ and 45 RPM manual speeds. Its synchronous motor is put in suspension inside the plinth's body through an O-ring. Pivot to Spindle stiffening plate, separated from the motor by composite anti-vibration system.  The tonearmThanks to 3D printing, we managed to manufacture a single piece and jointless tonearm, which is optimally shaped to provide a totally even mechanical response.

column1: Manual belt-drive system 33 ⅓ or 45 RPM
Inner null point 57,2mm / Outer null point 120,4mm
RCA Line Stereo Out + separate ground
Machined MDF (Logigram One) / Wood plinth (Logigram One Premium) / Composite plinth (logigram One Ultimate)
Low resonance MDF (Logigram One) and acrilic platter (Logigram One Premium / Logigram One Ultimate)
Cork slipmat (Logigram One Premium / Logigram One Ultimate)
Dimensions Logigram One / Logigram One Premium - 454x362x145 mm (WxDxH)
Weight Logigram One / Logigram One Premium - 6,2 kg
Universal AC to DC power supply compatible with US or European standard

Logigram’s first production line will be limited to only some hundreds of units. This is why, to celebrate the product launch, only this time we will include a special “Indiegogo Limited Edition” identification plate, attached to the bottom of the turntable, containing its unique serial number. Therefore by purchasing through Indiegogo you will have the chance to own a very unique and personal piece of design!           The study and pre-production of our turntables has taken place in a co-working environment, allowing us to experiment different working methods, and to identify the most efficient technlogies for this type of product. Before getting to the final prototype, we had the possiblity to work with CNC machines and to test different types of materials and models. During these months we solved most of the problems concerning the turntable and its components, also thanks to 3D printing.All of this allowed us to know better the machines we’ll be working with, and made us ready for a large-scale production.We managed as well to simplify the design in a way that makes the production and assembling of our turntable the fastest and most precise possible.As a company, we are planning to grow by adding more products to our design firm, even though we are aware of all the problems of a large-scale production. On the other hand, we have carefully considered and analyzed all the risks and challenges, and we are ready to face them. A customer care service will be set up during the campaign
column2: this will help to get in touch directly with our customers.As for logistics, we already made arrangements with company to ensure that the shipment will be right on schedule.We are looking forward to start creating Logigram for you, with all the care, precision and quality required for this type of audio device.The Defoss Team",46.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: <h1>HiFi Multi-Room streaming from Audio Hall of Fame member Tom DeVesto, the founder of Cambridge SoundWorks &amp
Two music systems - Solo and Duetto. High quality sound and build, simplicity of use, and an unprecedented number of music listening options available at the touch of a button.

When streaming services took over, a lot of people stopped paying attention to sound quality. You listened through your earbuds, your laptop, your smartphone. Or you connected to a music player through bluetooth and everything sounded a little better — as long as you stayed within 30 feet, and Mom didn’t call.
It’s time for your music player to do the heavy lifting
Solo is a beautiful, compact hardwood box that delivers big, room-filling audio with no smart device required. It's a simple, all-in-one solution to streaming music.

column2: >Solo measures 5” H x 9.5” W x 4.7” D. Shown in hand-painted high gloss (white)

column1: Pledge $275 or more, and you’ll unlock even more sound with Duetto. Duetto takes all the exciting features Solo has to offer, with true stereo sound, to allow for much higher listening levels.

column1: When you stream music straight off your Solo or Duetto, your phone stays free to do everything else. Never waste your phone's battery with streaming again.
Multi-Room play different sources in every room or sync them all together
DAB+ (International version only) - DAB+ upgrade and VAT is included in shipping cost
Music player allowing easy navigation and playback through a USB or network-shared library of music files including AAC+, MP3, WMA, WAV, and FLAC
4 High-Res inputs: 2 analog, 1 Optical, and 1 USB.
• 3” woofer with four layer voice coil (2 in Duetto)
Control your music anywhere from anywhere. Multi-Room capability allows you to play different music in any room or sync all the rooms together.

column2: >Using the app to choose between multiple sources

column1: In the spirit of keeping things phone-free, every Solo and Duetto comes with a remote control. That said, we do have a full-featured app: Como Control, which is an easy way to change things up from anywhere in the house. Available for iOS and Android.

column11: >Solo and Duetto look good from all angles!

column1: Match every Solo and Duetto to the room it lives in, with a furniture-grade natural wood finish or an elegant piano gloss white or black.

As a thank you to our donors for helping get Solo and Duetto off the ground, we’re offering a limited number of discounted products in our rewards. Grab your Kickstarter-exclusive discount before they run out.

column2: >We believe wireless is the future of music, so we spent the last 12 months putting our passion for perfection to the test, creating the next generation of revolutionary wireless headphones. Air is the first acoustic device in the world to implement carbon nanotube technology. This is a major industry breakthrough that will allow Air to have a comfortable, ergonomic design while looking, feeling and, most importantly, sounding spectacular.
column3:
>We’ve spent thousands of hours working with world-class acoustic labs and audio engineers to develop the very best wireless headphones - Air has been built with a 5.2 mm customized speaker driver, and utilizes a cutting-edge Carbon Nanotube diaphragm and the latest CSR chip. These features unite to deliver a design that immerses you in your music, the way it was meant to sound.

To guarantee a secure, comfortable fit for every user, we scanned and analyzed hundreds of ears. Then created a variety of size combinations to fit them.  Additionally, we created three “Sport Sleeves” for using with strenuous exercise - made with medical-grade silicone, these sleeves are ultra-light and skin-friendly.
column5: >In contrast to other wireless headphones, Air is designed to fit ergonomically, without adding pressure to the conch and ear canal areas.
column6: >
column7: >Air has what it takes to follow you through even your most eventful days, providing the soundtrack to your daily life.
column8:
>

Air comes in two color combinations: crisp White/Blue or elegant Black/Red
column9:
>

Simply pair with your Amazon Dot to talk to Alexa, no matter where you are.
column11: >With a water-resistant rating of IPX6, Air will always be ready for the unexpected - whether you’re training for a marathon or shredding a double black diamond.
column12: >
column13:
>We've improved upon our own high standards of acoustic performance. Our team has worked tirelessly to guarantee high-quality sound clarity - unparalleled at this tiny size.

We passionately designed a larger-than-life acoustic system by utilizing a carbon nanotube diaphragm. As a result of this design, the speaker driver is compact and durable, with the ability to deliver ultra-fast responses for elegant, sophisticated sound.
column14: >In addition to utilizing cutting-edge carbon nanotechnology, we customized the 5.2mm speaker driver using industry-leading model analysis, fine-tuning and adjusting the positioning and size of every element in the speaker chamber.
column15: >crazybaby’s acoustic team is led by the electroacoustic legend, Dr. Yu, an extraordinary industry leader whose professional life has been devoted to creating innovative audio solutions. Under the direction of Dr. Yu, our acoustic team spent countless hours determining the perfect size, height and angle for each electroacoustic element.
column16: >To create Air we partnered with Tsinghua University and Foxconn Associate Labs.  They’ve spent nine years researching and developing advanced carbon nanotechnology (CNT). All CNT diaphragms located inside of Air headphones are made individually, instead of being mass-produced, so as to ensure each one independently meets the strict quality standards set forth by the Lab.
column17:
>CVC 8TH Noise Isolation Technology ＋ Air's double digital silicon microphone work together to maintain call quality by efficiently mitigating background noise.

​
column18: >Air uses Bluetooth 4.2 (the newest bluetooth technology) to ensure crystal-clear stereo sound while paired with your device.
column19: >Compared to its predecessor, this new Bluetooth protocol increases data transmission speed by 2.5x, data volume by 10x and for the first time ever, connects over IPV6 to decrease energy consumption and provide safer internet access.
column20: >In a world flooded with Bluetooth technology, Air is a cut above the rest. By including the latest embedded TWS (True Wireless Stereo) chipset, Air delivers high-performance sound without additional bulk.
column21: >The free iOS and Android apps will get your listening started in a beat, and allow you to customize your EQ to hear exactly what you're looking for.
column22:
>

 

 

Sound
Driver Diaphragm: 998 Carbon Nanotube
Driver Unit: 0.20” (5.2 mm) Custom-made Hi-Fidelity MicroDrivers
Acoustic Architecture: Closed
Magnet Type: Neodymium
Frequency Response: 8Hz to24kHz
Impedance: 16 Ohms
Sensitivity: 101dB SPL/1mW
Max. Input Capability: 30mW (IEC)

Connections
Air: Bluetooth 4.2, Up to 10m (free space), Support Headset (HSP 1.2), Handsfree (HFP 1.6), A2DP 1.3 and AVRCP 1.6 profiles
Charging Capsule: USB-C connector

Audio
AAC, mSBC, SBC, and CVSD audio codec

General
High-Fidelity Sound
Passive Noise Isolation
True Wireless Stereo Bluetooth
IPX6 Waterproof

Microphones
Silicon Digital MEMS (each)
CVC (License) 8th Generation Noise Cancellation
Dual omni-directional microphones

Battery and Power
Air with Charging Capsule: 15+ hours listening time, up to 20 hours talk time
Air (single charge): Up to 3 hours listening time, or up to 4 hours talk time

All backers will receive an Air Leash for FREE when we hit our $1,000,000 stretch goal! To create a fabric that is safe and durable (even for use in extreme sports), we utilized an innovative material, called Fit-Tex™. Air Leash’s flexible, tear-free fabric meets the Oeko-Tex Standard 100, is REACH SVHC-free and exceeds environmental protection regulations in America, Europe, Japan, etc. The manufacturer we used when producing the Air Leash is equally advanced, and regularly works with brands such as Louis-Vuitton, Victoria’s Secret, etc.

The Air Leash is virtually weightless, convenient to bring wherever you need. While Air itself has a secure fit that works with all ear sizes, the Air Leash is an additional safeguard for when you need it most - whether you’re hitting the slopes or running a marathon.
column23: >We aim to make products that honor every moment, and provide a revolutionary audio experience to every customer.
column24: >We knew we wanted to come back to Indiegogo because of the outpouring of support we felt from the community the first time we released a product (Mars Levitating Speaker). Now that we have a new product to show the world, we couldn’t resist the chance to reward old (and new) Indiegogo backers with discounted products.
column25: >Additionally, when we launch a new product with crowdfunding, every step of our progress is inseparable from your support - this motivates us to do right by all of our backers and provide you with the best possible product we can. Wherever we go, our plan is clear: think outside the box to create innovations that benefit the world.

We can't do this without you. Thank you.

column1: Each pair of Air by crazybaby headphones comes with 18 months limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment.

column4: >What is Air by crazybaby's battery lifespan?

column1: Air by crazybaby earbuds can last up to 40 hours after a full charge, can play music for 3 hours, and can be used to talk on the phone for 2 hours.

column2: >How long does it take to get a full battery charge?

column1: The full charge time for Air by crazybaby earbuds is within 2 hours.
Yes, Air by crazybaby earbuds are waterresistant, with the rating of IP66 level.

column4: >Which devices are compatible with Air by crazybaby?

column1: With the latest Bluetooth 4.2 module, any Bluetooth-Smart device - such as smart phones, music players, tablets and laptops - are able to connect to Air. If your TV or PC doesn't support Bluetooth, you can connect Air via Bluetooth adapter.

column4: >How do you reconnect Air by crazybaby?

column1: When the headset is disconnected from your mobile phone, you will hear the words, ""Your headset is disconnected."" If you press the MFB, you'll be confirmed of the reconnection once you hear, ""Your headset is connected,"" from the headset. *Some mobile phones may have a prompt screen that will ask if you would like to pair your device.
Air by crazybaby's Bluetooth range is 0~10m, depending on your surrounding environment.

column4: >Which audio codecs does Air by crazybaby support?
>What is the maximum volume for Air by crazybaby?

column1: Air by crazybaby is available for shipping worldwide.
June 2017. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. The crazybaby team will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

In order to deliver Air safely and efficiently, the orders will dispatch via different courier companies for different regions. Thus, they may ship out in a slightly different order than the initial buying sequence.
We are offering incredible discounts on all pre-orders of Air’s in return for your support. You will never find Air at these low prices again!
If you need to update your address, be sure to follow these steps on Indiegogo.

column1: <td>Customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient
column2: crazybaby has no control over these charges.

column1: crazybaby team will continuousely updating on Indiegogo campaign page and let everybacker know the process of manufacture and shipping. For more info please contact service@crazybaby.com

column4: >Why do I have to wait longer than usual?

column1: This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
