column6: >Lemus HOME Piano is the all-in-one sound furniture that will give you an outstanding sound experience and at the same time, fit perfectly into your home interior design. With the built-in complete High-end sound system, with Google Cast, Apple Airplay 2, Multiroom, HDMI, Bluetooth and advanced Room-Correction technology. Say goodbye to cable clutter, large amplifiers and messy connections.

column1:
Lemus HOME Piano is the new affordable sound furniture in the award-winning Lemus HOME collection - simple and elegant as a piano, powerful as a complete home sound system.

Not only is it the most powerful “Soundbar” ever made, the Lemus HOME Piano breaks with tradition by combining a complete hi-fi sound system and a soundbar with a subwoofer, into an elegant piece of sound furniture.
column2:
>

In fact, it is not a traditional soundbar as we know it, but a combination of a complete hi-fi sound system, a soundbar with a subwoofer and a media-furniture.

column1: • Advanced Room-Correction technology via Lemus HOME iOS app

column4:
>The sound system that surprises

 

Despite its extremely compact and minimalistic design, Lemus HOME Piano provides both a unique music and movie experience with a crystal-clear sound and an extremely deep bass. The sound system is created on the same advanced amplifier as the award-winning Lemus HOME Classic, giving you the same 300-watt power, usability and world-class features.

The sound system consists of an extremely powerful subwoofer with an 8"" long-stroke woofer, which the amplifier exploits beyond its normal limit for a revolutionary deep bass. In addition, 2x high-end full-range units deliver the crystal-clear mid and high tones, which together with the bass, are designed to create a perfectly balanced transition through the advanced built-in Quad-Core DSP.
column11: >We know how to make good sound and great design
column17: >For our award winning Lemus HOME-collection
column27:
>Designed, Developed and Produced in Denmark

Premium Danish craftsmanship and FSC certified wood (wood from sustainable resources) guarantee a piece of furniture that will pleasantly surprise you in every aspect. 


With a height of only 18.5 cm (7,28"") and a depth of 35 cm (13,89""), and a choice between white and black with black fabric front, the Lemus HOME Piano is created to blend perfectly into your home interior.
column28: >Say goodbye to messy connections and cable clutter
column32:
>Outstanding film and music sound

The Lemus HOME Piano is not like other soundbars. On top of being designed to give you a unique cinematic experience, the Lemus HOME Piano is also your new home music system, where you can wirelessly stream your favorite music in the best quality.

The Lemus HOME Piano comes with a built-in HDMI with Audio Return Channel (ARC). You just need to run an HDMI cable between your Lemus HOME Piano and the TV to get top-quality audio you can control from your existing remote control. This requires no further adjustments, allowing for a quick and easy setup. It has never been easier to get TV audio in brilliant sound quality.
column33: >
column34:
>Multiroom and streaming

Developed on Google Cast and Apple Airplay 2, the Lemus HOME system gives you the opportunity to create multiroom audio with virtually any audio manufacturer out there, including B&
column35: O, Sony, Bose and many more. In addition, most new TVs are made with built-in Google Cast or Apple Airplay, so you will soon be able to stream TV audio wirelessly to your Lemus HOME Piano.
column37:
>Sound that adapts to your room

Lemus HOME Piano comes with advanced Room-Correction technology, so the sound adapts to the room in which you placed the sound furniture. Gone are the days of poor acoustics - Lemus HOME Piano ensures an excellent sound experience always, no matter the conditions.
column38:
>

Together with the Danish Growing Trees Network Foundation, we plant a tree for every Lemus HOME sold.
column40: >We’re already in production, so you’re guaranteed delivery
column48:
>About Lemus

The Danish team of Lemus is a combination of passionated designers and audio engineers who try to build a bridge between the design and audio world by not compromising in neither of the two areas. 

Founded in 2014 in Copenhagen by entrepreneur, designer and passionated music lover, Rasmus Kastrup. He is on a mission to bring back the real Hi-Fi experience into homes around the world, by rethinking the whole Hi-Fi category.

 

With a great record of multiple designs and audio awards and thousands of happy customers, the team behind Lemus will keep on pushing boundaries and live by the vision of the company: The future sound of HOME.

Say goodbye to cable clutter, large amplifiers and messy connections.

Mugo Touch is a true wireless Bluetooth earbud with unparalleled sound quality and rounded appearance as cobblestone. With a customized 9.6mm speaker to make it more stable on high and medium bass, it has an inherent advantage in sound compared to other wireless earbuds. The earbuds can play for 6 hours and the charging box offers an extra 24- hour playtime.

The price offered by Indiegogo will be definitely your best choice.

​​

Mugo Touch is upgraded to a touch version, using the latest touch chip IC HOLTEK, which enhances the technological sense of the product and gives you more choices.

  • No need to reach for your phone

The intuitive touch interface lets you activate all your favorite features with just a tap on the earpiece. These include start/stop and change tracks, take calls, activate voice commands and more.

​

The Mugo Touch can control the volume of the volume on the headset. Touch the left earphone for more than 3 seconds to increase the volume, and touch the right earphone for more than 3 seconds to reduce the volume. 

 

 

In 2017, we launched our first Bluetooth headset, Mugo. After more than a year, we collected a lot of user experience and feedback, let us have more data support and more experience, so we new Introduced the new Mugo Pro and Mugo Touch.

 

Customizing 9.6mm enhanced vocal unit. The “double diagram structural vocal unit” customized by Mugo is powerful, which shows better tone quality and richer surround stereo field, and brings you real professional auditory experience.

Standardized products cannot satisfy everyone’s pursuit of beauty. We expect yourself to define the beauty around your own ears by combining different groundings with the colors of diamond.

In order to give the product higher natural craftsmanship, we chose the handmade leather process.

The premium leather charging case is more unique and novel.

Thanks for the in-ear design to gently adapt to all ears, the Mugo Pro /Touch offers an extra-secure fit with zero discomforts. No more falling down your ear. 

 

The box is automatically charged, and the charging box can charge the earphones 4 times. It can be used to play music for 24/12 hours. Hall magnetic switch and USB Type-C interface, faster charging, long-lasting life, accompanied by the whole day.

A strong magnetic base keeps your earbuds from losing. Thanks for the clever mechanical design, it is simple and easy to take the earbuds out of the case by hand.

 

In the box: Bluetooth Earbuds，Silicon Ear Tips(S/M/L), charging case, Type-C, Instructions.

Audio

  • AAC, mSBC, SBC and CVSD audio codecs

Battery
• Single charge: Up to 3 hours of listening time.
• Single charge: Up to 6 hours of listening time.
​
column2:
>Mold and material

 

Help us get there by sharing the Mugo link with friends, family, everyone you know!

column1: • You will be the first to receive your Plants Play and will hear the songs of Plants and Trees that are blooming.
• If you order it now you will get up to 33% discount and you can help us realize Plants Play mission!

We are Edo and Kika, a young Italian couple. We live in a country house in south Italy, practice permaculture and love the Nature! For two years we have been traveling around the world looking for extraordinary trees and plants to listen to their songs with biofeedback technology and share them with our facebook community ""Traveling on the Song of Trees"". In recent months we have recruited a team of experts to create Plants Play and give everyone the ability to easily listen to the music of their beloved plants.

We are a band that started in Ann Arbor, MI. We Are very excited to be releasing our debut album. We really believe in these songs and the impact they could have on people. Music is a fantastic way to relate to people through similar emotions and experiences. With your help we will be able to get this music out there to make that impact on people. When this album releases we plan to tour and promote this album to further share our experiences and emotions with others.
This is a record about a traveler, a journey, the cycle of exertion and depletion, of death and resurrection, and the weariness that gives way to gratitude, celebration and awe.
• For this campaign, our goal is $2000 which will cover the cost of CD duplication, paying our album art designer, and mastering.
• A few perks we have include: early release of the album, a digital download of the album, a signed physical copy, and access to acoustic or demo versions of the songs.
<h2>Be sure to select a perk on the payment screen!!! Or you can easily click on the perk you desire to the right which will take you to the payment screen with the perk already selected--&gt

column2:
>

 

What if you could adjust the volume of life itself? No more flights filled with crying babies. No more risk of your ears falling off at that concert. No more loud neighbors  Only the sounds you like to hear, when you want to hear them. Sounds good? Well, hear us out. Double pun. Super intended.

You’ve got our attention. But no more puns, please. Agreed. We are talking about Knops
column3: the volume button for your ears. This acoustic hearing solution will give you full control over the surrounding sounds you hear. All day every day.

column1: How do Knops work exactly? Well, it’s actually pretty darn simple. Each pair of Knops has four steps. Adjust the Knops to step one and you will hear what you would’ve heard without plugs. But the real kicker enters the stage when you switch to the other three steps. Step 2 will reduce the volume to filter the noise of a vibrant city, step 3 will adjust the volume to a live music setting and step 4 will create a silent environment ideal for work. Four different modes for basically every audio situation.

But what if I’m moving around from a busy city to a live concert and back, after which I’m in desperate need of some Zen-like silence?
Aren’t you the busy bee. No worries. Just easily switch steps using the knob on the side of the Knops. And if you like, you can instantly open up to talk to people. Say goodbye to continuous plugging and unplugging situations. Which immediately reduces the risk of losing your precious earbuds. Knops are also engineered to wear in different situations so you won’t have to worry about the buds falling out of your ears. Win win, baby.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The video below shows that with a simple twist of the knob you can change the volume level of your environment.

column4:
>

Safe, techy, innovative. These Knops-things are probably not the prettiest things ever created then? We get where you’re coming from. During the development of Knops, we noticed a lack of aesthetics in hearing protection products and hearables. Or, as we like to put it, most earbuds are downright ugly as hell. That’s a pity because if a product can be seen on the user in everyday life, it should be in line or even enhance the user's personal style, right?
column5:
>

That’s why we based the design of Knops on a classic round volume button, with inside the shape of a gramophone cone, showing the link with volume and sound. This design in high-quality materials in combination with the option of various colors and trims makes Knops an accessory item which fits your personal style.
column6:
>

 Knops will be available in different colors and trims. Choose the one which matches your personal style.
column15:
>

Almost convinced. What about safety?
Funny you’d ask. Besides being a volume button, Knops also protects your ears from harmful sounds. By simply lowering the volume level, you can enjoy perfect quality sounds without the risk of ruining your hearing.
column19:
>

 

How does it work EXACTLY?
Like technically and stuff? Well, first of all Knops uses no electronics, no apps and no batteries. Instead our earbuds are acoustically engineered. The real sound is filtered using good old physics. With the help of computer simulations and real-world prototypes tested in acoustic labs, we tuned Knops. We spend a lot of time fine-tuning the sound, so we can provide the best quality sound at every volume level. Working with the natural response of the ear canal. We even managed to create a similar reduction in dB across all the frequencies. Creating a very flat response curve.
column20:
>

A WHAT exactly? A flat response curve. This means that sound travels through all the four steps with minimal distortion. We are mimicking the natural resonances of the human ear. So crystal clear sounds, vibrant and natural.
column22:
>

Where did this all begin? A long time ago. In a galaxy far far away. Or, to be more exact, in 2015 in a little place we’d like to call Amsterdam. Mainly because it’s called that way. There a group of creative friends came together to explore a solution for our hearing.

We collectively decided that hearing protection devices and electronic hearables did not provide a good enough solution for our ears. And, like we mentioned earlier, they were pretty ugly.

We discovered that earplugs are lowering sound all the time, most of the time with worse quality than our own natural hearing. That’s not cool. You constantly have to unplug and replug earplugs, for a situation where sound levels are lower, or you need to communicate with your friends. Also with their design focused on hiding the plugs, they communicate that you do not want to show these products to your surrounding. Rightfully so because well, they’re ugly. Electronic hearables can provide a more better solution, however, they do not provide protection. And that sucks. Also, because the sound goes in and out electronically, you will not hear the real sound. The sound is altered and there is a slight lag. They’re also pretty pricey because of all the electronic stuff. And although these products provide better aesthetics compared to ear plugs, we believe they still don’t look good enough to enhance the user's style. Read: They’re ugly.
column23:
>

But it’s not all about the noise. It’s also about the lack of noise. We are constantly surrounded by noise. And we are constantly distracted. With Knops you are in control of the amount of volume you want to receive. You can eliminate noise entirely if you like. Enjoying the absence of crying babies and whining ex-lovers. Ain’t that a blessing?
column25:
>

After a lot of research with focus on the user experience, we created the Knops concept. A volume button, which is adaptable to every situation, protects your ears against damage, filters noise to your liking, and also looks super good. We used a design method where we iteratively created prototypes and directly tested these with actual users in real life so we could use their  feedback. This way, we involved the user from the start. We perfected the ergonomics, so you can wear Knops all day with maximum comfort. We made the turning knob work smoothly with great haptic feedback while turning.
column26:
>

With the help of computer simulations and real-world prototypes tested in our acoustic labs, we tuned the Knops prototypes. We spend a lot of time acoustically fine tuning the sound, so we can provide the best quality filtering at every volume level.

column1:
Okay. We’re ready to meet the team now.
Prepare to meet seven ambitious and skilled people then. Knops is founded by Koen, Quinten, Arjen and Richard. Koen and Quinten already have a thriving business selling earplugs with their company called Thunderplugs. Their earplugs are sold in a whopping 26 countries worldwide. They’re like the Richard Bransons of earplugs. Sort of. Their experience in the music business including worldwide shipping is something we use to our advantage for Knops.

The other two founders are the brothers Arjen and Richard. Arjen has a Ph.D. in acoustics and is a leading engineer. He has worked for clients like NASA, Porsche, and Ferrari. He’s basically a rocket scientist with an acoustic guitar. Or something like that. The idea for Knops conceived by Arjen is also engineered by Arjen in co-operation with Richard. Richard has a master of arts and is a world class designer. He has worked with clients like IKEA and NASA. He once built a rocket named Sven. We think. The revolutionary design for Knops is created by Richard.

The team is completed by Raoul, Floris, Joren, and Nora. Raoul is responsible for Online Project Management and Marketing. He’s our digital ninja d’extraordinaire. Floris is our financial and online marketing mastermind. Basically a calculator with a Google Adwords-account. Joren and Nora are responsible for graphic design, supported by creative agency Today. Jony Ive called them once. They didn’t answer.

We have already completed most of the design and engineering for Knops and have fully working prototypes which we have tested with close partners, friends, colleagues, and a large number of independent testers.

Even though we have extensively tested our prototypes, Knops is a completely new product and as with any product manufactured for the first time, there is a possibility that unforeseen bugs, challenges, and delays will occur. We will do our utmost best to deliver the perfect product.

The decibel levels are indicative. We have good results with the acoustic tests of our prototypes, however the final product decibel levels may differ slightly from these indications. We will use independent test centers to qualify the official attenuation level according to norms.

We have identified our suppliers and have already started planning production timelines and processes. Moreover, through the execution success that we've had with Thunderplugs, we have proven our ability to deliver hundreds of thousands of great quality products in short timeframes. We also have our manufacturer in the Netherlands which gives us the possibility to act fast.
We pride ourselves on relentless execution. Even after this Indiegogo Indemand campaign ends, we plan to send out continuous updates and announcements regarding Knops (and beyond!).

There a group of creative friends came together to explore a solution for our hearing.We collectively decided that hearing protection devices and electronic hearables did not provide a good enough solution for our ears. And, like we mentioned earlier, they were pretty ugly.We discovered that earplugs are lowering sound all the time, most of the time with worse quality than our own natural hearing. That’s not cool. You constantly have to unplug and replug earplugs, for a situation where sound levels are lower, or you need to communicate with your friends. Also with their design focused on hiding the plugs, they communicate that you do not want to show these products to your surrounding. Rightfully so because well, they’re ugly. Electronic hearables can provide a more better solution, however, they do not provide protection. And that sucks. Also, because the sound goes in and out electronically, you will not hear the real sound. The sound is altered and there is a slight lag. They’re also pretty pricey because of all the electronic stuff. And although these products provide better aesthetics compared to ear plugs, we believe they still don’t look good enough to enhance the user's style. Read: They’re ugly.But it’s not all about the noise. It’s also about the lack of noise. We are constantly surrounded by noise. And we are constantly distracted. With Knops you are in control of the amount of volume you want to receive. You can eliminate noise entirely if you like. Enjoying the absence of crying babies and whining ex-lovers. Ain’t that a blessing? After a lot of research with focus on the user experience, we created the Knops concept. A volume button, which is adaptable to every situation, protects your ears against damage, filters noise to your liking, and also looks super good. We used a design method where we iteratively created prototypes and directly tested these with actual users in real life so we could use their  feedback. This way, we involved the user from the start. We perfected the ergonomics, so you can wear Knops all day with maximum comfort. We made the turning knob work smoothly with great haptic feedback while turning.With the help of computer simulations and real-world prototypes tested in our acoustic labs, we tuned the Knops prototypes. We spend a lot of time acoustically fine tuning the sound, so we can provide the best quality filtering at every volume level.

Okay. We’re ready to meet the team now. Prepare to meet seven ambitious and skilled people then. Knops is founded by Koen, Quinten, Arjen and Richard. Koen and Quinten already have a thriving business selling earplugs with their company called Thunderplugs. Their earplugs are sold in a whopping 26 countries worldwide. They’re like the Richard Bransons of earplugs. Sort of. Their experience in the music business including worldwide shipping is something we use to our advantage for Knops.

The other two founders are the brothers Arjen and Richard. Arjen has a Ph.D. in acoustics and is a leading engineer. He has worked for clients like NASA, Porsche, and Ferrari. He’s basically a rocket scientist with an acoustic guitar. Or something like that. The idea for Knops conceived by Arjen is also engineered by Arjen in co-operation with Richard. Richard has a master of arts and is a world class designer. He has worked with clients like IKEA and NASA. He once built a rocket named Sven. We think. The revolutionary design for Knops is created by Richard.

The team is completed by Raoul, Floris, Joren, and Nora. Raoul is responsible for Online Project Management and Marketing. He’s our digital ninja d’extraordinaire. Floris is our financial and online marketing mastermind. Basically a calculator with a Google Adwords-account. Joren and Nora are responsible for graphic design, supported by creative agency Today. Jony Ive called them once. They didn’t answer.

We have already completed most of the design and engineering for Knops and have fully working prototypes which we have tested with close partners, friends, colleagues, and a large number of independent testers.

Even though we have extensively tested our prototypes, Knops is a completely new product and as with any product manufactured for the first time, there is a possibility that unforeseen bugs, challenges, and delays will occur. We will do our utmost best to deliver the perfect product.

The decibel levels are indicative. We have good results with the acoustic tests of our prototypes, however the final product decibel levels may differ slightly from these indications. We will use independent test centers to qualify the official attenuation level according to norms.

We have identified our suppliers and have already started planning production timelines and processes. Moreover, through the execution success that we've had with Thunderplugs, we have proven our ability to deliver hundreds of thousands of great quality products in short timeframes. We also have our manufacturer in the Netherlands which gives us the possibility to act fast.
We pride ourselves on relentless execution. Even after this Indiegogo Indemand campaign ends, we plan to send out continuous updates and announcements regarding Knops (and beyond!).

The Spot Speaker is a customizable communication system designed to ""ALERT"" the pet owner indicating that the pet needs immediate assistance or attention. The system eliminates the communication frustrations between pets and their owners by providing customized audio alerts to the pet owner.

For example, if the pet needs to go outside to “go potty,” the pet traditionally will go to the door and wait for its owner to let it out. If the owner is preoccupied, then the owner will not see the dog at the door. In some cases, dogs are trained to only bark if a stranger approaches. Unfortunately, due to this confusion, the pet will get frustrated and have an “accident” near the door or in some cases will stand in front of its owner and “go potty"".
Or conversely, if the dog is already outside to go potty, owners tend to get distracted and forget their pets - and this is where the Spot Speaker can be considered a safety device.

Our break-through system builds off of the already established behavior of the pet standing next to the door when it is ready to “go potty” OR standing next to the door when the pet is ""ready to come inside"" the home or dwelling. The pet, while standing next to the door, will activate our new and innovative wall mounted sensor which will transmit an “owner customized” audible sound or music ALERT.

column2: T believe that this ""ALERT"" aid will help pet owners develop an improved, more positive relationship with their pet(s).

column1: But the Spot Speaker can be used for so much more! Please check out our website athttp://www.spot-speaker.com for additional commercials and other ideas for using the Spot Speaker. In fact, we are always looking for new and novel ideas and scenarios as to how you think your pet would use the Spot Speaker. So feel free to share any ideas you might have in our blog! You can also reach us on FaceBook, Twitter, or online!
We are seeking funding to bring this idea to homes and store shelves everywhere.
With a successfully funded project, we plan to do the following:
·A Production run used for marketing, selling and for fulfilling any funding rewards

Once we recieve the level of funding we need, then the production process goes into overdrive. We already have all the housings machined and ready for final assembly. While we're waiting on components to come in, we will have all the housings silkscreened with our Spot Speaker logo. The funding will allow us to purchase additional boards and components and we are intially going to assemble each Spot Speaker system by hand at the Spot Speaker Production facility -- aka our garage. The packaging and instructional card is in work and just waiting to get the final components for assembling the Spot Speaker.

Hopefully we will be able to start taking pre-orders that will enable us to outsource large scale production to a local company. We want to pump dollars back into local jobs and local industry so that we can make a difference in our community.

Our ultimate goal is to make the Spot Speaker available for online ordering and for purchasing at stores everywhere in the US and abroad. While this may seem like a huge goal, we know that with enough help from pet lovers around the World, we can make this dream a reality. This round of funding is just the first step in successfully launching a product that started off as one kid’s wishful thinking.

Our biggest risk right now is that we do not raise enough funds to finish the initial production run phase - a small production run to create Beta units for user (usability) testing. We are also looking to start our marketing efforts so that more people hear how awesome the Spot Speaker is. Of course, we support you fans out there that chat/tweet/talk about our product!

One thing we are not worried about is any technical risk as we have already created several functioning prototypes. We have people on our team that have literally tons of professional experience bringing products to market
column2: we have Electrical Engineers, Mechanical Engineers, we have a person who works at a Doggie Day Care with a degree in Animal Husbandry and we even have a Physicist and a teen ager along with plenty of pets! The only thing we’re missing is a customer or a large company available to bankroll the purchase of parts &amp
column3: materials and to pay for production. We have faith in our product and the drive to make it a complete and total success.

column1: If we do encounter one of the setbacks above or even something completely unforeseen, I am confident that we will tackle them the same way we’ve been tackling things to date – by pulling together as a team and using our ingenuity and elbow grease to make things work. This all started with a frustrated teenager’s day dream and we are so close to making this crazy idea into reality. We just need a little more support and faith from our backers.

Headphones have evolved! Gone are the days of bothersome and tangled wires keeping us from the music we love. We’ve all been there, spending valuable time detangling headphones instead of getting pumped for our workout. The Murel Zero: True Wireless headphones eliminates that problem  by getting rid of the wires and providing astonishing audio quality.

The Murel Zero sets you free by making things simple. No wires. They're gone. Now you're free to focus on an intense workout or a relaxing evening of music listening at home.

 

The Murel Zero's small size and light weight make it ideal for working out or for any other activity where wires can get in the way. It provides a high quality, closed off listening experience.

The Murel Zero features an incredible 8.6mm driver which provides excellent audio quality, volume, and clarity to your music.

We’ve outfitted the Zero with a Los Da (Airoha in Taiwan) AB15117 Bluetooth 4.0 Chip which has zero skipping! No matter how intense your workout is, you can rely on uninterrupted clean and clear audio. In addition, this incredibly small package is outfitted with an omni-directional microphone that allows you to make and receive calls directly from the earpiece. Simply press the button on the side of the Zero and say ""hello""!

With the Murel Zero you'll be getting a combination of incredible audio, connection clarity, and crazy long battery life. The 8.6mm driver, the Los Da Bluetooth chip, and the combined 120 mAh (Update: 140 mAh) battery on this thing take it to the next level. It's all housed in a super strong and resilient ABS and Polycarbonate shell.

The Murel Zero features voice prompts which clearly indicate when they are syncing together and when they are paired to your smartphone. This takes the guess work out of the pairing process and makes the whole experience that much more convenient. 

The Murel Zero comes with a unique charging case which both houses and charges the headphones when not in use. The case itself becomes the power source, even when it's not plugged in! Get up to four full charges before having to recharge the case. Nothing is worse than going to use your headphone only to realize they're dead because you forgot to plug them in. The Zero eliminates that problem! Never run out of power again!

The Murel Zero has a unique hook that fits in at the top of the ear helping to lock it in place. The second connecting point is the actual ear-tip inside the ear canal. This gives the headphones two solid points of contact with the inside of your ear to keep it securely in place.

Manufacturing these earbuds requires a large minimum quantity order to keep our cost low enough to make them a reality. With your backing we can make it happen!

column5: >The FOXILON P45 is a compact solar powered
column10: >speaker produced from high end materials, delivering quality audio, powerfull

column1: After a successful market introduction of the first portable fully solar powered Bluetooth speaker, the FOXILON P23, we decided to upscale the concept with additional features to provide a more immerse sound experience and extended portable features.

Designed for people who love to travel and want to move independent from power outlets. The P45 has been optimized to offer maximum sound and powerbank performance in an easy-to-carry size and convenient shape. Easily fits any suitcase, purse, backpack or even the inner pocket of your coat. The included strap and 1/4"" adaptor allows for multifunctional fixation possibilities.

Take the P45 on outdoor adventures to enjoy your favorite music during a hike, camping, cycling or other activities. The two solar panels will charge the powerbanks, even in indirect sunlight, while you are on the go. Free, green energy, while enjoying the nature.
Hand-build and assembled in The Netherlands to ensure an unrivaled quality.
The P45 aircraft grade CNC machined aluminum unibody can take a punch and with it's IP65 rating it is made for outdoor use.
The sunk control buttons are made from solid stainless steel, by CNC turning process, and sealed with rubber o-rings in order to prevent water ingress and guarantee durability.
Built to endure. Sustainable from the core.
The acoustic components are designed to reach the best sound experience possible for a highly portable speaker that easily fits in your jacket.

Two full range drivers, supported by a passive bass radiator, make for a balanced sound at low, middle and high frequencies. The Bluetooth 4.1 receiver with  apt X® support and DSP support high resolution streaming. The full range drivers are custom designed for the high efficiency requirements and powered by two separate and extremely efficient class G amplifiers with a total of 12 Watt. The perfect balance between power and efficiency.

Due to the dual parallel linked amorphous solar panels the P45 charges itself in nearly every situation where light is present. A wall charger is not necessary anymore! The custom designed solar panels and circuitry provide a charge to the speaker battery even without direct sunlight. The build in 6400 mAh battery provides approximately 100 hours of music playtime on a full battery. The P45 also has a regular USB-A socket that can be used to charge external devices. When on the go you can plug your smartphone, e-reader or tablet in the speaker and it will charge your device. The build in battery and charge circuit is capable to charge an average smartphone 2-3 times. Simultaneous music playback and device charging is possible.
With the P45 it's possible to use solar power to charge your life.
FOXILON products are design for intuitive operation. The P45 has only 2 control buttons.

• By operating the upper button the speaker can be turned on and off. When the button is depressed, the battery indicator automatically shows the current battery lever by lighting up the four led's that are positioned along the port cover. During audio playback the button acts as a play/pause button (on compatible Apps).
• By operating the lower button the mood lamp can be switched On or Off.

The first perk is the P45 Bluetooth Portable Speaker. The product will be shipped in a luxurious box including a FOXILON pouch, leather strap, micro USB cable and user guide. All Indiegogo backers will receive a leather strap and stainless steel carabiner hook.

The indoor package consists of the regular P45 package and a FOXILON tripod. The tripod is made from a CNC machined stainless steel base piece, complemented with local sourced, ecologic friendly FSC wooden legs, cut by hand and treated with linseed oil. The tripod adds to the 'designer piece' appearance and fits in every house. Place the speaker in your window, on your desk or wherever you need music and style in your life. The tripod is also compatible with all typical (action) camera's that are fitted with a 1/4"" mount.

The outdoor package consists of the regular P45 package, a silicon protective bumper, extra durable paracord straps and a stainless steel carabiner hook. FOXILON has developed a silicon bumper for the roughest adventures whilst remaining access to the speakers main functions. In addition to the leather strap, the outdoor package will include a selection of three paracords in different colors for a great look and outdoor convenience.

We have also added a nice offer for our P23 model. P45's 'little brother' with a more basic functionality and super compact size. The P23 is the first pocket-sized portable solar speaker on the market. A nice way to experience the FOXILON solar speaker technology. With a nicely crafted aluminium unibody design, stereo sound and integrated powerbank function the P23 offers impressive specs, which can be found on our website:

The product will be shipped in a luxurious box including a FOXILON pouch, micro USB cable and user guide. By offering the P23 in this campaign we want to provide new FOXILON enthousiasts a way to experience the unique solar power speaker technology for an economic price. Please be aware though that the P23 functionality and specifications are limited compared to the P45. For the best overall experience we highly recommend purchasing one of the P45 Perks.
We are proud to offer you this product on Indiegogo and we believe it is the right platform to spread our brand philosophy, audio product to the right audience.

We need the world to see that design, function and renewable energy can go hand in hand. Contributing to a reduction of the use fossil fuels while enjoying beautiful products is one of the values we stand for in our quest to develop new products that can make a difference. By sharing our product offer to a broad market we can continue to develop new features and improvements. By increasing our production rates we can at the same time reduce the relative amount of overhead needed to produce and ship the products, resulting in a higher value for our clients.

In order to supply our products to new oversea markets we need to invest in worldwide certification. Although our product is already compliant to EU regulation we need to ensure all validation and paperwork is in in place to enter new markets. Combining the certification activity with this campaign provides us the funding needed to provide our product to new markets.

If you like the P45, but you are not in the market for a speaker right now, we would love your help! As a starting business in the international market we need your support to reach as many people as possible. So please help us to spread the word.

column3: > our page with friends, let us know what you think and don't forget to follow our Facebook page and Instagram.

column1: FOXILON produces distinct audio products. Products are developed in our design studio in Rhenen with the greatest concern for form and function. We only work with the best materials and latest manufacturing processes, such as 3D printing. With a background in sports development and a passion for innovation FOXILON was founded by Bas Schinkel in 2014. The product portfolio has since been expanded steadily. The engineers turn the design from a blanc piece of paper to functional product that meets the market demands and FOXILON's core values. FOXILON is the first producer of mobile Bluetooth speakers fully powered by solar energy that can fit in your pocket. Every speaker is tested and build with the greatest care in The Netherlands.
FOXILON is a Bright Solution BV brand.
Naidjé van Ravenswaaij: Sales and customer service.

column3:
>What others say

We asked our testpanel to take a nice photo and write something about the P45.

Theresa and Jip: ""While travelling trough the Philippines we encountered all kinds of weather conditions. We were a bit worried about testing it in the highly humid environment. However the speaker survived it all! During the evening we used the moodlight to find a way through our cabin. We loved the sound of the speaker and the bass was good.""

Claudia and Shasa: ""What surprised us the most was the sound and volume of the speaker. We blasted the music all day without having to recharge it. We used the speaker during a party and the P45 is a real eye-catcher, we got a lot of great commends.""
column5:
/>

Ayla and Siger: ""We love hiking and the P45 is a great product to add some music along the way. We attached the speaker directly to a bag with a carabiner hook and it was safe and secure. The streaming of music drained the battery of the phone during the day so at night the powerbank function was a real handy addition to the speaker.""
column7:
/>

Corine and Rob: ""We loved the sound and the convenience of not needing a wall adaptor during travelling! Rob used the speaker multiple times during a festival weekend to charge his phone, a great feature.""

 

Pim: ""During my holiday we visited the desert, the P45 was fully charged all the time due to the sun. I used it to play some music in my hotel room and as a powerbank during the day to charge my phone. Work never stops so I needed a power outlet. The dust and sand of the desert were no match for the speaker. Due to the aluminium body the speaker reflected most of the sunlight and did not get hot in the desert sun.""
column9: />Diny: ""After using the P45 on a road trip I noticed that I started using the speaker the entire day. The solar panels even charge the speaker inside the house. Great sound and the sturdy look and feel make sure I don't get worried if I bang it against a wall or getting it dirty.""
column11:
>P45 Specifications

Connectivity

Wireless music streaming 
Bluetooth V4.0 (range up to 15m) 
aptX®, MP3, AAC and SBC audio support

Audio
Stereo sound, two full range drivers

passive bass radiator

2-channel Class G amplifier 6 watt, total 12 watt 
DSP technology

Energy
Li-ion battery 6400mAh 3.7V 
Solar cell back up power (Pmax). 0,7W 
solar cell top max power (Pmax). 0,24W 
Playback time  without availability Solar: 100 hours at average volume 
Playback time: Operating with availability solar or slightly rich environment: Unlimited

Connections
Charging Port for speaker: USB Type Micro-B, 5V, 200-1000mA 
Charging Port for external devices: USB Type A, 5V, 1000mA

Dimensions
180 x 70 x 30 mm (LxWxH) 
Weight: 350 grams

The tripod adds to the 'designer piece' appearance and fits in every house. Place the speaker in your window, on your desk or wherever you need music and style in your life. The tripod is also compatible with all typical (action) camera's that are fitted with a 1/4"" mount.

The outdoor package consists of the regular P45 package, a silicon protective bumper, extra durable paracord straps and a stainless steel carabiner hook. FOXILON has developed a silicon bumper for the roughest adventures whilst remaining access to the speakers main functions. In addition to the leather strap, the outdoor package will include a selection of three paracords in different colors for a great look and outdoor convenience.

We have also added a nice offer for our P23 model. P45's 'little brother' with a more basic functionality and super compact size. The P23 is the first pocket-sized portable solar speaker on the market. A nice way to experience the FOXILON solar speaker technology. With a nicely crafted aluminium unibody design, stereo sound and integrated powerbank function the P23 offers impressive specs, which can be found on our website:

The product will be shipped in a luxurious box including a FOXILON pouch, micro USB cable and user guide. By offering the P23 in this campaign we want to provide new FOXILON enthousiasts a way to experience the unique solar power speaker technology for an economic price. Please be aware though that the P23 functionality and specifications are limited compared to the P45. For the best overall experience we highly recommend purchasing one of the P45 Perks.
We are proud to offer you this product on Indiegogo and we believe it is the right platform to spread our brand philosophy, audio product to the right audience.

We need the world to see that design, function and renewable energy can go hand in hand. Contributing to a reduction of the use fossil fuels while enjoying beautiful products is one of the values we stand for in our quest to develop new products that can make a difference. By sharing our product offer to a broad market we can continue to develop new features and improvements. By increasing our production rates we can at the same time reduce the relative amount of overhead needed to produce and ship the products, resulting in a higher value for our clients.

In order to supply our products to new oversea markets we need to invest in worldwide certification. Although our product is already compliant to EU regulation we need to ensure all validation and paperwork is in in place to enter new markets. Combining the certification activity with this campaign provides us the funding needed to provide our product to new markets.

If you like the P45, but you are not in the market for a speaker right now, we would love your help! As a starting business in the international market we need your support to reach as many people as possible. So please help us to spread the word.
Share our page with friends, let us know what you think and don't forget to follow our Facebook page and Instagram.

FOXILON produces distinct audio products. Products are developed in our design studio in Rhenen with the greatest concern for form and function. We only work with the best materials and latest manufacturing processes, such as 3D printing. With a background in sports development and a passion for innovation FOXILON was founded by Bas Schinkel in 2014. The product portfolio has since been expanded steadily. The engineers turn the design from a blanc piece of paper to functional product that meets the market demands and FOXILON's core values. FOXILON is the first producer of mobile Bluetooth speakers fully powered by solar energy that can fit in your pocket. Every speaker is tested and build with the greatest care in The Netherlands.
FOXILON is a Bright Solution BV brand.
Bas Schinkel, Founder, designer & product manager.
Djamilla Smits: Photography & video content creator.
Naidjé van Ravenswaaij: Sales and customer service.

What others sayWe asked our testpanel to take a nice photo and write something about the P45.Theresa and Jip: ""While travelling trough the Philippines we encountered all kinds of weather conditions. We were a bit worried about testing it in the highly humid environment. However the speaker survived it all! During the evening we used the moodlight to find a way through our cabin. We loved the sound of the speaker and the bass was good.""Claudia and Shasa: ""What surprised us the most was the sound and volume of the speaker. We blasted the music all day without having to recharge it. We used the speaker during a party and the P45 is a real eye-catcher, we got a lot of great commends.""Ayla and Siger: ""We love hiking and the P45 is a great product to add some music along the way. We attached the speaker directly to a bag with a carabiner hook and it was safe and secure. The streaming of music drained the battery of the phone during the day so at night the powerbank function was a real handy addition to the speaker.""Corine and Rob: ""We loved the sound and the convenience of not needing a wall adaptor during travelling! Rob used the speaker multiple times during a festival weekend to charge his phone, a great feature."" Pim: ""During my holiday we visited the desert, the P45 was fully charged all the time due to the sun. I used it to play some music in my hotel room and as a powerbank during the day to charge my phone. Work never stops so I needed a power outlet. The dust and sand of the desert were no match for the speaker. Due to the aluminium body the speaker reflected most of the sunlight and did not get hot in the desert sun.""Diny: ""After using the P45 on a road trip I noticed that I started using the speaker the entire day. The solar panels even charge the speaker inside the house. Great sound and the sturdy look and feel make sure I don't get worried if I bang it against a wall or getting it dirty."" P45 SpecificationsConnectivityWireless music streaming Bluetooth V4.0 (range up to 15m) aptX®, MP3, AAC and SBC audio supportAudioStereo sound, two full range driverspassive bass radiator2-channel Class G amplifier 6 watt, total 12 watt DSP technologyEnergyLi-ion battery 6400mAh 3.7V Solar cell back up power (Pmax). 0,7W solar cell top max power (Pmax). 0,24W Playback time  without availability Solar: 100 hours at average volume Playback time: Operating with availability solar or slightly rich environment: UnlimitedConnectionsCharging Port for speaker: USB Type Micro-B, 5V, 200-1000mA Charging Port for external devices: USB Type A, 5V, 1000mADimensions180 x 70 x 30 mm (LxWxH) Weight: 350 grams",22.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >Hi my name is Abbie and I am a final year student at Bournemouth University studying Media Production.
column3: >For my graduate project, I want to create 2 illustrated fictional children’s books, which will be accompanied by audio books. The books will be part of a series that addresses the wellbeing issues children may encounter. The idea behind this is that parents or guardians read these stories to their children to help them develop an understanding of their own circumstances and experiences, and additionally supports other children understand why their peers may be slightly different to them. Each story focuses on a central topic e.g. managing anger or nerves and explores reasons why these feelings are triggered. The stories are written about a relatable central character and explore how the character feels, resolves and deals with their mental wellbeing.
column4: >I am looking at raising money for my campaign to support travel, illustrations and printing costs. Any donations towards this project will be greatly appreciated.
column5:
>Many thanks for taking the time to read this. 

","Hi my name is Abbie and I am a final year student at Bournemouth University studying Media Production.For my graduate project, I want to create 2 illustrated fictional children’s books, which will be accompanied by audio books. The books will be part of a series that addresses the wellbeing issues children may encounter. The idea behind this is that parents or guardians read these stories to their children to help them develop an understanding of their own circumstances and experiences, and additionally supports other children understand why their peers may be slightly different to them. Each story focuses on a central topic e.g. managing anger or nerves and explores reasons why these feelings are triggered. The stories are written about a relatable central character and explore how the character feels, resolves and deals with their mental wellbeing. I am looking at raising money for my campaign to support travel, illustrations and printing costs. Any donations towards this project will be greatly appreciated. Many thanks for taking the time to read this.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: hexinverter.net's vcNOIZ is a unique exponentially voltage controlled noise oscillator for analogue synthesis. It creates absolutely crunchy sounding Commodore 64-esque noise
It will be available in DIY (""do it yourself) form (Eurorack, MU, universal) as well as Eurorack assembled SMT modules.

vcNOIZ is a gritty sounding voltage controlled noise source. The best way to imagine it is as a noise VCO. The frequency of the noise is both linearly and exponentially controllable by analogue control voltage signals. It creates positively raunchy C64-esque digital noise and sounds great for hihats and other sounds as well!

By patching vcNOIZ into a VCA and EG you can create crazy warping noise pads to layer with your other sounds. You can use a percussive envelope and generate awesome sounding hihats. You can also use it as a random gate source for clocking things by using the DC coupled output -- the sky is the limit!
It is a very unorthodox VCO that is capable of generating very interesting timbres you have not heard before.

It differs in tonal characteristic from simply putting a white noise source through a low-pass filter, because a filter will actually round off the edges of the square waves generating the noise and therefore reduce the intensity of the sound. With vcNOIZ, the actual rate at which the noise is being generated is altered by voltage control, and thus, you get to keep the raunchy sounding sharp edges of the noise. In short: it sounds pretty cool :)

It will be available as a DIY project and complete module from the hexinverter.net online shop after this campaign ends, but I need your help to do a production run of these modules. I have done some number crunching and it just won't fit in anytime soon if I am to fund it entirely myself on a university student's very limited budget!

There are no microcontrollers used in this design, so it will fit right at home in any analogue purist's setup as well. It is comprised entirely of CMOS logic and analog opamps, so does not suffer from CV aliasing or any other issues present in a microcontroller-based design.

- Expo. response CV input (-V to +V)
- Linear response CV input (-V to +V) -- great for audio rate FM, as the audio demo shows. It sounds positively gruesome!
- Clock input (square wave, positive logic)
- Pitch control (to tune base frequency, just like a VCO)

- Base frequency noise output (a little smoother sounding than the divisions) [audio coupled]
- Sub octave /4 output (gritty sounding) [audio coupled]
- Sub octave /8 output (gritty sounding) [audio coupled]
- Base frequency DC coupled gate output (for when wanting a random gate when using a slower clock/pitch rate)
- Internal clock output (there was an extra opamp, so I figured this could be useful)
Where the project is at right now:

vcNOIZ is through the prototyping phase and only now needs your help to get things moving! The design is tested and ready to go into production. hexinverter.net just needs your preorders to help getting there!
As soon as I have a camera at my disposal, I will make some demo videos! For now, you can find audio demos and other information at the hexinverter.net project site!

The $1,800 funding goal is the minimum necessary to go forwards with the minimum costs I have calculated. I expect we will far surpass that goal, but if we do not quite meet it, I will still go forward with the run, it just means it will be slightly delayed as I accrue more funds out of my own pocket.
The funding campaign ends near the end of December.
Kits and complete modules will begin shipping near the end of January as they are assembled.
You might recognize hexinverter.net from other projects I have successfully funded here on indiegogo:
sympleSEQ -- the simple to build analog step-sequencer
seqSQUARED -- the analog pattern generator
vcNOIZ is offered in FOUR different formats to try to accommodate most everyone's needs, so...
PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING PACKAGE/PRICING OPTIONS THOROUGHLY BEFORE ORDERING!

Option 1: UNIVERSAL PCB set with CD4006 ICs ($30) -- This option is for people wanting to source their own parts and build in whatever format their heart desires. MU panels will be available from Re:Synthesis! The package includes one professionally made PCB and the 2x CD4006 ICs as they are the only uncommon part to find. Build documentation, including a pre-filled Mouser project cart and BoM/assembly guide will be available on the hexinverter.net project site to make your build easy to follow!

Option 2: UNIVERSAL PCB set WITH EURORACK PANEL and CD4006 ICs ($65) -- This option is for people wanting to source their own parts and but they want a pre-made eurorack panel. The package includes one professionally made PCB, one very nice eurorack panel from Re:Synthesis and the 2x CD4006 ICs as they are somewhat hard to find. Build documentation, including a pre-filled Mouser project cart and BoM/assembly guide will be available on the hexinverter.net project site.

Option 3: DIY EURORACK MODULE KIT ($140) -- This package deal has all of the surface mount done, but you must assemble the through-hole components as well as install everything into the panel. You will receive a bag of through-hole components as well as the already assembled SMT PCBs and a eurorack panel made by Re:Synthesis. An assembly guide will of course be provided on the hexinverter.net project site.

Option 4: COMPLETE EURORACK MODULE ($180) -- This is one professionally assembled eurorack module which has been hand tested and built by myself. Each module is supplied with a Doepfer-standard eurorack cable and is ready to make tonnes of noise!
I WELCOME ALL DEALER REQUESTS FOR A CUSTOM WHOLESALE DEALERSHIP PACKAGE LISTING! Contact me at hex(at)hexinverter.net

    Enough of people roaming around on your way to the office? 

    Can't bear the city or the airplane turbulence?

    Always get distracted in the office by your colleagues' noises?

    Sometimes, we just need one moment that only belongs to ourselves.

 

 

When passion meets technology, industry-leading Active Noise Cancellation delivers rich  and powerful listening experience, which brings you the joy of immersive sound. With a simple fingertip, you're transported to another space where people aren't visible, where there's no relief any rush to run, where a sense of peace at heart. 

 

Check out Greggle's TV on testing Space 2
column3:
showinfo=0"">

We're in Vegas! Testers try out Space 2 at CES 2020

column1:
Advanced active noise cancellation provides you immersive sound experience. Luxury material and specialized design secure your wearing with all day comfort and premium sound quality guaranteed.

 

 

Mu6 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Technology is an improved system that not only suppresses noise over a wider frequency range but also adapts to and corrects errors while being less sensitive to sound angle and user wear.

 

 

It's top -of- the -class ANC locks out 96% of noise energy and gives you an immersive listening experience like you never had before. While with transparency mode, it lets in all the sounds and keeps you aware of your surroundings while enjoying music on-the-go.

 

 

 

Mu6 has been built with a powerful 40mm dynamic driver and utilizes a cutting-edge polymer diaphragm for distortion-free bass and a balanced soundstage.

 

 

 

Our team scanned and analyzed hundreds of human ears and head shape with multiple mockups to guarantee a secure, comfortable fit for every user. The earcup band is uniquely calculated and designed which secured its durable, soft and lightweight, creating a zero pressure space for your ears. The ear pads feature high-quality breathable nylon fabric (superior heat dissipation) covered by skin-friendly protein leather.

 

 

 

 

 

Convenient ""grab"" and go, Space 2 headphones can be folded in different ways for easy storage and carry. New designed cozy home for your headphones fits perfectly in your gym bag or most handbags.

 

 

 

Mu6 was created with our single-minded purpose to make your life sound better. We have operations in Los Angeles, Texas, and Shenzhen China, with a team of passional and industry professionals with10+ years of experience in both start-ups and big companies such as Microsoft, Honeywell, and Huawei. 

Equipped with engineers and experts combining best-in-class acoustic know-how, cutting-edge digital signal processing technologies, headphone design insights, and strong manufacturing background, we have spent years developing the Mu6 headphones, creating a product that could at very competitive prices and still provide the best listening experience.

column3:
>Introducing Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder

The Twirling720 VR Audio Recording system works with ambisonics, a multi- channel audio recording technique that lets you capture 360° of sound at one single point. This high precision quad channel microphone models the characteristics and response of an assortment of microphone array configurations to accurately record the sound of a 3D space. The perfect tool to create VR worlds of sound.
column4: >
column7:
showinfo=0"" width=""640"">
Please Check HERE For More Twirling720 VR Recording Samples.
column8:
>True 360° Soundfield Recording

Unlike traditional microphones which use one or two channel recording to emulate 360 ° sound, the Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder makes use of its inventive quad-channel microphone to record beyond just the horizontal plane, but also a multitude of 3D sound and elevation cues including three-dimensional polar response, direction of arrival (DOA), transient response, harmonics, and proximity effects. Each of the 4 directional inputs work together to pick up the microphone’s distance in relation to the sounds – letting you record an acoustic space as it truly exists in real life.

(Prototype Testing)
column9:
>Post-Processing Versatility with Twirling720 Studio

The Twirling720 recorder is accompanied with our versatile post-processing software Twirling720 Studio. This software converts raw 4-channel recordings into a variety of output formats.

column1:
First Order Ambisonic B (FOA-B) format is supported by all major VR platforms such as Google Daydream/YouTube, Facebook/Oculus, Milk VR etc.  With FOA B format recordings, you can pan, tilt and zoom a sound image and easily switch between countless mic patterns and combinations to create your perfect sound all in post-processing! If you can dream it, you can produce it.

Quad Binaural is another common VR audio format used by most major platforms and content creation teams. It represents the soundfield through 8 tracks of audio with two tracks for each of the four directions (0, 90, 180, 270 degrees). 

Endless possibilities in sound manipulation.
• Pan, Tilt or Zoom the sound image
• Easily switch between Mic Patterns like: omni, cardioid, hyper-cardioid, sub-cardioid, super-cardioid and figure-8.
• Even advanced Combination Patterns like: blumlein, height-enabled blumlein, Mid/Side, or any combination and arrangement of microphones for VR, Spatial Audio and other effects.
• Perform detailed equalization based on each of the 4 individual channel inputs.
• Ambisonic spatial noise suppression with 20dB noise reduction without altering sound image and sacrificing audio quality
• Highly accurate sound source tracking in 3D space providing a real time visualization of the soundfield

Binaural Sound Preview

Powered by our state-of-the-art VR audio engine, Twirling720 Studio also lets you preview your 720 sound recording with a binaural rendering, allowing you to explore how human ears will hear the 720° sound image in a full 3D space.
column4:
Facebook 360° Compatibility

Twirling720 VR’s support for Google Omnitone, Youtube 360° and Facebook 360° spatial audio playback means everyone will be able to hear your 360° sound recordings.

These entirely web-based platforms allow your Twirling720 VR ambisonic recordings to be played directly in the browser. All your audience will need to hear your VR and 3D sound is access to the internet.
column5:
>Portable, all-in-one VR sound recording

The power and versatility of a microphone array in one single portable device.

The Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder combines a high quality 4-channel microphone and a fully integrated recording device into a revolutionary all-in-one 360° sound recorder. Never be tied down by bulky multi-microphone and recorder configurations or compromise the details in your sound recording again. Now you have the freedom to capture sound in its true 3 dimensions anywhere, anytime.

Being portable also means you can easily deploy Twirling720 at multiple spots on site to have more complete coverage of the sound scene, never missing any details of the sound of you are recording. The ability to distribute recordings provides more flexibility in both post processing and in on site recording, allowing you to record detailed sound scenes simultaneously with the video scenes. Where will your imagination take you?
column6:
>Compatible with VR Video

Immersive Sound for Immersive VR

 

VR is meant to create an alternate reality with life-like accuracy, but without the right audio cues to match the visuals, the effect isn’t convincing and your experience is compromised. Our audio-engineers designed the Twirling720 VR Audio recorder specifically with VR and 360° video in mind. Now you can create convincing, realistic worlds of sound to match those impressive VR and 360° video landscapes.
column8: AAX Plugin for Professionals
column10:
showinfo=0"" width=""640"">

To ensure that the experience of Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder owners is seamless, we’ve designed TwirlingWorks, a powerful audio tool for professional VR audio creation. Programed with assistance from some of the world’s experts in Ambisonics and audio mixing, TwirlingWorks supports both VST and AAX plugin formats, which can work with almost all the professional digital audio workstations (DAWs), such as Cubase, Pro Tools, Adobe Audition, etc. For the audio designer, TwirlingWorks is perfect for setting up mixes within your favorite DAW, and for real time auralization of the mix in 3D virtual reality. It further has a full suite of advanced features including:

column1: • Mixes Twirling720 ambisonic files with individual audio objects, and allows for sound sources (monophonic, stereo, FOA) to be properly spatialized in 3D relative to the user’s head location.
• Room model with high quality physical reverb generation
• Metadata generation and various file format export

column3:
>Design

Expertly crafted with ease of use in mind.

Recording quality is our first and foremost priority. The Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder combines the latest in audio-engineering hardware with a convenient design to make a 360° microphone system that doesn’t sacrifice recording quality and yet remains easy to set up and use.
column5:
>Why get the Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder?

With VR technology on the verge of breaking into the mainstream consumer market, there’s no better time to start innovating and creating 3D Ambisonic audio. The Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder is the perfect one-stop 3D audio recording solution for VR developers, film makers, sound recordists, field recordists, musicians, musical performance recordists and more.  If you’re passionate about sound and recognize how difficult it is to capture true 360 ° audio, you deserve the Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder.
column6:
>SPECS

Size: 200mmx80mmx27mm(L x W x D)

Frequency: 80Hz - 18kHz

Signal to Noise Ratio 68 dB

Weight: 290g

Mic Impedance: Max 2.0KΩ 1kHz (RL=2.0kΩ)

Voltage: 3.8~5V

Microphone Sensitivity: -35dB

Maximum Sound Pressure Level: 115dB SPL

4 high quality built-in microphone units

Support 24bit/48,96Khz WAV format

Lithium battery for 8 hours running

128x64 ppi LCD display

USB 2.0

3.5mm earphone output

Support SDHC

Mic boost
column7:
>Team and Vision

Emerging VR and 360 video technologies are completely changing the way we experience media and we believe there’s a great need for a high quality portable VR sound recorder. Our team consists of members from the world’s most renowned audio companies such as Dolby, Sennheiser, and Huawei. With over 60 years of combined experience in audio research and development, our goal is to revolutionize the way immersive audio is recorded. With seasoned musicians, recording artists and audio mixers also amongst our ranks, we understand audio as not only a science but an art as well.
column9:
>FAQ

How do I use/operate the Twirling720?

You can watch a step-by-step demonstration on how to use the Twirling720 here:
column11:
amp...

How is VR sound recording different from traditional recording?

While traditional recording techniques utilize multiple microphone arrays and create their surround-sound by mapping it in post-processing, the Twirling720 VR’s 4 microphone inputs record sound information beyond just the horizontal plane, but also a multitude of 3D sound and elevation cues.

How does the Twirling720 record 360° sound?

Each of the 4 directional inputs work together to pick up not only the sounds that reach them individually but also each microphone’s distance in relation to the sounds – letting you record an acoustic space as it truly exists in real life.

Can I use recordings I capture with the Twirling720 to supplement my 360° video?

Yes, recordings captured with the Twirling720 are ideal for Spatial-Audio used with 360° video. Our accompanied software Twirling720 Studio supports conversion into the FOA format, the standard supported by Youtube’s emerging 360° video platform.

Does the Twirling720 require any additional devices to capture audio?

No, the Twirling720 is a completely stand-alone device, meaning it both captures and records audio and saves it to your SDHC card. It also has it’s own display and 3.5mm headphone output so you can keep track of your recording on site.

Do I really need VR sound to create a VR Video or VR Game?

Sound is half the picture. This is especially true in the VR world where your ability to create believable immersion truly dictates how enjoyable your VR experience is. Poorly recorded sounds or sounds that don’t adapt to the users’ location in VR space can distract and take the user outside of their VR experience.

","Introducing Twirling720 VR Audio RecorderThe Twirling720 VR Audio Recording system works with ambisonics, a multi- channel audio recording technique that lets you capture 360° of sound at one single point. This high precision quad channel microphone models the characteristics and response of an assortment of microphone array configurations to accurately record the sound of a 3D space. The perfect tool to create VR worlds of sound.Recording SamplesPlease Check HERE For More Twirling720 VR Recording Samples. True 360° Soundfield RecordingUnlike traditional microphones which use one or two channel recording to emulate 360 ° sound, the Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder makes use of its inventive quad-channel microphone to record beyond just the horizontal plane, but also a multitude of 3D sound and elevation cues including three-dimensional polar response, direction of arrival (DOA), transient response, harmonics, and proximity effects. Each of the 4 directional inputs work together to pick up the microphone’s distance in relation to the sounds – letting you record an acoustic space as it truly exists in real life.(Prototype Testing)Post-Processing Versatility with Twirling720 StudioThe Twirling720 recorder is accompanied with our versatile post-processing software Twirling720 Studio. This software converts raw 4-channel recordings into a variety of output formats.

column1: First Order Ambisonic B format SN3D
First Order Ambisonic B format FuMa

First Order Ambisonic B (FOA-B) format is supported by all major VR platforms such as Google Daydream/YouTube, Facebook/Oculus, Milk VR etc.  With FOA B format recordings, you can pan, tilt and zoom a sound image and easily switch between countless mic patterns and combinations to create your perfect sound all in post-processing! If you can dream it, you can produce it.Quad Binaural is another common VR audio format used by most major platforms and content creation teams. It represents the soundfield through 8 tracks of audio with two tracks for each of the four directions (0, 90, 180, 270 degrees). Endless possibilities in sound manipulation.
Pan, Tilt or Zoom the sound image
Easily switch between Mic Patterns like: omni, cardioid, hyper-cardioid, sub-cardioid, super-cardioid and figure-8.
Even advanced Combination Patterns like: blumlein, height-enabled blumlein, Mid/Side, or any combination and arrangement of microphones for VR, Spatial Audio and other effects.
Perform detailed equalization based on each of the 4 individual channel inputs.
Ambisonic spatial noise suppression with 20dB noise reduction without altering sound image and sacrificing audio quality
Highly accurate sound source tracking in 3D space providing a real time visualization of the soundfield

Binaural Sound PreviewPowered by our state-of-the-art VR audio engine, Twirling720 Studio also lets you preview your 720 sound recording with a binaural rendering, allowing you to explore how human ears will hear the 720° sound image in a full 3D space.Google Omnitone, Youtube 360° & Facebook 360° CompatibilityTwirling720 VR’s support for Google Omnitone, Youtube 360° and Facebook 360° spatial audio playback means everyone will be able to hear your 360° sound recordings.These entirely web-based platforms allow your Twirling720 VR ambisonic recordings to be played directly in the browser. All your audience will need to hear your VR and 3D sound is access to the internet.Portable, all-in-one VR sound recordingThe power and versatility of a microphone array in one single portable device.The Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder combines a high quality 4-channel microphone and a fully integrated recording device into a revolutionary all-in-one 360° sound recorder. Never be tied down by bulky multi-microphone and recorder configurations or compromise the details in your sound recording again. Now you have the freedom to capture sound in its true 3 dimensions anywhere, anytime.Being portable also means you can easily deploy Twirling720 at multiple spots on site to have more complete coverage of the sound scene, never missing any details of the sound of you are recording. The ability to distribute recordings provides more flexibility in both post processing and in on site recording, allowing you to record detailed sound scenes simultaneously with the video scenes. Where will your imagination take you? Compatible with VR VideoImmersive Sound for Immersive VR VR is meant to create an alternate reality with life-like accuracy, but without the right audio cues to match the visuals, the effect isn’t convincing and your experience is compromised. Our audio-engineers designed the Twirling720 VR Audio recorder specifically with VR and 360° video in mind. Now you can create convincing, realistic worlds of sound to match those impressive VR and 360° video landscapes.TwirlingWorks VST & AAX Plugin for ProfessionalsTo ensure that the experience of Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder owners is seamless, we’ve designed TwirlingWorks, a powerful audio tool for professional VR audio creation. Programed with assistance from some of the world’s experts in Ambisonics and audio mixing, TwirlingWorks supports both VST and AAX plugin formats, which can work with almost all the professional digital audio workstations (DAWs), such as Cubase, Pro Tools, Adobe Audition, etc. For the audio designer, TwirlingWorks is perfect for setting up mixes within your favorite DAW, and for real time auralization of the mix in 3D virtual reality. It further has a full suite of advanced features including:
Mixes Twirling720 ambisonic files with individual audio objects, and allows for sound sources (monophonic, stereo, FOA) to be properly spatialized in 3D relative to the user’s head location.
Room model with high quality physical reverb generation
Metadata generation and various file format export

DesignExpertly crafted with ease of use in mind.Recording quality is our first and foremost priority. The Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder combines the latest in audio-engineering hardware with a convenient design to make a 360° microphone system that doesn’t sacrifice recording quality and yet remains easy to set up and use. Why get the Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder?With VR technology on the verge of breaking into the mainstream consumer market, there’s no better time to start innovating and creating 3D Ambisonic audio. The Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder is the perfect one-stop 3D audio recording solution for VR developers, film makers, sound recordists, field recordists, musicians, musical performance recordists and more.  If you’re passionate about sound and recognize how difficult it is to capture true 360 ° audio, you deserve the Twirling720 VR Audio Recorder. SPECSSize: 200mmx80mmx27mm(L x W x D)Frequency: 80Hz - 18kHzSignal to Noise Ratio 68 dBWeight: 290gMic Impedance: Max 2.0KΩ 1kHz (RL=2.0kΩ)Voltage: 3.8~5VMicrophone Sensitivity: -35dBMaximum Sound Pressure Level: 115dB SPL4 high quality built-in microphone unitsSupport 24bit/48,96Khz WAV formatLithium battery for 8 hours running128x64 ppi LCD displayUSB 2.03.5mm earphone outputSupport SDHCMic boost Team and VisionEmerging VR and 360 video technologies are completely changing the way we experience media and we believe there’s a great need for a high quality portable VR sound recorder. Our team consists of members from the world’s most renowned audio companies such as Dolby, Sennheiser, and Huawei. With over 60 years of combined experience in audio research and development, our goal is to revolutionize the way immersive audio is recorded. Connect this footswitch to your computer and start recording in your favorite DAW (Pro Tools, Logic, Reaper, Ableton, etc). If you mess up while recording a take, just tap the footswitch and the bad take will automatically be deleted, the playhead moved back to where you last began recording, and a new take will begin. No need to take your hands off your instrument, press some keyboard shortcuts/move the mouse around to set up a new take.

This footswitch connects to your computer as a USB human interface device, like a keyboard or a mouse. It sends a pre-programmed sequence of keystroke data (a ""macro"") to your computer whenever you press the switch with your foot.

I made this prototype for fun, but a lot of people told me they would be interested in having one. Unfortunately, the cost per footswitch is much higher if I have to build them one at a time (the prototype would cost $60 for parts + additional for assembly labor). I can offer a lower price if many people order at once.

If anyone is willing to pay a premium price for a highly custom unit (more switches, paint job/artwork, funny extra features), then I can still offer that person a lower rate than I would be able to if it was a purely one-off situation, since shipping/handling costs from suppliers will still be shared among the other orders, and part of the design process will be common to the non-customized orders. Everybody wins.
