column4:
>Visit www.aedle.net !

Founded in 2011, aëdle is a Paris based house specialized in the manufacturing of high-end audio accessories and what we like to call Travel Instruments.

 

The VK-X is our latest creation and our definition of what Wireless headphones should be.
column7:
> 

Each of our headphones is assembled by hand in our Parisian workshop.
With a limited production capability, we offer 1 000 units on IndieGogo Pre-order at a discounted price.
column9:
'>You have 3 options available when choosing your VK-X:

● Classic Serie Edition (Brown Genuine Lambskin Leather / Natural Aluminium)
● Legacy Serie Edition (Black Genuine Lambskin Leather / Natural Aluminium)
● Made to Order Edition (Create your custom VK-X with our selection of leathers / Aluminium)

The Serie Edition features our traditional and timeless color choices. It will be produced on an ongoing basis (around 150 Units / Months for our Stores and Partners).
column11:
>
VK-X Legacy

What if your headphones could meet your lifestyle?

Unlike the Serie Edition, Made to Order Edition VK-X will remain produced upon individual customer requirements. This unprecedented service allows to create your unique pair of headphones, handcrafted specifically for you.

Choose your desired finish among our curated selection of leather and aluminum finishes.

To ensure the best experience, you will receive the swatch book of our selected aluminum tiles and leather colors in August to make your definitive choice.
column12: >The Swatch Book you will receive with the Made-to-order option.
column15:
> 

 

You can find below some of aëdle special made-to-order picks: the Sand Beige with the Bronze finish, playing on brown nuances
column16: the Rose Gold goes pretty well with the Forest Green, reminding a vintage, elegant watch. Royal Blue and Silver finish reflect the sharp look of a bold sports car while Carmine Red and Anthracite finish is spot on, binding the flaming leather color to the coldness of the metal.
column19: >The best of both worlds.

column1: Designed as a true travel instrument, the VK-X pursues aëdle design philosophy based on the exclusive use of noble materials and secular manufacturing processes around functional yet minimalist shapes.
column2:
>
 

The Genuine Lambskin Leather we use to cover the VK-X earpads and headband comes from South of France. We work with a company specialized in high-end lambskin that works with the finest Parisian luxury brands to ensure the lightweight, flexible and soft finish we require to craft headphones that could be worn for several hours in one sitting.

Aircraft Grade Aluminium parts bring to the VK-X its recognizable industrial and minimalist feel. We machine them one after one out of a single block of premium aluminum for a stable result.

Find out more about our leather and aluminum in our journal.

We are a small team of passionate people that thrive every day to produce the best audio products in our Parisian atelier located in Rue Campagne Première, a street that became well-known thanks to the international artists that lived there.
column3:
>
 

We believe that the key to success lies in the mastery of details, which explains why all our products, and so will the VK-X, are assembled carefully by hand in Paris, following those production steps :

column1: • Reception, Quality Control of leather quality and REACH compliance
• Skiving, cutting and stitching the headbands and earpads
• Production of the electronic components by our leading French partners
• Production of plastic components and machined aluminum cups in Asia
• Reception, Quality Control of electronic, plastic and machined components

Help us reach our stretch goals to upgrade the VK-X. Once we reach 200,000$, LDAC coded will be available for all the VK-X produced. Once we reach 350,000$, we will develop a specific iOS and android app for the VK-X.
column2:
>For every friend who purchases a VK-X, we'll give you both an aëdle gift

 

We offer a special referral program during the pre-order campaign. Refer friends and people within your network and win aëdle gifts for each contribution you bring to help us reach our stretch goals!

 

What happens once one of your referred friends purchase a VK-X?

You win 1 point, and your friend wins 1 point too.

What can I win with 1 point?

With 1 point, you can claim one of the four aëdle gifts valued 1 point (see list below!). You can also save that point and try to refer other friends to claim bigger aëdle gifts.

How to participate?

Take part in the referral program is easy:

column1: Copy your personal invitation link (to do this, click on this icon located top right on the campaign page)
• If one of your friends purchase the VK-X, it counts like a referral. You both won 1 point!

You can then track your results this way.

 

What are the aëdle gifts?

You can find below all the gifts that could be claimed with the referral program, along with the required points. More info about our products is also available on our website!
column3:
> 

Since its founding in 2012, Aëdle created 4 different audio products and sold more than 10,000 worldwide. We want to thank all our users and partners for helping us make this adventure possible. Visit our website for more info!

column1: ODS-1 In-Ear headphones in 2016
• VK-2 Headphones and ODS-D In-Ear headphones in 2017

column4:
showinfo=0"">

We today have a fully working prototype of the VK-X, and validated most of its mechanical components for the production stage that will begin this summer.
We are refining the sound signature in order to reach our target sound signature and adjusting the Active Noise Cancelling microphones to make it even more efficient. Apart from this, we are also currently fine-tuning the software that will pilot the VK-X and adjust mechanical tolerances to provide the best conditions for Mass Production.

You can follow and discover what happened in the past months on our development journal.

As we already produced several audio products successfully and built a solid sourcing network, production is not an issue for us and we are confident we will deliver the VK-X now that we finished the prototype stage.

However, tooling, testing and producing molds requires a tremendous amount of resources for a small company like us. We decided to crowdfund the launch of the VK-X to collect enough funding for this reason.

Risk 1. If we don’t reach our funding goal, we know we won’t be able to launch production properly, which will lead to a risk we don’t want to take: create and ship a bad product. If this were to happen, we will refund entirely our backers in this case and pause the VK-X development to save our brand reputation.

Risk 2. The second risk we might encounter is a delay in delivery caused by one of our sourcing partners. Delays, as we experienced in the past years, could be frequent when producing such a product. Having already planned and coordinated everything with our partners, we can expect a delay limited to 1 month, which will make us deliver the VK-X in December instead of November.

That being said, we will make sure to communicate with our backers on a frequent basis to keep them informed with the due transparency and honesty demanded by this kind of venture.

 

We are collecting in this section all the recurrent questions we received along with our answers. Do not hesitate to comment on the campaign to ask something else!
column20:
>

The VK-X is Bluetooth 4.2 and not 5.0 since there is no added value in terms of sound quality between the 2 versions. The upgrades offered by 5.0 Bluetooth (Range x4, Throughput x2) are exclusive to BT Low Energy, which is not really adapted to continuous music streaming as it sends small packets of information. That being said, the VK-X Bluetooth 4.2 is, of course, compatible with devices that use Bluetooth 5.0. For more info, you can access our blog post.
column33: >Will the VK-X accessories include a Lightning cable?
column36:
>

There will not be a Lightning cable included with the VK-X accessories. We have not had the time to develop this particular cable for the campaign but we plan to work on made-for-iPhone cables by the end of the year.
column49: >Will the VK-X have a hard or a soft case?
column52:
>

We will provide a hard-case with the VK-X. We are currently working on the design, which explains why we don't have any packshot yet. The hard case will be faithful to the product and adapted to travel. We will provide pictures shortly.
column65: >What are the accessories coming with the VK-X?

column17:
>

As all our audio products, the VK-X is warranted internationally for 2 years.

column1: As a crowdfunding project, a return policy is not mandatory. However, we are committed 100% to do things well with all the respect and gratitude we have for our supporters. This is why we offer the following return policy:
•  Full Refunds are authorized (by Indiegogo) until July 19th (end of the campaign)
• Starting July 20th, you are onboard with us, there will be no refunds processed until the delivery of your headphones scheduled for November.
• Once you receive your headphones, if you are not satisfied with them for any reason, you have 15 days to get a refund at the following conditions:
• Send us back the headphones in original condition

• Once we receive them, we will issue a full refund of your original pledge minus the following:
    >

column14: >What is the campaign tax policy?
column17:
>

Local taxes, duties and VAT are not included in the campaign prices and due upon reception of the goods:
- For citizens outside the E.U., extra charges such as import duties and / or sales tax may be applied by local authorities upon reception of the goods
- For citizens in the E.U., we will require an extra VAT charge prior to sending the goods to be compliant with the E.U. Tax regulation

column3: >All new Drop-Safe Fit TWS earbuds
column4: >at a market breaking price
column5: >Letsfit T20 earbuds are made using a new and award winning innovative Scandinavian design that offers a never before seen secure fit with an ergonomic based comfort experience that stays the same even when worn over time. Meaning your earbuds are fit for any type of activity, in any type of environment. This leaves you more focused when moving about or working out, and stops you being disturbed by the things around you.
column8: >The problem with using traditional TWS earbuds when exercising or moving about.

column1: Fall out often: Traditional TWS earbuds either fall out of the ear easily, or they move slightly resulting in lost sound quality, and you have to push them in place repeatedly.
Too large: Over-ear earphones that hook over the ear are too large, and not very convenient. They also leave pressure on the outside of the ear causing the ear to become uncomfortable after a while.

Put pressure on the ear: With other ordinary TWS sports earbuds, pressure is put on the ear because the earbud has to be forcefully placed deep inside making your ears uncomfortable, or even painful over time.

column2:
>The C-Shape design and the science behind the all-new C-Skirt.

 

Letsfit has teamed up with Scandinavian multiple award-winning earbud design specialists Freebit to design a pair of earphones that offer a completely new type of design never seen before in the TWS market. Both design teams got together and looked at the concept of sound, and how sound relates to human interaction and the elements that surround us. It was from this that the notion of humans, sound, and mother nature inspired the design concept that we can see through the T20 triton seashell like in-ear design, now coined as ‘C-Skirt’.
column3: >A brand-new design that gives
column4:
>an even more secure fit.

 

Letsfit wanted to make earbuds that were secure and fit for exercising. When working out Letsfit’s all new T20 earbuds offer a secure feel never seen before in other TWS earbuds, and with this a more superior feel of comfort.
column5: >What this means is that our

column1: • Are secure, won’t fall out or move in the ear.
• Have a unique way of sitting in the ear, resulting in increased comfort, meaning you can continue to wear them even after your workout for any other activities.
• Are suitable for multiple different workout environments.
• Remove any hard structures putting pressure on the bottom of the ear that result in increased comfort over time, and minimizes pressure against the tragus and antitragus

column4: >
column6:
>Making your workouts more secure.

 

“It’s all about pressure. We know exactly where pressure is needed, and where it isn’t. Our patented technology has a new and unique way of attaching to the ear that avoids sensitive areas, resulting in a secure earbud that can be worn comfortably for much longer periods of time than other earbuds.” – Freebit, Norway. Design Partners with Letsfit for the T20.

The all new C-Skirt concept used on our T20 earbuds is ergonomically designed to rotate into the ear and fits perfectly with the soft parts of the outer ear (ear auricle), placing the earbud closer to the ear auricle, effectively prevents the earphone from loosening or falling off when accidentally being touched or slipping when sweating during exercise.

 

 

Our T20 earbuds are built to withstand any intense workouts (indoor or outdoor) and are secure and safe in the ear at all times allowing you to focus more on your workouts, training, hiking journeys and much more. Perfect for any exercise environment and can be used all day without having to worry about your earbuds falling out ever again.
column7:
>Built to withstand the hardest workouts without compromising on comfort.

 

Our T20’s unique rotary in ear design ensures stability, meaning it is not necessary for the earplug itself to fit deep into the ear to be able to wear. Reducing depth of the earplug then reduces the pressure on the ear canal and the floor of the ear enhances comfort when wearing by a significant amount. In addition, the  C-Skirt design avoids sliding and discomfort from any possible sweat in the ear that is caused by the continuous movement.

 

In addition, the T20 is equipped with three different sizes of ear-tips as well as our al new
C-Skirt, which means there is a comfortable configuration that fits everyone.
column8:
>Portable, with one-touch gestures that allow you to focus more on your exercise.

 

Touch control makes using your earbuds when exercising even more convenient. You can easily skip to the next/previous song, or even pick up calls by simply tapping your left or right earbud, allowing you to focus more on the tasks at hand and less with fiddling around with your phone. Your earbuds will also automatically pair to your device after the first time they are paired meaning you can be one step ahead of the crowd when starting your workouts.

 

What’s more, the minimalist design means that you won’t be weighed down when traveling, hiking, or even when working out. As well as this, our T20 is made with a charging case that is compact and portable, letting you take your earbuds with you everywhere and also enabling you to be able to charge on the go.
column10:
>in all environments.

 

Letsfit T20 earbuds are also sweatproof, and waterproof. Which means they are ready to withstand even the toughest workout routines. You can safely wear your earbuds throughout your entire workout without worrying about your earbuds or their performance.
column11:
>Stable connectivity to make sports easier.

 

Bluetooth 5.0 gives you more stable connections when exercising so that you don’t have to worry about losing your focus when training.

 

Letsfit T20 Earbuds use Bluetooth 5.0 with Multi-cast synchronization that allows your earbuds to be constantly synced to your smartphone by continually analyzing the status of both earbuds and deciding which earbud is acting as the main receiver of audio and which is the secondary receiver. What this enables the listener to do is have a no-lag experience when listening to music no matter which earbud they are using, and can also enable them to use one earbud independently or both simultaneous also without experiencing any lag in audio at any given time.
column12:
>Sound that keeps you focused.

 

Enjoy great audio quality that will help you stay focused when working out or in all other activities. With rich bass and clear highs accompanied by balanced mid-tones, you’ll be able to push yourself further when listening to the music you love.

 

You can also use your earbuds to listen to music for up to 5 straight hours comfortably with ease. Meaning even if you are running a marathon, our T20 earbuds can accompany you the whole way.
column13:
>Find a color that suits you.

 

Letsfit T20 earbuds can be purchased in either black, white, or our Kickstarter exclusive Orange limited edition color. Making sure there is a style that suits everyone. This exclusive color will not be available outside of our Kickstarter campaign so make sure you get yours here to be able to enjoy something special.
column14: >Earbuds that pack a punch.
column16:
>Our promise.

 

Unlike other companies on Indiegogo, Letsfit already has a working, mass “production -ready” early prototype of our product. We always want to make a product that we and our customers can be proud of. This means that not only will we 100% be able to deliver our promise (and the product!) to you, but we will also be here to offer post sale support via our customer service team to make sure you get the best user experience possible. As well as this, we offer the chance to extend the warranty of all our products via our official website (letsfit.com) for an extra year free of charge, giving you two years peace of mind. The Letsfit team have been designing and manufacturing fitness products including earbuds for the last 5 years, and we’d say that we are pretty darn good at it!


We also work extremely closely with our manufacturing partners and have our own inhouse design team and have paired up with well-known award-winning Scandinavian earbud designers Freebit. As such we feel that the risks give to our customers in terms of producing a final product is 0%. We are confident in delivering industry changing Earbuds to everyone who wants to try something new. However, due to recent worldwide circumstances we feel that logistics at this time may be a little bit “up in the air”, and would be a little hard to predict at this given time. Delays in shipping could occur due to factors like viruses, due to logistic and travel restrictions. If any delays were to occur due to such things, we will always be the first to communicate this via updates to all our customers with full transparency and of course, be here to give a helping hand should you have any questions during your Letsfit journey.

Letsfit is a young brand who already have transformed into Amazon Best Sellers over mutilple product categories and are here to serve everyday people during their everyday exercise. With fitness trackers, smart watches, earbuds, and other workout gear, Letsfit provides high-quality products that meet users’ expectations and offer them a healthier life. To pursue the never ending challenges and interests that fitness brings.
column17:
>Meet the team.

 

Based in Florida, our team really is the life and soul of our company, we believe, love and thrive on diversity. And offer an environment that gives us the space and time to really come up with more and more ways to enrich our customers' lives through our services and products. 

 

 

 

Letsfit were also featured at this year’s CES exhibition, in Las Vegas Nevada where we showcased a bunch of amazing products to the industry that showcased great new ways for people to stay on top of fitness and get the most out of their health.

 

 

Get even more products when you help spread the word and share Letsfit with your family and friends. It just takes 2 referrals and you will be eligible to receive a free $5 Amazon gift voucher!

 

How to share:

 

1. First, back Letsfit

2. Once you are a backer, log into your Indiegogo account

3. Copy Letsfit’s campaign link

4. Share your unique link with your friends! 

 

 

How to check your referrals:

1. Log into your Indiegogo account

2. Click on your user name at the top of the page

3. Select ‘My Profile’

4. Click on the Referrals tab, to see your latest breakdown of referrals and contributions

1. Hi-Res Coaxial Dual Driver Module

The coaxial drivers consist of one 50mm full range driver to offer bass boost at 90Hz. While a 20mm mid to high frequency driver offers sensitivity up to 117 dB, offering the best sound field for gamers, providing a clear representation of direction, location, and distance.
The combination of two offers the best sound experience for gaming. Both drivers have the frequency response from 20hz all the way up to 40Khz, and sensitivity up to 113dB at 1Khz.
CYBORG PX2 headphones  meets the JAS (Japan Audio Society) standards of Hi-Res audio, providing HQ sound quality to cater to your music and gaming needs.

As fellow audiophiles, we understand the never ending desire to pursue higher resolution. That’s why, our headphone is equipped with True Digital rendering / Hardware decoding DSP engine, integrated with ESS9281C pro Hyperstream II Quad DAC with 134dB audio output quality to complete the final  unfold of MQA audio files, at the 24 bit /384KHz resolution delivering the sound of the original master recording .
To learn more about  MQA  please go to
3.  Xear Virtual 7.1 Surround Sound with RF Wireless Connection

Bluetooth headphones undoubtedly free gamers from wire hassle, but latency and sound quality become a major concern. Our team has successfully integrated RF technology into the headset. The wireless connection via RF (Radio Frequency) drastically reduces latency, making it the ideal headset for intense gaming.

Coupled with Xear Virtual 7.1 surround sound, you get a realistic 7.1 channel surround sound field with virtually lower  latency. Download the driver on your Windows devices and enhance the audio performance.
4. ESS9281C True Digital Render / Hardware Decoder

Hi-Res audio files like DSD256, PCM384K/32 bit contain a lot of data, making it a fairly demanding task for the CPU and DSP to process. Thanks to our DSP engine that’s fully integrated with the ESS9281C pro  Hyperstream II Quad DAC, we’re able to perform true digital rendering / hardware decoding and accurately recreate every detail in live concerts, games, instruments and more.

Xear 7.1 Surround Sound: Experience Xear Virtual 7.1 channel surround sound through wireless RF 2.4G transmission by installing the adapter(Included) on your PC / NB. The built-in wireless RF2.4G receiver module decodes I2S digital audio data, while the ESS 9281Cpro Quad DAC enhances it to Hi-Fi quality. (Note: Driver required for PC. Not available on mobile devices.  Xear 7.1 Surround Sound : The RF2.4 G Tx transmitter provided the Broadcastting function for Multiple Link with More than 3 * PX2 headphones at syncronize music . ( may be more than 3 . it 's depends on contents data  rate ) ,  this function fit movie time or music time to share more people togather without any worry intererance people neboring you  in the train or movie at home . especially at night movie time . enjoy the surrounding and strong sound effect with friends and no worry to interferance your family.

FPS ( First Person Shooter): We tone down the bass booster and enhance the treble to allow clearer player communication and voice clarity. The headset renders fine audio details to help players get a sense of direction and distance. Locating your enemies has never been easier.
6. True Digital USB Audio for Low Latency

Playing audio through USB connection on your PC or mobile devices allows for the best audio quality and low latency. The built-in 9281C  pro Hyperstream II chip in our headphone has enough processing power to effortlessly decode Hi-Res and HQ audio and reduces buffering and delay when watching movies.

Short battery life has been a major drawback for wireless headphones nowadays. Our headset allows you to switch to an analog 3.5mm jack or True Digital USB Audio Class 2.0 Type C connection. No power is required. Under the Type C configuration, our headset offers the lowest latency and truly allows the hardware decoder to shine in turns of its sound quality. It delivers true digital signals from the audio source.
True Digital USB 2.0 TYPE-C Connection: MQA  rendering  24bit /384KHz ,and hardware decode  PCM384K 32bit/ DSD (Dop)5.2MHz files. (Cable included)
3.5mm Analog Input: The most commonly available connection. (Cable included)

column2: >Stereo Audio: Directly driving audio signal to the 40KHz speaker driver. (Stereo with Mic cable.)

column1: 8. Powerful Amp Pushing Up To 600 ohm At 2V RMS

With powerful drivers comes high impedance. Most smartphones nowadays are only capable of pushing out 15mw of power.This is why the sound quality coming out from smartphones is generally disappointing.
To resolve this issue, many audiophiles would purchase a separate headphone amplifier to push their high end headphones. Oftentimes, these amps would cost higher than the headphone itself.
With CYBORG PX2, that problem becomes obsolete. The built-in ESS 9281C DAC is capable of pushing up to 600 ohm at 2V RMS. We make sure that users get the most out of our headsets.
9  Best Value For The Money

No more compromise with the sound quality. The best all-in-one headphone is here. Whether you’re commuting, gaming, and simply enjoying music, you’ll get the highest performance possible at a very affordable price with the CYBORG PX2.
Any time , Any where , share the best listening experience with Music , Movie , Gaming

column1: After doing extensive research on audio and gaming headphones, we noticed a few issues with the products currently available on the market.
·       The sound quality of most gaming headphones is less than ideal by audiophiles' standards.
·       Most audiophile headphones are expensive because of the brand, not the technology behind it.
·       High end brands are too expensive, while no name brands oftentimes are terrible in quality.
·       New technology and novel materials are not well-developed and researched enough to improve sound quality.
·       The importance of audio output signal quality is not emphasized enough.
That’s why, our team began doing integration, sourcing from the best partners such as ESS Technology for DSP / DAC, MQA for 384K/24bit music .

Our professional acoustic team has experience designing driver modules like the hybrid electrostatic coaxial dual driver, the planar magnetic speaker module, and of course, the coaxial type dual driver found in our CYBORG PX2.

Our system engineers utilize the MCU to integrate and control the DSP (Digital Signal Processor), DAC and AMP inside the ESS9281C pro chipset to achieve RF 2.4G decoding, Hi-Res / MQA rendering and EQ settings.

All parts and designs are individually tested by their respective team. Finally, in March 2020, we have accomplished our first prototype that passes our rigorous testing and quality check. The amazing result encouraged us to launch the campaign on Indiegogo.
We are proud to say Cyborg provides the best sound quality across gaming and music fields. Its budget price makes it easy for music enthusiasts of all levels to enjoy.
We are ready to provide beta testers our pre-production units to test out the CyBORG PX2 headphones  performance  &

What to expect in our next campaign?
8 channels True Digital Hardware Decode ( Q4 /2020 )
With your support, we will be able to develop a world class product with the following specs:
• True Digital 8 (7.1) channels with super low latency and 8 processors in each channel to do hardware decoding. HQ audio out with 135dB of dynamic range in each channel.
• 40KHz speaker module with 5 drivers each in left and right. Perform true hardware decoding at the highest quality with the lowest distortion.
• All drivers will have 115dB sensitivity, balanced within the frequency range, crystal clear sound and low harmonic interference.

Our team is aiming to begin production in Q4 2020. Your support will be the strongest momentum to drive us forward. After the campaign, we would like to invite backers to join a discussion and share your experience with us and help us optimize the product.
We have been doing testing for the above-mentioned specs in our lab. All results are verified and positive. In a couple of months, we’ll be certain what we can do, and when we can reach the goal.
We strongly believe that traditional acoustic headphone makers mislead the gaming headphone industry. Gaming headphones are not just for gamers or bassheads. They should have the following qualities:
• Lowest Latency for DSP with Highest sound quality
• True digial 7.1 for each individual speker performing the true sound
• Deliver true digital  audio signal from audio content source
• USB Audio 2.0/3.0 to hi-bit rate audio contents transmmsion
• 7.1 Movie sound quality as 7.1 home Theater sound effect
• True life Music as concert or Band  performing all music instrument sound clearlly .
We’d like to challenge users who are accustomed to expensive headphones from big brands to give us a try. We believe that technology should be enjoyed by everyone at an affordable price.

Since we’re approaching mass production, we will begin to deliver pre-production units to third-party entities for testing, including the MQA team for certification and verification. We will also send samples to professional music studios, audio testing labs, music producers, singers and so on.
We have prepared a few pre-production units for our beta testers to review when the campaign is launched. We hope we can get more listening feedback while the campaign is live.
We are confident that with our in house engineers and partnership with MQA, ESS, we’ll be able to solve any issues if any problem were to arise.
We are strongly believe CYBORG PX2 Headphone will be your best gift for summer vocation time , Get one CYBORG PX2 now ,

if You may not be able to make a decision right away to support our campaign, but we are greatly appreciative of your interest in our project. Any questions or feedback can help us improve our current and future projects.
If you like our campaign, help us share it with your friends and family, let’s give more people a chance to take a look at our project.
We’ll deliver the pre-production units to beta testers and have them share the experience so you can make the final purchase decision. Our product is almost ready for mass production.

We want you to get the best bang for the buck. We’ll continue to keep the project live on Indiegogo InDemand after the campaign. If you haven’t made up your mind, you can always come check us out in the future.

The coaxial drivers consist of one 50mm full range driver to offer bass boost at 90Hz. While a 20mm mid to high frequency driver offers sensitivity up to 117 dB, offering the best sound field for gamers, providing a clear representation of direction, location, and distance.
The combination of two offers the best sound experience for gaming. Both drivers have the frequency response from 20hz all the way up to 40Khz, and sensitivity up to 113dB at 1Khz.
CYBORG PX2 headphones  meets the JAS (Japan Audio Society) standards of Hi-Res audio, providing HQ sound quality to cater to your music and gaming needs.

As fellow audiophiles, we understand the never ending desire to pursue higher resolution. That’s why, our headphone is equipped with True Digital rendering / Hardware decoding DSP engine, integrated with ESS9281C pro Hyperstream II Quad DAC with 134dB audio output quality to complete the final  unfold of MQA audio files, at the 24 bit /384KHz resolution delivering the sound of the original master recording .
To learn more about  MQA  please go to
3.  Xear Virtual 7.1 Surround Sound with RF Wireless Connection

Bluetooth headphones undoubtedly free gamers from wire hassle, but latency and sound quality become a major concern. Our team has successfully integrated RF technology into the headset. The wireless connection via RF (Radio Frequency) drastically reduces latency, making it the ideal headset for intense gaming.

Coupled with Xear Virtual 7.1 surround sound, you get a realistic 7.1 channel surround sound field with virtually lower  latency. Download the driver on your Windows devices and enhance the audio performance.
4. ESS9281C True Digital Render / Hardware Decoder

Hi-Res audio files like DSD256, PCM384K/32 bit contain a lot of data, making it a fairly demanding task for the CPU and DSP to process. Thanks to our DSP engine that’s fully integrated with the ESS9281C pro  Hyperstream II Quad DAC, we’re able to perform true digital rendering / hardware decoding and accurately recreate every detail in live concerts, games, instruments and more.
5.  Preset EQ Profiles & Broadcast for RF2.4 G Wireless

Xear 7.1 Surround Sound: Experience Xear Virtual 7.1 channel surround sound through wireless RF 2.4G transmission by installing the adapter(Included) on your PC / NB. The built-in wireless RF2.4G receiver module decodes I2S digital audio data, while the ESS 9281Cpro Quad DAC enhances it to Hi-Fi quality. (Note: Driver required for PC. Not available on mobile devices.  Xear 7.1 Surround Sound : The RF2.4 G Tx transmitter provided the Broadcastting function for Multiple Link with More than 3 * PX2 headphones at syncronize music . ( may be more than 3 . it 's depends on contents data  rate ) ,  this function fit movie time or music time to share more people togather without any worry intererance people neboring you  in the train or movie at home . especially at night movie time . enjoy the surrounding and strong sound effect with friends and no worry to interferance your family.

FPS ( First Person Shooter): We tone down the bass booster and enhance the treble to allow clearer player communication and voice clarity. The headset renders fine audio details to help players get a sense of direction and distance. Locating your enemies has never been easier.
6. True Digital USB Audio for Low Latency

Playing audio through USB connection on your PC or mobile devices allows for the best audio quality and low latency. The built-in 9281C  pro Hyperstream II chip in our headphone has enough processing power to effortlessly decode Hi-Res and HQ audio and reduces buffering and delay when watching movies.

Short battery life has been a major drawback for wireless headphones nowadays. Our headset allows you to switch to an analog 3.5mm jack or True Digital USB Audio Class 2.0 Type C connection. No power is required. Under the Type C configuration, our headset offers the lowest latency and truly allows the hardware decoder to shine in turns of its sound quality. It delivers true digital signals from the audio source.
True Digital USB 2.0 TYPE-C Connection: MQA  rendering  24bit /384KHz ,and hardware decode  PCM384K 32bit/ DSD (Dop)5.2MHz files. (Cable included)
2.4G RF Connection: For low latency connection.
3.5mm Analog Input: The most commonly available connection. (Cable included)
Stereo Audio: Directly driving audio signal to the 40KHz speaker driver. (Stereo with Mic cable.)
8. Powerful Amp Pushing Up To 600 ohm At 2V RMS

With powerful drivers comes high impedance. Most smartphones nowadays are only capable of pushing out 15mw of power.This is why the sound quality coming out from smartphones is generally disappointing.
To resolve this issue, many audiophiles would purchase a separate headphone amplifier to push their high end headphones. Oftentimes, these amps would cost higher than the headphone itself.
With CYBORG PX2, that problem becomes obsolete. The built-in ESS 9281C DAC is capable of pushing up to 600 ohm at 2V RMS. We make sure that users get the most out of our headsets.

No more compromise with the sound quality. The best all-in-one headphone is here. Whether you’re commuting, gaming, and simply enjoying music, you’ll get the highest performance possible at a very affordable price with the CYBORG PX2.
Any time , Any where , share the best listening experience with Music , Movie , Gaming

Our team members mainly consist of engineers. We like to work on new technologies. Most of our top engineers have more than 30 years of R&D development experience, with knowledge in computer and system development across audio / video interfaces.
After doing extensive research on audio and gaming headphones, we noticed a few issues with the products currently available on the market.
·       The sound quality of most gaming headphones is less than ideal by audiophiles' standards.
·       Most audiophile headphones are expensive because of the brand, not the technology behind it.
·       High end brands are too expensive, while no name brands oftentimes are terrible in quality.
·       New technology and novel materials are not well-developed and researched enough to improve sound quality.
·       The importance of audio output signal quality is not emphasized enough.
That’s why, our team began doing integration, sourcing from the best partners such as ESS Technology for DSP / DAC, MQA for 384K/24bit music .

Our professional acoustic team has experience designing driver modules like the hybrid electrostatic coaxial dual driver, the planar magnetic speaker module, and of course, the coaxial type dual driver found in our CYBORG PX2.

Our system engineers utilize the MCU to integrate and control the DSP (Digital Signal Processor), DAC and AMP inside the ESS9281C pro chipset to achieve RF 2.4G decoding, Hi-Res / MQA rendering and EQ settings.

All parts and designs are individually tested by their respective team. Finally, in March 2020, we have accomplished our first prototype that passes our rigorous testing and quality check. The amazing result encouraged us to launch the campaign on Indiegogo.
We are proud to say Cyborg provides the best sound quality across gaming and music fields. Its budget price makes it easy for music enthusiasts of all levels to enjoy.

We are ready to provide beta testers our pre-production units to test out the CyBORG PX2 headphones  performance  & quality. with your earliest listening   experience we can share and improved for the mass production units.

If you have any issues with the product, whether it’s design, function or specs, compliments or criticism, our team will be happy to help you out. We would greatly appreciate hearing back from you. This will be crucial information to help us improve our next iteration.
What we are going to be focusing on next is the production side of things.

Never before has this quality audio been available in a headphone that everyone can afford. GameON is shifting the paradigm on the audio industry and making music matter again.

Shipping December 15, 2016, just in time for the Holidays!


 

Hear from our Founder, Steven Lamar, co-creator of Beats by Dr. Dre:
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

GameON means high output, ultra-low distortion sound that's incredibly clear. This isn't just a pair of earphones, this is a revolution in the way we experience music. This is how people IN the music industry hear it.

Innovative ergonomic design and Sure-Fit Clips block outside noise, so there are no distractions on your pure musical and gaming journeys.  

Experience your favorite songs as you never have before. GameON will set your sound free.
 

Audiophile quality sound with adjustable enhanced dynamics.


Leverage true hi-fi sound to become fully engaged with the nuances of your music and gaming. Audio is powerful, precise and detailed while environmental noise and distractions are muted.


Speak into the high-quality mic positioned at just the right height to pick up your voice, and hear your call perfectly even in the noisiest situations.

Switch into ultra bass boost to kick your music into high gear and you won't be able to keep still, whether you're jamming out or working out.
 


Incredible color options, ultra-premium brushed titanium craftsmanship, and sleek metallic finish.


 

Millions of music lovers don't realize that some expensive, brand-name headphones have mediocre sound, at best.  - TIME Magazine (link)

Retailers mark up prices by more 20%-50% to even sell audio products to you. - Audiophile Review (link)

We've lost an entire generation to the hype and need to get back to the roots.

We're cutting the red tape, removing the markup, and inviting you to finally hear the difference.

 

It's incredibly important to us that the design of GameON Earphones looks great no matter where you are or what you're doing.*

*Caution: GameON completely immerses you in your music experience (blocking out unwanted external noise) and therefore should never be used while operating a motor vehicle or in any situation such as riding a bicycle or running on public roads where inability to hear approaching danger could cause harm.


 

 


 


 

This is the first step for a bright new future. The collaboration combines Atari's iconic and timeless brand with ROAM's stylish, high quality earphones to create co-branded mobile audio products.

We’re getting back to basics while blowing people’s minds with audio quality.  Keeping it simple, it’s all about iconic design and great sound.

Designed for gamers and music lovers alike, GameON earphones is the first in line to deliver extraordinary sound quality at an affordable price. With your support, this collaboration will grow.

Responsible for the original concept and design of the Beats by Dr. Dre headphone product line in 2006, Steven Lamar was a huge advocate for using higher quality components for better sound, but lost out to other interests. 

Deeply impacted by the tragedy of losing his late-wife to brain cancer, Steven began in a new direction. He founded ROAM in 2013 to to blend his expertise in audio with a desire to make mobile devices safer to use.

In line with its own mission, and moved by ROAM's mission, Fred Chesnais &
column4:
Atari have joined ROAM to sponsor a series of audio products, games, and beyond. In addition to its commitment to making audio excellence as affordable as possible, Atari has been instrumental in getting the word out to as many people as possible. 

More than 25 years of technical and manufacturing knowledge, making him one of the leading experts in the audio industry. Phil oversees all aspects of product development, engineering, procurement, supply chain management, product quality, and more.

Artists are a huge part of our product development process. Stephen Belafonte and others have worked with our team to provide valuable early feedback. 
 


 

We are able to ship worldwide. Taxes, duties, VAT, and GST are all included. Please see the reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship the product by December 13*, 2016. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual ship dates may vary by country. We will keep you notified of your product delivery date.

By pre-ordering now you'll get to own one of the very first pair of GameON earphones ever created. You'll get exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of ROAM and Atari products.

 

What is the Frequency Response?

See this chart. Green is Bass Boost, and Red is Audiophile. They converge at around 900.

What is ""Other"" at checkout?

iPhone has a special set of controls for our switches to work. If you're not an iPhone owner, then you should select ""Other.""

Comments? Questions? 

If you have a question, and you think that others would like to know, please post it in the comments section, linked here.

Want more multi-pack options? Leave us a comment. We're happy to accommodate large order inquiries, color suggestions, and more.

For all other questions, including interview requests, let us know: support@roamwith.com.

column3:
'>® Hybrid Technology defines the Sound of the Future.

 

1. Dual-Driver: Superior in both Extremes.

column7: '> Dual-driver incorporates

column1: • Strong and sturdy bass power from a planar driver.
• Performance efficiency of a Dynamic driver between bass power and size.
• The bulky size of a planar driver.

column7: '> Dual-driver incorporates

column1: • Electrostatic driver in reproducing the most clean and crisp mid-high frequency.
• Electrostatic driver in bringing out details and overtone sensations in high notes.
• Agility and fast response of B.A. and electrostatic drivers.
<li><strong>Insufficient in bass power of conventional B.A. &amp
• High distortions and resonance of a conventional B.A. driver.
• Mobility restrains of an Electrostatic driver requiring stand-alone amplifier.
• Power consumption required of an Electrostatic driver.

2. HYBRID:  We offer the Most Powerful Combination.

Verisonix is the first in the world capable of combining both Electrostatic and Dynamic drivers in a speaker.  Why?  Because we’d like to re-define how Hi-Res quality music should sound.
How does hybrid driver elevate your listening enjoyments:

Each driver operates on its dedicated tasks.     

Meaning:  Each driver is doing what it does best
column2:
the bass you get is firm and sturdy and the high notes is extremely clean and crisp.  The tiniest sounds from high notes will not be drawn out by the bass.  This greatly reduces distortions and uneven sound waves a conventional speaker driver has when reproducing bass and high notes simultaneously.  

    

  • Sensitivity from 5Hz to 50KHz is consistently kept at its best @114db/mw.      

Meaning:  The volume reproduced from sub-bass, bass, mid, high to ultra high notes are precise, clear, and powerful.  You will be able to hear more sounds in a song and more instruments that were played in an orchestra concert.         

 

  • The patented Electrostatz
column4:
'>® Technology makes it the best Hybrid headphones in the world.  

Meaning:  What could have cost you thousands in exchange of its finest timbre and fidelity, the Electrostatic driver, is now within reach.  Frequency up to 50KHz for breath taking high notes as well as the blood pumping bass generated from the dynamic speaker making HP102/HP112 the best Hybrid headphones in the world.          

 

3. Co-exist in Harmony: Alignments &
column5:
Calibrations.

 

 

4. Electrostatic Speaker?

The electrostatic headphones are still far from the mass market because:

column1: • Entry Model average retail price starts from USD1,500.

5. CAEE Technology:  Free upgrading to Hi-Res Music.

The fact is that even with the most expensive Hi-Fi speaker in the world there’s no guarantee for good quality sounds depending on the music source played.  Music nowadays can be acquired on-line, thru streaming apps, or using peer-to-peer sharing, and the qualities of them can vary greatly.  

 

The CAEE is created just for this purpose by upgrading your music source to Hi-Res quality thru algorithm calculations.  By increasing the sampling rate of audio files, the Electrostatz® Hybrid headphones or speakers will perform at its best.

column5:
>FAQ:

​

  1. How does Verisonix hybrid dual-driver headphones differ from an average headphones?

Average headphones normally equipped with only one speaker driver.  A lot of time they would need to produce bass and high notes simultaneously leading to modal break-ups.  The modal break-up refer to the changing shapes of the diaphragm sending uneven audio image to your ear.  Hybrid dual-driver eliminates this issue with each speaker driver operates on its own
column6:
the 40mm DOM speaker driver is dedicated for bass, and the electrostatic speaker driver provides sheer cleanness of the finest mid-high notes.

  1. What is an electrostatic headphones and how is it different from Verisonix patented Electrostatz® ?

Most headphones need magnets to trigger movements in producing pressure and sounds.  Due to their structures there are more resonance and sounds distortion.  In contrary the structure of an electrostatic speaker is almost sonic transparent.  The static electric charge is placed directly on the ultra-thin diaphragm, and without touching any object it is able to produce extremely clean high frequency sounds.  However, a traditional electrostatic speaker requires high voltage power supply to push the driver.  Verisonix patented Electrostatz® technology incorporates the sound quality of a traditional electrostatic speaker driver without the needs of having a stand-alone amplifier.

column1:
What is CAEE technology?  

CAEE is another of Verisonix core technology that is built-in the headphones with your original music files automatically upgrading to Hi-Res Quality.  Thru algorithm calculations the CAEE is designed to increase the sampling rate of an original file to 192K/24bit Hi-Res quality.

  1. What are the audio connection methods?  

​Audio inputs:  Bluetooth 4.2 wireless connection, 2.5mm phone jack, USB digital streaming via Micro USB, and a built-in MP3 players.

  1. Which format does the built-in player support?

The built-in player supports MP3, WMA, APE, FLAC, and WAV format.

  1. What is the USB digital streaming via Micro USB Audio connection for?

When connecting with PC or laptop, it supports DSD256 and PCM format where you will be able to listen to uncompressed Hi-Res music just as recorded in the professional studio.

  1. What’s the memory capacity of the built-in player?

The built-in player is with 8GB memory capacity.  It will hold over 2500 MP3 songs.

  1. Is the ear-pad replaceable?

Yes, it is replaceable.

  1. What is the Bluetooth effective range?

The effective range is over 10 meters. (over 30 meters in open area.)

  1. What is the battery usage time?

Over 12 hours continuous usage.

  1. Is there any built-in EQ (equalizer) mode?

Yes, the HP102/HP112 come with three EQ modes:  Music, Movie, &
column2:
Gaming.

  1. What language does it support?

English and Chinese or English and Japanese.

13. When connected with analog-in cable (wired mode), will the headphones still work even when the battery is out?

No, you will have to re-charge the headphones to make it work even when it's in wired mode. The reason is that the built-in CAEE system in our headphones enhances audio quality of all sources from 48K/8bit up to 192K/24 bit.  To ensure the upgrading of the input sound quality the power needs to be applied for this main feature to perform at its best.  Other Bluetooth &
column3:
Line-in headphones do not have CAEE feature hence they might work under wired mode even when the batteries is low with direct line connect by mechanical switch.

CMP Tech:

Powered by graphene driver, Åtta Göra Liberté delivers soul-touching and inspired sound with a seamless connection. No wires, no gimmicks, just the flawless audio, and beautiful design.

In this information-overloaded time, it can be confusing when you choose an ideal earphone as there are tons of options on the market with all these complicated parameters. We are here to make things simple. Our advanced driver membranes are crafted from state-of-art graphene, a revolutionary material that makes a remarkably clear, bold, and balanced sound.

Here it is, the ultimate solution of flawless sound - graphene driver.
column3:
>What is graphene?

Constructed from a single layer of carbon atoms in a hexagonal crystal lattice, Graphene is the thinnest, lightest, and strongest material on earth. It has been used in various fields for all kinds of purposes since it’s been discovered and has earned the name ‘the wonder material’ as it owns the potential to change the world.
column4:
>Why graphene?

The technical answer: Graphene is considered the perfect material for loudspeaker membranes - the key part in the speaker that vibrates to produce sound. With its lightweight properties, graphene driver moves much quicker compared with regular drivers with other materials. Because of its incredible stiffness, it keeps the shape as it moves, to deliver the smoothest, most extended frequency response for soul-touching and balanced sound!

The short answer: Graphene makes the music sound really good!

 

 

 

With the graphene drivers built-in, Åtta Göra delivers superior sound with clear highs, accurate mids and strong bass. Benefit from this balanced sound and the leading optimization algorithm, Åtta Göra can produce a wider sound stage for a more realistic and immersive listening experience.

 

Below is the frequency response of Sennheiser Momentum

Graphene reacts more accurately than other materials as it excels in weight and stiffness. Graphene also reduces the blurring sound with resonances and phase shifts, allowing it to represent the high fidelity sound of original recording.
column5:
>Long-session HiFi Music Anywhere

Charge for only 15 minutes, listen for 3 hours. Together with the wireless charging case, you’ll get 24+ hours of high-fidelity audio while the earbuds can continuously play for 6+ hours. Let the music follow wherever life takes you!

 

No wires, no worries! Simply place the charging case on the wireless charging pad, Åtta Göra will automatically be juiced up, for the effortless charging experience anytime. Or you can charge the case with the Type-C cable when there is no wireless charging pad available.

column1: Feel free to move around while enjoying the music without carrying the charging case or your phone. Thanks to the leading Bluetooth 5.0 protocol, you can experience the seamless sound with Åtta Göra at a distance of up to 165 ft(50 meters) away.
column2:
>Intuitive Touch Control

Control media, fine-tune volume and take calls with intuitive touch gestures. For effortless productivity, leave your phone in your pocket and activate your preferred voice assistant with simple taps. Responsive control is right at your fingertips.

 

To deliver a stylish and ergonomics design, we spent lots of time and effort. A premium matte finish and smooth glass accents create a striking contrast, finished with an elegant strap for portability, Åtta Göra brings the chic form as well as thoughtful functions.

 

Åtta Göra is adventurous but practical
column4:
Simple but intricate. It stands the co-exist of the elegant look and superior sound. The bird in our logo - Åtta is the symbol of elegance, freedom, and creativity while the fox Göra delivers the image of cleverness, modesty, and simplicity. The fox and the bird coexist not in contradiction but in harmony. With this design philosophy, we bring the leading techs powered superior sound and world-class industrial design together, for enjoying the flawless sound with elegance wherever you are!

 

 

*The price you see on the check out page might appear in Hong Kong Dollar or your country's currency. Here are the pledges in USD.

 

 

Åtta Göra is now under preproduction stage and will deliver the first patch (About 1000 Units) before Christmas.

Have you ever fell deep inside an emotion that the music you loved gave you?
John Coltrane's Central Park west right during this fall season.
San Juan Sunset by Deodato while looking at the setting sun across the ocean horizon.
Late at night listening to Bill Evans Trio's Stella by Starlight.
With Adapt Reference Audio DAC, this experience is amplified with more stable, clear details inside the music.

 

Adapt is designed with philosophy and engineered from fundamentals. All the features and every little detail interconnect to create One flawless audio DAC.

With Adapt, you don't have to listen to a low quality, low volume music or carry another expensive bulky Digital Audio Player (DAP). 
Just a single Adapt completely upgrades your audio effortlessly.

Adapt will be an upgrade to your ear and your life. Enjoy the sunset and enjoy the rain with the Adapt on your hands.
Adapt Reference is for serious music listeners, music producers, hardcore gamers and anyone who wants to fully expand their listening experience.
Adapt Standard is an affordable Hi-Fi DAC for audiophile beginners and enthusiasts who have interests in better music.

The concept of Adapt started in February 2018. The audio DACs out in the market were bulky, expensive, or had a mediocre performance. So, we wanted to make a compact, reasonably priced, high performing DAC that can last long in this fast-changing world.
column4:
ESS, the best performer in the audio market  

Adapt uses the latest ESS 32bit SABRE Hi-Fi ES9218P DAC with the Triple Filtered Power Supply for the most stable yet dynamic audio experience. 

For MUSIC LOVERS: Have a seat in the middle of a small classic jazz bar at late-night or in a large orchestra hall waiting for the orchestra to finish their tuning.
For GAMERS: Catch the slightest noise your enemy makes in the wide open grass field. 

 

ULTRA HIGH precision sound

The two temperature compensated crystal oscillators(TCXO) in the Adapt Reference model differentiates itself from other portable audio DAC having more clean and consistent sound just like the high-end audio system.

In simpler words, A quartz watch is off by 50 seconds per month and a regular digital device's Oscillator is off by 25 seconds per month. But, TCXO is off by only 1.3 seconds per month. That's some accuracy.

Adapt Reference has two TCXOs dedicated to 44.1kHz and 48kHz native sampling rates. Dedicated frequency minimizes the even the tiniest error during the sampling rate conversion process. 

Adapt's high precision and high resolution gives you the best sound experience for any audio playback. Even the normal compressed music files and Youtube videos will sound more clean and accurate.

 

 

Just like HI-FI  

Adapt product design represents the identity of Dense. In its simple compact design, innovative twin heat sink design using aluminum alloy keeps the hardware inside maintain an optimum temperature. Stable system temperature means stable performance and extended product life.


Adapt = Power in simplicity

Adapt can connect to iPhones, Android phones, macOS, Windows PC with a single USB Type C connection. Volume is synced with the source device for an easy user interface.
2Vrms output can drive active speakers and any headphones in the market including high impedance professional headphones.
1.6"" x 0.8"" x 0.4"" (40.5mm x 20mm x 10mm) size and 0.4oz (12g) in weight is made for portability.

 

 

These are some of the measurement comparing Adapt Reference, popular DAC Dragonfly Red, and  MacBook Pro, Which represents most of the popular devices' performance. As music lovers ourselves, data is not everything in audio, but it gives an idea how much it can perform.

The Frequency response of Adapt Reference is much wider than the other's and better in Total Harmonic Distortion(THD). You will be surprised how much Superior sound Adapt can give you.

Hello, I’m Dylan, currently I’m in the 11th grade and enrolled in a Junior Achievement JA Company Program to help me learn how to run and manage a business. My name is Nasiir and I’m also in the 11th grade participating in JA Company Program. WE ARE Mega Games!

We came up with our idea because we are avid card players. While we enjoy playing cards, we want to play by the rules and avoid disputes. Our product will revolutionize card game rules as it will enable all people, including those who may have disabilities
column2: visual or learning impairments, the opportunity to have easy access for understanding the rules of the game - delivered via a customized audio rule book. To put it frankly, Mega Games House Rules will prevent disagreements between families and friends over the rules by providing a better experience during family night card games, after all, the rules will be loud and clear!

column1: Our current goal is set at $10,000. This will allow us to produce a higher amount of product and to expand our organization across the United States. This money will be invested towards maintaining a quality product, new collaborations with customers to build out new rule books as well as enable opportunities to eventually lead to employing a new team to help lead the business forward, Further, we look to donate part of our profits (from a specific perk titled Mega Games for EVERYONE!) to the American Association Of People With Disabilities (AAPD).

We offer a variety of different perks that allow our backers to pick out specific topics or rewards such as putting your money towards the AAPD, paying salaries for the hard working kids throughout this program, receiving exclusive offer items not available to everyone, and the option to back various perks while still not breaking your own bank!
We can optimize the use of the funds by putting the majority of our backers' funds towards the production even if we don’t achieve the entire goal. We are still looking to expand the company over the next several months therefore, all contributors will receive the perk that is associated with the specific level of contribution.

Inclusive to those whom may be visually impaired or perhaps don’t personally like reading (like many of us!) especially when it comes to rules of card games, Mega Games wants to provide their supporters with a smoother card game experience by providing high-quality, audio rule books, specific to a game.  Our audio rule books make it so that the rules are justified and everyone is aware and in agreement with the rules before play begins. This will prevent or at least quickly resolve the issue of disputes. We do not include ""how to play"" information within our audio rule books at this time, we merely focus on the rules for that specific game. Plus, if you want to collaborate with us to create a new rule book for a new or existing game, we'd love to get your support through the perk titled, Custom Audio Rule Book!
Backing Mega Games' products can offer better experiences for those who argue about the rules, but also your support could help us reevaluate and improve our products by enabling you to leave any comments or concerns about the product. We can ensure issues will not only be addressed but rectified in a timely manner.

There have been many obstacles we have already overcome as a new JA Company and we know there will be many more to come as well. All the way from reforming all of our ideas down to helping personalize the company to reach multiple markets in hope for the best business growth - it has been a risk and challenge. We hope to achieve excellence throughout our campaign to enable the best experience for all card game players and overcome obstacles for those who have visual impairments and other corresponding issues to enjoy games in a whole new way. Perhaps there will be challenges with some of the larger game companies but we would see that as more as an opportunity to collaborate and provide game options that are suitable for all as opposed to a threat on what we're doing as a company.

Besides backing a perk if interested in supporting Mega Games, we would much appreciate it if you could spread word about our company through social media and any other ways that you can make noise about our campaign. Yell in the streets, tell a friend, share on social! BE SURE TO USE ALL SHARE TOOLS INDIEGOGO OFFERS!

column7: >What is Sprout? It's a stereo amplifier for the modern home!

column1:
Sprout is the link between your music and your speakers. Sprout is the size of a big novel, yet it will fill your living room, bedroom or any room with enormous, live sound. Sprout is designed down to the smallest detail, and built to last from stainless steel, extruded aluminum, and walnut. This is not audio equipment. It's audio jewelry. 

We know that most folks these days live in smaller homes. Sprout provides the performance of a big system in a small, easy-to-use package that will blend in to any decor. You won't have to hide Sprout, and you won't want to!
Sprout allows you to play music or sound from almost any source imaginable. With Sprout you can listen from:
• Any Bluetooth enabled device: tablet, phone, or computer(built-in Bluetooth receiver)
• Turntable to play vinyl records (built-in phono preamp)
• TV or gaming console, or even a reel-to-reel tape deck  (analog input)
• Any Size Speakers (50 watt per channel amplifier into 4 ohms)
What do you want to listen to? and

Sprout's two control knobs answer those questions--with the input knob on the left  you choose from Vinyl/Analog/Digital/Bluetooth. No menus, no screens, no tiny remote control to loose. The knob on the right is the volume control: just turn it to the right for louder, turn it to the loft for softer. Easy, direct, intuitive. Instant tactile feedback, a direct connection to your music. Click-click-BOOM.

Me too. I'm Scott McGowan. 32-year-old audio-enthusiast, concert-goer, and amplifier-designer. I work at PS Audio in Boulder, Colorado. I've been around HiFi systems my entire life because I love LIVE music.
Unfortunately, when I play music on my small stereo at home, it just doesn't sound live. But all that has changed.
PS Audio makes high-end stereo systems for audiophiles. An audiophile's goal is to reproduce live music exactly as it is heard on stage. Can that actually be done?
You bet. Our company does it every day.
It's not something most of us can afford however. It's not something most of us have space for, either.
Teresa (my wife, above) and I have a one-bedroom apartment
column2: we spend our money on bills. Normal-people stuff like student loans and groceries....not a hi-fi system!

column1: Yet who doesn't want concert-quality music in their living room?  From our phones, turntables, computers or CD players: that's how most people listen to music...
Ever notice how these big receivers get tucked away behind cabinet doors?             It's obvious WHY, isn't it? THEY'RE HIDEOUS!!
Ever notice how 90% of their features go unused?                                                          Who can understand the jargon and menus and controls?

column4: > And after all that... they DO NOT honor the music. ""Live sound""?? Not likely!

column1: Sprout will change forever the way you listen to music at home, from the lowest quality downloads to the highest quality discs, to your best LP's. If you love music like I do, Sprout will change your life and your relationship to music.
Sprout brings me the music: pure, sweet, simple and LIVE!
Sprout is much easier to use than that ugly receiver above:
And it's all relevant to music lovers.  Nothing superfluous--just those two knobs we talked about above.
Stereo equipment is incredibly complicated.  It's a fact.

But then again, so is your car's 4-stroke internal combustion engine.  I have only the vaguest conception of how cars operate.  But I don't have to know--and yet  I drive everyday.  They make it easy.

This is what I want to bring to the home audio industry, which until now has failed normal people like you and me.  Everyone loves music.  But wattage, voltage, signal-to-noise ratio, interconnects, EQ controls, output impedance? I feel your pain.  Don't get discouraged.
This is me at the HiFi Show in Munich, Germany (May 2014)

Sprout is the culmination of PS Audio's 42 years' experience building concert quality audio products. We hand selected the best parts of that rich history and put it into a single, simple, easy-to-use personal music system. It's everything you need. Nothing you don't. Just add speakers or headphones, and music—so close to live—will fill your whole home. It's nothing short of magical.

Sprout is designed by music lovers, for music lovers.
Sprout is high definition, playing the purest quality files up to 192kHz/24-bit (trust me, that's a good thing).

Sprout takes you back to the music's source in a warm, friendly sort of way.  No remote control, just a solid connection between you and your music.  Feel the precision.  Put the tactile beauty of control back in your hands. Reach out for Sprout!
Add headphones or speakers to Sprout, and your music will come alive. You can adios the dock.
It's big, awkward, and hard to use.  You shouldn't need a degree in electrical engineering to love music in your home.  Sprout is simple and elegant and brings the artists into your living room!
You've got a great source—unleash it on Sprout by Bluetooth or USB, and you'll hear your music for the first time.
42 years ago PS Audio released our first product: a phono-stage amplifier.  We've been doing it ever since.  We cherish our LP's. Use Sprout to draw every drop of analog purity from your records.

Sprout delivers.  Concert-quality audio in your home?  That's pretty remarkable if you think about it.  Yo Yo Ma's strings should sound like a cello.  You should be able to distinguish Simon from Garfunkel.  My dad and I are insatiable sound hounds.  We believe the pursuit of live sound is a journey, not a destination.
You should join us.  It's going to be fun.
Don't miss this chance to own Sprout!
There will never be a better opportunity to bring Sprout home. Help me bring music and magic into the world.

Sprout has sold thousands of units at $799...but thanks to its success we're able to offer it now at $499!  This is an incredible opportunity  to score the amazing Sprout personal music system at a very low price, and fill your home with the sound of live music like you've never experienced before!
• Inputs: Phono (Moving Magnet), Analog (3.5mm), USB (asynchronous 192kHz/24-bit), Digital Coax (any sample rate and bit depth up to 192kHz/24-bit), Bluetooth (built in).
• Analog output: variable 3.5mm line, for subwoofer or otherwise.
Read what audio and design experts say about Sprout:
Herb Reichert, Stereophile:
column7: >With Sprout, I always enjoyed the way I felt when a song ended and the next one began. I took pleasure in how I would go from smiling satisfaction to eager anticipation. Sprout specialized in the beguiling reproduction of every kind of music I sent through its four inputs. Recommended to style-conscious, value-seeking human beings of all ages, genders, and heights. You go, little Sprout!""

column1: Caleb Denison, Digital Trends: ""It seems most audio gear manufacturers are woefully out of touch with what normal people want/need. Thankfully, there are a few audio companies that just get it, and PS Audio proves it’s one of them with its latest effort, the Sprout integrated amplifier.""

Ken Kessler,  The Telegraph(UK):""Financed in part by crowdfunding, the Sprout is a gorgeous device that turns audio minimalism into an objet d’art. It is a low-profile, square footprint component reminiscent of the Mac Mini, with only two controls on the front. It’s as if one of the first of its design criteria was an absolute denial of technofear.""

Lee Scoggins, Headphone Guru :""The Sprout has turned out to be one of the most fun and versatile audio components I have ever used. It does just about everything and it introduced me to (finally!) some decent Bluetooth sound.""

Gregory Han, Design Milk :""I knew I was starting on the right foot when I found an amplifier seemingly designed specifically for the segment I represented: a design-minded customer who wanted to upgrade to entry-level audiophile components. I knew I wanted something small, yet sufficiently powerful and flexible for a variety of sound sources, whether it be a turntable, a laptop, or streaming wirelessly. When I noted PS Audio’s literature made mention of both Braun’s Dieter Rams and Apple’s Jony Ive as guiding inspiration for their user experience, it was apparent this audiophile company had factored in design prominently into their plans.""
...and what the press says about PS Audio:

John Darko, DigitalAudioReview.net: ""PS Audio ensures you're looked after each step of the way: the packaging, customer support, website, YouTube channel and firmware upgrades are solid examples of this manufacturer’s innovative ambition."" (PerfectWave DAC)

column2: Henk, 6moons.com: ""We firmly believe that we can now speak of the beginning of the second digital revolution... Kudos to PS Audio for being at the very front lines staking out this exciting future."" (PerfectWave Transport &

column3: y=0"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">The Absolute Sound: ""PS Audio’s NuWave Phono Converter is truly an innovative product with great sound and value for the money. A real pleasure to review...."" (NuWave Phono Converter)

column1: Karl Sigman, Audiophilia.com: ""PS Audio has perhaps achieved the impossible with the DS [DirectStream]. The DS gets my highest recommendation
column2: hats off and a bow to PS Audio."" (DirectStream DAC, winner of Publisher's 'Star Component' award).

column1:
There is no risk! PS Audio has been a leading maker of high-end audio gear for over 40 years. Sprout has been available now for a year, and thousands of units have been sold at $799. Thanks to our success and experience we've managed to restructure manufacturing and sales, and can now offer Sprout at $499!

The only challenge here is restraining yourself from buying a Sprout for every name on your holiday shopping list!
