Asivio One is the world's most complete and technologically advanced true wireless earbuds. Experience superior hi-fi audio and top of the line features developed with state-of-the-art technology. Luxurious and unique cutting edge design makes these earbuds the genuinely complete package. Use the powerful charging case with a 3500mAh built-in battery to enjoy up to 160 hours of extra music playtime and as a power bank to charge up your mobile phone. 

As standard features, Asivio One integrates the latest and most innovative technologies in wireless earbuds development:

What makes Asivio One special and unique?

The performance of the features are determined by the quality of the components used and the level of integration that makes up the product. Different companies will include the latest set of features but Asivio One separates itself from others by using only top quality components and some of the best earbud technologies to seamlessly integrate all these features into one device. Our completely flat top design of the earbud is also unique and provides the perfect companion for the touch control feature. The high quality audio development was a deliberate process and includes expert optimization of the sound by our audio engineering team which could only be done at that level with our use of top quality product components. With Asivio One you are getting a premium product with the combination of superior audio quality and top performing features all working together in a precise and reliable manner.

With no wires to fix or adjust and designed never to fall out of your ears, Asivio One is just the ideal partner for an active lifestyle. We designed these earbuds with comfort and performance in mind, so you can be assured of a top quality user experience. 

We want you to be part of this brilliant breakthrough achievement in premium high quality earbuds, featuring deep rich bass with superb stereo sound and long music playtime or call duration capacity. Asivio One earbuds stays securely in your ears for your activities.

Using Asivio One earbuds for 4 hours per day and placing back in the case can take you a whole month before the need to recharge the case.

The built-in magnetic compartments secures the earbuds in a case that is more than just for storage and protection.

The earbuds provides 4 to 5 hours of listening time on a single charge while the powerful and compact charging case has a 3500mAh built-in battery that charges your earbuds up to 40 times. This means approximately 160 hours of extra playtime before the need to recharge the case.

First earbuds charging case on Indiegogo with a digital battery capacity display!

Asivio One has elevated the charging case standards of true wireless earbuds by including a battery capacity digital display. You will always know the remaining battery life of your charging case which eliminates the guesswork about power availability.

Enjoy the convenience of having a charging case that doubles as a power bank. Just plug your mobile phone or other devices into the USB port to get a full charge. 

Whether you are listening to music, podcast, watching movies, playing video games or even just talking, Asivio One is the perfect companion thanks to the unwavering sound detail. Hear your music exactly how the composers intended it to be heard with these well balanced and fully optimized earbuds.

Internal spacing in true wireless earbuds are limited so a high level of expertise is required to bring out the complete range of acoustic sounds. 

How did we achieve superior sound?

We combined the best quality components product material with perfect optimization to create a clear industry leader, where nothing is average and all aspect are of the highest standards.

The rigid but lightweight custom 6mm graphene coated drivers were engineered to provide immersive, ultra realistic audio with deep rich bass and crisp and clear mids/highs.

Graphene is a thin sheet, two-dimensional layer material that is 100 times stronger than steel and thinner than paper. Applying a coat of graphene delivers strong and precise audio responses whenever the drivers vibrate to create sound, resulting in highly improved audio quality. 

Expert Audio Optimization

Our audio engineers spent numerous hours optimizing the sound with digital audio debugging technology, delivering a tuned to perfection hi-fi audio for natural CD quality sound signatures.

 Frequency Chart

Powered by Bluetooth 5.0 technology which is the latest and most advanced connection technology on the market today, Asivio One provides a virtually unbreakable wireless connection. This new version of Bluetooth has higher transmission speed, wider range and an increased data transmission capacity than previous versions.

Seamless and flawless integration with Asivio One creates:

Asivio One earbuds connects easily with Bluetooth enabled devices at a distance of up to 33 feet(10 meters).

How to connect:

You are now ready to enjoy your music, movies, talk time and more.

For initial pairing, select the ""Asivio One"" option in the Bluetooth setup of your mobile phone or other device settings.

The earbuds will automatically connect to your device once removed from the case for future use. Place earbuds back in the case and they are automatically disconnected from your device. 

Connect Asivio One premium wireless earbuds with any Bluetooth enabled devices:

Lifestyle activities such as jogging, gym training or even just walking should not be affected by worries about your earbud not working due to moisture.

Asivio One uses IPX7 waterproofing technology to provide the highest level of protection for your earbuds against sweat or liquid. IPX7 waterproof technology offer protection from complete water submersion up to 1 meter deep for at least 30 minutes. 

You can have peace of mind knowing that the quality of your earbuds will not be affected during that hardcore workout.

Asivio One earbuds were designed to never fall out your ears. After testing different styles and sizes on numerous size ears, we decided on the best shape and contour for the most secure and comfortable fit. Hear amazing audio using Asivio One without them falling out or loosening.

Just place in ear and twist slightly to lock for a secure and comfortable fit.

Every ear size is different so we included 3 set of silicone eartips (S-M-L) to ensure a custom fit that enhance your listening experience.

With a perfect fit and weighing just 4g you will forget that you are wearing earbuds.

Intelligent touch control makes it easier and more convenient to access the different functions of the earbuds. This technology allows you to take/reject calls, pause/forward/rewind music, adjust volume up/down and utilize Siri or Google Voice assistant.
Access to the touch control functions are literally at your fingertips. No more uncomfortable button to press, just a tap or two and you are totally in control of the options.
Enjoy comfortable and pressure free touch control functions.

The touch control feature allows you to automatically launch your favorite AI assistant with just a 2 seconds long touch.

Taking and making calls is an enjoyable experience using Asivio One. Ring tone and audio will be heard from both earbuds. Dual microphones for better noise reduction and echo cancellation when making calls ensures strong smooth voice features. You can also use a single earbud for talking while driving or in situations where you need to hear your surrounding. 

We use DSP noise reduction technology to block out external noise. Top quality HD mic in each earbud utilizes CVC6.0 technology, creating a high level of precision audio and clarity when making phone calls.

Caller ID Voice Assistant 

Know who is calling before you answer with caller ID voice assistant technology.  Asivio One earbuds will automatically read out the phone number of an incoming caller to you when playing music, watching movies or other activities. 

The design and performance was very important to us when creating these earbuds. We wanted to develop a product that performs at the highest level with a design that will stand out in a crowd. Our team created a masterpiece that provides the best condition for sound optimization while fitting comfortably and securely in your ear.

Asivio One extensive planning and development resulted in premium quality true wireless earbuds that are loaded with the most innovative features for an enjoyable experience.
What's In The Box
How To Order
• Select the perk option that suits you.

We thank you for supporting Asivio One true wireless earbuds campaign.

Our team consist of professionals in audio engineering and retail. We worked hard to develop a complete product that not only looks great but perform at the highest level. 

Sam Francis : Project Manager

V. McCurdy : Project Coordinator

Connect With Us!

Get the latest updates on Asivio earbuds.

column2:
Challenges

We have completed the prototype stage of this campaign and has fully functional Asivio One Earbuds that meets our standards. 
Our next step is manufacturing and we have already secured production partners. Once the successful campaign is completed we will start the mass production of the earbuds. 
We do not foresee any problems completing this project but as with all manufacturing there can be delays. 
We have a dedicated and experienced team ready to solve all unforeseen situations and we are confident in our ability to make this project a success. We want to thank you for supporting Asivio One earbuds.

column2: >INTRODUCING ROBOQI H2
column12:
>Shipping Started on August

Two incredible high quality tweeters can delivery deep bass, powerful and accurate sound. With 70-18k HZ frequency range, ROBOQI H2 can brings you dynamic sound quality and incredible listening experience.

To make ROBOQI H2 a perfect speaker, we mix modern technology into design, the touch panel, portable and easy. The touch-sensitive control on the top allows you to freely adjust and operate.

ROBOQI H2 Combines with wireless charging function, it is a Bluetooth speaker and also a wireless charger at the perfect price.

The way its various elements work together makes ROBOQI H2 unique and powerful.

column1:
This is the best bedside Alarm Clock to put you to sleep and wake you up with a brand new you!

ROBOQI H2 can be used as a radio, we thought it important to have an FM radio in case there was a power and data outage.

Built in 4000 Amh battery can ensure ROBOQI H2 Up to 12 hours play time and 72 hours standby.

The Screen' brightness can be adjusted for general purposes.

ROBOQI H2 supports BT(Bluetooth), AUX (auxiliary) and TF card inputs. Connect your Phone, TV or Laptop to steam music and voice wirelessly.

Advanced Bluetooth 4.2 technology and aptX support give you the most optimal sound for range capacity.

ROBOQI H2 not only goes well by your bedside, it also fits on your desktop, living room or kitchen!

ROBOQI H2 is built in high quality microphone, you can pickup phone calls when phone is connected with speaker via Bluetooth. The distance can be as long as 33 ft (10m).

ROBOQI H2 is designed as a simple and stylish shape. It can blend seamlessly into your room. The front face is a HD screen shows clock while can be used as a mirror.

Select your favorite or whatever fits your home color scheme, Space black and cloud white, we offer these two classic modern colors for you.

The clock can display 12/24 hrs mode. Never be annoyed at time display.

column12:
>

InvisibleTech was founded in California by HKUST graduated PH. D in 2016. The mission of us is to make intelligent technology invisible. InvisibleTech is formed by a team of dynamic, energetic and creative designers who are longing to create thoughtful, affordable and high-quality products, and bring it into daily life. We love crowdfunding our new projects because we can communicate with people and get feedback immediately from backers.

InvisibleTech successfully finished its 1st Kickstarter campaign named ROBOQI in 2018. We sent all the rewards to the backers as we promised and got excellent feedback from backers all over the world.

With our professional experience and great service, we make sure to bring ROBOQI H2 to the world. And now, we need your help to make this ultra Bluetooth speaker visible to your life. Support ROBOQI H2 today, and have great listening experience with it. Thanks.

For any questions please contact this email: hi@roboqi.com

For more news, updates and more please follow us on:
column13:
>

The product in the video is only a prototype for testing and filming. We keep close contact with our manufacturers because we want to be prepared for any possible production obstacle. We have completed all testing and development. Our selected producers are ready to collaborate with us under our conditions and schedule. Your donations will cover the product expenses, packaging, assembly and shipping. We are committed to delivering the product on time with the highest quality. We are taking into account all challenges and risks in terms of developing, quality control and production. Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures.  We have completed all testing and development. Our selected producers are ready to collaborate with us under our conditions and schedule. Your donations will cover the product expenses, packaging, assembly and shipping. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you in the loop. With your supports, we can bring ROBOQI H2 worldwide.

column2: >

column1: Meet the Loop Earbuds - built to provide you with the most advanced audio experience ever. Enjoy a truly wireless earbud featuring crystal clear, Hi-Fi sound with 2x the data transfer speed, 4x the connection range, and 8x the data transfer size thanks to Bluetooth 5 technology. The ergonomic design is proven to never fall out, no matter what activity you’re engaged in - running, biking, skateboarding, or even practising parkour. And with One-Touch controls and a built-in mic you’ll have a hands-free experience when taking calls.

Unlike the majority of wireless earbuds on the market which still use Bluetooth 4.2 to connect, transfer and receive data, the Loop use Bluetooth 5. Using this next-generation version allows the Loop to connect at 4x the range of BT 4.2 devices and transfer 8x more data at 2x the speed to deliver a seamless audio experience so you can enjoy your songs without any interruptions at the highest fidelity possible.
Built and tested to ensure a comfortable and secure fit, Loop is guaranteed to rest snuggly in your ear during any activity from biking to skateboarding to free-running.

Sweat it out in the gym or run through the rain without fear of damaging your earbuds thanks to Loop Earbuds IP54 waterproof rating, meaning you won’t have to worry about water, splash or dust damage occurring to your earbuds.
Built with a small battery that packs a big punch, you can enjoy 4 hours of continuous Hi-Fi audio everywhere on a single charge, or up to 12 with Loop’s portable charging case.
Loop arrives with a portable case that will recharge your earbuds wherever you are. Able to hold an additional 2 full charges for your earbuds to give you up to 12 hours of playback.
Pause, play, switch between songs, and answer calls with the press of a button. Loop is built with One-Button control giving you a simple way to control your audio experience.

With the built-in mic you can take incoming calls with your Loop earbuds by using it as a hands-free headset. With passive noise cancelling, one touch controls, and exceptional hi-fi sound quality, every conversation will be crystal clear.

Interested in writing or featuring the Loop Earbuds in one of your upcoming articles or reviews? You can find a copy of our press kit HERE or you can reach out to us to chat more at team@loopearbuds.com.
Yes, Loop is dustproof, splash proof and rainproof and has a IP54 rating.

What does Bluetooth 5 mean?
Bluetooth 5 technology allows for 8x more data to be transferred 2x faster, giving you a clear connection between your earbuds and your device. And further, it extends the range of connection by up to 4x.

Do Loop earbuds come with a built-in mic?
Yes, your Loop earbuds have a built-in mic so you can make and take calls hands-free.
How many countries do you ship to?
We are offering global shipping to all of our backers.
Can I change my address before you ship?
You can log into your Indiegogo account and change your address. If you encounter any issues contact us at support@loopearbuds.com.
How can I cancel my order? Will you be offering refunds?

You can log into your Indiegogo account and cancel your order, or if you encounter any issues contact us at support@loopearbuds.com. And we will be offering refunds while the campaign is active. After the campaign ends we will not be offering refunds.
Yes, you can claim as many perks as you’d like.

• In-depth HiBy R6 review from Bad Guy Good Audio Reviews
• HiBy R6 got 9.2 scores in Headfonics, click here to see the whole review
We have developed two body versions for HiBy R6. The aluminum alloy body version comes in 2 different colors (Black or Gray) for individual aesthetic appeal.
The stainless steel body uses the 316L stainless steel, the hardest grade of metal ever crafted into an electronic device chassis, providing class-leading aesthetics and durability simultaneously.
All the specs between two versions are the same except the body material.

1. HiBy R6

2. 2.5mm to 3.5mm Line Out Cable

3. USB Type C Cable

4. Screen Protector

5. SD Card Slot Needle

 

Here you see a 1kHz square wave signal sampled at 192kHz, being put out by a music app on android.  On usual Android devices this signal would be resampled and mixed into the fixed 48kHz system audio stream, producing a digital output to the DAC like the upper picture. Whereas on the R6, DTA architecture bypasses Android Sample Rate Conversion (SRC) for all apps, the signal would pass unaltered to the DAC like the lower picture.

So you see, in the past you could get a phone or player with a ""quad DAC"", or even a power-hungry 8-channel ES9018S meant for home audio.  But today for the first time, you will be sending the original signal to the DAC, to be converted into the original sound reaching your ears.  From almost all Android apps, not just the one or two hi-res compatible apps bundled with the player.

HiBy Music specializes in research, development and sales of high quality portable audio products.  With over 30 professional audio R&
column2:
D staff, over 10 years of history in the portable audio field, we have jointly developed dozens of portable digital audio players (DAPs), earphones, USB DACs, etc. With several well known portable audio brands.  Our own HiByMusic smartphone audio player app also has a user base of 500 thousand users spread over 90 countries around the globe and has won accolades from professional users regarding its audio quality.

It core staff (shown here) have varied and overlapping backgrounds, from wireless communications (Fanoble) to audio electronics (Rick, Libin) to software engineering (Jet) and psychoacoustics (Joe).  They hail from various parts of China as well as Australia and Hong Kong (Joe).  All have at least a decade of relevant industry experience*.  They take on the core tasks of the company from product research and conception (Fanoble, Rick) to design (Jet, Deng) to relations and service (Joe).

*Except Joe--he started working in audio in 2013 but has been an audiophile since birth
column4:
D capability over the whole audio reproduction chain, including key audio processing algorithms and ability to design its own FPGA-based audio processing chips.

With its base firmly planted in HiFi territory and at the same time boldly challenging established boundaries, HiBy Music’s mottos are “Make Music More Musical” and “Ease of Use is Not Optional.”  From button-based entry-level DAPs to touch-operated Android DAPs, we will keep bringing out the best products both in terms of operational fluidity and audio quality.

As an established hardware manufacturer, we chose Indiegogo for very specific reasons. Most importantly, it’s a listening tool. Launching a new product by crowdfunding makes progress inseparable from backer support. This makes us able to hear the feedbacks from backers, to deliver the device that you really want.

We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their HiBy R6 from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.  If you have any question regarding to the shipping, Please contact hello@hibymusic.net.Orders placed now will begin shipping in March 2018
*Actual ship dates may vary. we will keep you notified of your product ship date.We are offering the exclusive early birds discount and free shipping worldwide for all the Indiegogo early backers. 

Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the HiBy R6 community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
column16:
related=indiegogo%3AIndiegogo"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

1. What does the R6 run on?

The R6 is the first Chinese DAP to run on a Qualcomm Snapdragon--Snapdragon 425, comprising 4 ARM Cortex-A53 64 bit CPUs.  Together with 3GB of RAM, they provide a firm platform for decoding hi-res audio such as DSD256 and DXD384, and full compatibility with music apps on the Android market.

2. How does the R6’s power LED change color according to status?

It changes color according to playback status / sample rate of music being played as follows:

Not playing: pale blue

32-48kHz:    blue

88.2kHz-192kHz:  green

352.8-384kHz:    orange-yellow

DSD: white.

3. Can the R6 be connected to external USB DACs?

Yes.

4. Can the R6 be used AS an external USB DAC?

This function will be available with an upcoming firmware update.​

5. Can be R6 be used with 3rd party apps?

Yes, the R6 will come loaded with Google Play.

6. Will the R6 support the high quality aptX bluetooth audio protocol?

The aptX audio protocol will be added to the R6 via firmware update (est. End of December 2017)

7. How to take screenshots on the R6?

Hold the power and volume down buttons at the same time.

8. What is the USB data transfer speed of the R6?

Data wise the USB port on the R6 is USB 2.0, with actual speed depending on the number of and size of files.

9. Does the R6 support quick charge?  What kind of chargers are supported?

The R6 supports Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0, and regular USB DC 5V/2.5A or Qualcomm Quick Charge 1/2/3 chargers are recommended.

10. How long does the R6 take to full charge?

Approximately 70 minutes to 70% and 140 minutes to 100%, when a QC3.0 charger is used.

11. How large is the R6’s battery?  How long does it last in use?

The R6’s Li-poly battery is 4000mAh in capacity and the R6 is capable of continuous playback on battery through its SE 3.5mm headphone port for 12 hours or its balanced 2.5mm port for 7 hours (with screen off).

Without music playing, a R6 straight out of the factory can standby with power on for over a week
column17:
this changes significantly depending on what apps are installed afterwards.

12. How to access the R6’s system level sound options?  What options are available?

From the Android pulldown shade, select Audio Options. Available options are:

Lowpass filter mode: select from three available filter modes for the antialiasing filter after the DAC.

Multifunction output:  choose whether the 3.5mm LO/Coaxial digital port outputs an analog line signal or a digital S/PDIF signal.

Gain:   choose between low and high gain for the headphone ports.

Channel balance:  trim the left / right balance of the audio output to suit your earphones / ears.

Note that there may be many more app-level audio options available depending on the music app used. (The bundled HiBy Music app for example includes several)

13. How will firmware updates be supplied?  What updates are expected?​

Updates will be pushed over-the-air and files for manual download will be supplied as well.  Both update modes can be managed via the bundled firmware updating app.

As mentioned above, updates to enable using the R6 as a DAC and bluetooth aptX capability are to be expected in updates.  In addition, continual updates to the HiBy Music app are to be expected, and updates to Android 7.0 and/or 8.0 are possible.

14. Is it possible to change / improve the sound signature of the R6 via firmware updates?

Yes
column18:
hardware and software measures to improve the sound signature and/or open it up for modification are both being researched and expected to make it into the R6 firmware by the end of the year.

column1:
""Beauty is but skin deep...""

 

JTE aspires to produce high quality entertainment that challenges common perceptions and generates relevant conversations. As one of the shows selected for the 2016-2017 season, Ugly Lies the Bone is partially financed by our student theatre group
column2: however, in order to fully realize this significant story, we need your help! Your contribution to our production would fund both artistic and technical elements
column3:
but more specifically, it would allow this important story to reach its potential and for each student to fully realize their artistic vision.

 

We need your help!

column1: Your contribution to our campaign would directly fund crucial resources, such as:

Lights and sound: The main character in this production is a wounded female war veteran, Jess. Through the use of virtual reality video game therapy, she builds a breathtaking new world where she can escape her pain. As this play lives in her mind and body, we are working to supplement the virtual reality that Jess experiences with lights and sound, which will convey what she sees and feels.

Set construction and properties: The construction of detailed and durable pieces requires adequate transportation, building materials, and space. These pieces are critical to constructing Jess's memories and experiences.

Bandages, latex and special makeup: As we are living in Jess's world, we need to convey the severity of Jess's burns. In order to do so, we'll need large quantities of special FX makeup and prosthetics to create Jess's wounds.

Marketing campaigns: Our campaigns are meaningful and strategic, promoting relevant works of art to the greater Northwestern community and beyond.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you're unable to contribute at this time, please consider these alternative ways to support this production:
Share the link to this page via email, Facebook, Twitter, or other forms of social media!

Come see our show! Ugly Lies the Bone runs in Shanley Pavilion, October 12th-14th.

 

""Ferrentino reminds us that our internal landscape, like our pain, is ours alone."" - The New Yorker

We are incredibly honored to bring this production of Ugly Lies the Bone to fruition and would greatly appreciate any support you are able to give. For further information about the show or our board, please reach out to our producer, Cairo Dye, at cairodye2019@u.northwestern.edu ,
Thank you so much for your consideration in aiding our project!
The Ugly Lies the Bone Cast and Crew | The Jewish Theatre Ensemble

column4: >OUR IPADS HAVE SO MUCH TO SAY

column1: • We use them to watch our favorite movies or TV shows, jam to our favoritemusic, and pass time with incredible games
• But there is one problem faced by all of us who own an iPad... and that's its rear-facing speaker
NEVER CUP YOUR HANDS AROUND YOUR IPAD AGAIN

column2: >Sabine is an elegant device that attaches to your iPad and redirects the soundtoward the front
>Sabine is made from the best materials and manufacturing process available
>Sabine grips iPad using an innovative material allowing it to be removed and attached... over and over again

column1: FINALLY, SOUND AMPLIFICATION THAT LOOKS AS GOOD AS IT SOUNDS

column2: >Sabine is laser cut with exacting precision from high quality aluminum
>To finish Sabine, we chose clear anodization... the same process Apple uses to finish their products like iPad
>Sabine attaches without adhesive, it leaves no residue and if it loses its grip, simply wash it off and let it dry
>We went through multiple mock-ups, models, and prototypes
>Everything from the subtle bend at the end of Sabine (to match the curvature of iPad) to the radius of the four corners was scrutinized
>This attention to detail becomes apparent when you begin using your Sabine
>We wanted to eliminate the need to cup our hands around our iPads
>But do so in a way that complemented Apple's design language
>We succeeded by using superior materials and clean, elegant lines
>We are crazy about the way it turned out, and hope you are too

column1: FOUNDED BY ENGINEERS WITH A LOVE FOR APPLE PRODUCTS

column2: >We are highly trained nerds, I mean professionals
>So naturally, we studied material properties when deciding what Sabine should be made from
>What we found was impressive... aluminum is over 6 times better at reflecting sound than plastic

column1: THE HARD PART IS DONE, NOW WE JUST NEED YOUR HELP

column2: >iPad owners the world over are cupping their hands behind their tablets as we speak
>With your help, we can stop this madness once and for all
>The design is complete, suppliers lined up... we just need a little help from you!
>We are ready to place our next production order of Sabines but that's going to take a lot of cash... that's where you come in!

column6:
>Other Ways You Can Help

Don't own an iPad, or enjoy the excercise you get from constantly cupping your hand?

column1: • It'd be amazing if you could help spread the word on your social media networks
• Share our campaign with your favorite tech news site! Here are a few shortcuts:
","OUR IPADS HAVE SO MUCH TO SAY
We use them to watch our favorite movies or TV shows, jam to our favoritemusic, and pass time with incredible games
But there is one problem faced by all of us who own an iPad... and that's its rear-facing speaker
NEVER CUP YOUR HANDS AROUND YOUR IPAD AGAIN
Sabine is an elegant device that attaches to your iPad and redirects the soundtoward the front
Sabine is made from the best materials and manufacturing process available
Sabine grips iPad using an innovative material allowing it to be removed and attached... over and over again
FINALLY, SOUND AMPLIFICATION THAT LOOKS AS GOOD AS IT SOUNDS
Sabine is laser cut with exacting precision from high quality aluminum
To finish Sabine, we chose clear anodization... the same process Apple uses to finish their products like iPad
Sabine attaches without adhesive, it leaves no residue and if it loses its grip, simply wash it off and let it dry
We went through multiple mock-ups, models, and prototypes
Everything from the subtle bend at the end of Sabine (to match the curvature of iPad) to the radius of the four corners was scrutinized
This attention to detail becomes apparent when you begin using your Sabine
OUR GOAL WITH SABINE WAS SIMPLE
We wanted to eliminate the need to cup our hands around our iPads
But do so in a way that complemented Apple's design language
We succeeded by using superior materials and clean, elegant lines
We are crazy about the way it turned out, and hope you are too
FOUNDED BY ENGINEERS WITH A LOVE FOR APPLE PRODUCTS
We are highly trained nerds, I mean professionals
So naturally, we studied material properties when deciding what Sabine should be made from
What we found was impressive... aluminum is over 6 times better at reflecting sound than plastic
THE HARD PART IS DONE, NOW WE JUST NEED YOUR HELP
iPad owners the world over are cupping their hands behind their tablets as we speak
With your help, we can stop this madness once and for all
The design is complete, suppliers lined up... we just need a little help from you!
We are ready to place our next production order of Sabines but that's going to take a lot of cash... that's where you come in!

No worries, you can still help!
It'd be amazing if you could help spread the word on your social media networks
Share our campaign with your favorite tech news site!  Here are a few shortcuts:
Don't forget the Indiegogo share tools!",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

Ultimate Comfort

Traditional headphones are painful because they create pressure and generate heat. They’re also subtractive, in that they take you out of your environment, which makes communication difficult and awkward.

column1: VIE SHAIR’s 3D molded air frame design floats the speaker just off your ear, and is extremely comfortable to wear. You can wear it with less stress and no sweat. It also allows you to interact with your environment while listening to your audio. When you want privacy, the open air frame easily converts to a closed air frame.

VIE SHAIR's sound creates totally new sound listening experience. The structure of VIE SHAIR floats the flat  directional speaker off of your ear. The amplifier and bigger low impedance is almost like an external audio system, so powerful and expressive enough to travel farther distance, It results the listening experience is so natural and powerful. You will find a total new aspect of your favorite music.

Open Air Sound

VIE SHAIR's geometric open air frame creates natural and refreshing listening experience. It sounds almost like listening to music coming from the big sound system in open air live environment

Studio Sound

You can experience VIE SHAIR's most powerful sounds with the closed air frame. The sound,  powerful enough to travel distance in open air environment results extremely powerful bass, and rich expression of mid/high range in closed air environment. It sounds like listening to music in perfectly designed audio room.
VIE is Bluetooth enabled. Its core audio technology comes from Yamaha’s advanced MACH-5 codec, and the large, directional flat speakers provide superior sound quality.
""No more pinched ears or sweaty lobes — just a great pair of ‘phones you can rock for hours, discomfort-free!"" - Digital Trends

""The Vie Shair wireless headphones use an ""open air"" design that cups around your ear without strongly pressing against it, while still promising strong sound quality and minimal audio leakage for anyone around you."" - Stuff
""Comfort-wise, the headphones delivered on Vie's promise, and feel oddly refreshing to wear compared to my regular over-ear headphones I have on all day at work."" - Mashable
""The Vie Shair headphones feature a unique air frame that relieves pressure on the ears while permitting more environmental awareness."" - Gizmag
""The no-pinch headphones we’ve been waiting for!"" - ChipChick

VIE’s open air frame makes minimal skin contact and permits airflow, making them comfortable and sweat-free, even while exercising. You’ll stay in touch with your surroundings, and will notice when people approach or want to talk with you. And, without removing your headphones or adjusting your audio, you can carry on a normal conversation.
For times when you want to be undisturbed or eliminate unwanted noise, you can swap out the open air frame for the closed air frame. Instant concentration. Instant privacy. Instant peace and quiet.

VIE SHAIR fits well when wearing eyeglasses or sunglasses. As glass-wearers ourselves, we have found that VIE is more comfortable than typical over-the-ear headphones on the market (which squash your ear with the frame of the glasses). VIE’s open and closed air frames apply minimal pressure. Also, our closed airframe has a soft cushion around its edges. This prevents slippage against the arms of your glasses, and minimizes impact on the passive noise cancellation.

Enjoy open air, pain-free sound while watching TV or gaming (comfortably!) for hours on end, without disturbing others around you. Hear when your family calls, even with your headphones on. Share video or game audio with your friends using the broadcast function. Wirelessly hook up to audio gadgets, or use the 3.5mm audio input.

Comfortably listen to your favorite tunes or podcast for extended periods of time, without causing ear fatigue. Wear the open air frame to ensure you never miss a call from your boss. Or, switch to the closed air frame for reduced ambient noise and improved concentration.

Say goodbye to ill-fitting earbuds and sweaty headphones. VIE is a great solution for active living. The open air frame reduces stress with limited skin contact and lets air circulate freely. Share music and get in tune with a workout buddy. VIE is a safer headphone, because you can hear the outside world while you’re running, biking or exercising. The LED lights add extra visibility for night runs.

Enjoy a live DJ set in a unique atmosphere. Pump up the bass with the 3-band equalizer. Set the volume to your personal comfort level, and still be able to start a conversation with that interesting person across the floor. Interact with a venue full of people – with music and lights in perfect harmon

And more…

VIE SHAIR creates new ways to listen to and share your audio. Waiting for your boarding call? Want your children to hear when you call for dinner? Performing a home gig? Taking an ambient yoga session? The ways VIE can fit into your lifestyle are endless.
Our founder, Yazz, is a jazz drummer. He recommends VIE SHAIR for musicians, and explains why in this video:

>Closed air frame sounds like listening music in designed audio room.

>You can experience VIE SHAIR's most powerful sounds with the closed air frame. The sound,  powerful enough to travel distance in open air environment results extremely powerful bass, and rich expression of mid/high range in closed air environment. It sounds like listening to music in perfectly designed audio room.

column1: Traditional headphones use dynamic speakers, which vibrate a cone or dome diaphragm to create sound waves. The cone or dome is glued on the edges and moved by passing a current through a coil of wires to repel magnets in the speaker. This motion creates sound waves. VIE uses planar magnetic speakers. In these speakers, instead of having a separate diaphragm and electric coil to move the diaphragm, the whole diaphragm is made of a printed circuit on a thin film, suspended in a uniform magnetic field. When electricity is passed through the film, the entire film vibrates in the magnetic field to create sound waves. This provides dramatic improvements over traditional dynamic speakers.

column3: >— Because dynamic speakers glue the diaphragm, the diaphragm can only partially move around the edges, which distorts the sound (especially at higher tones or volumes). Planar magnetic speakers deliver 100% vibration across the entire film, providing a fuller sound.
>— The thin film diaphragm responds more quickly to changes in the audio. This makes for more life-like sound for things with a fast start or finish, like fingers snapping or a snare drum hit.
>— The printed circuits in a planar magnetic speaker requires less energy to drive than the wire coils in a dynamic speaker, which helps your battery last longer.
>— Dynamic speakers wear down over time, due to the heavier diaphragm and glue which ages. Planar magnetic speakers keep the same beautiful sound profile over time.

column1: Traditional dynamic over-ear speakers usually have drivers in the 30-53mm range, because larger sizes cause the surface of the diaphragm to physically change shape at high frequencies and produce distortions. VIE’s 58mm planar magnetic drivers are able to use 100% of a larger driver surface without distortion thanks to the planar design, which keeps its shape out to the very edge of the driver. This larger speaker increases the quality of the sound the headphones deliver and reduces audio leakage, so that only you can hear your audio.
VIE deploys Yamaha’s high spec MACH-5 audio module. MACH-5 is one of Yamaha’s most advanced codecs and provides high quality audio and many of the headphone’s unique functions.

column2: >Music Enhancer (3-band Equalizer, Harmonic Enhancer, 2-5-2 surroundings, Multi-band Dynamic Range Compression)

column1: To make sure you hear your music the way you want to, VIE has an on-board 3-band equalizer that works with all your music apps. It allows you to customize the sound to your own personal taste, or opt for one of the preset profiles including hip hop, rock, dance and jazz.

VIE has more than just audio – you can match your headphones to your mood or music for a truly immersive experience! The built-in LEDs glow softly around the perimeter of the speaker module and can be set to one of five different colors (red, blue, yellow, green or white).

Want to share in the experience? Wirelessly broadcast audio from your headphones to other VIE SHAIR headphones. By setting the “on air” mode, you can broadcast to an unlimited number of people. And when you want to join into the broadcasters audio, just set your headphones to receive.

column2: >Wireless digital audio transmission in 2.4GHz ISM band
>Optional app control for transmitting and receiving
>Automatic adaptive frequency mechanism selects best available frequency

column1: The VIE crew is a team of music and tech lovers with a passion for music and innovation. We believe in simplicity, integrity, and love. We live these core values every day, which is evident in our design skills and product development.

Our vision is to become the top brand for fostering happy, music-filled lifestyles. On our journey so far, we’ve gained support from powerful global partners, such as Yamaha and Stratasys, who have generously offered to contribute resources to ensure we meet our Kickstarter commitments.

We will ship worldwide. Our rates vary based on your location and the quantity of VIE headphones you are ordering. Please note that shipping to any country outside of United States, Canada, United Kingdom, European Union, and Japan may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In the event of a cancellation, we’ll refund your pledge. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes charged by the the authorities in your country which will be covered at your expense when receiving the shipment.

We have finalized our product design, and it’s ready for mass production. We have a preliminary agreement with our partner and manufacturer YAMAHA who has many years of experience creating high spec audio equipment. That said, there is always the small chance that unexpected changes or issues may arise during execution, resulting in delays or cancellation. In the event of cancellation, we’ll refund your pledge.
Delays or cancellation may arise from: A change in specifications (requested by the operator), or execution by the factory which causes a significant cost increase
column2: Feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations
column3: The event of a natural disaster, such as an earthquake or tsunami.

Traditional headphones use dynamic speakers, which vibrate a cone or dome diaphragm to create sound waves. The cone or dome is glued on the edges and moved by passing a current through a coil of wires to repel magnets in the speaker. This motion creates sound waves. VIE uses planar magnetic speakers. In these speakers, instead of having a separate diaphragm and electric coil to move the diaphragm, the whole diaphragm is made of a printed circuit on a thin film, suspended in a uniform magnetic field. When electricity is passed through the film, the entire film vibrates in the magnetic field to create sound waves. This provides dramatic improvements over traditional dynamic speakers.

Whole sound — Because dynamic speakers glue the diaphragm, the diaphragm can only partially move around the edges, which distorts the sound (especially at higher tones or volumes). Planar magnetic speakers deliver 100% vibration across the entire film, providing a fuller sound.

Crisp and accurate — The thin film diaphragm responds more quickly to changes in the audio. This makes for more life-like sound for things with a fast start or finish, like fingers snapping or a snare drum hit.
Lower power use — The printed circuits in a planar magnetic speaker requires less energy to drive than the wire coils in a dynamic speaker, which helps your battery last longer.
Durable — Dynamic speakers wear down over time, due to the heavier diaphragm and glue which ages. Planar magnetic speakers keep the same beautiful sound profile over time.

Traditional dynamic over-ear speakers usually have drivers in the 30-53mm range, because larger sizes cause the surface of the diaphragm to physically change shape at high frequencies and produce distortions. VIE’s 58mm planar magnetic drivers are able to use 100% of a larger driver surface without distortion thanks to the planar design, which keeps its shape out to the very edge of the driver. This larger speaker increases the quality of the sound the headphones deliver and reduces audio leakage, so that only you can hear your audio.
VIE deploys Yamaha’s high spec MACH-5 audio module. MACH-5 is one of Yamaha’s most advanced codecs and provides high quality audio and many of the headphone’s unique functions.
Hi-Fi Audio (THD+N 0.008%), Ultra Low Noise HP
Music Enhancer (3-band Equalizer, Harmonic Enhancer, 2-5-2 surroundings, Multi-band Dynamic Range Compression)

To make sure you hear your music the way you want to, VIE has an on-board 3-band equalizer that works with all your music apps. It allows you to customize the sound to your own personal taste, or opt for one of the preset profiles including hip hop, rock, dance and jazz.

VIE has more than just audio – you can match your headphones to your mood or music for a truly immersive experience! The built-in LEDs glow softly around the perimeter of the speaker module and can be set to one of five different colors (red, blue, yellow, green or white).

Want to share in the experience? Wirelessly broadcast audio from your headphones to other VIE SHAIR headphones. By setting the “on air” mode, you can broadcast to an unlimited number of people. And when you want to join into the broadcasters audio, just set your headphones to receive.
Wireless digital audio transmission in 2.4GHz ISM band
TX/RX switch for transmitting and receiving
Optional app control for transmitting and receiving
Automatic adaptive frequency mechanism selects best available frequency

column26: >The ‘World’s hottest math teacher’ who has a PhD in engineering from UCL, models for Armani and trains as a fitness pro- uses noise cancelling earphones wherever he goes- loves Thunder.
column30: schema=youtube"" width=""620"">

column1: Almost all earphones on the market with active noise cancellation have to be charged regularly. However, Thunder uses the iPhone’s Lightning connector to draw the power for its active noise cancellation directly from your iPhone. This means you can enjoy active noise cancellation all day long without the hassle of batteries or chargers!

Quiet mode completely blocks out all ambient noise, allowing you to listen to your music and nothing but your music. Despite the powerful noise cancellation, in this mode Thunder only consumes 1% of your iPhone’s battery per hour, meaning you can kick back and relax and not worry about battery levels.
column9:
/>

Aware mode allows a little ambient noise into your ears, enabling you to remain aware of what’s happening around you. This gives you a superior listening experience but still ensures you’ll still stay safe in traffic and avoid missing out on transport announcements.

column5: > Everyone’s listening habits differ, but traditional earphones are tuned with a “one-sound-fits-all”approach. Thunder revolutionizes your listening
column8: >experience by adapting itself to your ears and your style.

column2: >With its complementary app, Thunder tests your hearing in a way similar to a vision test. Listen and answer if you can hear a series of notes played at different frequencies and volumes. Once Thunder obtains your unique hearing signature, the uHear function performs its magic by calibrating Thunder’s sound to you. If your ears can hear it, Thunder will play it!

>Thunder’s autoTune function further enhances your listening experience by adapting itself to your playlists. Whether you like bass-thumping club anthems or intimate acoustic singer-songwriter ballads, raucous free jazz trios or reserved string quartets, autoTune listens to your songs to create a curated sound perfect for your playlist.

>And if you want to dive in and tune your earphones like a professional acoustic engineer, Thunder’s uTune feature lets you do that too. With adjustable EQ, sound field and surround sound, Thunder has the most comprehensive tuning options available on any earphones, giving you total control.
>Regardless of your level of expertise, Thunder gives you a personalized sound that’s yours and yours alone.
>Original audio from a youtube video of Justin Timblake's Can't Stop the Feeling

column1: Due to the inherent limitations of the iPhone’s audio processor, iPhone earphones have always struggled to produce a true high fidelity sound. Thunder solves this problem for good.

column2: >Powered by a genuinely hi-fi audio chip and the iPhone’s Lightning connector, Thunder gives every iPhone user the chance to experience lossless sound for the first time! Prepare to hear everything.

column1: Best of all, if you are considering an upgrade to an iPhone 6s Plus or the upcoming iPhone 7, Thunder’s use of the Lightning connector ensures that you will continue to be able to enjoy the best quality sound.

• 1 pair of Thunder Earphones
• 1 earphones cushion kit (that has 3 pairs of high-performance silicone tips and 3 pairs of premium memory foam tips sizing from small, medium to large respectively)
•1 durable silicone carrying pouch
And you have a choice between chrome silver and chrome black.

column2: />

>We started Thunder because we see the future of a whole new way of listening that utilise the full potential of your existing smart phone and turn it into a listening experience that you've never had before.

column3: >After almost a year of designing, developing, prototyping, tuning and testing, we are proud to finally present Thunder to you all.
>The next step would be to get ready for mass production. And that is why we need your lovely support to make it happen and put it into the hands of you and many more.
/>

column1: Like any hardware project, there are risks and challenges associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics.

BeSound is based in Shenzhen, the centre of world electronics. Our team has successfully delivered thousands of audio products to market. We understand the unique challenges of audio hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise.
Thunder will be built by our top-tier, MFi certified manufacturing partner.

column2: >1. How good is the noise cancellation?

>At 100 Hz(typical noise frequency range of aircrafts ), on average, Thunder reduces the noise by 32dB (from 85 dB to 53dB) , equivalent of 12.5 times reduction  of  the original noise in terms of sound pressure.
At 200 Hz (typical noise frequency range of trucks), Thunder achieves 41 dB noise reduction.
At 500 Hz, 1000 Hz and 3000Hz, Thunder is measuring at 31dB, 22dB and 43dB.
>2. Is it compatible with all iPhone devices?

>Thunder is compatible with all iOS devices having lightning connector, including:
·iPhone 7 Plus/ 7/ SE/ 6S/ 6S Plus/ 6 Plus/ 6/ 5S/ 5C/ 5.
·iPad 4/ Air/ Air 2/ Pro/ Mini/ Mini 3/ Mini 4
·iPod Touch 5/ iPod Touch 6/ iPod Nano

column1: 3. What if I’m an android user?

column2: >The core technology in Thunder is fully compatible with Android and the type-C connector. And we’d love to bring the Thunder experience to all android users! However to be able to do so, we will have to open a whole new production line for type-c connector. And that cost can only be covered until we hit a much higher goal. Please help us to bring the Thunder experience to all android users!
>4. How can I get in touch with the Thunder Team?

column1: The easiest way is by clicking the ‘Ask a question’ button right beneath the campaign title on this page. You can also post your comment once you’ve made a contribution. If you prefer to email,
thebesound@gmail.comis where to find us. Lastly, you can always chat through Facebook Message at www.facebook.com/besound.cn
We will do our best to get back to you asap wherever you are!

column2: >5. What colors can I choose from?

>Thunder is now available in chrome black and chrome silver. More colors and surface finishing choices can be made if there is high demand from our backer community. We are more than thrilled to be able to build Thunder together with you!
>6. Do we offer warranty and how long is it?
>Yes, we offer an exclusive 6-month warranty to all backers that covers every electronic component in Thunder.
>7. Which countries do we ship to?
>8. When can I get my pair of Thunder?
>Shipping will start after the Chinese New Year season which is February of the coming year. We ship by order so our earliest backers will get the Thunder experience the earliest!
>The package will include 1 pair of Thunder Earphones, 1 earphones cushion kit and 1 durable carrying pouch. Please let us know if you have any suggestion on making Thunder better! Cheers!

column1: ","** NOTICE ON THUNDER FIT**AS PER EXPLAINED IN THE UPDATE (29/11/2016) THUNDER FIT IS NO LONGER AN OPTION.UP TILL NOW WE OFFERED A FULL REFUND TO ALL OUR BACKERS WHICH INCLUDED ALL THE COMMISSIONS TAKEN BY INDIEGOGO, BANKS AND PAYPAL TO SHOW OUR GRATITUDE. HOWEVER FOR ANY MISTAKEN PURCHASE ON THUNDER FIT FROM NOW ONWARDS, WE WILL EXCLUDE THE COMMISSIONS FEES (10%) AND REFUND YOU THE REST (WHICH IS THE AMOUNT THAT WE ACTUALLY RECEIVE)  ( https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles... ) THANKS FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING.THUNDER TEAM19/12/2016 ​          The ‘World’s hottest math teacher’ who has a PhD in engineering from UCL, models for Armani and trains as a fitness pro- uses noise cancelling earphones wherever he goes- loves Thunder.

Almost all earphones on the market with active noise cancellation have to be charged regularly. However, Thunder uses the iPhone’s Lightning connector to draw the power for its active noise cancellation directly from your iPhone. This means you can enjoy active noise cancellation all day long without the hassle of batteries or chargers!

Quiet mode completely blocks out all ambient noise, allowing you to listen to your music and nothing but your music. Despite the powerful noise cancellation, in this mode Thunder only consumes 1% of your iPhone’s battery per hour, meaning you can kick back and relax and not worry about battery levels.Aware mode allows a little ambient noise into your ears, enabling you to remain aware of what’s happening around you. This gives you a superior listening experience but still ensures you’ll still stay safe in traffic and avoid missing out on transport announcements.

Everyone’s listening habits differ, but traditional earphones are tuned with a “one-sound-fits-all”approach. Thunder revolutionizes your listening  experience by adapting itself to your ears and your style.

With its complementary app, Thunder tests your hearing in a way similar to a vision test. Listen and answer if you can hear a series of notes played at different frequencies and volumes. Once Thunder obtains your unique hearing signature, the uHear function performs its magic by calibrating Thunder’s sound to you. If your ears can hear it, Thunder will play it!

Thunder’s autoTune function further enhances your listening experience by adapting itself to your playlists. Whether you like bass-thumping club anthems or intimate acoustic singer-songwriter ballads, raucous free jazz trios or reserved string quartets, autoTune listens to your songs to create a curated sound perfect for your playlist.

And if you want to dive in and tune your earphones like a professional acoustic engineer, Thunder’s uTune feature lets you do that too. With adjustable EQ, sound field and surround sound, Thunder has the most comprehensive tuning options available on any earphones, giving you total control.
Regardless of your level of expertise, Thunder gives you a personalized sound that’s yours and yours alone.
Original audio from a youtube video of Justin Timblake's Can't Stop the Feeling
Due to the inherent limitations of the iPhone’s audio processor, iPhone earphones have always struggled to produce a true high fidelity sound. Thunder solves this problem for good.
Powered by a genuinely hi-fi audio chip and the iPhone’s Lightning connector, Thunder gives every iPhone user the chance to experience lossless sound for the first time! Prepare to hear everything.

Best of all, if you are considering an upgrade to an iPhone 6s Plus or the upcoming iPhone 7, Thunder’s use of the Lightning connector ensures that you will continue to be able to enjoy the best quality sound.

• 1 pair of Thunder Earphones• 1 earphones cushion kit (that has 3 pairs of high-performance silicone tips and 3 pairs of premium memory foam tips sizing from small, medium to large respectively)•1 durable silicone carrying pouch
And you have a choice between chrome silver and chrome black.

We started Thunder because we see the future of a whole new way of listening that utilise the full potential of your existing smart phone and turn it into a listening experience that you've never had before.
After almost a year of designing, developing, prototyping, tuning and testing, we are proud to finally present Thunder to you all.
The next step would be to get ready for mass production. And that is why we need your lovely support to make it happen and put it into the hands of you and many more.
Like any hardware project, there are risks and challenges associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics.

BeSound is based in Shenzhen, the centre of world electronics. Our team has successfully delivered thousands of audio products to market. We understand the unique challenges of audio hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise.
Thunder will be built by our top-tier, MFi certified manufacturing partner.
1. How good is the noise cancellation?

At 100 Hz(typical noise frequency range of aircrafts ), on average, Thunder reduces the noise by 32dB (from 85 dB to 53dB) , equivalent of 12.5 times reduction  of  the original noise in terms of sound pressure.At 200 Hz (typical noise frequency range of trucks), Thunder achieves 41 dB noise reduction.At 500 Hz, 1000 Hz and 3000Hz, Thunder is measuring at 31dB, 22dB and 43dB.
2. Is it compatible with all iPhone devices?

Thunder is compatible with all iOS devices having lightning connector, including:·iPhone 7 Plus/ 7/ SE/ 6S/ 6S Plus/ 6 Plus/ 6/ 5S/ 5C/ 5.·iPad 4/ Air/ Air 2/ Pro/ Mini/ Mini 3/ Mini 4·iPod Touch 5/ iPod Touch 6/ iPod Nano
3. What if I’m an android user?

The core technology in Thunder is fully compatible with Android and the type-C connector. And we’d love to bring the Thunder experience to all android users! However to be able to do so, we will have to open a whole new production line for type-c connector. And that cost can only be covered until we hit a much higher goal. Please help us to bring the Thunder experience to all android users!
4. How can I get in touch with the Thunder Team?
The easiest way is by clicking the ‘Ask a question’ button right beneath the campaign title on this page. You can also post your comment once you’ve made a contribution. If you prefer to email,
thebesound@gmail.comis where to find us. Lastly, you can always chat through Facebook Message at www.facebook.com/besound.cn
We will do our best to get back to you asap wherever you are!
5. What colors can I choose from?

Thunder is now available in chrome black and chrome silver. More colors and surface finishing choices can be made if there is high demand from our backer community. We are more than thrilled to be able to build Thunder together with you!
6. Do we offer warranty and how long is it?
Yes, we offer an exclusive 6-month warranty to all backers that covers every electronic component in Thunder.
7. Which countries do we ship to?
Wherever you are in the world!
8. When can I get my pair of Thunder?
Shipping will start after the Chinese New Year season which is February of the coming year. We ship by order so our earliest backers will get the Thunder experience the earliest!

The package will include 1 pair of Thunder Earphones, 1 earphones cushion kit and 1 durable carrying pouch. Please let us know if you have any suggestion on making Thunder better! Cheers!",62.0,6,"1 Campaign
It is much more than a speaker
You deserve to get the best quality sound wherever you are
With BBX1 you will be able to enjoy a fabulous and powerful hifi sound and impressive bass effects for such a small portable device. all you need is a wifi connection.
All the people who tested it were very impressed by the sound quality and power delivered
With the class D embedded amplifier that can reach up to 600 Watts, BBX1 is a unique portable device that provides amazing bass
You deserve to watch movies with the best quality sound wherever you are
With BBX1, you can for instance, use it as a video streamer and watch your movies on your favorite VOD stream provider. You can watch internet TV channels with your favorite internet provider...
BBX1 has been designed to allow you to connect it with a HDMI cable to any input screen or video projector. You can use BBX1 as a great media-center
You deserve to connect with your friends with the best quality sound wherever you are

Have you ever lacked good quality sound during videoconference or audioconference with your laptop ? With BBX1, you and your customers will appreciate the significant quality sound improvement. Just plug in a compatible webcam and start for instance your skype application.
You deserve to play games with the best quality sound wherever you are

Download games on the android platform and play great arcade games* with a compatible USB joystick(ex:PS4) or with the touch screen: PAC-MAN, Frozen Front, space invaders classic, Absolute RC simulator, Angry Birds Go, Racing Fever, XPlane flight simulator...

*We have already tested some applications here mentionned, there might be some android applications that you wish which could possibly not work on BBX1. Be also aware that all android games do not  always work with a joystick (the ones we tested upon do)
Make of BBX1 the use you best like
BBX1 has been developped on android platform, hence possibilities of using android applications will be almost infinite : music player, music streamer, media center, domotics gatway...
Because we are all different, we have imagined this product with the possibility for you  to add and organize your android applications the way you like.
What is your benefit and the purpose in supporting BBX1 project
As a thank you to our backers for helping BBX1 project, we’re offering a limited number of discounted prototypes development samples rewards.

Since these are development samples, there might be some imperfections that could occure, the purpose of this indiegogo initiative is to get constructive feedbacks, suggestions so that we can possibly make improvements and corrections.
As Backer receiving a BBX1 prototype sample, you will have the pleasure to:
• Use it as a usual wireless speaker and send your music from your PC or smart phone... (via iTune, Spotify)
• Listen to music on your favourite streaming platform, even without phone : Spotify, Deezer, Qobuzz
• Watch movies from their streaming provider, no need of phone : Netflix, Youtube, Vimeo
• Videoconference with your friends, no need of phone: skype
• Play great arcade games* with a compatible usb joystick(ex:PS4) : PAC-MAN, Frozen Front, space invaders classic, Absolute RC simulator, Angry Birds Go, Racing Fever, XPlane flight simulator...
• Use it as a central board for your domotics wifi plugs
J+V is a French startup based in  based in Paris (France). The brand is the acronym for Jérôme Gallix and Vincent Raveau

Jérôme has a strong experience in Automotive techniques applied for design, competition and innovation. This experience added to his natural curiosity and innovative character provide him a wide and pragmatic knowledge in material and techniques applied to excellence

Vincent has spent more than 25 years of his professionnal life in an innovative atmosphere and has managed very large teams from research to industrial applications. He is highly passionate about new technologies.
Both are music lovers and wanted to developp a device able evolve in usage and to provide a high quality hifi sound for streamed music and video applications.

We expect to fulfill all backers orders by end of 2018. However, it's possible that our production schedule may shift based on the number of orders we receive. We believe delivery should take 6 months to 9 months max.

J+V is a team of engineers who have managed and produced in the industry millions of devices solutions over many decades. While we cannot confirm final production dates until our campaign ends, we have the knowledge and connections to execute the BBX1 quickly, with the highest quality.
You can find general terms and conditions on the following link : General Terms and Conditions of fundings.
Be also aware that all fundings shown here are without VAT ( sans la T.V.A for french people)

column8:
/>With the help of our device, you will always and everywhere get the convenience you need.

Any plastic bottle becomes a convenient tool for washing hands, vegetables and fruits in nature.

You can see by clicking on the link

column1: As you could see in the video, to make a nice melody you don't need any special knowledge or to understand the notes. You can play with your bare fingers. But, it is much easier to play with our unique drumsticks. I've got to say that it is quite difficult to play with bare fingers for the beginners. Even I couldn't do it. It's about the right vibrations which can not be interrupted when hitting the tongues with your fingers. You must not interrupt (with your finger). That's why I recommend you not to take the risk, and get our drumsticks for beginners.

The Spolum Guide is a device that will help you get started with the drum and teach you some familiar tunes or even some new ones. I have to admit that you can get started very easily even without the Guide. However I felt that it would've helped many people including myself, so I designed and created it. It's a ten-LED system where every tongue has its own light to indicate which petal to hit sequentially to create a melody. It's like a relaxation game, which improves your and your child's motoric activity and develops an exquisite ear for music. All the lights, electronics, and a rechargeable battery are hidden under a special lid. The device can be connected to your smartphone via Bluetooth technology. You can choose your melody and easily control the tempo.

We tried many different coatings and finally, we got inspired by the coating of guns. We discovered that the “bluing” way is the best. It perfectly protects the instrument and it doesn't distort the sound even after quenching. For bluing, we use high-quality exotic oils, which give the drum a beautiful color, shine, and aroma. In this way, the drum won't oxidize. Now this coating is highly modified and the drum is finally covered with resistant varnish. It's still important to take care of the drum with a soft cloth and oil every now and then. It's just doing the drum well. We coat our drums on the inside and the outside surface, and we use high quality precious oil.
New Spolum Drum Painting. Now we use high quality painting. After increasing the height of The Spolum Drum, the sound became longer and this allowed us to paint the instrument with professional powder coating. It's cool that now you can also paint it yourself with patterns, colors, and easily re-varnish it afterwards, sound resonance duration with additional coverage preserved. It fits children use, and areas with unstable humidity.

With the Spolum Drum Art pack, you will get a pair of Spolum Drumsticks. You get a Custom Engraved ART Edition of the Spolum Drum. Each Spolum Drum ART is artistically decorated and engraving is done on the main surface with metal etching technology afterwards. With this technology, each ART Edition Drum gets a unique picture. We have added one more step producing your Spolum Drums! Now they are even more resistant to external factors, and also have a beautiful highlighted pattern! The coating is perfected with resistant varnish now but still Spolum Drum Art edition needs some care with oil after use.

With the Drum Spiral Shell pack you will get a pair of Spolum Drumsticks. The instrument has a spiral which resembles a Golden Section or a shell, and gives the drum a unique look. The tone is short, so you can play it fast. We took into account your wishes and improved the coating, Spolum Drum SPIRAL SHELL is finally covered with resistant varnish now. The coating requires care, it needs to be cleaned with oil after the use. You’ll get a perfectly made instrument with all the tools you’ll need for playing well.

With the Spolum Drum Painted  pack you will get a pair of Spolum Drumsticks. This is the last model we have designed. After lots of your feedbacks, tests and investigations of metal, we really tried to enhance and lengthen the sound. The drum turned out to be very special. Now it’s a perfect instrument for meditation, relaxation and healing sessions. The note sound is very long and is as close as possible to the Tibetan singing bowl. You need to play it slowly listening to the sounds how they merge with each other. It’s easy to play with your fingers because of very sensitive petals. You need Drumsticks to play on the street or in a large room, because of the very strong vibrations and fusion of notes. It is good enough for children, since the coating on the drum is a resistant powder coating, which does not require additional care. It is also possible to paint the Drum by yourself with any patterns, sound resonance duration with additional coverage is very high. It is an ideal choice for playing outdoors and for severe operating conditions.
We believe, that anyone can make music and that most of people have talent, which they don't even know about.  I have not met a person who was not able to play the Spolum Drum.
We also hope that this instrument will improve the environment of your home, your environment and eventually the whole world. Our belief is based on the knowledge of many religions
column2: bells in churches, Tibetan bowls, shaman drums, etc.

column1: It is handmade of high quality 3 mm thick steel sheet and weighs 10 pounds (4.5 kg), Spolum Drum plays with no additional electronic devices and works with vibration you make when hitting the steel tongues which then reproduce and amplify the sound around the spherical shape of the drum inside, which returns the beautiful sound back to the outside of your surroundings. All Spolum Drums are tuned by a professional musical technician to specific notes, but you can change the tone yourself by moving our unique magnets underneath the tongues. If you have an opportunity to compare the quality of our instruments with other manufacturers, you will see a substantial difference.

You can play it with your fingers, but that requires some experience. However, if you get our special drumsticks, you will hear the beautiful sound with the first hit. You don't need to have any knowledge about playing a muscial instrument
column2: you just need to hit it a few times and then it will goes on and on by itself. From my own experience, I can tell that everyone from your family will play in a completely different style. Their melodies will sound like you would have never expected them to sound - it always surprises everyone. Every time you will hear someone playing, you will say “wow”, because even a person who plays for the first time can surprise you.

column1: That is actually good because you won't know how to do it, you will do it naturally without prejudice and you will create your own, unique music, which will be the best one in the world for you. When you get such feeling, believe me, people around you will love your music as well. And if you're not doing well or you don't like the melodies you make, just get the Guide. The Guide will help you to learn the basics, and it will teach you some familiar melodies. If you don't manage to catch up with the Guide, you can lower the tempo of the Guide. At that moment, when you have played the melody for the 20th time, you will develop a visual memory of how it goes, and you will be familiar with many melody patterns. It's like a game, through which you create a beautiful music.

Yes. If you ask any doctor, you will hear that your psychological health is very important if not the most important part of your overall health condition. If you have ever tried and enjoyed meditation, this instrument is perfect for you. However, if you don't like meditation, you can just place the drum on your lap, and when playing, you will certainly enjoy its pleasant strong vibrations going through your body. And if you put the Spolum Drum on someone else’s back, and you start slowly drumming with one hand, he will start to feel very sensational and pleasant vibrations going through his whole body. After a few minutes of the massage the sensation is so good, he will not want you to stop. I know people who are working in SPA and wellness making a living by performing this type of massage effortlessly on daily basis. If you place 2 or 3 instruments on someone else’s back, and start slowly drumming one by one, there will be three times more pleasure. The sound itself is so beautiful, that people return for this massage to repeat such a unique way of relaxation. If you would like to learn more about healing effectiveness of the Spolum Drum, we suggest you should learn more about the sound and how it affects live organisms. In a nutshell, sound is like a mechanical wave or vibration. It has been proven that vibrations can be destructive or formative! If you take a look into this subject you can learn how to heal your own body with sound. I trully recommend it!

Manufacture of the Drum will take place in an already well-equipped factory. There is also already a  well-coordinated team of professionals in metalworking. An exact number of work hours spent on each instrument was estimated. The Czech Republic is currently one of the largest producers of acoustic pianos in Europe with 150 years of craftsman's tradition in this area. There is an enormous amount of joyful people, who work in a musical industry and are always looking for new ideas in this industry. You may have heard about the worldwide known Petrof brand piano which is produced in the Czech Republic. So this country is not only known for its beautiful architecture, fantastic beer but also for its great musical instruments. It is an ideal place for the birth of your musical instrument. Money that we're raising from this project will be spent on buying materials, not production machines or any other equipment for the factory. That's why we offer a fair price with no extra reselling costs and with top-notch quality.

We have a big amount of different engravings in 1-2 copies, so immediately after your payment on Indiegogo, we will email you with a website link where you will be able to choose your own design or color. It is important to make a choice right away, since if the drawing is one and someone else buys it, you will no longer be able to order it. Please, get THIS link to choose your Drum - https://choice.spolum.com/
Indiegogo is a huge community of independent people, who want to create and inspire the world. We are not aiming only for musical instrument lovers or musicians
column2: we're looking for people who care about others and who cherish their life and are happy to share their joy with others. What do you think a good musician or good cook does if not sharing his inspirations and creativity.

column1: With our instrument, you will be able to share happiness and good mood with everyone, starting with your own family all the way to strangers. I hope that you share our vision and will help us by sharing this project with your friends and other open-minded people. We promise that we won't disappoint you and that we will return your support in the form of high quality and hand-made product produced with love!
• There are 1500 drums available in stock and we will send your order immediately.
• 100% real live music with no electronic or artificial tones.
• Can be played easily by anyone without knowing the notes or musical theory.
• Сompact and you can take it anywhere with you.
• Recommended by psychologists for kids and elderly people, and it can be also used for alternative massages thanks to its vibrations.
• It has an honorable sound based on our genes. Nationality or religion doesn’t matter - the bell sound or drumming has always been everywhere.
• Each instrument is tuned by a professional musician.
• The instrument is young and is still a novelty, it has American origins.
• A Gift for the first 100 buyers -  A backpack for the Spolum Drum.
We are glad to announce our new project -  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/faucet-outdoor--2/x/16783118#/
