We are glad to announce our new project -  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/faucet-outdoor--2/x/16783118#/",26.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>

 

What is MOROW?

MOROW is a Prog Rock web radio that has been operating in Paris, France since 2000. We play the best Progressive Rock music of yesterday and today, uninterrupted, 24/7, with no ads and no intrusive jingles or talking. You can find us at
column7:
>

Bruno - Bruno started MOROW as a passion project in order to share his love for progressive rock. His talent and experience in radio programming are what gives MOROW its distinctive sound.

Arnaud - Having studied Computer Science, Arnaud discovered MOROW in its early stages and has been helping with it ever since. He manages all the technical parts: the website, the app and the servers.

Sebastian - Does all the actual work. An intern learning, among other things, project management. He is managing the majority of the campaign, mainly because he’s the only one who speaks good English.

 

Why are we running this campaign?

We are free to play only the music that we love, but it comes at a cost. We’ve asked for your help once before, and the “Help MOROW” campaign we ran was a resounding success.
column9:
>

That was three years ago.

Today we come to you again with a request, and an idea. The money you helped us obtain in 2014 has enabled us to survive this long, but has since dried up and we need more contributions to stay alive.

However, we see this as a challenge, an opportunity to drive MOROW forward together.

We thought about how we could offer you something you would be willing to contribute monthly towards. And we think we’ve found the solution.

 

MOROW+

We have started development of new iOS and Android apps, and of a new functionality that will tailor the program to fit your tastes. Upon registering as a MOROW+ user, each one of you will have access to your own individualized MOROW stream, with only music you like. Every MOROW+ stream will keep that distinctive MOROW sound, curated by Bruno, but will be influenced by your preferences while still offering you new and exciting titles to discover. The specifics are complicated but the idea is simple:

to let you have the best listening experience possible while sustaining your favourite web radio.

We love MOROW just the way it is, and we know you do too, which is why the challenge for us was thinking up a new way of listening to music while keeping everything that makes MOROW great.
column11:
showinfo=0"">

MOROW+ is a personalized radio, not an on-demand platform like Spotify. As an extra feature, it is not mandatory
column12:
you can keep listening to MOROW as usual.

But going back to a non-personalized stream will be difficult once you have experienced MOROW+ !

This new functionality will let you experience MOROW the way it was always meant to be. In fact, MOROW was created with this in mind: MOROW is an acronym of My Own Radio On Web.

Back in 2000 the functionality was not feasible, only now do we have a chance at implementing what we believe to be the next step in a 17 year long journey of musical excellence.

To accomplish this, we need you.

While the updated website and original iOS app have already been released, we need funds to continue development and keep them up and running.

This is the only way for MOROW to thrive and keep offering you your favourite music.

 

What we need

We need 9000€ to accomplish all this.

34% (~3000€) of that will go to keeping the website and app up and running for two years.

16% (~1500€) will go to finishing the development of the website and application.

38% (~3400€) will be used to fulfil rewards.

10% (~900€) is taken by Indiegogo and credit card fees.

2% (~200€) is set aside for now in case of unexpected circumstances.
column14:
>

Since we have selected the flexible funding option, we get to keep the money even if the goal is not met. If we don’t reach the minimum, you can count on us to do what is best for MOROW.

If we exceed the funding goal (preferable) we will be able to accomplish everything we have set out to do and more. We have plenty of ideas on how to make MOROW better!

 

What you get

Our undying love and affection.

 

…

 

Oh, and some rewards:
column16:
>

To add any item to your reward, you can contribute the required amount via the ""Back it"" button at the top of the page and send us a direct message via the ""Ask a question"" button (also at the top of the page) detailing what it is you want.

For example if you want an X-Large Sweatshirt to go with your MOROW t-shirt, press ""Back it"", enter 60€ as your donation amount, confirm, and then send us a message saying you want an X-Large sweatshirt. We'll take care of the rest!

Please note that the process is only possible if you have already contributed to the campaign, if you haven't you will not be able to send us a direct message.

Here's a step-by-step visual aid:
column17:
>

 

Other ways you can help

Get involved in the campaign!

Let us know what you think about our music, our project, our website… We love feedback, as it helps us shape MOROW to best suit your needs.
column19:
>GIve us your thoughts!

Share the love!

Please consider sharing this campaign with friends, family, pets and random strangers on the street. Be it through email, Facebook, Twitter, or carrier pigeon, sharing the campaign will enable more people to see it and contribute.

You can use the sharing options on the page or use this link:
column20:
>https://igg.me/at/keepMOROWalive

Don’t forget about us!

We need you to be there for us just as we have been there for you. Keep up to date with the campaign as much as possible
column21:
knowing you’re out there and you care will mean the world to us.

 

Also, don’t forget to use #keepMOROWalive to let the world know about our project!

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: I don't want to listen to only my favourite bands and songs, I want more discover new things. Will that still be possible?

A: Of course! First off, MOROW+ is not a replacement for MOROW, it is an optional extra for those who wish to go further. As such, you can listen to MOROW the way you always have as long as we can keep MOROW alive.

Secondly, MOROW+ is not meant to restrict your listening experience, on the contrary! We’re committed to bringing you the best of yesterday and today in everything we do, including MOROW+.

 

Q: I want to contribute to the campaign, but not via Credit Card. Can you set up a different payment method?

A: We’ll try and sort something out for you. Get in touch via the “Ask a question” button at the top of the page or directly at contact@morow.com, and we’ll figure out a way for you not to miss out on the amazing rewards we have available.

 

Q: Listeners should be informed and reminded, it is the future of MOROW we’re talking about after all. Are you going to be contacting well-known Prog Rock pages or magazines?

A: We have done so as of today! We’ve sent out a few emails, but could really use your help, as we’ve probably missed quite a few. Tell your favourite sources of Prog news about us and ask them to share the campaign or contact us at contact@morow.com!

 

Thank you!

Bruno, Arnaud, Underappreciated intern Sebastian

column1:
0,"

 

""The immersive sound from multiple sources can provide interesting listening experience for gamers and  those who enjoy watching movies. Music lovers, especially who loves high-fidelity file formats such as FLAC should also be benefit from the technology."" -- Techtudo

 

""It is combining high end creative designs with next-gen technology. This headphone does not give many of the pains that people often have after wearing one for a long time."" -- Techlector

 

SHIVR’s own advanced algorithm can effectively enhances audio surround sound and sense of space, allowing the listener to accurately sense sound from different sources. 

Traditional two-channel audio only delivers sound from the left and right side, but in real life we can identify sounds from various directions, distances and the surrounding environment. Real sounds mix as they bounce off walls, floors, and ceilings, and gives us a feel of room size and the materials within it.

We use a gyroscope technology-based 3D audio algorithm to achieve 3D spatial sound.

1. The algorithm deconstructs the sounds from difference sources and rebuilds them in an environment simulator, to determine directions, distances and reflected surface data of the sound.

2.Head tracking tech keeps the sound locked in position no matter what movements you make with your head.

3.We use HRTF(Head related transfer function) to detect your anatomy such as ear shape, head size, and shoulder size. It then rebuilds the sound to best adapt to your body. In addition, our HPTF technology can compensate the rebuilt audio with more layered details instead of simple EQ adjustments.

 

What Users Are Saying About SHIVR

We let people try SHIVR for the first time to gain real world feedback on the 3D and audio performance.
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 

Most active noise cancelling (ANC) headphones use only one mic to pick up and process the ambient noise. But SHIVR includes both feedforward and feedback mics. This more advanced measurement of sound provides the best noise-free experience in any environment.

Along with advances in hardware, we developed an ANC algorithm that is customized for SHIVR to deliver even better noise cancellation results. It resulted from various tests on acoustic engineering, components’ size &
column5:
drive implementation, etc. Compared to traditional solutions, it's substantially more flexible and effective in ANC performance. In addition, the ANC algorithm can better detect noisy environments and calibrate filter parameters to deliver the best performance.

 

  • Digial ANC Algorithm Calibrates to Various Environments

column1: •  Take a look at the full beta version SHIVR with ANC and 3D effect on.

We designed SHIVR for long-term, comfortable use so you can enjoy binge-watching movies or competing with your teammates in the virtual reality world non-stop.

 

Our 3D algorithm is based on a built-in gyroscope to not only create immersive 3D surround sound, but also to perfectly calibrate to each user’s ear to eliminate in-the-head localization effects. The listener won’t feel dizzy or tired even after long listening sessions.

We scanned and analyzed hundreds of human ears and head shape with multiple mockups to guarantee a secure, comfortable fit for every user. The headband is made of TR90 titanium which is durable and lightweight. The ear pads feature high quality memory foam covered by skin-friendly protein leather.

Nothing sounds better to your ear than a crystal clear sound. Our DSP process creates high fidelity audio that your ears will never get tired listening too.

 

 

SHIVR features a premium φ40mm Bionic Stereo Driver to deliver a rich and more accurate sound. This Bionic Stereo Driver is custom designed to fit in the independent acoustic chamber inside SHIVR.  The membrane inside the driver can vibrate with less power consumption while creating more natural sound so you can distinguish the highest tweets and the lowest bass.

SHIVR’s acoustic team is led by acoustic experts who have previously worked for JBL, AKG, Panasonic, Pioneer, and other audio leaders. The acoustic structure is designed by veterans who worked for big names like Beats by Dre and Panasonic. The team has a proven record producing world leading audio devices from start to finish.

SHIVR supports aptX technology to elevate your Bluetooth listening experience to the highest audiophile level. aptX is a codec necessary to achieve high fidelity wireless music. aptX is a superior compression/decompression protocol that reduces latency and provides the best audio with low battery consumption.

 

One issue with noise cancelling headphones is that after the ambient noise is removed, it may cause loss in the audio signal. We worked with YAMAHA audio lab to provide a compensation signal to the feed-backward noise prediction. So you will hear the music noise-free without quality loss.

 

SHIVR uses Bluetooth 4.2 technology to ensure a stable connection. You can enjoy seamless music streaming even when you aren’t close to your music source with SHIVR’s improved wireless range of 49 feet (15 meters)

Turn on ambient sound mode to hear your immediate environment to detect any danger when walking/ riding. Or for talking to your teammates or friends while wearing the headphones.

SHIVER knows when you are wearing the headphones and when you are not. When music is playing and you take off SHIVR the music will pause automatically and resume playing when you place the headphones back on your head.

Powered by advanced ANC technology and equipped with an intelligent battery saver, SHIVER gives you over 25 hours of playtime. You won’t run out of sound during your commute or business travel. Put it on and just listen.

 

 

 

 

SHIVR's supply chain team have more than 10 years’ experience to ensure high quality for all the components such as speaker, mic, cables, and plastic in order to produce the best sound performance 

 

 

November 16th-18th SHIVR is exhibit at Inter BEE Show in Japan. Some of our Japanese backers had already tried the latest SHIVR Headphones.

 

 

SHIVR was created to break the cycle and bring a revolutionary new audio experience.

How to deliver the “SHIVR” experience to users? For 2 years, we’ve been dedicated to finding the best solution to achieve the ultimate immersive listening experience. Our answer is not one, but two industry leading technologies. We’ve developed a groundbreaking 3D audio algorithm as well as our own hybrid ANC Technology &
column2:
digital ANC algorithm. The combined technology can instantly increase the sense of auditory space. You will hear a crystal clear, ultra-wide sound environment like you’ve never experienced before. Now SHIVR is an international team, 40 experienced engineers from Shenzhen, Hong Kong and US.

Contact Us

For partnership inquiries: marketing@shivr.co

For distribution inquiries: sales@shivr.co

column2: Drummer of 17 years. Using my Engineering experience and my love for the drums I decided to design the most exciting drum parts for True Resonant Quality, TRQ.

column1:
The GI Hoop is a 3D CNC Machined 6061 Aluminum Drum Hoop. 

Think Tesla for Drum Hardware.

Using the finest materials and manufacturing processes you can boldly transform the sound of your drums and take your play to the next level with TRQ.

Improve your drum play with...
Enjoy the benefits as a drummer with...
• Individual Serial Numbers, so no 2 pair are alike
Designed by a Mechanical Engineer Experienced in the Following
<li>Design and Calculation of Pressure Vessels, Load bearing structures, Weldments, Power Delivery, CNC Machine Design, Composite Design, Stress &amp
In a world where Drum Hardware has been the same for decades, the GI Hoop is a proven innovation in the sound of today's evolving drummer.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

After much engineering, I found myself on the island of Puerto Rico helping rebuild post-hurricane Maria. Inspired by the Island, I decided to pursue my passion for designing the most advanced drums. I became a drummer when I received my first drumset in high school. In college I devoted my life to Engineering and against my strongest will, I sold my drumset in order to pay for my senior year. 
So I left my day job and decided to design my drums from the ground up. I started with the drum hoop and a tuning key designed with the highest mechanical design standards of uncompromised utility, sonic quality, reliability, and aesthetics. 

-Gabriel Martinez

 

","I am a Mechanical Engineer & Drummer of 17 years. Using my Engineering experience and my love for the drums I decided to design the most exciting drum parts for True Resonant Quality, TRQ.

column1: The GI Hoop is a 3D CNC Machined 6061 Aluminum Drum Hoop. Think Tesla for Drum Hardware. Using the finest materials and manufacturing processes you can boldly transform the sound of your drums and take your play to the next level with TRQ.Improve your drum play with...
True Resonance from your Snare Drum
Enjoy the benefits as a drummer with...
Individual Serial Numbers, so no 2 pair are alike
Designed by a Mechanical Engineer Experienced in the Following
Design and Calculation of Pressure Vessels, Load bearing structures, Weldments, Power Delivery, CNC Machine Design, Composite Design, Stress & Fatigue Calculations

In a world where Drum Hardware has been the same for decades, the GI Hoop is a proven innovation in the sound of today's evolving drummer. After much engineering, I found myself on the island of Puerto Rico helping rebuild post-hurricane Maria. Inspired by the Island, I decided to pursue my passion for designing the most advanced drums. I became a drummer when I received my first drumset in high school. In college I devoted my life to Engineering and against my strongest will, I sold my drumset in order to pay for my senior year. So I left my day job and decided to design my drums from the ground up. I started with the drum hoop and a tuning key designed with the highest mechanical design standards of uncompromised utility, sonic quality, reliability, and aesthetics. -Gabriel Martinez",4.0,2,"1 Campaign
Help me to help drummers reclaim their place in pop music.

• Hi, My name is Luc Prefontaine. I've been working in studios for about 25 years. I have recorded drums on many occasions and have often dealt with snare drum tracks in which there was too much hi hat (Hi Hat Bleed). The presence of hi hat on the snare track prevents the engineer from giving the snare drum the required top end during the mix without dialing in obtrusive hi hat harshness. I had the idea for a ""once and for all"" fix for hi hat bleed and created the HHHusher, which was awarded a patent.

• Today's drummers have to compete against sophisticated drum samplers who sound great because each element of the drum was recorded separately - thus no bleeding occurs. But no sampler can reproduce the organic power and human feel of a real drummer.

• My goal is to make the HHHusher available not only to the big studios, but to the bands who record themselves and to home studios everywhere. I therefore need to produce it in a way to avoid making its price too high for the commun musician so I am committed to sell it under 100$ at first and then lowering its price as sales volume grows.

• By contributing to my project you will help drummers fight against drum samplers who are replacing them in the studio. You will also help bands to have a great drum sound and feel in their music projects.

• I believe in starting out small and adjusting the means of production according to the demand. I will setup a small shop at first and make them out of fibreglass. I will need 10000$ CAD to setup shop and buy the tools and materials to start production. This amount will be added to my own money which I invest in this project.
• If the demand is there, i will have the incentive to switch to a more industrial means of production (plastic injection).
• If you give to my campaign you will receive perks and rebates on the HHHusher once they are in production.

• Each dollar you contribute to the HHHusher Project will be given back to you in the form of a rebate upon purchasing the 14"" HHHusher model. As an example, if you give 50$, you get a 50$ rebate once the HHHushers are available. (Does not apply to shipping, once by contributor)
• Plus, your rebate will also be applicable to the 15"" HHHusher model (Designed for 15"" hi hats), when it comes out at a later date.

• I have the ""HHHusher.com"" domain reserved and an e-commerce internet site which is 90% complete and is only awaiting product photos and tutorial videos. It already looks pretty slick and I will put it online once the product is available. Hi Hat bleed is a universal issue in the world of recording. I am confident that the existence of a solution such as the HHHusher will attract attention in the recording community. Google placement and well placed banners will probably be enough to get the ball rolling.

• The HHHusher has been designed on computer by a highly competent industrial designer and the research is done and proven. I have been working on this idea for the last 4 years and the concept has been tested by professional drummers and engineers.
If you like my idea but can't contribute
• You can help me by spreading the word! If you know anybody who is a drummer or a recording engineer, please send them a link to my campaign. I need all the help I can get
Help me to help drummers reclaim their place in pop music.

Hi, My name is Luc Prefontaine. I've been working in studios for about 25 years. I have recorded drums on many occasions and have often dealt with snare drum tracks in which there was too much hi hat (Hi Hat Bleed). The presence of hi hat on the snare track prevents the engineer from giving the snare drum the required top end during the mix without dialing in obtrusive hi hat harshness. I had the idea for a ""once and for all"" fix for hi hat bleed and created the HHHusher, which was awarded a patent.

Today's drummers have to compete against sophisticated drum samplers who sound great because each element of the drum was recorded separately - thus no bleeding occurs. But no sampler can reproduce the organic power and human feel of a real drummer.

My goal is to make the HHHusher available not only to the big studios, but to the bands who record themselves and to home studios everywhere. I therefore need to produce it in a way to avoid making its price too high for the commun musician so I am committed to sell it under 100$ at first and then lowering its price as sales volume grows.

By contributing to my project you will help drummers fight against drum samplers who are replacing them in the studio. You will also help bands to have a great drum sound and feel in their music projects.

I believe in starting out small and adjusting the means of production according to the demand. I will setup a small shop at first and make them out of fibreglass. I will need 10000$ CAD to setup shop and buy the tools and materials to start production. This amount will be added to my own money which I invest in this project.
If the demand is there, i will have the incentive to switch to a more industrial means of production (plastic injection).
If you give to my campaign you will receive perks and rebates on the HHHusher once they are in production.

Each dollar you contribute to the HHHusher Project will be given back to you in the form of a rebate upon purchasing the 14"" HHHusher model. As an example, if you give 50$, you get a 50$ rebate once the HHHushers are available. (Does not apply to shipping, once by contributor)
Plus, your rebate will also be applicable to the 15"" HHHusher model (Designed for 15"" hi hats), when it comes out at a later date.
How will the HHHusher be marketed?

I have the ""HHHusher.com"" domain reserved and an e-commerce internet site which is 90% complete and is only awaiting product photos and tutorial videos. It already looks pretty slick and I will put it online once the product is available. Hi Hat bleed is a universal issue in the world of recording. I am confident that the existence of a solution such as the HHHusher will attract attention in the recording community. Google placement and well placed banners will probably be enough to get the ball rolling.

The HHHusher has been designed on computer by a highly competent industrial designer and the research is done and proven. I have been working on this idea for the last 4 years and the concept has been tested by professional drummers and engineers.

Digital Multi-Effects

The C99 is a low-latency digital multi-effects pedal containing a three-stage mono preamp/overdrive, flexible mono tone stack, a powerful 8-delay modulation block for flanging, chorus, and reverb, and an impulse response based cabinet/speaker simulator.  The C99 features a precision-machined aluminum case, a powerful digital signal processor, USB audio and MIDI, and effects preset storage and recall.

Simple Controls

Since the effects parameters for the seven presets (19 parameters per preset) are modified using a web browser there's only two knobs and two foot switches
column2:
a volume control (VOL) and a mix control (MIX) that sets the effects audio and USB audio mix ratio for the output.  

The preset select foot switch (PRE) is used to cycle through the eight presets which includes a bypass mode (preset 0, no effects, input audio passed directly to output) and the seven modifiable presets (preset 1 through preset 7).  The three LED's indicate which of the eight presets is active.

The preset toggle foot switch (A/B) is used to set (press for 1 second) and recall (press for less than one second) a specific preset.  For instance you can hold A/B down to set A to preset 3, use the PRE foot switch to move to preset 5, and hold down A/B to set B to preset 5.  Then use the A/B foot switch to quickly toggle between presets 3 and 5.  You can also set A or B to preset 0 (bypass) to make the A/B toggle between bypassed and an effect - acting like a conventional single-effect stompbox.

Audio Routing

The C99 has the ability to record audio from your guitar and send it to your computer (computer, laptop, tablet, or phone) in real time via USB audio and can also play audio from your computer allowing the C99 to act as a sound card while using your effects - both recording and playback can be used at the same time.

The built-in speaker cabinet simulator (featuring official Celestion speaker IR's for various speaker and cabinet types) can be employed to send your output to a PA system or to a pair of studio monitors if you're not using a conventional guitar amplifier.  The C99 can mix the USB audio and your effect output together allowing you to jam along.

Presets Editor

HTML/Javascript and USB MIDI are used to adjust your effect presets - in real time so that you can hear the changes as you make them.  All you need is Google Chrome, a computer/laptop (OS X, Windows) or an Android powered mobile device, and a USB cable.

The 19 effects parameters are shown for the current selected preset and will update automatically as you use the C99 foot switches to move from one preset to another.  Note that any application supporting USB MIDI can also be used to control the C99.   

The C99 effect presets editor running in Google Chrome (Compatible with Windows 7/10, OS X, and Android).

Effects Chain

The C99 implements the most common effects blocks
column3:
the preamp/amp/overdrive, the tone-stack, and the delay that can product effects ranging from flanger to chorus to reverb.

The preamp block consists of a three-stage amplifier model similar to that of a tube preamp circuit in a guitar amplifier.  Each stage incorporates soft tube-like clipping as well as pre and post tone shaping resulting in a final preamp output that's smooth and articulate.

PREAMP - PRE LOW-CUT:  Reduces the bass (response before clipping) for each preamp stage.  Use this control to loosen or tighten up the amp's bass response.

PREAMP - STAGE GAIN:  The amount of signal gain for each stage.  Maxed out this preamp has tone of gain!

PREAMP - MID-EMPHASIS:  Emphasizes the mid-range response of each preamp stage.  This control cascades the mid-range gain of the increasingly distorted guitar signal resulting in a brassy overdriven sound.  Use the tone-stack's middle frequency control to cut the midrange for a great classic hard rock sound.

PREAMP - EMPHASIS FREQ:  Adjust the center frequency of the mid-emphasis control.

PREAMP - POST HIGH-CUT:  Reduces the treble after the last preamp stage, similar to a tone control on an effects pedal.

The tone block consist of a three-band semi-parametric equalizer with adjustable EQ gain and frequency settings with the filter Q being adjusted automatically to result in a smooth and natural frequency response shape for adjacent EQ bands.  The tone stack operates primarily on the lower, middle, and upper midrange frequencies.  Therefore the preamp's 'PRE LOW-CUT' and 'POST HIGH-CUT' controls are used to adjust the bass and treble levels.

TONE - LOWER GAIN/FREQUENCY:  Adjusts the gain and the frequency of the semi-parametric EQ for the lower frequencies (lower-midrange).  The Q is adjusted automatically per the lower EQ and the middle EQ settings.

TONE - MIDDLE GAIN/FREQUENCY:  Adjusts the gain and the frequency of the semi-parametric EQ for the mid-range frequencies (middle mid-range).  The Q is adjusted automatically per the lower EQ, middle EQ, and the upper EQ settings.

TONE - UPPER GAIN/FREQUENCY:  Adjusts the gain and the frequency of the semi-parametric EQ for the upper frequencies (upper midrange).  The Q is adjusted automatically per the middle EQ and the upper EQ settings.

The delay block consists of eight delay lines each with their own own delay line lengths and modulation frequency oscillator (LFO).  The number of delays is selectable and the delay length and LFO rates are adjusted automatically as you adjust the common delay time, rate, and depth parameters.  Using a single delay allows for a standard flanger or chorus.  Increasing the delay count results in thick and lush chorus, while maxing out the delay count to eight and increasing the feedback results in smooth reverb.

DELAY - COUNT:  Sets the number of delay lines to use, 0 (none) through 8.

DELAY - TIME:  Sets the base delay time for delay line #1 (0 to 42 milliseconds).  Delay lines #2 and beyond are adjusted automatically to have a similar but delay length that is related to the other delay lengths (yet unique in actual length) in a 'musical' way.

DELAY - MOD RATE:  Sets the delay time modulation frequency for delay line #1 (0 Hz to 3 Hz).  Modulation frequencies for delay #2 and beyond are adjusted automatically to have similar/unique modulation frequencies.

DELAY - MOD DEPTH:  Sets the delay time modulation depth for delay line #1 (0 % to 10%).  Modulation depths for delay #2 and beyond are adjusted automatically to have similar/unique modulation depths.

DELAY - FEEDBACK:  Adjusts the amount of delayed signal that is fed back into the delay line.  Moderate feedback with short delay times result in flanging.  Low to no feedback with moderate to high delay times result in chorus.  High feedback with long delay time and high delay count results in reverb.

DELAY - DAMPING:  Reduces the high frequencies of the delay line for dry as well as wet/feedback signals.  Use this to reduce the brightness of delay effects - especially for reverb where feedback is set to high levels.

DELAY - INTENSITY:  Adjusts the ratio of dry signal to wet/delayed signal as well as selects the delay network type (one delay, two delays, four delays, or eight delays).  One delay results in a more prominent flanger/chorus effect while eight delays results in smoother reverberation.  Two and four delays result in blended chorus/delay and modulated reverb effects.

The output block controls the effect chain's output volume and the cabinet impulse response selection.  Since these parameter are included in the effects presets the overall volume and cabinet selection chain can be adjusted per preset.

OUTPUT - VOLUME:  Adjusts the output volume before being altered by the master volume (VOL) knob.

OUTPUT - CABINET:  Selects which authentic Celestion speaker/cabinet impulse response is used - ranges from 0 (off) to 9 (nine impulse responses).

Impulse Responses

The guitar speaker and cabinet have a significant effect on the overall sound of the guitar and effects chain.  Using impulse responses allow a speaker's frequency response, as well as its reverberation characteristics, be applied to the audio signal to replicate its effect.  This is useful for setups that do not include a conventional guitar amplifier and speaker/cabinet such as PA systems or that use of powered studio monitors.  In fact it's possible to sound much like a guitar amp setup with a guitar amp.  This is especially useful when using the C99 as your computer's record and play-back audio device allowing the C99 to act as your instrument-to-computer recording interface, your sound-card for music playback, and your multi-effects unit ... all with one compact device!

The C99 contains the following authentic Celestion speaker impulse responses built-in:

column1:
Specifications

Case Design:  3.4"" x 2.7"" x 1.0"" (Very Compact!), CNC precision milled from solid aluminum.

Total Latency:  1.25 milliseconds from analog audio input to analog audio output.

Audio Input:  Mono, 1 Vpeak (2V pk-pk), 1 Mohm resistance, low noise differential analog signal path, 24-bit 48 kHz sampling.

Digital Signal Processing: 32/64 bit fixed-point math, 32 bit audio signal, filter and impulse response data, 64-bit filter calculation accumulation.

Audio Output:  Stereo, 1 Vpeak (2V pk-pk), 24-bit 48 kHz sampling.

USB Audio:  Audio class 2.0, 32-bit sample width, 48 kHz sample rate, stereo input for recording, stereo output (can be mixed with the effect output),  MIDI support for effects control and adjustment.

USB MIDI:  Support for firmware upgrading, and effects control and adjustment via MIDI SYSEX.

Power Supply:  External 9-12V supply (2.1mm barrel, center negative).

User Controls:  Two foot switches (preset A/B toggle and presets 1-8 selection), two knobs (master volume and effect/USB audio mixer).

Parameter Presets:  Seven banks of effects chain parameter presets, presets selectable by foot switches and edited using USB/MIDI base applications.

Cabinet Simulation:  Impulse-response processing at 48 kHz supporting 40 milliseconds of convolution.  Ten Authentic Celestion speaker/cabinet impulse responses are included.

column5:
>

Today it is hard to find speakers that sounds and look good for a decent price. Most of the commercial speakers looks almost the same - they follow same trend and they produce sound pumped with too much bass...

Everything wrapped in cheap plastic that lack ""soul"" and performance when comparing to the speakers that were built during sound engineering revolution when every system was unique in its own way.

That is why we've decided to build something that would bring back experience we know from our childhood times and we've created MARQUEE MK 1 Speaker.
column11:
>

Each MARQUEE MK 1 Speaker is a handcrafted piece of woodworking and engineering art that is unique in its own way. Because each speaker is handmade, you will never see the same looking Marquee MK1 out there! We always make sure that it sounds the same, but difference in wood grain pattern makes it a truly unique piece of art!

We choose our audio equipment carefully and we've spend last 5 years designing and testing different setups and audio parts to create something that sounds the way we want. You will never hear anything even close in mass produced commercial audio systems. Clear, warm and well balanced sound gives us hope, that once you will listen to your favorite music from MARQUEE MK 1 speaker, you will never want to go back to any other audio systems...
column20:
>

Each ROA Marquee MK1 speaker is equipped with two HIGH QUALITY 3"" DRIVERS, NEODYMIUM TWEETER and 6"" SUBWOOFER to deliver true full range spectrum sound without missing anything in between.

Drivers are placed and tuned in separate chambers so they do not interfere with each other so there is no distortion and PORTED design of the chambers is producing deep high quality sound.
column21:
/>

Marquee MK 1 also features build in amplifier with Bluetooth 4.0 module equipped with aptX technology. AptX™ audio enhances the wireless sound quality of many of the world’s finest smartphones, speakers, soundbars, headphones and tablets. With aptX, music lovers can enjoy wired quality sound - wirelessly. Leading manufacturers such as Sony, Samsung, Vizio and Panasonic use aptX to build Bluetooth® products, and support high quality sound.
column23:
>

- Handcrafted Real Wood Speaker
- Built-In 6"" Sub-woofer with Neodymium Magnet
- Powerful Amplifier with Dedicated Sub-woofer channel
- Long Range Bluetooth 4.0 [external antenna]
- AptX technology (CD Like Wireless Audio)
- Hi-Fi Sound Quality - TPA3116 Class D amplifier chip
- Unique Design
- Neodymium Tweeter
- 2x Bamboo Fiber Cone High Quality Drivers
- AUX-in
- RCA-in
column32:
>

To fully cover low frequencies, we've decided to put 6"" subwoofer at the bottom of the speaker to distribute BASS in 360 degrees. Equipped with large Neodymium magnet and flat woven glass-fiber/honeycomb aluminum composite cone, this subwoofer produces frequency response to fill your room with more then enough bass without destroying the balance between the rest of the drivers...
column36:
>

When we were thinking about design, we've wanted MARQUEE MK 1 to be a premium speaker that would blend perfectly into your home and that was our main mission. It will be perfect addition to your Bedroom / Office or Living Room that will turn into real cinema experience room!


We use only top quality &
column37: selected Red Oak wood for our Marquee MK speakers!
column42:
>

Our idea is to create a new generation of audio system that will be universal in use and design. You can use MARQUEE MK1 while watching Movies - will turn your TV in your living room into Cinema.

Or you can use it as a BLUETOOTH SPEAKER when you want to listen to your favorite music in your Bedroom before going to sleep. Or connect it to your console while playing games for immersive gaming experience! There are unlimited possibilities what you can do with MARQUEE MK1!
column47:
>

When we were creating our CAMPAIGN TIMELINE, we made sure to take additional time for each of our steps in order to give you ""REAL"" and Reliable time frames if it comes to our production and your order Fulfillment. While we were doing our market research, we saw that there is a lot of Campaigns that gives ""UNREAL"" time frames and later on backers complained about not fulfilling TIMELINE Promises, or even worse - not getting their product at all!!!

Here at Red Oak Audioworks we promise you to stick to our TIMELINE! MARQUEE MK1 is a working and tested product and it's ready for production. We took additional time in the timeline to make sure that can count on us. if it comes to bringing new generation of audio on time!
column51:
>

Launching product like our ROA MARQUEE MK1 speaker takes time (for designing prototype mostly), but also investments in equipment (to enhance quality and speed of our speaker production) but also for marketing purposes to make our brand recognizable across the world.

Also funds are needed to get necessary certificates so we can ship our product to you worldwide etc. We've already did most time consuming thing - we have our working prototype that is ready for production, so now we hope to get your support so we can climb to another level.

We've decided to launch INDIEGOGO campaign to make change in consumer electronics industry and to bring our ideas into motion - to create something new and different.
column54:
=

As our thank you for your support, we've made some special rewards so we can meet our campaign goal:

 

1.) Red Oak Audioworks Support T-Shirt
column55:
>

Red Oak Audioworks Support T-Shirt available in White ( S / M / L)

2.) Red Oak Audioworks 2TB PENDRIVE
column56:
>Our Signature Red Oak Audioworks Pendrive - store your Data using this pocket and unique piece of tech.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

MARQUEE MK 1 is a handcrafted product and it might have slight deviations if it comes to craftsmanship. Although we will do our best to keep it at the highest standard so those differences are almost invisible.

We are not a huge corporation but we are confident that we will have very punctual delivery if it comes to production and sending our product on time to our supporters.
We take additional time in the campaign calendar to be sure we will not be delayed - even by some random stuff that may come up.

All our parts suppliers are tested and are reliable, so risk if it comes to supply delays is minimum. The only delay that may occur is when we will be applying for CE / FCC / IC certificates so we will be able to send our product worldwide - it's required in order to get our product through the customs.
column62:
>!!! THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT TO MAKE OUR DREAM COME TRUE !!!

AptX™ audio enhances the wireless sound quality of many of the world’s finest smartphones, speakers, soundbars, headphones and tablets. With aptX, music lovers can enjoy wired quality sound - wirelessly. Leading manufacturers such as Sony, Samsung, Vizio and Panasonic use aptX to build Bluetooth® products, and support high quality sound. SPECS : - Handcrafted Real Wood Speaker- Built-In 6"" Sub-woofer with Neodymium Magnet- Powerful Amplifier with Dedicated Sub-woofer channel- Long Range Bluetooth 4.0 [external antenna]- AptX technology (CD Like Wireless Audio)- Hi-Fi Sound Quality - TPA3116 Class D amplifier chip- Unique Design- Neodymium Tweeter- 2x Bamboo Fiber Cone High Quality Drivers- AUX-in- RCA-in  => SPEAKER DIMENSIONS: <=WIDE - 13 3/4""DEEP - 11 1/4""HEIGHT - 6 3/4""WEIGHT - 12 lb => SUBWOOFER <=To fully cover low frequencies, we've decided to put 6"" subwoofer at the bottom of the speaker to distribute BASS in 360 degrees. Equipped with large Neodymium magnet and flat woven glass-fiber/honeycomb aluminum composite cone, this subwoofer produces frequency response to fill your room with more then enough bass without destroying the balance between the rest of the drivers... => DESIGN <=When we were thinking about design, we've wanted MARQUEE MK 1 to be a premium speaker that would blend perfectly into your home and that was our main mission. It will be perfect addition to your Bedroom / Office or Living Room that will turn into real cinema experience room!We use only top quality & selected Red Oak wood for our Marquee MK speakers! => UNIVERSAL AUDIO SYSTEM <=Our idea is to create a new generation of audio system that will be universal in use and design. You can use MARQUEE MK1 while watching Movies - will turn your TV in your living room into Cinema.Or you can use it as a BLUETOOTH SPEAKER when you want to listen to your favorite music in your Bedroom before going to sleep. Or connect it to your console while playing games for immersive gaming experience! There are unlimited possibilities what you can do with MARQUEE MK1! => TIMELINE <=When we were creating our CAMPAIGN TIMELINE, we made sure to take additional time for each of our steps in order to give you ""REAL"" and Reliable time frames if it comes to our production and your order Fulfillment. While we were doing our market research, we saw that there is a lot of Campaigns that gives ""UNREAL"" time frames and later on backers complained about not fulfilling TIMELINE Promises, or even worse - not getting their product at all!!!Here at Red Oak Audioworks we promise you to stick to our TIMELINE! MARQUEE MK1 is a working and tested product and it's ready for production. We took additional time in the timeline to make sure that can count on us. if it comes to bringing new generation of audio on time!  WHY INDIEGOGO?Launching product like our ROA MARQUEE MK1 speaker takes time (for designing prototype mostly), but also investments in equipment (to enhance quality and speed of our speaker production) but also for marketing purposes to make our brand recognizable across the world.Also funds are needed to get necessary certificates so we can ship our product to you worldwide etc. We've already did most time consuming thing - we have our working prototype that is ready for production, so now we hope to get your support so we can climb to another level.We've decided to launch INDIEGOGO campaign to make change in consumer electronics industry and to bring our ideas into motion - to create something new and different. => SPECIAL REWARDS <=As our thank you for your support, we've made some special rewards so we can meet our campaign goal: 1.) Red Oak Audioworks Support T-ShirtRed Oak Audioworks Support T-Shirt available in White ( S / M / L)2.) Red Oak Audioworks 2TB PENDRIVEOur Signature Red Oak Audioworks Pendrive - store your Data using this pocket and unique piece of tech. RISKS AND CHALLENGES:MARQUEE MK 1 is a handcrafted product and it might have slight deviations if it comes to craftsmanship. Although we will do our best to keep it at the highest standard so those differences are almost invisible.We are not a huge corporation but we are confident that we will have very punctual delivery if it comes to production and sending our product on time to our supporters.We take additional time in the campaign calendar to be sure we will not be delayed - even by some random stuff that may come up.All our parts suppliers are tested and are reliable, so risk if it comes to supply delays is minimum. The only delay that may occur is when we will be applying for CE / FCC / IC certificates so we will be able to send our product worldwide - it's required in order to get our product through the customs. !!! THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT TO MAKE OUR DREAM COME TRUE !!!",20.0,0,"1 Campaign

New Ultra-High Fidelity Audio Player [d-play] :
""FEEL the Music !""

PRESENTATION

Le lecteur musical haute-résolution D[SD] AudioFEEL [d-play] en 3 questions :
The high-resolution D[SD] music player AudioFEEL [d-play] in 3 questions :

1/ pourquoi ?
grâce aux technologies actuelles, il est enfin possible de réunir les 'puristes' du son analogique et les 'geeks' de l'ère numérique :
- avec la qualité analogique: dynamique, définition, chaleur...
- et le côté pratique du numérique: fiabilité, reproductibilité, insensibilité aux parasites
Si l'expérience sonore/musicale est l'une des plus intéressante sur terre, c'est aussi l'une des plus subjective et personnelle
column2: Dès qu'il est question d'audio et de musique, on parle de ressenti, d'émotions, de sentiments (j'aime/j'aime pas): bref, des choses difficilement quantifiables en termes techniques...

column1: Au final, l'important c'est le résultat !
Or l'arrivée des technologies numériques a bouleversé non seulement la façon d'écouter de la musique, mais elle a également transformé la manière de la 'concevoir' et de la distribuer
column2: si cela apporte des améliorations non négligeables dans beaucoup de cas, il faut admettre que pour l'auditeur 'final' les dernières décennies ont plutôt privilégiées la compression et l'optimisation des données (internet/streaming oblige!) au détriment de la qualité...

column1: Mais après tout, pourquoi les nouvelles/futures générations devraient se contenter d'un son basse-résolution, compressé, encodé, décimé…?
Aussi, les 'nostalgiques' du son analogique y trouveront leur compte, puisqu'ils retrouveront la définition perdue avec les débuts de l'ère digitale...
using current technologies, it is now possible to gather the analog-sound 'purists' and the geeks of the digital age :
- with analog quality : dynamic definition, warmth ...
- and the convenience of digital reliability, reproducibility, interference immunity
If the sound/music experience is one of the most interesting on earth, it is also one of the most subjective and personal
column2: when talk about audio and music, talking about feelings, of emotions, feelings (I like/I do not): in short, not easily quantifiable things in technical terms...

column1: In the end, what matters is the result !

But the advent of digital technology has revolutionized not only the way of listening to music, but it has also transformed the way to 'make' and distribute it, if it brings significant improvements in many cases, note that for the end listener, recent decades have rather preferred compression and optimization data (because of internet/streaming) at the expense of quality ...
But after all, why the new/future generations should settle for a low-resolution sound, compressed, encoded, decimated ... ?
Also, the 'nostalgic' of analog audio will find their account, they re-find the definition lost with the beginning of the digital age ...

2/ comment ?
grâce à la technologie DSD 'Direct Stream Digital' ou 'Delta-Sigma Direct' qui permet de s'affranchir des limites imposées par le format PCM 'Pulse Code Modulation' et dérivés (.wav, AAC, CD...etc) associée à un support média de type carte mémoire SD: d'où le nom de code D[SD].

DSD est un procédé de stockage de signaux audio sur un média numérique utilisé par Sony et Philips dans les années 1990 d'abord à des fins d'archivage puis commercialisé avec le format SA-CD. Bien que le résultat de ce procédé soit un flux numérique haute-fréquence composé de 0 et de 1, celui-ci se rapproche clairement du signal analogique original.

thanks to technology DSD 'Direct Stream Digital' or 'Delta-Sigma Direct' which overcomes the limitations imposed by the PCM 'Pulse Code Modulation' and derivatives ( .wav , AAC, CD ... etc. ) associated to a SD memory card media Type: whence codename D[SD].

DSD is a method of storing audio signals on digital media used by Sony and Philips in the 1990s first for the purpose of archiving then commercialized with the SA-CD format. Although the result of this process is a digital high-frequency streams compound of 0 and 1, this is clearly closer to the original analog signal.

Par analogie, cette modulation de largeur d'impulsion ou modulation de densité d’impulsions s’apparente un peu à la Pré-magnétisation HF ou Polarisation qui existait sur les 'antiques' magnétophones à bandes…
Ce procédé permet d’obtenir des performances dynamiques largement supérieures à tout autre format : 120 dB sur toute la bande passante utile.

De plus, par rapport aux formats de type PCM, le format DSD permet de s’affranchir des épineux problèmes de décimation et d’interpolation… sans compter les inconvénients résultants de 'Jitter' d’horloge et autres latences liées aux buffers/corrections d’erreurs critiques en PCM.
By analogy, this pulse width modulation or pulse density modulation is a bit like the HF pre-magnetization or polarization that existed on the 'vintage' magnetic tape recorders...
This method provides dynamic performance far above any other format: 120 dB on all the useful frequency range.

In addition, compared to PCM formats, DSD format allows to overcome difficult problems of decimation and interpolation ... not to mention the resulting disadvantages of 'Jitter' clock and other latencies related buffers/errors-corrections 'critical' in PCM.

Comparatif des topologies PCM / DSD :
Comparison of PCM / DSD topologies:

Une tentative de commercialisation de ce format a été faite avec le Super Audio CD, dont l'objectif était de succéder au Compact Disc : celui-ci comportant un certain nombre de défauts inhérents à sa technologie datant de la fin des années 1970.

Malheureusement, alors que sa qualité est reconnue par les audiophiles, le SA-CD a été un échec commercial pour plusieurs raisons : l’une d’elle étant probablement que ce support n’apportait pas vraiment de valeur ajoutée à l’auditeur ‘normal’ par rapport au CD…

Aujourd’hui, le contexte a changé et de nouvelles solutions/technologies sont apparues : augmentation des capacités de calcul, démocratisation des mémoires flash, composants électroniques toujours plus performants… mais en fin de compte, l’auditeur final n’a toujours pas profité de ces avancées.

La ‘dématérialisation’ de la musique est actuellement à la mode mais elle comporte également quelques inconvénients : elle nécessite de disposer d'un ordinateur (et savoir s’en servir), ensuite d’avoir un matériel adapté et enfin les formats (liés au téléchargement/streaming) évoluent sans cesse et sont très souvent encodés/compressés…
L’usage de plusieurs méthodes d’écoute n’est pas incompatible et peut même être complémentaire :
- téléchargement/achat/support physique pour écoute Hi-Fi haute définition D[SD]
Quant à l’utilisation de cartes mémoires type SD, celles-ci comportent de nombreux avantages par rapport aux supports de type optique (CD, DVD, Blu-ray) :
- plus de problèmes mécaniques : usure, poussière, rayures, traces de doigt, etc…
- électroniques : complexité, usure laser, correction d'erreurs, mémoire tampon, horloge, etc…
De plus, un système de protection de Copyright est prévu d’origine dans le format SD : Content Protection for Recordable Media (CPRM).
Aussi, les avantages par rapport aux DACs USB qui apparaissent actuellement sont indéniables :
- pas de problèmes liés à l’interface USB : connexion, stabilité, synchro, drivers, players, etc…
- fonctionnement absolument silencieux (pas de pièces mécaniques, ventilateurs, etc)
- vrai support physique, robuste, fiable et performant
An attempt to commercialize this format was made with the Super Audio CD, whose objective was to succeed the Compact Disc: one with a number of defects inherent in its technology from the late 1970s.

Unfortunately, while its quality is recognized by audiophiles, the SA- CD was a commercial failure for several reasons, one of which is probably that this format does not really brought value to the 'normal' listener relative to the CD...

Today, the situation has changed and new solutions/technologies have emerged : computing capacity increased, flash memory democratization, ever more powerful electronic components... but ultimately, the final auditor has not benefited these advances .

The 'dematerialization' of music is currently fashionable but it also has some drawbacks: it requires to have a computer (and know how to use) , then have a suitable device and finally the formats (related to download/streaming) are constantly changing and are often encoded/compressed ...
The use of several methods of listening is not incompatible and may even be complementary :
- download/purchase/physical support for Hi-Fi listening HD D[SD]
As for the use of SD memory cards types, they have many advantages over optical media type (CD, DVD, Blu-ray) :
- no more mechanical problems wear, dust, scratches, fingerprints, etc ...
- electronic : complexity, laser wear, error correction, buffer, clock, etc ...
In addition, a system of protection of Copyright origin is provided in the SD format : Content Protection for Recordable Media (CPRM).
Also, the advantages over USB DACs that currently appear are undeniable :
- standalone operation, no computer required PC/Mac
- no problems with the USB interface connection, stability, synchronization, drivers, players, etc ...
- absolutely silent operation (no mechanical parts, fans, etc.)
- real physical support, robust, reliable and efficient
pour l'instant, du fait du peu d'outils d'enregistrement/édition adaptés, et à part certains SA-CD, un petit nombre d'enregistrements proposent une résolution 'DSD native'
column2: Cependant, en attendant le tout-DSD, la conversion de formats PCM de très haute qualité (24bits/192kHz ou supérieur) au format DSD permettra d'obtenir dans un premier temps une qualité compatible avec les exigences de la haute-fidélité.

column1: Aussi, si la demande est là, nul doute que l'industrie musicale saura s'adapter afin de proposer de vrais 'DSD'...
at this time, because of the few adapted recording/editing tools , and with the exception of some SA-CD, a small number of records can offer a resolution 'native DSD'
column2: However, waiting for the all–DSD, the conversion of high quality PCM formats (24bits/192kHz or higher) to DSD will provide initially a quality suitable for the requirements of high-fidelity…

column1: Also, if the demand is there, no doubt the music industry will adapt in order to provide real 'DSD' ...
Le but visé est l’amélioration globale de la qualité audio objective : définition, dynamique, distorsion, bande passante, spatialisation… afin de laisser s’exprimer la Musique !

Et le contexte actuel étant ce qu’il est, plusieurs aspects sont à prendre en compte :
The goal is the overall improvement in the objective audio quality : definition, dynamic, distortion, bandwidth, spatialisation... to let them express the Music!
And the current situation being what it is, several aspects should be taken into account :
L’ère du CD touche à sa fin et un nouveau modèle économique est donc à réinventer…

Actuellement on a le choix entre un modèle de type totalement dématérialisé par internet (téléchargement ou streaming) et un modèle de distribution classique de médias physiques : DVD-A, Blu-ray Pure Audio, (SD-ROM… ?)
Mais pourquoi pas imaginer un modèle 'hybride' de téléchargement HD associé à un support !? : certains sites spécialisés proposent d’ores et déjà des fichiers haute-qualité « Studio-Masters »…
Il suffira alors de copier ces fichiers .DSF ou .DSD sur une carte SD et on aura l’équivalent d’un CD 'gravé' mais avec la qualité d’un SA-CD (mais sans les problèmes mécaniques/optiques)…
Les 2 modèles peuvent en effet co-exister :
- téléchargement + mémoire flash (équivalent de l’actuel CD-RW 'réinscriptible')
- support physique avec mémoire de type ROM (idem CD pressé) + 'D[SD]pack' (packaging personnalisé/créatif)
The CD’s time coming to end and a new economic model is to reinventing ...

Currently there is a choice between a model type completely dematerialized by internet (download or streaming) and a classical distribution model of physical media : DVD-A, Pure Audio Blu-ray, (SD-ROM ... ? )
But why not imagine a 'hybrid' model of HD download associated with a support ? : Some specialty sites already offer high-quality files ""Studio-Masters"" ...
So, it just copy these files .DSF or .DSD on an SD card and we will have the equivalent of a CD 'engraved' but with the quality of a SA-CD (but without the mechanical/optical problems) ...
The two models can indeed co-exist :
- download + flash memory (equivalent to the current CD-RW)
- physical medium with a ROM type memory (as CD pressed) + 'D[SD]pack' (custom/creative packaging)

Pour information, voici un comparatif de la taille mémoire occupée en fonction de différents formats pour une piste de musique classique d’environ 10 minutes :
For information, here is a comparison of the memory occupied according to various formats for classical music track about 10 minutes:
On peut remarquer que le format DSD64 (non compressé) occupe moins d’espace que le format PCM24/192 (compression FLAC) et le DSD128 pèse presque deux fois moins lourd que son équivalent PCM (DXD)…
Une carte mémoire de 4Go suffirait pour stocker environ 74 minutes de musique (soit l’équivalent d’un CD) en très haute définition DSD128 non compressé.

Peu utilisée pour l’instant, la technologie de compression sans pertes DST (Direct Stream Transfer) permettra de réduire la taille occupée d’un facteur compris entre 2 et 3 (standard MPEG-4 Audio).
It may be noted that the DSD64 size (uncompressed) occupies less space than the size PCM24/192 (FLAC compression) and DSD128 weighs almost two times lighter than its equivalent PCM (DXD)...
A memory card of 4GB is enough to store about 74 minutes of music (equivalent of a CD) in high definition uncompressed DSD128.
Little used so far, the technology lossless compression DST (Direct Stream Transfer) will reduce the size occupied by a factor of between 2 and 3 (standard MPEG-4 Audio).

Depuis plusieurs années, les mélomanes avertis constatent une perte de qualité au niveau dynamique. En effet, encouragées par les auditeurs/consommateurs, certaines maisons de disque/producteurs ont participé à une course au volume sonore et cette demande ""je veux que mon disque sonne plus fort que celui de machin"" a abouti à des aberrations telle que la 'loudness war' (lien wiki)
L'arrivée d'un nouveau format permettrait de définir/normaliser la dynamique des programmes et enregistrements musicaux.

Comme amélioration, on peut imaginer des métadonnées contenues dans les fichiers permettant au lecteur d'auto-régler son volume afin d'homogénéiser les différences de niveaux d'écoute en fonction des D[SD] insérés…
Dans une perspective d’évolution, on peut aussi imaginer un processeur intégré qui adapte la dynamique des enregistrements en fonction du niveau de bruit environnant.
• End of the 'Loudness War' :

For several years, music lovers find a quality loss to Dynamic. In fact, encouraged by listeners/consumers , some record labels/producers participated in a race to volume and the demand ""I want my record sounds louder than other"" has led to aberrations such as 'loudness war' (wiki link)
The arrival of a new format would define/standardize the dynamic range of musical recordings and programs.
As an improvement, we can imagine some metadata contained in the files allowing players to self-adjust its volume to homogenize differences listening levels based on D[SD] inserted ...
In an evolution perspective, we can also imagine an embedded processor that adjust the dynamics of records based on surrounding noise level.
Les limites de la mondialisation débridée commencent à se faire sentir et une économie alternative est possible si les consommateurs deviennent acteurs…

Du fait de l’utilisation de technologies courantes et simples, la relocalisation de toute la filière musicale peut être envisagée : du producteur (groupes ou musiciens) au consomm’acteur’ (l’auditeur) en passant par toutes les étapes intermédiaires
column2: par exemple, pour des artistes locaux, des séries de 'D[SD]pack' peuvent être produites en petit nombre.

column1: Le rôle des disquaires (indépendants ou non) peut également s’étendre, par exemple en proposant des services et conseils adaptées/personnalisées.
Les 'D[SD]pack' seront de préférence en carton recyclé (+ écologique) et seront fortement personnalisables
column2: issus d’une production locale et respectueuse de l’environnement (imprimeurs labélisés Imprim'Vert).

column1: The limits of unbridled globalization begin to feel and an alternative economy is possible if consumers become actors...

Due to the use of easy and current technologies, the re-location of the entire music industry can be considered : from the producer (bands and musicians) to the consum'actor' (the listener) through all the intermediate steps
column2: for example, a series of 'D[SD]pack' can be produced in small numbers for local artists .

column1: The role of record stores (independent or not) can also be extended, for example by providing services and personalized/tailored advices.
The 'D[SD]pack' are preferably recycled cardboard (more ecological) and will be highly customizable, from an environment-friendly local production (ecological ink printers).

2014 sera-t-elle l’année de la haute-définition audio en D[SD] ?...
à vous de choisir !…
2014 will be the year of the high-definition audio in D[SD] ?...
the choice is yours !....

AudioFEEL.fr
Follow the progress of the project on Facebook page or website:
Audio-FEEL.com

Le lecteur D[SD] 'd-play' est le précurseur d’une nouvelle génération de lecteurs audio réellement Haute-Fidélité !
The D[SD] player 'd-play' is the precursor of a new generation of truly high-fidelity audio players!
Avec le lecteur D[SD] d-play AudioFEEL :
- le premier lecteur D[SD] ‘solid state’ autonome
- composants et conception de qualité audiophile
- formats haute définition: DSD64 (2.8MHz) et DSD128 (5.6MHz)
- cartes mémoire Secure Digital (RAM ou ROM) type SDHC (2 Go - 32 Go)
- sortie ligne sur connecteurs RCA dorés
- sortie casque (Jack 6.35mm) en face-avant avec amplificateur dédié
- réglage du volume de sortie avec fonction ‘mute’
- éco-conception garantie 'made in France' en collaboration avec AudioTouch
prix public final: estimé entre 550€ et 650€
- the first 'solid state' D[SD] standalone player
- High Definition Formats: DSD64 (2.8MHz) and DSD128 (5.6MHz)
- memory cards Secure Digital (RAM or ROM) SDHC type (2 Go - 32 Go)
- headphones output (6.35mm Jack) in front panel with dedicated amplifier
- eco-design guarantee 'made in France' in collaboration with AudioTouch
l’ensemble des fonds récoltés seront répartis comme suit :
~10% : commissions/frais liés à la collecte de fonds
20% de TVA reversée sur les ventes
Le reste étant réparti à peu près également sur les 4 postes suivants:
- Achat des composants électroniques / pièces mécaniques
all funds raised will be distributed as follows:
The remainder split almost equally on the following four items:
- Purchase of electronic components / mechanical parts

AudioFEEL, c’est d’abord l’histoire d’une passion pour le son en général et la musique en particulier. Musicien amateur, ingénieur du son et électronicien, l’initiateur du projet AudioFEEL n’en est pas à son coup d’essai puisqu’il a été à l’origine de plusieurs projets associatifs et professionnels : Acoustic-Studio, Méleson Music, eXa Concept, AudioTouch…

Avec l’aide de partenaires spécialisés dans leurs domaines, toutes des PME locales, AudioFEEL s’efforce de trouver des solutions pratiques et innovantes afin de proposer une expérience sonore/musicale de qualité au plus grand nombre…

AudioFEEL is primarily the story of a passion for sound in general and music in particular. Amateur musician, sound engineer and electronician, the initiator of the project AudioFEEL is not at his first attempt as he was at the origin of several associations and professional projects: Acoustic-Studio, Méleson Music, eXa concept, AudioTouch...

With the help of partners specialized in their fields, all local businesses, AudioFEEL strives to find practical and innovative solutions to provide the best sound/music quality experience to as many...

DSD est un procédé de stockage de signaux audio sur un média numérique utilisé par Sony et Philips dans les années 1990 d'abord à des fins d'archivage puis commercialisé avec le format SA-CD. Bien que le résultat de ce procédé soit un flux numérique haute-fréquence composé de 0 et de 1, celui-ci se rapproche clairement du signal analogique original.

thanks to technology DSD 'Direct Stream Digital' or 'Delta-Sigma Direct' which overcomes the limitations imposed by the PCM 'Pulse Code Modulation' and derivatives ( .wav , AAC, CD ... etc. ) associated to a SD memory card media Type: whence codename D[SD].

DSD is a method of storing audio signals on digital media used by Sony and Philips in the 1990s first for the purpose of archiving then commercialized with the SA-CD format. Although the result of this process is a digital high-frequency streams compound of 0 and 1, this is clearly closer to the original analog signal.

Par analogie, cette modulation de largeur d'impulsion ou modulation de densité d’impulsions s’apparente un peu à la Pré-magnétisation HF ou Polarisation qui existait sur les 'antiques' magnétophones à bandes…
Ce procédé permet d’obtenir des performances dynamiques largement supérieures à tout autre format : 120 dB sur toute la bande passante utile.

De plus, par rapport aux formats de type PCM, le format DSD permet de s’affranchir des épineux problèmes de décimation et d’interpolation… sans compter les inconvénients résultants de 'Jitter' d’horloge et autres latences liées aux buffers/corrections d’erreurs critiques en PCM.
By analogy, this pulse width modulation or pulse density modulation is a bit like the HF pre-magnetization or polarization that existed on the 'vintage' magnetic tape recorders...
This method provides dynamic performance far above any other format: 120 dB on all the useful frequency range.

In addition, compared to PCM formats, DSD format allows to overcome difficult problems of decimation and interpolation ... not to mention the resulting disadvantages of 'Jitter' clock and other latencies related buffers/errors-corrections 'critical' in PCM.
Comparatif des topologies PCM / DSD :Comparison of PCM / DSD topologies:

Une tentative de commercialisation de ce format a été faite avec le Super Audio CD, dont l'objectif était de succéder au Compact Disc : celui-ci comportant un certain nombre de défauts inhérents à sa technologie datant de la fin des années 1970.

Malheureusement, alors que sa qualité est reconnue par les audiophiles, le SA-CD a été un échec commercial pour plusieurs raisons : l’une d’elle étant probablement que ce support n’apportait pas vraiment de valeur ajoutée à l’auditeur ‘normal’ par rapport au CD…Aujourd’hui, le contexte a changé et de nouvelles solutions/technologies sont apparues : augmentation des capacités de calcul, démocratisation des mémoires flash, composants électroniques toujours plus performants… mais en fin de compte, l’auditeur final n’a toujours pas profité de ces avancées.

La ‘dématérialisation’ de la musique est actuellement à la mode mais elle comporte également quelques inconvénients : elle nécessite de disposer d'un ordinateur (et savoir s’en servir), ensuite d’avoir un matériel adapté et enfin les formats (liés au téléchargement/streaming) évoluent sans cesse et sont très souvent encodés/compressés…
L’usage de plusieurs méthodes d’écoute n’est pas incompatible et peut même être complémentaire :
- téléchargement/achat/support physique pour écoute Hi-Fi haute définition D[SD]
Quant à l’utilisation de cartes mémoires type SD, celles-ci comportent de nombreux avantages par rapport aux supports de type optique (CD, DVD, Blu-ray) :
- plus de problèmes mécaniques : usure, poussière, rayures, traces de doigt, etc…
- électroniques : complexité, usure laser, correction d'erreurs, mémoire tampon, horloge, etc…
De plus, un système de protection de Copyright est prévu d’origine dans le format SD : Content Protection for Recordable Media (CPRM).
Aussi, les avantages par rapport aux DACs USB qui apparaissent actuellement sont indéniables :
- pas de problèmes liés à l’interface USB : connexion, stabilité, synchro, drivers, players, etc…
- fonctionnement absolument silencieux (pas de pièces mécaniques, ventilateurs, etc)
- vrai support physique, robuste, fiable et performant
An attempt to commercialize this format was made with the Super Audio CD, whose objective was to succeed the Compact Disc: one with a number of defects inherent in its technology from the late 1970s.

Unfortunately, while its quality is recognized by audiophiles, the SA- CD was a commercial failure for several reasons, one of which is probably that this format does not really brought value to the 'normal' listener relative to the CD...

Today, the situation has changed and new solutions/technologies have emerged : computing capacity increased, flash memory democratization, ever more powerful electronic components... but ultimately, the final auditor has not benefited these advances .

The 'dematerialization' of music is currently fashionable but it also has some drawbacks: it requires to have a computer (and know how to use) , then have a suitable device and finally the formats (related to download/streaming) are constantly changing and are often encoded/compressed ...
The use of several methods of listening is not incompatible and may even be complementary :
- download/purchase/physical support for Hi-Fi listening HD D[SD]
As for the use of SD memory cards types, they have many advantages over optical media type (CD, DVD, Blu-ray) :
- no more mechanical problems wear, dust, scratches, fingerprints, etc ...
- electronic : complexity, laser wear, error correction, buffer, clock, etc ...
In addition, a system of protection of Copyright origin is provided in the SD format : Content Protection for Recordable Media (CPRM).
Also, the advantages over USB DACs that currently appear are undeniable :
- standalone operation, no computer required PC/Mac
- no problems with the USB interface connection, stability, synchronization, drivers, players, etc ...
- absolutely silent operation (no mechanical parts, fans, etc.)
- real physical support, robust, reliable and efficient
pour l'instant, du fait du peu d'outils d'enregistrement/édition adaptés, et à part certains SA-CD, un petit nombre d'enregistrements proposent une résolution 'DSD native'
column2: Cependant, en attendant le tout-DSD, la conversion de formats PCM de très haute qualité (24bits/192kHz ou supérieur) au format DSD permettra d'obtenir dans un premier temps une qualité compatible avec les exigences de la haute-fidélité.

column1: Aussi, si la demande est là, nul doute que l'industrie musicale saura s'adapter afin de proposer de vrais 'DSD'...
at this time, because of the few adapted recording/editing tools , and with the exception of some SA-CD, a small number of records can offer a resolution 'native DSD'
column2: However, waiting for the all–DSD, the conversion of high quality PCM formats (24bits/192kHz or higher) to DSD will provide initially a quality suitable for the requirements of high-fidelity…

column1: Also, if the demand is there, no doubt the music industry will adapt in order to provide real 'DSD' ...
Le but visé est l’amélioration globale de la qualité audio objective : définition, dynamique, distorsion, bande passante, spatialisation… afin de laisser s’exprimer la Musique !

Et le contexte actuel étant ce qu’il est, plusieurs aspects sont à prendre en compte :The goal is the overall improvement in the objective audio quality : definition, dynamic, distortion, bandwidth, spatialisation... to let them express the Music!
And the current situation being what it is, several aspects should be taken into account :
L’ère du CD touche à sa fin et un nouveau modèle économique est donc à réinventer…

Actuellement on a le choix entre un modèle de type totalement dématérialisé par internet (téléchargement ou streaming) et un modèle de distribution classique de médias physiques : DVD-A, Blu-ray Pure Audio, (SD-ROM… ?)
Mais pourquoi pas imaginer un modèle 'hybride' de téléchargement HD associé à un support !? : certains sites spécialisés proposent d’ores et déjà des fichiers haute-qualité « Studio-Masters »…
Il suffira alors de copier ces fichiers .DSF ou .DSD sur une carte SD et on aura l’équivalent d’un CD 'gravé' mais avec la qualité d’un SA-CD (mais sans les problèmes mécaniques/optiques)…
Les 2 modèles peuvent en effet co-exister :
- téléchargement + mémoire flash (équivalent de l’actuel CD-RW 'réinscriptible')
- support physique avec mémoire de type ROM (idem CD pressé) + 'D[SD]pack' (packaging personnalisé/créatif)
The CD’s time coming to end and a new economic model is to reinventing ...

Currently there is a choice between a model type completely dematerialized by internet (download or streaming) and a classical distribution model of physical media : DVD-A, Pure Audio Blu-ray, (SD-ROM ... ? )
But why not imagine a 'hybrid' model of HD download associated with a support ? : Some specialty sites already offer high-quality files ""Studio-Masters"" ...
So, it just copy these files .DSF or .DSD on an SD card and we will have the equivalent of a CD 'engraved' but with the quality of a SA-CD (but without the mechanical/optical problems) ...
The two models can indeed co-exist :
- download + flash memory (equivalent to the current CD-RW)
- physical medium with a ROM type memory (as CD pressed) + 'D[SD]pack' (custom/creative packaging)

Pour information, voici un comparatif de la taille mémoire occupée en fonction de différents formats pour une piste de musique classique d’environ 10 minutes :For information, here is a comparison of the memory occupied according to various formats for classical music track about 10 minutes:
On peut remarquer que le format DSD64 (non compressé) occupe moins d’espace que le format PCM24/192 (compression FLAC) et le DSD128 pèse presque deux fois moins lourd que son équivalent PCM (DXD)…
Une carte mémoire de 4Go suffirait pour stocker environ 74 minutes de musique (soit l’équivalent d’un CD) en très haute définition DSD128 non compressé.

Peu utilisée pour l’instant, la technologie de compression sans pertes DST (Direct Stream Transfer) permettra de réduire la taille occupée d’un facteur compris entre 2 et 3 (standard MPEG-4 Audio).It may be noted that the DSD64 size (uncompressed) occupies less space than the size PCM24/192 (FLAC compression) and DSD128 weighs almost two times lighter than its equivalent PCM (DXD)...
A memory card of 4GB is enough to store about 74 minutes of music (equivalent of a CD) in high definition uncompressed DSD128.
Little used so far, the technology lossless compression DST (Direct Stream Transfer) will reduce the size occupied by a factor of between 2 and 3 (standard MPEG-4 Audio).

Depuis plusieurs années, les mélomanes avertis constatent une perte de qualité au niveau dynamique. En effet, encouragées par les auditeurs/consommateurs, certaines maisons de disque/producteurs ont participé à une course au volume sonore et cette demande ""je veux que mon disque sonne plus fort que celui de machin"" a abouti à des aberrations telle que la 'loudness war' (lien wiki)
L'arrivée d'un nouveau format permettrait de définir/normaliser la dynamique des programmes et enregistrements musicaux.

Comme amélioration, on peut imaginer des métadonnées contenues dans les fichiers permettant au lecteur d'auto-régler son volume afin d'homogénéiser les différences de niveaux d'écoute en fonction des D[SD] insérés…
Dans une perspective d’évolution, on peut aussi imaginer un processeur intégré qui adapte la dynamique des enregistrements en fonction du niveau de bruit environnant.

For several years, music lovers find a quality loss to Dynamic. In fact, encouraged by listeners/consumers , some record labels/producers participated in a race to volume and the demand ""I want my record sounds louder than other"" has led to aberrations such as 'loudness war' (wiki link)
The arrival of a new format would define/standardize the dynamic range of musical recordings and programs.
As an improvement, we can imagine some metadata contained in the files allowing players to self-adjust its volume to homogenize differences listening levels based on D[SD] inserted ...
In an evolution perspective, we can also imagine an embedded processor that adjust the dynamics of records based on surrounding noise level.
Les limites de la mondialisation débridée commencent à se faire sentir et une économie alternative est possible si les consommateurs deviennent acteurs…

Du fait de l’utilisation de technologies courantes et simples, la relocalisation de toute la filière musicale peut être envisagée : du producteur (groupes ou musiciens) au consomm’acteur’ (l’auditeur) en passant par toutes les étapes intermédiaires

AudioFEEL, c’est d’abord l’histoire d’une passion pour le son en général et la musique en particulier. Musicien amateur, ingénieur du son et électronicien, l’initiateur du projet AudioFEEL n’en est pas à son coup d’essai puisqu’il a été à l’origine de plusieurs projets associatifs et professionnels : Acoustic-Studio, Méleson Music, eXa Concept, AudioTouch…

Avec l’aide de partenaires spécialisés dans leurs domaines, toutes des PME locales, AudioFEEL s’efforce de trouver des solutions pratiques et innovantes afin de proposer une expérience sonore/musicale de qualité au plus grand nombre…

AudioFEEL is primarily the story of a passion for sound in general and music in particular. Amateur musician, sound engineer and electronician, the initiator of the project AudioFEEL is not at his first attempt as he was at the origin of several associations and professional projects: Acoustic-Studio, Méleson Music, eXa concept, AudioTouch...

With the help of partners specialized in their fields, all local businesses, AudioFEEL strives to find practical and innovative solutions to provide the best sound/music quality experience to as many...",8.0,0,"2 Campaigns
