column3:
showinfo=0"">
 

 

We are partnering with designers and artists (everyone from painters to graffiti artists) to expand the options for earcaps. Not only will you be able to choose from different colors, we'll also be offering earcaps and earpads in a range of shapes and materials like leather, plastic, and metal, for example. All of the new options will be compatible with your headphones so you can build on to your collection until your choices become virtually infinite.             

Back Stereocap today and start your revolution in music and style!

 

According to French law we offer a two years warranty on every pair of Stereocap headphones.

 

Our team reflects the blend of style and technology that is the Stereocap. Our core team includes industrial designers and engineers, marketing and branding experts in fashion, and consumer electronics specialists.  

Relative to design and product application we have worked with the OvaDesign agency, specializing in the design of connected objects. We've worked together throughout every stage of product development.        

To get to where we are now, we've been working since 2015 to build our team and develop Stereocap. Stereocap has come a long way since the very first model. After tedious trials of testing and research, we've finalized our prototype and are ready for production.

 

 

For technical questions about contributing on Indiegogo, you can reach the Indiegogo Team at support@indiegogo.com              

For questions about STEREOCAP, you can reach our team at contact@stereocap.com

Distribution Inquiries: contact@stereocap.com

Press Inquiries: pr@stereocap.com

Auri is the all-in-one solution for your bedroom. It is the beautifully designed, award-winning, intelligent light with magical lighting, premium sound, smart charging for your devices, and Alexa build-in. It's the ultimate all-in-one device that enlightens every moment of your home from morning until night.

column1: We all had those moments, that we are stressed, we are anxious, these emotions scramble our brain and make it hard for us to concentrate and focus, these negative energies trouble us and make it hard for us to fall asleep and relax. HERE COMES THE SOLUTION!

The 'Aurish Therapy' is your secret gate to the mother nature. According to studies, getting closer to nature can effectively lower your stress, release your anxiety and live a longer life.

The Auri Light is the AI-empowered atmospheric lights can simulate thousands of different nature environments such as Rainforests, Beaches, Islands, Oceans, and more. Auri also offers thousands of unique ambient sounds which can help you focus at work, sleep better at night, and improve your mood.

 

 

We have defined 26 combinations of light and sound to sync with your daily mood. Through ""Aurish"" you'll be guided through a soothing and immersive ambient experience to lift your mood, help relax during meditation, or simply drift off to sleep.

column3:
>

 

We have all had one of those nights which we had serious trouble falling asleep. The Auri light is the first device in the world using light, sound, and fragrance to help you fall asleep faster, wake up refreshed, and with an aim to improve your sleep quality.

 

 

Before you fall asleep, the Auri Light will play your favorite ambient sound with warm lighting to help you sleep. When you wake up during the night, Auri Light will light up softly and guide your way. In the morning, Auri will gently tune up the sunlight setting and wake you up with your favorite music or radio station.
column5:
Yoga

 

Auri is the perfect companion for yoga and meditation. The built-in unique sounds and add-on oil diffuser can provide an easy solution for your peace of mind, helping keep the mind sharp, relieve stress and anxiety, and allow you to come away relaxed and prepared to take on the world.
column7:

With one tap from your phone, Auri can tune into different light and audio modes. Preset everything such as romantic lighting, some smooth jazz, and the fragrance you favor, and Auri will have prepared the perfect date night for you and your loved one. (Roses not included ?)
column10:

Music and gaming is the perfect way to relax after work. It’s made even better with Auri as Auri understands and reacts to your music and surroundings. Auri features a world-class sound system designed by top acoustic experts featuring technology that projects mind-blowing sound in every direction. What does this mean? It means Auri immerses you in crystal clear sound no matter where you are in the room.

 

 

 

Auri offers fantastic sound quality with its advanced full range transducer with passive radiators to deliver high-quality sounds. Paired with the omnidirectional acoustic deflector, Auri spreads consistent sound coverage to every corner in your room.

Auri also offers high fidelity audio thanks to the PureTone audio and PurePath HybridFlow processing structure. The copper capped T-pole also reduces inductance, significantly improving high-frequency responses while keeping least low-frequency distortion.
column11:

The Omnidirectional Acoustic Deflector at the bottom of Auri directs the sound from the Transducer which evenly spreads the sound wave with uniform 3D coverage of the room's surroundings for a premium 360-degree sound experience.

Auri also guarantees over 50,000+ hours of lighting.

Auri also offers thousands of unique ambient sounds which can help you focus at work, sleep better at night, and improve your mood.  We have defined 26 combinations of light and sound to sync with your daily mood. Through ""Aurish"" you'll be guided through a soothing and immersive ambient experience to lift your mood, help relax during meditation, or simply drift off to sleep.

Sleep Aid & Natural Wake Up  We have all had one of those nights which we had serious trouble falling asleep. The Auri light is the first device in the world using light, sound, and fragrance to help you fall asleep faster, wake up refreshed, and with an aim to improve your sleep quality.  Before you fall asleep, the Auri Light will play your favorite ambient sound with warm lighting to help you sleep. When you wake up during the night, Auri Light will light up softly and guide your way. In the morning, Auri will gently tune up the sunlight setting and wake you up with your favorite music or radio station. Perfect Companion for Meditation & Yoga Auri is the perfect companion for yoga and meditation. The built-in unique sounds and add-on oil diffuser can provide an easy solution for your peace of mind, helping keep the mind sharp, relieve stress and anxiety, and allow you to come away relaxed and prepared to take on the world. Romance With one tap from your phone, Auri can tune into different light and audio modes. Preset everything such as romantic lighting, some smooth jazz, and the fragrance you favor, and Auri will have prepared the perfect date night for you and your loved one. (Roses not included ?) Enjoy Music & Game Music and gaming is the perfect way to relax after work. It’s made even better with Auri as Auri understands and reacts to your music and surroundings. Auri features a world-class sound system designed by top acoustic experts featuring technology that projects mind-blowing sound in every direction. What does this mean? It means Auri immerses you in crystal clear sound no matter where you are in the room.   Auri offers fantastic sound quality with its advanced full range transducer with passive radiators to deliver high-quality sounds. Paired with the omnidirectional acoustic deflector, Auri spreads consistent sound coverage to every corner in your room.Auri also offers high fidelity audio thanks to the PureTone audio and PurePath HybridFlow processing structure. The copper capped T-pole also reduces inductance, significantly improving high-frequency responses while keeping least low-frequency distortion.  The Omnidirectional Acoustic Deflector at the bottom of Auri directs the sound from the Transducer which evenly spreads the sound wave with uniform 3D coverage of the room's surroundings for a premium 360-degree sound experience.   Auri's Built-in dash Charge USB port is the best charging solution for your nightstand.  No more looking for power outlets in the dark.   With Alexa built in and multi-directional voice detection, you can control all your smart home devices such as NEST, Hive, TP-Link, Wemo, and more, with the most popular and familiar voice assistant. All in one neat little package.   Not all the lights are created equal. Auri's LED light belts emit light onto the outer shell which diffuses evenly making it bright and free of glare. Furthermore, unlike traditional energy saving bulbs, Auri offers flickers free light which is closer to natural light and gives you a better reading experience. Auri also guarantees over 50,000+ hours of lighting. Flicker-free and energy saving, no glare, and 50,000+ hours life    Multiple AI interactions (voice, infrared sensing, touch & app) to give you a smart life of the technology. Voice Control With Auri’s built-in Voice AI, you can play your favorite music, check the latest news, command all smart devices in your home all with your voice. The 4-microphone matrix on the top of Auri allows it to hear from you in all directions. Auri is always there ready to help. Infrared Sensing By using human detection technology, Auri knows when you arrive at home, get up at night, or just walking by the living room to get a cup of coffee in the morning. This means you will always be welcomed with Auri’s gentle and warm lighting.*Auri Motion Sensor needs to be purchased separately. Touch Control The elegant designed gold touch panel on the top of Auri allows you to access the full control of Auri light in one place. App Control Auri’s App is designed for easy to a selection of all lighting modes. You can also customize your Auri light settings through its simple and intuitive user interface.   Auri team worked with the famous sound artist Xingyu Li who spends his time traveling around the world recording sounds from nature such as the rainforest, birds, and the waves moving across the water, so that we can offer unique, ambient sounds specifically curated for Auri. We're incredibly proud of the ambient sounds we've created to help you focus during meditation, lull you to sleep or to relax after work.   The design of Auri originated from the wonders of nature including the Antelope Canyon, Terraced Fields, rolling deserts, and many others areas of the world where the earth moves and slopes The simple and parametric design language delivers a humble yet stylish look to any home. Auri can perfectly blend in with any modern home thanks to its elegant yet rational design.  Auri Oil Diffuser With various accessories specifically selected for Auri, there are numerous combinations waiting for you to customize for your ideal lifestyle. (i.e. we strongly suggest you to use Auri oil diffuser to introduce a scent of nature and zen in your room, and bring peace and tranquility through the sense trinity of visual, hearing and smell for your yoga and meditation practice.) Auri Motion Sensor Motion sensor makes Auri more powerful. It is tiny, adaptive, easy to install, always attentive. Just attach it on the ceiling or door frame, wherever you would wake up Auri. Secet natural lighting or automated wake-up modes in the Auri App to define how Auri reacts to you.  As a global AI technology company, Ling Technology strives to find the most intuitive way of interaction, and to design a series of AI consumer products that will push the limit of industry. We are dedicated in becoming the premiere brand in global consumer AI product market.        We have been able to keep the risk low thanks to our experience creating world class hardware before, and have worked with the factory in the past so have realistic expectations regarding timelines and delivery.The challenge is to create an app everyone can use, and we are working hard to build something we are each proud of. Software is always a tricky fish, but we believe our team can handle it expertly and give you a great experience.",51.0,2,"1 Campaign
Have you ever become pleasantly zoned out while watching Bob Ross or listening to someone tap their nails? If so, then you've probably experienced ASMR.

ASMR (or autonomous sensory meridian response) is a deeply relaxing experience in which certain sounds trigger a tingly feeling in your body. People describe it as chill, blissful, even euphoric–and it can be brought on by something as simple as listening to someone brush their hair, whisper, or crinkle paper. It may sound a little out there, but it's hugely popular. (Perhaps you've read about how Cardi B's a fan or seen the ASMR commercial featuring Zoë Kravitz?)

Whether you're a longtime ASMR enthusiast or just curious, we have a first of its kind product that we think you'll love.

 

Experience ASMR Like Never Before
It's called SleepPhones®: ASMR Edition, and it's the first headphones to come preloaded with ASMR content. (Eight hours, in fact!)

And these aren't just any headphones–they're SleepPhones®, the world's most comfortable headphones for sleeping and relaxing. SleepPhones® feature flat speakers in a soft, stretchy headband. They also contain a thin, flexible module with a button that lets you play, pause, skip tracks, and control the volume. With SleepPhones®: ASMR Edition, there's no external device or cords–just simple headphones that can play for 20 hours from a three-hour charge.

You'll love the superior sound quality from the eco-friendly, lead-free speakers. Ditto for the comfortable headband made from our proprietary SheepCloud™ fabric. Our headbands are machine washable and come in two fabrics: warm Fleece and moisture-wicking Breeze. You can also choose from three sizes and lots of great colors!

We worked with 16 top ASMRtists from all over the world to create the preloaded recordings for SleepPhones®: ASMR Edition. You'll enjoy everything from rhythmic tapping to light scratching to peaceful Italian whisperings. And you'll enjoy lots of it because these artists have recorded 8 hours of deeply relaxing ASMR content for your listening pleasure!

Imagine slipping a soft, pliable headband over your ears. A small button in the back of the headband cues hours of ASMR to start playing. This button also lets you adjust the volume and skip tracks. There are no ads, no blue light from a device, and no scrolling–just a whole lot of incredibly relaxing ASMR ready for you to enjoy.

 

Unwind with These ASMRtists

We spent many months gathering just the right mix of ASMRtists for this special project. We're proud to include the following 16 ASMRtists on SleepPhones®: ASMR Edition. Collectively, they have 2.4 million YouTube subscribers!
Be calm with Becca ASMR

WhisperAudios ASMR

 

 A Bit More About Us
Our company is called AcousticSheep LLC, and we're the inventors of SleepPhones®, the world's first and most comfortable headphones for sleeping.

They say necessity is the mother of invention, and that was certainly the case when it came to SleepPhones®. After taking patient phone calls late into the night, Dr. Wei-Shin Lai wanted to listen to relaxing music in bed. But only bulky headphones or uncomfortable earbuds were on the market. So she and her husband decided to design comfortable headband headphones you can wear in bed–even if you sleep on your side.

SleepPhones® feature wafer-thin speakers in a super soft headband so anyone can easily and comfortably listen to music, audio books, meditation tracks, and more in bed. Since 2007, our company has sold more than one million SleepPhones® and won many awards for our patented invention.

Beyond helping people sleep and relax, SleepPhones® became very popular within the ASMR community. Some of the top ASMR YouTube artists have promoted our products to their millions of followers for years. That got us thinking: Why not marry SleepPhones® award-winning design with great ASMR content?
Soon, that will be a reality with SleepPhones®: ASMR Edition.

Make your Christmas special ever. All the orders will be sent out in November of 2019. You can give it to your beloved ones as a best Christmas gift. Or you can take it to bump your Christmas party, making it most special ever.

What is the key feature that your dreamed wireless speaker supposed to have? Better sound? Longer battery life? More entertained? Actually it isn’t hard to find a wireless speaker that meets all your requirements but the price goes relatively high under big brand names. We OUTXE as a best value creator, aim to provide you a versatile premium solution at a fairly low price. OUTXE Joybeats features:

You will always feel like there is something missed in a party when hearing the tedious music coming from the speakers. And now, bringing Joybeats speaker to the party will make a total difference. Carrying it means bring a small band with you. Tapping 5 different places on the speaker to create different beats to the tempo of the sound, you will add more fun to your party time. You will find your party can also be heated in such a way.

OUTXE Joybeats is carefully designed to be a not-just-loudspeaker, as it gives you a whole-directional sound experience thanks to the angled complete mesh all around, The auto-drivers are forward-facing to provide front-facing audio, and the new DSP technology delivers music to a wider range of area.

Joybeats makes your dream of party time anywhere come true, by the pool, on the beach or on the sea. No more threats from water or splash, which used to invade your speaker, to cause a bothering interruption of the music playing at a climax.

This time, we are aiming at making your happy time more unforgettable than ever before. Joybeats is such an amazing speakers. When the music is on, the light effect on Joybeats is designed to flash or breath different light colors synced up with your playing of music. An eye-shaped light will wink at you when the music is on.  A luminous angel in hand, an enthusiastic fire in your heart.

The more, the better. You may feel a single speaker is not powerful enough to pounding the heart of the party, Here Joybeats, an innovative Bluetooth-enabled device, will give you a double-enhanced music experience. The music will not be limited in one space anymore. You can take control of your environment by pairing two individual Joybeats speakers with the True Wireless Stereo Mode, to rock all the ears. Since now, with the play of music synced on the two speakers at the same time, every party moment is to be a climax anytime. 

Unlimited enjoyable playing time seems impossible in every speaker at present. But we have extend your music time as long as we can to a lasting 15+ hours here from Joybeats. With a built-in large capacity battery that runs efficiently, the music will be on without a stop. Stay up now to have a  festival time all night long. 

Wireless is also well employed in this OUTXE Speaker. With a wireless pairing range of 20M, you can connect your devices remotely to take control of the music your party will be sank into.  Now enjoy the music in a wireless way. 

Thanks to the smoothly triangular cylinder covered with a layer of grinding abrasive cloth, Joybeats is friendly to grip. You can hold it firmly and there is no chance to drop. Small and compact body design makes Joybeats convenient to take on the go. Or you can hang it on your backpack with the provided lanyard. 

On any adventure, there are always expected to be some rough and windy roads ahead. Don't be dragged down from the music for those craggy and uneven roads! Joybeats features a robust construction complete with a solid case with impact-absorbing silica gel to protect the inner components. Whatever they are, gentle or tough, Joybeats can always take it.
The following video demonstrated a fully functional pre-production OUTXE JoyBeats with all functions working.

OUTXE is a professional team aimed at facilitating your outdoor adventures and activities, hoping to make every of your outdoor experience the most unforgettable moment in your life. We want to make every moment of the party time more remarkable and enjoyable than ever before.

We had a preliminary concept of the speaker in September of 2018. After several trial production ended in May of 2019, we launched here our Indiegogo campaign, OUTXE JoyBeats - The coolest IPX7 waterproof wireless speaker, never stop beats with tapping , which is specially designed for parties, indoor or outdoors, and we always carefully consider the quality of the materials we use, the cost, the environment – and ultimately, your satisfaction.  

We exerted no efforts for months in developing, testing and prototyping, even completed the molding before the campaign started. We are in want of your supports to start the mass production and make this project a reality.

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

column1:
0,"

Podcaster Pro™ 

Creating podcasts takes passion, time, and energy!

By podcasting, you have already made a substantial commitment because you care about your message.

You don't want to ruin the show with poor sound quality. But you also don't want to spend several hours editing a 30-minute show!
column4:
showinfo=0"">

The secret to a great sounding podcast, created in barely more time than it takes to record it, is professional quality live recording.

Adam Curry, like other radio professionals, couldn't spend hours in post production during live broadcasts, so instead, he relied on professional level gear that can provide a clean live sound, requiring no post production editing.

Using this same method Adam creates 6hr of podcasts every week, which is ready and uploaded in less than 30 minutes. 

Adam has spent tens if not hundreds of thousands of dollars on audio gear over the last 30 years. Over the last 18 months, his knowledge has gone into designing and prototyping a single, small audio device that he currently uses for his own podcast. Now he'd like to share that device with you.

Introducing the Podcaster Pro™

The Podcaster Pro™ is designed from the ground up to provide the best possible audio quality for either live streaming or recording.

Every component, from custom chip programming, to board design, to case design, to the custom knobs, has been rigorously engineered to Adam's specifications, giving you his years of experience in Radio and Television to create the single most ergonomic all-in-one audio processing device for podcasters and voice over talent.

 

No other product provides all of the functionality of the Podcaster Pro™ in a small portable package at this incredible low Indiegogo price level.

The Podcaster Pro™ lets you tailor recording options using an intuitive interface of just 2 dials and 3 soft buttons. All parameters can be adjusted and then saved to memory for later recall. You can also reset the box to Adam's personal presets at the push of a button!
column7:
showinfo=0"">

Podcaster Pro™ Audio Specs

6 Input channels total

column1: • 1x stereo Mix Minus for Skype via USB

2x headphones with independent volume controls

4x independent noise gates

5x compressors/limiters 

2x A class preamps

5x independent EQs

2x cough switches

Club 33 - A members-only community of Podcaster Pro™ supporters where Adam will post training videos on getting the best sound for your podcast. Even if you don't buy the Podcaster Pro™ (and you should) you will learn something from the training.
Podcaster Pro™ - Whether you get the Earlybird or the regular version, you will be getting the only audio device incorporating all of Adam's designs in a small, portable package.
Mic Combo will include the Podcaster Pro™ as well as a Mic selected by Adam as a great mid-priced option. Adam is still testing mics so details won't be announced until later.
Headphone Combo will include the Podcaster Pro™ and a pair of headphones tested and selected by Adam. Adam is still testing headsets so details won't be announced until later.

Signature Edition Podcaster Pro™ - There are a number of signature edition versions. The functionality of the signature editions is identical to the standard edition. *-What makes these editions special is that they look nicer, with an upgraded material on the sides (TBD polished painted wood, carbon fiber, etc) and they have a signature laser engraved of either Adam or one of the other Signature Edition partners. Buying a Signature Edition means you want to support this project above and beyond simply buying the cheapest version. You want to help us make this a company which will develop other innovative audio products after this campaign is over. As a way of thanking you for that level of support, we provide an upgraded, signed and numbered limited edition of the Podcaster Pro™. They will only be available during the campaign, and once they are gone, no more will be made.

Adam recording a Station ID - is a perk that in only available when ordering an Adam Curry Signature Edition Podcaster Pro. This will mean that Adam will record and send you a station ID similar to ""This is Adam Curry and you're listening to PODCASTNAME""

Ticket to Podcast Movement 17 - is a very special perk that will let you purchase a heavily discounted ticket to the Event bundled with the cheapest Podcaster Pro™. This gives the buyer a $250 discount off the current ticket price as well as a great price for the Podcaster Pro™

Adam Hand Built Edition Podcaster Pro is one of the first 10 units that are built, with Adam doing all the 'non-robot' assembly himself. These units will be the first to ship, and of course, there are just a few produced. This version includes signatures by all 3 of the principles inside the case - just like the original Mac did.

To get volume discounts necessary to mass produce the Podcaster Pro™ at a reasonable price, we need to raise a minimum of $500,000. At that level, we will be able to manufacture and deliver the PodcasterPro™ to all the contributors, pay off existing design expenses from the last 18 months, and cover large one-time costs like board R&
column2: D, firmware development, and factory mold making.

column1: As a stretch goal, at $1,000,000 raised, we will be able to continue manufacturing the Podcaster Pro™ for sale at retail. So even if you don't buy one through this campaign, help get the word out so that we are able to offer it beyond this single Indiegogo campaign. We will additionally unlock more color options than Black, once we hit $1mil.
By pledging the money to allow us to manufacture the Podcaster Pro™ you will receive perks at your level of contribution.

We will continue producing prototypes and tweaking parameters during the rest of the campaign. Any issues we find and rectify will enable a faster transition to manufacturing. For this reason please be patient if we are slow to answer questions - were probably working on the product.
At the end of the campaign, we hope to take the hand wired boards and put in the order for mass production, as well as purchase enough components to fulfill all orders and still have extras.

August and September will be busy for board assembly and getting production of non-electronic parts such as the case and buttons put into full production. While we are using US Manufacturing, some parts may still have long shipping or delays in machine time. We will also be showing the device at Podcast Movement 17 - so if you ordered, you will be able to have the first look there.

Our goal is to have the first small batch of fully functioning units done in October. This will allow the first tiers to be fulfilled. Since things move slowly in November and December, we need to be sure October production is up to speed to ensure that deliveries of the Signature Editions are done in December. While it is fully our intention to ship units out in December, please consider expecting a unit before Christmas a high risk. There are too many possible delays, not the least of which is UPS and Fedex having millions of extra shipments, that may cause delays, even if we are able to ship before Dec 23.

Our plan is to have the largest production runs in January through March. Shipping units based on perks selected and date of pledge. So keep in mind that people in the same perk group may get shipments that are a month apart simply based on how long they waited during the campaign before commiting. Commit early! Commit often!

While the original idea of the Podcaster Pro™ originated with Adam Curry over a decade ago, to make this idea a reality, a team of experts was needed. About 18 months ago Adam reached out to Gene Naftulyev and Charles Thompson to see if it could be feasible to turn his idea into reality.
That was the birth of Small Batch Audio: the company formed in Austin, TX to design and develop the un-named all-in-one audio device.
Over the course of the next 18 months work was started both to design the hardware based on Adam's specs, and to ensure a  successful Indiegogo campaign.

From the product side this meant not only figuring out which components would meet the requirements and designing a way for them to work together, but also designing a case that is small enough to be portable, and yet able to allow heat to dissipate without use of fans which would be a problem in a studio environment. Additionally, the ergonomics and UI/UX had to be developed to provide an interface that didn't complicate the normal audio recording workflow.

Testing of individual components began 6mo into the project and the first functional, but not pretty, functional prototype board was created. Then during the next several months' firmware and software was written to allow seamless use of the product. Meanwhile, case design was being done to accommodate the hardware. Production of a prototype case would not be possible for months - until final dimensions of the pre-production circuit boards were finalized.

While most of the design work was finished, there were still several questions about sourcing components that could not be answered. Starting a campaign at that point in time would not be unusual, however, the team felt that it is better to delay the launch of the Indiegogo campaign until all of these questions were answered.

column2: />Around March 2017, enough work had been done on the prototype that unanswered questions were all gone and the work to get ready for the campaign began. Several hours of video footage, both for the pre-launch site - http://smallbatch.audio - and for the campaign had been shot and were being edited down to 2 minutes. Both Indiegogo and Kickstarter were considered, but Indiegogo was chosen due to its bigger commitment to the Audio and Hardware space that the product occupied. In a nutshell, more people would see the product on Indiegogo who were not already following the project. This extra audience gave Indiegogo a definite advantage.

column3: />Adam Curry - aka Podfather - Pirate radio DJ, MTV Host,  Founder of OnRamp Inc., co-inventor of Podcasting, and the man who has been podcasting longer than anyone else!

column1: Having been born in the US, but grown up in the Netherlands, Adam has been straddling two universes ever since.

Adam combines business acumen, creative genius, and a hackers thirst for knowledge in a single person. Adam's search for a non-existent product led him to research requirements and find a team of people to help make his dream a reality. K5ACC

column3: />Gene Naftulyev - aka Sir Gene Duke of the South - A multi-time C-Level executive, author, speaker, business consultant and auditor with a proven record of successfully building and selling companies over the last 20 years.

column1: Born in Putinland aka Russia, Gene grew up in the United States and only went to the Netherlands after Adam left there. Gene has worked as a consultant to some of the biggest companies and government contractors in the world. Eventually, Gene found more satisfaction in working with younger, more agile companies to help them avoid the mistakes typical of growth and stagnation. KF5TBE

column2: />Charlie Thompson - aka GrummanGuy - Charlie Thompson has over 38 years of design and technical management experience in the semiconductor industry including Motorola, Crystal Semiconductor, SiliconLabs, and Intersil. Mr. Thompson led teams developing products including high-resolution analog to digital converters, audio A/D converters, telecom applications, digital signal processors, video processors, as well as RF CMOS-based Sirius-XM Satellite Radio. Charlie holds 16 U.S. Patents granted and 5 applications pending. W5CDT

column1: If you have published about the Podcaster Pro™, please let us know so we can link back to the story.
• While we have spent 18 months designing, testing, and creating prototypes, we will only start manufacturing after a successful campaign. So unforeseen manufacturing problems may cause delays.
• Our delivery timeline is based on best-case-scenario for smooth manufacturing and shipping times.
• We will do everything possible minimize delays, there may be 3rd party delays which are out of our control.
• So we would ask you to consider all dates mentioned as our best estimates at the time of launch.
• While all products will be tested prior to shipping, if there are defects in a shipped product, we will have a support department to deal with replacements.
• Rewards for the Podcaster Pro™ will be shipped by perk group, and by date of contribution.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
• Post stories and link to this campaign on Podcasting Social Media groups!
• Ask friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
• Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools for social media to spread the word!

","Podcaster Pro™ Creating podcasts takes passion, time, and energy!By podcasting, you have already made a substantial commitment because you care about your message.You don't want to ruin the show with poor sound quality. But you also don't want to spend several hours editing a 30-minute show! The secret to a great sounding podcast, created in barely more time than it takes to record it, is professional quality live recording.Adam Curry, like other radio professionals, couldn't spend hours in post production during live broadcasts, so instead, he relied on professional level gear that can provide a clean live sound, requiring no post production editing.Using this same method Adam creates 6hr of podcasts every week, which is ready and uploaded in less than 30 minutes. Adam has spent tens if not hundreds of thousands of dollars on audio gear over the last 30 years. Over the last 18 months, his knowledge has gone into designing and prototyping a single, small audio device that he currently uses for his own podcast. Now he'd like to share that device with you.Introducing the Podcaster Pro™The Podcaster Pro™ is designed from the ground up to provide the best possible audio quality for either live streaming or recording.Every component, from custom chip programming, to board design, to case design, to the custom knobs, has been rigorously engineered to Adam's specifications, giving you his years of experience in Radio and Television to create the single most ergonomic all-in-one audio processing device for podcasters and voice over talent. No other product provides all of the functionality of the Podcaster Pro™ in a small portable package at this incredible low Indiegogo price level.The Podcaster Pro™ lets you tailor recording options using an intuitive interface of just 2 dials and 3 soft buttons. All parameters can be adjusted and then saved to memory for later recall. You can also reset the box to Adam's personal presets at the push of a button! Podcaster Pro™ Audio Specs6 Input channels total
1x stereo Mix Minus for Skype via USB
2x headphones with independent volume controls4x independent noise gates5x compressors/limiters 2x A class preamps5x independent EQs2x cough switches

Club 33 - A members-only community of Podcaster Pro™ supporters where Adam will post training videos on getting the best sound for your podcast. Even if you don't buy the Podcaster Pro™ (and you should) you will learn something from the training.
Podcaster Pro™ - Whether you get the Earlybird or the regular version, you will be getting the only audio device incorporating all of Adam's designs in a small, portable package.
Mic Combo will include the Podcaster Pro™ as well as a Mic selected by Adam as a great mid-priced option. Adam is still testing mics so details won't be announced until later.
Headphone Combo will include the Podcaster Pro™ and a pair of headphones tested and selected by Adam. Adam is still testing headsets so details won't be announced until later.

Signature Edition Podcaster Pro™ - There are a number of signature edition versions. The functionality of the signature editions is identical to the standard edition. *-What makes these editions special is that they look nicer, with an upgraded material on the sides (TBD polished painted wood, carbon fiber, etc) and they have a signature laser engraved of either Adam or one of the other Signature Edition partners. Buying a Signature Edition means you want to support this project above and beyond simply buying the cheapest version. You want to help us make this a company which will develop other innovative audio products after this campaign is over. As a way of thanking you for that level of support, we provide an upgraded, signed and numbered limited edition of the Podcaster Pro™. They will only be available during the campaign, and once they are gone, no more will be made.

Adam recording a Station ID - is a perk that in only available when ordering an Adam Curry Signature Edition Podcaster Pro. This will mean that Adam will record and send you a station ID similar to ""This is Adam Curry and you're listening to PODCASTNAME""

Ticket to Podcast Movement 17 - is a very special perk that will let you purchase a heavily discounted ticket to the Event bundled with the cheapest Podcaster Pro™. This gives the buyer a $250 discount off the current ticket price as well as a great price for the Podcaster Pro™

Adam Hand Built Edition Podcaster Pro is one of the first 10 units that are built, with Adam doing all the 'non-robot' assembly himself. These units will be the first to ship, and of course, there are just a few produced. This version includes signatures by all 3 of the principles inside the case - just like the original Mac did.

To get volume discounts necessary to mass produce the Podcaster Pro™ at a reasonable price, we need to raise a minimum of $500,000. At that level, we will be able to manufacture and deliver the PodcasterPro™ to all the contributors, pay off existing design expenses from the last 18 months, and cover large one-time costs like board R&D, firmware development, and factory mold making.

As a stretch goal, at $1,000,000 raised, we will be able to continue manufacturing the Podcaster Pro™ for sale at retail. So even if you don't buy one through this campaign, help get the word out so that we are able to offer it beyond this single Indiegogo campaign. We will additionally unlock more color options than Black, once we hit $1mil.
By pledging the money to allow us to manufacture the Podcaster Pro™ you will receive perks at your level of contribution.

We will continue producing prototypes and tweaking parameters during the rest of the campaign. Any issues we find and rectify will enable a faster transition to manufacturing. For this reason please be patient if we are slow to answer questions - were probably working on the product.
At the end of the campaign, we hope to take the hand wired boards and put in the order for mass production, as well as purchase enough components to fulfill all orders and still have extras.

August and September will be busy for board assembly and getting production of non-electronic parts such as the case and buttons put into full production. While we are using US Manufacturing, some parts may still have long shipping or delays in machine time. We will also be showing the device at Podcast Movement 17 - so if you ordered, you will be able to have the first look there.

Our goal is to have the first small batch of fully functioning units done in October. This will allow the first tiers to be fulfilled. Since things move slowly in November and December, we need to be sure October production is up to speed to ensure that deliveries of the Signature Editions are done in December. While it is fully our intention to ship units out in December, please consider expecting a unit before Christmas a high risk. There are too many possible delays, not the least of which is UPS and Fedex having millions of extra shipments, that may cause delays, even if we are able to ship before Dec 23.

Our plan is to have the largest production runs in January through March. Shipping units based on perks selected and date of pledge. So keep in mind that people in the same perk group may get shipments that are a month apart simply based on how long they waited during the campaign before commiting. Commit early! Commit often!

The team at Xcyte is ready to Xcyte the world.  Established in 2014 our business has developed a unique range of music cables as we are the only company able to supply music cables free of interference.  Starting in Australia, we have sales staff ready to go.  We have a distributor established in the USA already and a major Silicon Valley company has shown interest in the technology.  They understand we can improve their already popular product range of tablets and cell phones.
Xcyte has secured a high profile endorser to boost on line sales.  Investment in our technology and campaign will allow us to launch an intensive on line advertising campaign to Xcyte the world.

The global earphone market is worth over $13B USD annually and continuing to grow annually.  Already we have one US journalist stating ""we probably have the best sounding earphones in the world""...and more to come!

• We are seeking $250,000 in funding to launch this technology.  Funds will be used to launch an intensive on line advertising campaign using our high profile endorser.  Funds will also be used to establish the USA distributor and also to make professional video presentations to attract customers.  Half the funds will be used in new product development.

• Xcyte has unique technology that can benefit every consumer and business in the world.  We are looking for a range of investors in our products and technology.  Rewards will vary from pairs of earphones to a share in the company.  We promise investors will not be disappointed with what we have planned as rewards!
• If we dont quite reach our target then our overall plan will be scaled back in proportion to the funds we receive.
Xcyte Cable technology has the ability to improve the listening experience for every music lover in the world...from earphone users, to home theatre lovers, live music venues to cinemas.

Moving forward our ground breaking electrical cables will benefit all aspects of power usage, saving power, money and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.  Be among the first to hear how we will change and improve electrical cables for the first time.

To date the technology has proven impossible to reverse engineer.  Our music cables are ready to go and generate income immediately.  However the earphone market is very competitive but from feedback from customers we understand we have an outstanding product and technology.

Even if you cant donate you can still help by liking our Facebook page.  Facebook likes and post shares will give people a random chance to win a set of earphones as we increase likes.  Each 100 likes we will give away a pair of Signature earphones.

column2: >At Star Cable, we hand build high grade audio cables for well known high-end brand customers. We have the capability to build cables that can produce exceptional sound quality but we want to take one step further to build something really awsome. Every decade or so, we see a big change or advance in the music industry. People often get lost in the new audio terms not knowing what they want is what they get and ended up spending a lot of money on the wrong audio gears. This is the reason we created Origin, because it can give the best audio in one piece and we want to put smiles on your face when you hear it. We are not a marketing company, so, we say what we mean and we deliver.

column1:
You need to have Hi-Res earphones and a Hi-Res DAC to hear Hi-Res music. 

Each DAC has its on unique characteristic, therefore, a good set of earphones may not be able to deliver to the best sounding potential if mis-matched DAC is used. After we looked at the latest audio standards in Hi-Res and Lossless music format, we are cofident to design and build a product that can truly deliver the performance what the new standards intended for.  So, Origin is end to end Hi-Res and we go even further, Solid Silver wires are used as the signal conductor from the USB connector all the way to the earphones. 



The Design
The amount of pure silver we put into Origin is beyond anyone's imagination.

Sabre32 is the best miniture  DAC processor in the market, it is very powerful and has the capability to faithfully convert  from lossy formats MP3 up to Lossless formats like FLAC (32bit 384Khz resolution) and Quad DSD. (256 times the CD sample rate). Making it the ultimate choice for us to ensure the source of the sound is solid.
column2:
>                                  

DAC Casing Design

We like to use metal in our products. so, we chose aluminum to house the Sabre32 DAC. The casing is light weight with polished surface and the reflective bright shine represents its solid silver content inside the cable. 

In the back of the case, we will laser carve a set of unique serial ID. 

The two gold plated buttons are for volume control, we dismissed other buttons, because they are really not that useful and not helping with the exterior appearance. 


Hi-Res Earphones

column1:
To find a matching earphone for the DAC ended up to be the toughest job. Most of the earphone makers don't produce Hi-Res earphones or not quite up to our expectation. There are several earphone driver technologies that can achieve Hi-Res standard (Frequency response at 40Khz is the minimum). Balanced Armature driver is one of the technologies to do the job but it is really expensive and really don't have the bass that we are after. Traditional Dynamic Drivers are really good for the lower frequency sounds. In the end, after no less than 10 earphone makers, we found a company that can provide a very special design that is just right for us. 
We think we can call it Multilayer Ceramic + Dynamic driver technology. Basically it can get up to 80Khz and as low as 5 hz (that is practically unmeasurable). So, our specification will set at 5hz to 60Khz, this is the range the earphone performs the best. 
As for the earphone casing design, we had to do it ourselves, luckily we have a very talented in-house industrial designer. He is best 3D printer in the world, just tell him what you want, he delivers almost instantly.

column4: >These Hi-Res earphones are specially tuned to match the characteristic of the Origin DAC. Solid firm bass, clear and detail in mid and

column6:
>Driver: dual driver (multilayer ceramic driver and dynamic driver)

Interconnected cables

We know cables, so, we put in the best material and technique to interlink the best DAC and the best earphones. Solid silver 23AWG in total with OFC wires form the braiding shield and acts as the negative signal return. Most earphone wires are very thin, because they use thin strands of enameled covered copper to form the signal core, which is very bad for audio signals but they can achieve thin and much less in cost. For Origin, sacraficing audio performance over cost or light weight is really not the idea. Our cables will be a little bigger in size but you will be rewarded with great sound quality and its Hi-Res all the way. 



Monster Sound Performance

Origin can produce very clean and powerful sounds in all range of sound frequency. 

For Vocal heavy music, Origin brings the singer's unique vocal techniques and fine details into your ears, your emotion will swing with the music

For Symphony music, all musical instruments can be clearly distinguished with  no muddiness or interference smudges. Your heart will beat in pace with the orchestra and your body will sense the enormous sound pressure when all the instruments pounds to the exclamation mark, just like your are there live. 

For gaming, Origin will bring you fully immersed in the battle field. You will hear everything that was build into the game. Bullets ricketshade, bombs exploding far away, glass breaking and even the grenade pin is pulled.  

Excellent for :

column1:
Market Comparison

Origin is make up of 3 parts, since, there is nothing in the market to compare to as a whole product, we can only split each part and compare them to what is available in the market. The price search was based on key word results from Amazon and eBay.

Portable DAC

Origin Digital to Audio Converter is 32bit/384Khz PCM and Quad DSD capable. 

Market price range from $69 to $149 

Earphone Cable

Audiophiles know how magical is if normal copper cables are replaced by Silver cables. Origin uses Solid Silver cables not Silver plated. The sound enhancement is exceptionally natural and detail. You got to hear it to believe it. 

Market price $59(short length) to $300

Hi-Res Earphones

If your earphones don't specify the frequency response over 40Khz, then its not Hi-Res capable. Hi-Res earphones Market Price $299 to $699


Origin will be retail at $299 after crowdfunding, its the best time to get them now starting at $99 unrealistic PERKS. Your contribution is a great encouragement for us to continue our  efforts to bring super unique audio products to you. 


Origin connector types

Origin offers 3 types of connectors. USB A, Micro USB and USB C Type. 

Origin works on Windows PC, Mac, Android Phones and iPhones.

For iPhone users we are sorry that we don't have a direct Lightning connector yet. However, a camera kit converter can do the job.

Origin Specification

Protective Case


                                    Time Line
column3: >Fund raised will go to cover portion of the tooling and production. Mainly, your involvement is an approval on our ambition to continue to provide unique quality audio products.

column1: The risks is minimal, because the electronic is mature and tested.  The main components are also used by the top audio makers. The earphones and the Silver raw materials makers are all based in Taiwan and close by our facility. We are confident to bring this product to mass production.

Working PCB testing with overhead earphones. 


Note:
Parts of the technical informations contained in the video are referenced to Sony and MQA knowledge base.

Most earphone wires are very thin, because they use thin strands of enameled covered copper to form the signal core, which is very bad for audio signals but they can achieve thin and much less in cost. For Origin, sacraficing audio performance over cost or light weight is really not the idea. Our cables will be a little bigger in size but you will be rewarded with great sound quality and its Hi-Res all the way. Monster Sound PerformanceOrigin can produce very clean and powerful sounds in all range of sound frequency. For Vocal heavy music, Origin brings the singer's unique vocal techniques and fine details into your ears, your emotion will swing with the musicFor Symphony music, all musical instruments can be clearly distinguished with  no muddiness or interference smudges. Your heart will beat in pace with the orchestra and your body will sense the enormous sound pressure when all the instruments pounds to the exclamation mark, just like your are there live. For gaming, Origin will bring you fully immersed in the battle field. You will hear everything that was build into the game. Bullets ricketshade, bombs exploding far away, glass breaking and even the grenade pin is pulled.  Excellent for :

Market ComparisonOrigin is make up of 3 parts, since, there is nothing in the market to compare to as a whole product, we can only split each part and compare them to what is available in the market. The price search was based on key word results from Amazon and eBay.Portable DACOrigin Digital to Audio Converter is 32bit/384Khz PCM and Quad DSD capable. Market price range from $69 to $149 Earphone CableAudiophiles know how magical is if normal copper cables are replaced by Silver cables. Origin uses Solid Silver cables not Silver plated. The sound enhancement is exceptionally natural and detail. You got to hear it to believe it. Market price $59(short length) to $300Hi-Res EarphonesIf your earphones don't specify the frequency response over 40Khz, then its not Hi-Res capable. Hi-Res earphones Market Price $299 to $699Origin will be retail at $299 after crowdfunding, its the best time to get them now starting at $99 unrealistic PERKS. Your contribution is a great encouragement for us to continue our  efforts to bring super unique audio products to you. Origin connector types

Origin offers 3 types of connectors. USB A, Micro USB and USB C Type. Origin works on Windows PC, Mac, Android Phones and iPhones.For iPhone users we are sorry that we don't have a direct Lightning connector yet. However, a camera kit converter can do the job.Origin Specification
Solid Silver core & OFC Braiding shield
USB A or USB C type

Protective Case                                    Time LineFund raised will go to cover portion of the tooling and production. Mainly, your involvement is an approval on our ambition to continue to provide unique quality audio products.

The risks is minimal, because the electronic is mature and tested.  The main components are also used by the top audio makers. The earphones and the Silver raw materials makers are all based in Taiwan and close by our facility. We are confident to bring this product to mass production.
Working PCB testing with overhead earphones. Note:Parts of the technical informations contained in the video are referenced to Sony and MQA knowledge base.",12.0,0,"1 Campaign
Meet the Wiggle Kit, A New Instrument For Singers

How great would it be to affect your vocals with a simple flick of the wrist? That’s why we introduce the Wiggle Kit: a new musical instrument that transforms expressive hand movements into expressive sounds effects.

By twisting your hand in different directions, you simply add sound effects to your voice. In the App that comes with the Wiggle Kit, you pick and change different effects, ranging from simple reverbs and delays to the most complex auto-tune and vocoder effects, all controlled from within the palm of your hand.

column7: s=b653077cd561966c10c474e825d1f3d6"" src="""" style='font-family: ""Benton Sans"", Helvetica, sans-serif

column1: See who is using the Wiggle Kit

The core of the Wiggle Kit is the Wiggle device itself. Small in size, but packed with the latest technology, it translates your hand movements into vocal effects. All without any noticeable latency. Up to three different effects can be controlled at the same time by moving the Wiggle from left to right, raising it from low to high or twisting the Wiggle around your wrist.
Simply connect the Wiggle Device to the App by holding it close to your phone or tablet. It will automatically connect via Bluetooth and be ready to use!
Pick one of the 20+ built-in voice effects for each direction of movement. Every effect can be customized and tweaked to your own preferences.
Sing into the microphone of your phone, tablet or headphones and the effects are instantly added to your voice. Control the intensity of each effect by twisting and turning the Wiggle.
What If I Don't Have A Professional Microphone?

We’ve got your back. Our goal was to create the most effortless music-making experience at any skill level. If you don’t have a dedicated microphone, the Wiggle App works great with the built-in microphone in your smartphone or headset, so you can practice anywhere you want!
Here's What You Can Do With the Wiggle App

The Wiggle Kit comes with a free App for your smartphone and tablet. Simply connect the Wiggle via Bluetooth, pick an effect from the built-in library and you’re ready to rock. Explore tutorials, find your favorite artists effect presets or start creating your own set of vocal effects to perfectly match your singing style. The possibilities are endless!

But if you want to use the Wiggle Kit with your own preferred software, we have great news for you: Because the Wiggle Device is fully MIDI-compatible, it works with over 100’s of MIDI apps and software like Ableton Live, Logic and FL Studio.
Whether you’re a professional or aspiring singer, each Wiggle Kit comes with everything you need to get started:
The Wiggle device is packed with the latest technology, all inside a super sturdy and compact design. Be warned, this device might look cute and small but under the hood, it's a beast of a machine.
After many iterations and years of testing and launching a successful Kickstarter in december 2017, we’re now fully prepared to launch the Wiggle Kit on Indiegogo!

We call ourself the Omnipresent World of Wizkids (OWOW for short). Based in the leading innovative technology region in Europe, Eindhoven, our team consists out of music and gear freaks, all with a strong vision towards the future of music production.

You might know us from our previous Kickstarter campaign two years ago and our recent Kickstarter campaign. Both projects got successfully funded and we shipped to all our happy 800 backers in the summer of 2016 and december 2017.

Two years ago we did our first Kickstarter campaign to fund four new MIDI instruments. This series was called the MIDIS and included the first model of the Wiggle. We successfully raised 51K to bring the MIDIS to production and shipped all rewards to more than 600 happy backers worldwide.

Although we got great feedback from users and internally known artists from all over the world, we decided to improve the MIDIS 1.0 by modifying the design, redesign the PCB and adding a Bluetooth chip to make them wireless, and more.

In May, earlier this year, we launched the MIDIS 2.0. We noticed that singers who used the Wiggle in their performances, struggled with the complex software needed to make it work. The issue was that many had never worked with music software and depended on their producer (or the front of house). That’s where the idea of the Wiggle App came along: To give singers a simple and easy to use tool to use vocal effects, either on stage, at the studio or at home.

However, we did not have the means to developed the Wiggle App at that time. That’s why we decided to bring the Wiggle Kit to Kickstarter: to raise funds for the development of the Wiggle App. Now that we have raised more than $22.5K and released the first version of the Wiggle App, we are working hard on bringing the Wiggle App to next level by developing and coming up with new effects!

If you like this project and want to support us but aren't ready to buy a Wiggle Kit, you can help us out by sharing this campaign with one of your friends. Many thanks!

 

 

Wiggle Kit is Part of the MIDIS series

column2: >MOTION SONIC is a novel motion-sensing effector to alter the sound based on the physical movement of your body.

>1
Wear the motion sensor on your hand

>2
Create your Effects with Motion on Mobile App

column1: MOTION SONIC gives you a new music experience that makes sounds become a part of your body. Just let your body flow along with your emotion, it allows you to alter the sound in sync with physical movement of your body. Now, musical performance is more instinctive, expressive and creative.
you will get a core device of MOTION SONIC, a band for back hand, a band for wrist and USB charging cable. To start with it, download the MOTION SONIC iOS app.

You can create your own Motion-Effect. Download MOTION SONIC iOS App and create your expression by selecting specific Motion and linking it to the specific effect you want to sync. It provide a variety of Motions and Effects below.

※MOTION SONIC app is for iOS( iOS13 or later, iPadOS13 or later required. iPhone 8 or later, iPad 5th generation or later, iPad mini 5th generation or later, iPad Air 3rd generation or later, required) for this campaign. Can not use it on Android and other device.

You can use your favorite instrument. Connect your mobile device  with your instrument via the audio interface. The mobile app paired with MOTION SONIC hardware via Bluetooth alters the sound of the instrument in response to your motions.
※ Note: Audio interface is not included in our product. You can use iOS compatible audio interface. To find audio interface, see FAQ section 5 on the bottom of this page.

I aim to create future that you can express sounds through your own body. To make it realized we designed the interactions that completely synchronize sound with your body. It allows you not to be conscious of the presence of the interface to control sound. Now, you can just let your body flow along with your emotion to express sounds.
I believe we can create new entertainment never seen before with MOTION SONIC and I’m so excited to create a new culture with you!

I was excited when I tried it because it captured even slight movements of my body and I could express the comfortable pitch waving by using it. It is not same with the other modulation effects for making Lo-fi sound because it is not the cyclic pitch waving but the pitch waving in sync with natural movements such as hitting keys or picking for playing guitar.

It extends my range of emotional expression because it reflects my body movements directly in sounds. Tools for controlling sound such as pitch bend and modulation wheel usually limit my expression by taking my hand away from a keyboard. On the other hand, it enriches my expression by applying complex effects in real time that I would have to be edited and inserted later, for example, I can control several sound effects at the same time without taking my hand away from a keyboard. In addition, from the point that It is easy to setup, it is suited for a live use.
1. Can you ship MOTION SONIC outside the US or JP?
We will ship to US and Japan only. At this moment, we have designed MOTION SONIC for compliance with US and Japanese regulations only.
Add ￥2,610(Approx. $24) to US, ￥1,050(Approx. $10) to JP at checkout for shipping.
4. How will we support the product and for how long?
MOTION SONIC will carry our 1-year U.S. and Japan warranty.
5. Do I need other tools for using MOTION SONIC?
You need iOS compatible audio interface to connect with the instrument.
There are two types of iOS compatible audio interface, USB Audio Interface and 3.5mm 4 pole audio jack Audio Interface.
b) Requiring Lightning USB Adapter type
6. Is the mobile app only for iOS?  Which mobile device I can use for app?

iOS13 or later, iPadOS13 or later required. iPhone 8 or later, iPad 5th generation or later, iPad mini 5th generation or later, iPad Air 3rd generation or later required. you can’t use it on Android and any other mobile device.
7. How do MOTION SONIC and App communicate?
MOTION SONIC use Bluetooth classic to communicate with iOS.
8. What is MOTION SONIC's battery life?
Max 6 hours of constant play if you turn off the illumination LED
Max 2.5 hours of constant play if you turn on the illumination LED with default brightness
9. Does a band to wear MOTION SONIC comes in different sizes?
One size only. Both bands for back of hand and for wrist can be adjustable for your hand size.
10. Can I use a band for back of hand for both left and right hand?
Yes, a band supports both left and right hand.
11. Can I use MOTION SONIC to control MIDI instruments?
12. What is the size of MOTION SONIC Wearable Device?
*All measurements are approximate of a current prototype.
Please note in advance that the actual dimensions of the product may slightly vary.
13. What if I have a question that wasn't covered in FAQ?
If you still have questions, Please send a direct message to the SNS official account below.

*Backers could see a link, ""Ask question"" on the top of our campaign page but please do not contact us from ”Ask question”. if you have any question or concern please send a direct message to our SNS account.

erot:bot is audio to to body interface. Which means that you can put audio directly on specific parts of the body.
                      '
column16:
This is the erot:bot which will soon be joined by its much larger sibling the alot:bot. 

What sets this apart from something like a conventional vibrator or massager is that it gives you massive creative control and therapeutic potential by giving you full control of the sensation.. whether you use it for physical therapy, sexual theraplay, fun, or sound healing.. erot bot opens up a world of eye rolling back bass drops directly into your body.

>
column29:

Imagine yourself improvising or even writing a masturpiece for your lover. fun for two or more people with audio splitters. 

the possibilities are literally endless !time is non linear!

cum profusely into the cyberpunk future! 

                          '
